atk-s0510a:1093_0: Evamādiguṇayutto devātidevo sakkātisakko brahmātibrahmā buddhātibuddho so mahākāruṇiko bhagavā attano
atk-s0510a:1093_1: buddhacariyaṃ buddhakāraṇaṃ sambhāvayamāno pākaṭaṃ kurumāno buddhāpadāniyaṃ nāma buddhakāraṇapakāsakaṃ
atk-s0510a:1093_2: nāma dhammapariyāyaṃ dhammadesanaṃ suttaṃ abhāsittha kathesīti.
atk-s0510a:1097_2: bhagavatā kattha paññatta”nti puṭṭho “atha paccekabuddhāpadānaṃ suṇāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:1098_2: Tattha jetakumārassa nāmavasena tathāsaññite vihāre catūhi iriyāpathavihārehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi
atk-s0510a:1098_3: vā vasantaṃ viharantaṃ yathā purimakā vipassiādayo buddhā samattiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā āgatā,
atk-s0510a:1098_10: Vedehiputto ca so muni ceti “vedehiputtamunī”ti vattabbe “vaṇṇāgamo”tiādinā niruttinayena i-
atk-s0510a:1098_15: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satimantānaṃ dhitimantānaṃ gatimantānaṃ bahussutānaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti
atk-s0510a:1098_16: etadagge ṭhapito āyasmā ānando nataṅgo namanakāyaṅgo añjaliko hutvā “bhante,
atk-s0510a:1098_17: paccekabuddhā nāma kīdisā hontī”ti apucchīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1098_18: Te paccekabuddhā kehi hetubhi kehi kāraṇehi bhavanti uppajjanti.
atk-s0510a:1099_1: Tato paraṃ vissajjitākāraṃ dassento “tadāha sabbaññuvaro mahesī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1099_2: Sabbaṃ atītādibhedaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya jānātīti sabbaññū,
atk-s0510a:1099_3: sabbaññū ca so varo uttamo ceti sabbaññuvaro.
atk-s0510a:1099_9: Ānandabhaddaṃ madhurena sarena tadā tasmiṃ pucchitakāle āha kathesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1099_11: ye paccekabuddhā pubbabuddhesu pubbesu atītabuddhesu katādhikārā katapuññasambhārā jinasāsanesu aladdhamokkhā appattanibbānā.
atk-s0510a:1099_12: Te sabbe paccekabuddhā dhīrā idha imasmiṃ loke saṃvegamukhena ekapuggalaṃ padhānaṃ katvā paccekabuddhā jātāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1099_14: Vināpi buddhehi buddhānaṃ ovādānusāsanīhi rahitā api.
atk-s0510a:1099_15: Parittakenapi appamattakenapi ārammaṇena paccekabodhiṃ paṭiekkaṃ bodhiṃ sammāsambuddhānantaraṃ bodhiṃ anupāpuṇanti paṭivijjhanti.
atk-s0510a:1100_1: Sabbamhi lokamhi sakalasmiṃ lokattaye mamaṃ ṭhapetvā maṃ vihāya pacekabuddhehi samova sadiso eva natthi,
atk-s0510a:1100_2: tesaṃ mahāmunīnaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ imaṃ vaṇṇaṃ imaṃ guṇaṃ padesamattaṃ saṅkhepamattaṃ ahaṃ tumhākaṃ sādhu sādhukaṃ vakkhāmi kathessāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1101_1: Anācariyakā hutvā sayameva buddhānaṃ attanāva paṭividdhānaṃ isīnaṃ antare mahāisīnaṃ madhūvakhuddaṃ khuddakamadhupaṭalaṃ
atk-s0510a:1101_2: iva sādhūni madhurāni vākyāni udānavacanāni anuttaraṃ uttaravirahitaṃ bhesajaṃ osadhaṃ nibbānaṃ patthayantā
atk-s0510a:1101_3: icchantā sabbe tumhe supasannacittā suppasannamanā suṇātha manasi karothāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1102_1: Paccekabuddhānaṃ samāgatānanti rāsibhūtānaṃ uppannānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ. Ariṭṭho,
atk-s0510a:1102_5: piyadassī, gandhāro, piṇḍolo, upāsabho, nitho, tatho, sutavā,
atk-s0510a:1102_6: bhāvitatto, sumbho, subho, methulo, aṭṭhamo, sumedho, anīgho, sudāṭho, hiṅgu, hiṅgo,
atk-s0510a:1102_9: santacitto, sacco, tatho, virajo, paṇḍito, kālo, upakālo, vijito, jito, aṅgo, paṅgo,
atk-s0510a:1102_21: dibbilo cātiādīnaṃ paccekabuddhasatānaṃ yāni apadānāni paramparaṃ paccekaṃ byākaraṇāni yo ca ādīnavo
atk-s0510a:1102_22: yañca virāgavatthuṃ anallīyanakāraṇaṃ yathā ca yena kāraṇena bodhiṃ anupāpuṇiṃsu catumaggañāṇaṃ paccakkhaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1102_23: Sarāgavatthusūti suṭṭhu allīyitabbavatthūsu vatthukāmakilesakāmesu virāgasaññī virattasaññavanto rattamhi
atk-s0510a:1102_24: lokamhi allīyanasabhāvaloke viratacittā anallīyanamanā hitvā papañceti rāgo papañcaṃ doso papañcaṃ sabbakilesā
atk-s0510a:1102_25: papañcāti papañcasaṅkhāte kilese hitvā jiya phanditānīti phanditāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni jinitvā tatheva
atk-s0510a:1102_26: tena kāraṇena evaṃ bodhiṃ anupāpuṇiṃsu paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ paccakkhaṃ kariṃsūti attho.
atk-s0510a:1103_1: Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍanti tajjanaphālanavadhabandhanaṃ nidhāya ṭhapetvā tesaṃ sabbasattānaṃ antare
atk-s0510a:1103_2: aññataraṃ kañci ekampi sattaṃ aviheṭhayaṃ aviheṭhayanto adukkhāpento mettena cittena “sabbe sattā sukhitā
atk-s0510a:1103_3: hontū”ti mettāsahagatena cetasā hitānukampī hitena anukampanasabhāvo.
atk-s0510a:1103_4: Atha vā sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍanti sabbesūti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1103_5: Bhūtesūti bhūtā vuccanti tasā ca thāvarā ca.
atk-s0510a:1103_9: Tasanti uttasanti paritasanti bhāyanti santāsaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0510a:1103_15: Thiranti na tasanti na uttasanti na paritasanti na bhāyanti na santāsaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0510a:1104_7: Sabbesu sakalesu bhūtesu sattesu taṃ tividhaṃ daṇḍaṃ nidhāya nidahitvā oropayitvā samoropayitvā nikkhipitvā
atk-s0510a:1104_8: paṭippassambhetvā hiṃsanatthaṃ agahetvāti sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1104_9: Aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesanti ekamekampi sattaṃ pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā anduyā vā rajjuyā vā aviheṭhayanto,
atk-s0510a:1104_10: sabbepi satte pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā anduyā vā rajjuyā vā aviheṭhayaṃ aviheṭhayanto aññatarampi tesaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1104_11: Na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyanti nāti paṭikkhepo.
atk-s0510a:1104_12: Puttanti cattāro puttā atrajo putto, khettajo, dinnako,
atk-s0510a:1104_14: Sahāyanti sahāyo vuccati yena saha āgamanaṃ phāsu,
atk-s0510a:1104_21: Na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyanti puttampi na iccheyya na sādiyeyya na pattheyya na pihayeyya nābhijappeyya,
atk-s0510a:1104_22: kuto mittaṃ vā sandiṭṭhaṃ vā sambhattaṃ vā sahāyaṃ vā iccheyya sādiyeyya pattheyya pihayeyya abhijappeyyāti na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1104_23: Eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti so paccekasambuddho pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko,
atk-s0510a:1105_1: So hi paccekasambuddho sabbaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhaṃ chinditvā,
atk-s0510a:1105_5: sannidhipalibodhaṃ chinditvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā nikkhamma anagāriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1105_6: pabbajitvā akiñcanabhāvaṃ upagantvā ekova carati viharati iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpetīti evaṃ
atk-s0510a:1106_1: So evaṃ pabbajito samāno eko araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni
atk-s0510a:1106_11: eko carati viharati iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpetīti evaṃ so adutiyaṭṭhena eko.
atk-s0510a:1107_0: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko?
atk-s0510a:1107_1: So eko adutiyo appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto mahāpadhānaṃ padahanto māraṃ sasenakaṃ namuciṃ kaṇhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1107_2: pamattabandhuṃ vidhametvā ca taṇhājāliniṃ visaritaṃ visattikaṃ pajahi vinodesi byantiṃ akāsi anabhāvaṃ gamesi.
atk-s0510a:1112_0: Evaṃ so paccekasambuddho taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko.
atk-s0510a:1114_0: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko?
atk-s0510a:1116_0: Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. –
atk-s0510a:1118_0: Kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho eko anuttaraṃ paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko?
atk-s0510a:1118_2: Paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-s0510a:1118_3: So paccekasambuddho tena paccekabodhiñāṇena “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti bujjhi,
atk-s0510a:1118_32: Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca bujjhi,
atk-s0510a:1118_35: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca bujjhi,
atk-s0510a:1119_0: Atha vā yaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ anubujjhitabbaṃ paṭibujjhitabbaṃ sambujjhitabbaṃ adhigantabbaṃ phassitabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1119_1: sabbaṃ taṃ tena paccekabodhiñāṇena bujjhi anubujjhi paṭibujjhi sambujjhi adhigañchi phassesi sacchākāsīti,
atk-s0510a:1119_2: evaṃ so paccekasambuddho eko anuttaraṃ paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.
atk-s0510a:1122_7: evaṃ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyatananti āyatanacariyāya carati.
atk-s0510a:1124_0: Khaggavisāṇakappoti yathā khaggassa nāma visāṇaṃ ekameva hoti, adutiyaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1124_1: evameva so paccekasambuddho takkappo tassadiso tappaṭibhāgo.
atk-s0510a:1124_10: khaggavisāṇasadiso khaggavisāṇapaṭibhāgo eko adutiyo muttabandhano sammā loke carati viharati iriyati
atk-s0510a:1124_11: vattati pāleti yapeti yāpetīti eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1125_0: “Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ;
atk-s0510a:1126_0: Na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1128_0: Ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno; Eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1130_0: Etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1131_0: “Vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā;
atk-s0510a:1132_0: Vaṃse kaḷīrova asajjamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1133_0: “Migo araññamhi yathā abaddho, yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya;
atk-s0510a:1134_0: Viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1135_0: “Āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ca ṭhāne gamane cārikāya;
atk-s0510a:1136_0: Anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1137_0: “Khiḍḍā ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe, puttesu pemaṃ vipulañca hoti;
atk-s0510a:1140_0: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1142_0: Appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1144_0: Chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1145_0: “Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
atk-s0510a:1146_0: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
atk-s0510a:1147_0: “No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
atk-s0510a:1148_0: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
atk-s0510a:1149_0: “Addhā pasaṃsāma sahāyasampadaṃ, seṭṭhā samā sevitabbā sahāyā;
atk-s0510a:1150_0: Ete aladdhā anavajjabhojī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1152_0: Saṅghaṭṭamānāni duve bhujasmiṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1153_0: “Evaṃ dutīyena sahā mamassa, vācābhilāpo abhisajjanā vā;
atk-s0510a:1154_0: Etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1155_0: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
atk-s0510a:1156_0: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1157_0: “Ītī ca gaṇḍo ca upaddavo ca, rogo ca sallañca bhayañca metaṃ;
atk-s0510a:1158_0: Etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1159_0: “Sītañca uṇhañca khudaṃ pipāsaṃ, vātātape ḍaṃsasarīsape ca;
atk-s0510a:1162_0: Yathābhirantaṃ viharaṃ araññe, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1164_0: Ādiccabandhussa vaco nisamma, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1168_0: Nirāsayo sabbaloke bhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1170_0: Sayaṃ na seve pasutaṃ pamattaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1172_0: Aññāya atthāni vineyya kaṅkhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1174_0: Vibhūsaṭṭhānā virato saccavādī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1175_0: “Puttañca dāraṃ pitarañca mātaraṃ, dhanāni dhaññāni ca bandhavāni;
atk-s0510a:1176_0: Hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1177_0: “Saṅgo eso parittamettha sokhyaṃ, appassādo dukkhamevettha bhiyyo;
atk-s0510a:1178_0: Gaḷo eso iti ñatvā matimā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1180_0: Aggīva daḍḍhaṃ anivattamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1186_0: Kule kule appaṭibaddhacitto, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1188_0: Anissito chejja sinehadosaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1190_0: Laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1194_0: Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesu, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1196_0: Saṅkhātadhammo niyato padhānavā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1198_0: Padumaṃva toyena alimpamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1199_0: “Sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī;
atk-s0510a:1200_0: Sevetha pantāni senāsanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1201_0: “Mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle;
atk-s0510a:1202_0: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1205_0: “Bhajanti sevanti ca kāraṇatthā, nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittā;
atk-s0510a:1207_8: Visesena pana yasmā ettha kāci gāthā tena tena paccekabuddhena puṭṭhena vuttā,
atk-s0510a:1207_9: kāci apuṭṭhena attanā adhigatamagganayānurūpaṃ udānaṃyeva udānentena,
atk-s0510a:1207_12: Tattha yā ayaṃ avisesena pucchāvasito uppatti,
atk-s0510a:1208_1: Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0510a:1208_6: So paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yathākkamena etamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1209_1: ānisaṃsā pubbayogāvacare diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacceva aññaṃ ārādheti.
atk-s0510a:1209_2: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacceva aññaṃ ārādheti,
atk-s0510a:1211_2: tasmā paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ sabbesaṃ patthanā ca abhinīhāro ca icchitabbo”ti.
atk-s0510a:1212_7: Ete ca bhedā paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikānaṃ vasena ñātabbā.
atk-s0510a:1212_14: Appatvā pana cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ dānaṃ dentopi
atk-s0510a:1212_15: tadanurūpe sīlādipāramidhamme ācinantopi antarā buddho bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0510a:1212_19: Yathā nāma timāsacatumāsapañcamāsaccayena nipphajjanakaṃ sassaṃ taṃ taṃ kālaṃ appatvā divase divase satakkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:1212_20: sahassakkhattuṃ keḷāyantopi udakena siñcantopi antarā pakkhena vā māsena vā nipphādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0510a:1212_24: Evamevaṃ appatvā cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca antarā buddho bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0510a:1212_25: Tasmā yathāvuttameva kālaṃ pāramipūraṇaṃ kātabbaṃ ñāṇaparipākatthāya.
atk-s0510a:1212_26: Ettakenāpi ca kālena buddhattaṃ patthayato abhinīhārakaraṇe aṭṭha sampattiyo icchitabbā. Ayañhi –
atk-s0510a:1216_2: Aññatra hi manussajātiyā avasesajātīsu devajātiyampi ṭhitassa paṇidhi na ijjhati,
atk-s0510a:1216_3: tattha ṭhitena pana buddhattaṃ patthayantena dānādīni puññakammāni katvā manussattaṃyeva patthetabbaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1216_7: Mātugāmanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānañhi manussajātiyaṃ ṭhitānampi paṇidhi na ijjhati.
atk-s0510a:1216_8: Tattha ṭhitena pana buddhattaṃ patthentena dānādīni puññakammāni katvā purisabhāvoyeva patthetabbo,
atk-s0510a:1216_12: Yo hi tasmiṃ attabhāve vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho,
atk-s0510a:1216_15: So hi dīpaṅkarapādamūle pabbajitvā tenattabhāvena arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1216_19: So hi dīpaṅkaraṃ sammukhā disvā paṇidhiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1216_21: So ca kho sāsane vā kammavādikiriyavāditāpasaparibbājakanikāye vā vaṭṭati yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa.
atk-s0510a:1216_22: So hi sumedho nāma tāpaso hutvā paṇidhiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1216_26: So hi pañcābhiñño ca aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ca hutvā paṇidhesi.
atk-s0510a:1216_30: no itarassa yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa. So hi –
atk-s0510a:1218_0: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0510a:1219_4: Sā ca sace koci vadeyya “ko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca niraye paccitvā buddhattaṃ icchatī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1219_7: Tathā yadi koci vadeyya “ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ vītaccikānaṃ aṅgārānaṃ pūraṃ akkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchati,
atk-s0510a:1219_8: ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sattisūlehi ākiṇṇaṃ akkamanto atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchati,
atk-s0510a:1219_9: ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ samatittikaṃ udakapuṇṇaṃ uttaritvā buddhattaṃ icchati,
atk-s0510a:1219_10: ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ nirantaraṃ veḷugumbasañchannaṃ maddanto atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchatī”ti,
atk-s0510a:1219_13: Evarūpena ca kattukamyatāchandena samannāgato sumedhapaṇḍito paṇidhesīti.
atk-s0510a:1220_0: Evaṃ samiddhābhinīhāro ca bodhisatto imāni aṭṭhārasa abhabbaṭṭhānāni na upeti.
atk-s0510a:1220_1: So hi tato pabhuti na jaccandho hoti na jaccapadhiro,
atk-s0510a:1220_11: na tiracchānayoniyaṃ vaṭṭakato pacchimattabhāvo hatthito adhikattabhāvo hoti,
atk-s0510a:1221_0: Yā cimā ussāho ca ummaṅgo ca avatthānañca hitacariyā cāti catasso buddhabhūmiyo,
atk-s0510a:1224_7: yehi samannāgatattā nekkhammajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā kāmesu dosadassāvino,
atk-s0510a:1224_12: nissaraṇajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā sabbabhavesu dosadassāvinoti vuccanti,
atk-s0510a:1225_0: Paccekabuddhānaṃ pana kīva ciraṃ patthanā vaṭṭatīti?
atk-s0510a:1225_4: Ettakenāpi ca kālena paccekabuddhattaṃ patthayato abhinīhārakaraṇe pañca sampattiyo icchitabbā. Tesañhi –
atk-s0510a:1228_0: Tattha vigatāsavadassananti buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ yassa kassaci dassananti attho.
atk-s0510a:1229_3: Tathā buddhassa mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhākassa puttassa cāti,
atk-s0510a:1229_6: Imesaṃ pana sabbesampi adhikāro ca chandatāti dvaṅgasamannāgatoyeva abhinīhāro hoti.
atk-s0510a:1230_0: Evaṃ imāya patthanāya iminā ca abhinīhārena yathāvuttappabhedaṃ kālaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā buddhā loke uppajjantā
atk-s0510a:1230_7: Te pana buddhānaṃ uppajjanakāle na uppajjanti.
atk-s0510a:1230_14: Na hi te lokuttaradhammaṃ paññattiṃ āropetvā desetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0510a:1230_15: mūgena diṭṭhasupino viya vanacarakena nagare sāyitabyañjanaraso viya ca nesaṃ dhammābhisamayo hoti.
atk-s0510a:1230_17: Guṇavisiṭṭhatāya buddhānaṃ heṭṭhā sāvakānaṃ upari honti,
atk-s0510a:1230_20: vosānaṃ nāpajjitabba”nti iminā uddesena uposathaṃ karonti,
atk-s0510a:1230_22: uposathaṃ karontā ca gandhamādane mañjūsakarukkhamūle ratanamāḷe sannipatitvā karontīti.
atk-s0510a:1230_23: Evaṃ bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa paccekabuddhānaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ patthanañca abhinīhārañca kathetvā
atk-s0510a:1230_24: idāni imāya patthanāya iminā ca abhinīhārena samudāgate te te paccekabuddhe kathetuṃ “sabbesu bhūtesu
atk-s0510a:1230_25: nidhāya daṇḍa”ntiādinā nayena imaṃ khaggavisāṇasuttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1230_26: Ayaṃ tāva avisesena pucchāvasito khaggavisāṇasuttassa uppatti.
atk-s0510a:1231_1: Tattha imissā tāva gāthāya evaṃ uppatti veditabbā –
atk-s0510a:1231_2: ayaṃ kira paccekabuddho paccekabodhisattabhūmiṃ ogāhanto dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo
atk-s0510a:1231_3: pūretvā kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā āraññiko hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1231_4: Etaṃ kira vattaṃ aparipūretvā paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0510a:1232_0: Idha ekacco bhikkhu harati na paccāharati,
atk-s0510a:1232_4: Tattha yo bhikkhu pageva vuṭṭhāya cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā pānīyaghaṭaṃ
atk-s0510a:1232_5: pūretvā pānīyamāḷe ṭhapetvā ācariyavattaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ katvā dveasīti khandhakavattāni ca cuddasa
atk-s0510a:1232_7: So sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0510a:1232_8: tāva vivittāsane vītināmetvā velaṃ ñatvā nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā saṅghāṭiṃ
atk-s0510a:1232_9: khandhe karitvā pattaṃ aṃse ālaggetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonto cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā cetiyañca bodhiñca
atk-s0510a:1232_10: vanditvā gāmasamīpe cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ ādāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-s0510a:1232_11: Evaṃ paviṭṭho ca lābhī bhikkhu puññavā upāsakehi sakkato garukato upaṭṭhākakule vā paṭikkamanasālāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1232_12: vā paṭikkamitvā upāsakehi taṃ taṃ pañhaṃ pucchiyamāno tesaṃ pañhavissajjanena dhammadesanāvikkhepena
atk-s0510a:1232_14: Vihāraṃ āgatopi bhikkhūhi pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti,
atk-s0510a:1232_17: Pacchābhattampi purimayāmampi majjhimayāmampi evaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ papañcetvā kāyaduṭṭhullābhibhūto pacchimayāmepi sayati,
atk-s0510a:1233_2: Pageva vuṭṭhāya yathāvuttaṃ vattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasi kātuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1233_3: aññadatthu yāguṃ vā khajjakaṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā patthayamāno kālasseva pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0510a:1233_4: Tattha yāguṃ vā khajjakaṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā laddhā pattaṃ nīharitvā bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0510a:1233_5: paññattāsane nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā visesaṃ patvā vā apatvā vā vihāraṃ āgantvā teneva manasikārena viharati.
atk-s0510a:1233_7: Edisā hi bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā,
atk-s0510a:1233_8: sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṃ taṃ āsanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0510a:1233_9: yattha bhikkhū nisinnā yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ appattā.
atk-s0510a:1234_2: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā gihīhi saddhiṃ kathāpapañcena papañcito tucchakova nikkhamati.
atk-s0510a:1235_0: Yo pana pageva vuṭṭhāya purimanayeneva sabbavattāni paripūretvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0510a:1235_1: tāva pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0510a:1235_4: Tattha sabbatthakaṃ nāma mettā ca maraṇānussati ca.
atk-s0510a:1235_7: Āvāsesu hi mettāvihārī bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo,
atk-s0510a:1235_9: Devatāsu mettāvihārī devatāhi rakkhitagopito sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0510a:1235_10: Rājarājamahāmattādīsu mettāvihārī tehi mamāyito sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0510a:1235_11: Gāmanigamādīsu mettāvihārī sabbattha bhikkhācariyādīsu manussehi sakkato garukato sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0510a:1236_0: Yaṃ pana sadā pariharitabbaṃ cariyānukūlena gahitaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1236_3: taṃ sadā pariharitabbato rakkhitabbato bhāvetabbato ca “pārihāriya”nti vuccati,
atk-s0510a:1236_5: Atthakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti – “āvuso,
atk-s0510a:1236_6: tumhe na iṇaṭṭā na bhayaṭṭā na jīvikāpakatā pabbajitā,
atk-s0510a:1236_8: Tasmā gamane uppannakilese gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne,
atk-s0510a:1237_0: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu pāsāṇā honti,
atk-s0510a:1237_6: So “ayaṃ bhikkhu tuyhaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0510a:1237_7: ananucchavikaṃ te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-s0510a:1237_10: Soyeva nayo ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ asakkontopi taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati,
atk-s0510a:1238_0: So kira ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento evaṃ vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:1238_1: Manussāpi sudaṃ antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni karontā ca theraṃ tathā gacchantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1238_5: So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttena citteneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1238_6: Arahattapattadivaseyevassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0510a:1238_7: cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1238_8: Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsī mahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi –
atk-s0510a:1238_11: Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti maṇiobhāsopī”ti evamādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1239_1: Sopi kira gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento “paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī”ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0510a:1239_2: puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1239_3: Evaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanuyuttacitteneva pādaṃ uddharanto vippayuttena cittena uddhaṭe paṭinivattanto gāmasamīpaṃ
atk-s0510a:1239_4: gantvā “gāvī nu kho pabbajito nu kho”ti āsaṅkanīyappadese ṭhatvā saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ gahetvā gāmadvāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1239_5: patvā kacchakantarato udakaṃ gahetvā gaṇḍūsaṃ katvā gāmaṃ pavisati “bhikkhaṃ vā dātuṃ vandituṃ vā upagate
atk-s0510a:1239_6: manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi mā me kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1240_0: Sīhaḷadīpe kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca.
atk-s0510a:1240_3: Gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā gāmadvāre udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu,
atk-s0510a:1240_10: “kiṃ nu kho ete amheheva saddhiṃ na sallapanti,
atk-s0510a:1240_16: Tattha paññāsāya bhikkhūsu vassaṃ upagatesu dve bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1240_24: Tepi bhikkhū antovasseyeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1241_0: Evaṃ kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā bhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva
atk-s0510a:1241_1: cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo
atk-s0510a:1241_4: Tattha ca piṇḍāya caranto na turitaturito javena gacchati,
atk-s0510a:1241_6: visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ pana udakabharitasakaṭamiva niccalo hutvā gacchati.
atk-s0510a:1241_7: Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ vā adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:1241_8: patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto āhāre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā akkhabbhañjanavaṇālepanaputtamaṃsūpamāvasena
atk-s0510a:1241_9: paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāya na madāya…pe…
atk-s0510a:1241_10: bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ vinodetvā yathā purebhattaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1242_11: atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño hoti seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo,
atk-s0510a:1242_12: mahāpañño vā hoti seyyathāpi thero sāriputtoti.
atk-s0510a:1243_0: Ayaṃ pana paccekabodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā āraññiko hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni
atk-s0510a:1243_1: etaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā kālaṃ katvā kāmāvacaradevaloke uppajji.
atk-s0510a:1243_2: Tato cavitvā bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0510a:1243_5: tasmā esāpi taṃ gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṃ rañño nivedesi.
atk-s0510a:1243_7: yaṃ puññavante satte gabbhe uppanne mātugāmo gabbhaparihāraṃ labhati.
atk-s0510a:1243_9: Sā tato pabhuti nāccuṇhaṃ kiñci ajjhoharituṃ labhati,
atk-s0510a:1243_11: Accuṇhe hi mātarā ajjhohaṭe gabbhassa lohakumbhivāso viya hoti,
atk-s0510a:1243_13: accambilaloṇakaṭukatittakesu bhuttesu satthena phāletvā ambilādīhi sittāni viya dārakassa aṅgāni tibbavedanāni honti.
atk-s0510a:1243_14: Aticaṅkamanaṭṭhānanisajjasayanatopi naṃ nivārenti “kucchigatassa sañcalanadukkhaṃ mā ahosī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1243_15: Mudukattharaṇatthatāya bhūmiyā caṅkamanādīni mattāya kātuṃ labhati,
atk-s0510a:1243_16: vaṇṇagandhādisampannaṃ sāduṃ sappāyaṃ annapānaṃ bhuñjituṃ labhati.
atk-s0510a:1244_0: Sā evaṃ parihariyamānā gabbhaparipākakāle sūtigharaṃ pavisitvā paccūsasamaye puttaṃ vijāyi pakkatelamadditamanosilāpiṇḍisadisaṃ
atk-s0510a:1244_2: Tato naṃ pañcamadivase alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ rañño dassesuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1244_4: So sabbasampattīhi vaḍḍhamāno nacirasseva viññutaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1244_7: Abhisitto rājaputto rajjaṃ kāresi nāmena brahmadatto,
atk-s0510a:1244_9: Jambudīpe kira pubbe caturāsīti nagarasatasahassāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1244_14: tenassa vīsati nagarasahassāni ahesuṃ vīsati pāsādasahassāni,
atk-s0510a:1244_19: vīsati itthisahassāni orodhā ca nāṭakitthiyo ca,
atk-s0510a:1245_0: So mahārajjaṃ kārayamānoyeva kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pañca abhiññāyo,
atk-s0510a:1245_2: Yasmā pana abhisittaraññā nāma avassaṃ aṭṭakaraṇe nisīditabbaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1245_3: tasmā ekadivasaṃ pageva pātarāsaṃ bhuñjitvā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:1245_5: so “ayaṃ saddo samāpattiyā upakkileso”ti pāsādatalaṃ abhiruhitvā “samāpattiṃ appemī”ti nisinno nāsakkhi appetuṃ rajjavikkhepena samāpatti parihīnā.
atk-s0510a:1245_10: samaṇadhammasukhaṃ pana vipulaṃ anekānisaṃsaṃ uttamapurisehi sevitañcā”ti ñatvā aññataraṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi “imaṃ rajjaṃ dhammena samena anusāsa,
atk-s0510a:1245_11: mā kho adhammakāraṃ kāresī”ti sabbaṃ tassa niyyātetvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā samāpattisukhena vītināmesi,
atk-s0510a:1246_8: Sā punapi dvattikkhattuṃ pesetvā anicchamānaṃ santajjāpesi “yadi na karosi,
atk-s0510a:1246_13: Ekadivasaṃ raho gantvā tāya saddhiṃ sirisayane saṃvāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:1246_15: so tassā samphassarāgena ratto tattha abhikkhaṇaṃ saṅkitasaṅkitova agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1246_16: Anukkamena attano gharasāmiko viya nibbisaṅko pavisitumāraddho.
atk-s0510a:1247_0: Tato rājamanussā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1247_3: tato rājā nilīno sayameva disvā sabbe amacce sannipātāpetvā ārocesi.
atk-s0510a:1247_13: So attano dhanasārañca puttadārañca gahetvā paravisayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1247_17: Amacco katipāhaccayena laddhavissāso taṃ rājānaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:1247_21: Rājā “kiṃ etaṃ uppaṇḍetukāmo bhaṇatī”ti na suṇāti.
atk-s0510a:1247_22: So antaraṃ labhitvā punapi suṭṭhutaraṃ vaṇṇetvā avoca.

atk-s0510a:1284_3: tesaṃ sukhaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo dukkhaṃ apaharitukāmo ca.
atk-s0510a:1285_1: tathā attatthaparatthaubhayatthavasenāpi tividhaṃ atthaṃ laddhavināsanena aladdhānuppādanenāti dvidhāpi hāpeti vināseti.
atk-s0510a:1285_4: esa me parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ nīce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
atk-s0510a:1285_7: ahaṃ tesaṃ parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
atk-s0510a:1287_2: Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane tayo paccekabodhisattā pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke uppannā.
atk-s0510a:1287_3: Tato cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasirājakule nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:1287_5: Te ubhopi kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā anukkamena paccekabuddhā hutvā nandamūlakapabbhāre
atk-s0510a:1287_6: vasantā ekadivasaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “mayaṃ kiṃ kammaṃ katvā imaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ anuppattā”ti āvajjetvā
atk-s0510a:1287_7: paccavekkhamānā kassapabuddhakāle attano attano cariyaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1287_8: Tato “tatiyo kuhi”nti āvajjentā bārāṇasirajjaṃ kārentaṃ disvā tassa guṇe saritvā “so pakatiyāva appicchatādiguṇasamannāgato hoti,
atk-s0510a:1287_9: amhākaṃyeva ovādako vattā vacanakkhamo pāpagarahī, handa,
atk-s0510a:1287_10: naṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassetvā ārocemā”ti okāsaṃ gavesantā taṃ ekadivasaṃ sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1287_13: Tato rājā “atthi nu kho koci mama dassane byāpāraṃ na karotī”ti olokento paccekabuddhe addakkhi.
atk-s0510a:1287_14: Saha dassaneneva cassa tesu sineho uppajji.
atk-s0510a:1287_15: So hatthikkhandhā oruyha santena ācārena upasaṅkamitvā “bhante,
atk-s0510a:1287_24: imaṃ veḷugumbaṃ sabbaso mūlakhandhasākhānusākhāhi saṃsibbitvā ṭhitaṃ asihattho puriso mūle chetvā āviñchanto na sakkuṇeyya uddharituṃ,
atk-s0510a:1287_25: evameva tvaṃ anto ca bahi ca jaṭāya jaṭito āsattavisatto tattha vilaggo.
atk-s0510a:1287_26: Seyyathāpi vā panassa vemajjhagatopi ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīro asañjātasākhattā kenaci alaggova ṭhito,
atk-s0510a:1287_27: sakkā ca pana agge vā mūle vā chetvā uddharituṃ,
atk-s0510a:1287_28: evameva mayaṃ katthaci asajjamānā sabbā disā gacchāmā”ti tāvadeva catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā passato
atk-s0510a:1287_31: “kadā nu kho ahampi evaṃ asajjamāno bhaveyya”nti tattheva ṭhito vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1287_32: Purimanayeneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1288_11: Yā apekkhāti yā taṇhā yo sineho.
atk-s0510a:1288_14: Yathā vaṃso visālo visatto eva hoti,
atk-s0510a:1288_18: Svāhaṃ tāya apekkhāya apekkhavā visālo vaṃso viya visattoti evaṃ apekkhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ apekkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1288_19: maggañāṇena chindanto ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrova rūpādīsu vā lābhādīsu vā kāmabhavādīsu vā diṭṭhādīsu vā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0510a:1290_2: Eko kira bhikkhu kassapassa bhagavato sāsane yogāvacaro kālaṃ katvā bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhikule uppanno aḍḍhe mahaddhane mahābhoge.
atk-s0510a:1290_4: tato paradāriko hutvā kālaṅkato niraye nibbatto tattha paccitvā pakkāvasesena seṭṭhibhariyāya kucchimhi itthī hutvā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:1290_5: Nirayato āgatānaṃ sattānaṃ gattāni uṇhāni honti.
atk-s0510a:1290_6: Tena seṭṭhibhariyā ḍayhamānena udarena kicchena kasirena taṃ gabbhaṃ dhāretvā kālena dārikaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0510a:1290_7: Sā jātadivasato pabhuti mātāpitūnaṃ sesabandhuparijanānañca dessā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1290_9: tatthāpi sāmikasassusasurānaṃ dessāva ahosi appiyā amanāpā.
atk-s0510a:1290_10: Atha nakkhatte ghosite seṭṭhiputto tāya saddhiṃ kīḷituṃ anicchanto vesiṃ ānetvā kīḷati.
atk-s0510a:1290_11: Sā taṃ dāsīnaṃ santikā sutvā seṭṭhiputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nānappakārehi anunayitvā ca āha –
atk-s0510a:1290_13: itthī nāma sacepi dasannaṃ rājūnaṃ kaniṭṭhā hoti,
atk-s0510a:1290_16: Sāmike anālapante sūle āropitā viya dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
atk-s0510a:1290_17: Sace ahaṃ anuggahārahā anuggahetabbā, no ce,
atk-s0510a:1290_23: Seṭṭhidhītā tāvattakena sallāpamattena ussāhajātā “sve nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti bahuṃ khajjabhojjaṃ paṭiyādeti.
atk-s0510a:1290_26: idāni pesessatī”ti maggaṃ olokentī nisinnā ussūraṃ disvā manusse pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1290_28: Sā taṃ sabbaṃ paṭiyāditaṃ ādāya yānaṃ abhiruhitvā uyyānaṃ gantuṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0510a:1291_0: Atha nandamūlakapabbhāre paccekasambuddho sattame divase nirodhā vuṭṭhāya nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā
atk-s0510a:1291_1: anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā “kattha ajja bhikkhaṃ carissāmā”ti āvajjento taṃ seṭṭhidhītaraṃ disvā “mayi
atk-s0510a:1291_2: imissā saddhākāraṃ kāretvā taṃ kammaṃ parikkhayaṃ gamissatī”ti ñatvā pabbhārasamīpe saṭṭhiyojanamanosilātale
atk-s0510a:1291_3: ṭhatvā pattacīvaramādāya abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā ākāsenāgantvā tassā paṭipathe oruyha bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0510a:1291_6: Sā yānā oruyha sakkaccaṃ vanditvā pattaṃ sabbarasasampannena khādanīyena bhojanīyena pūretvā padumapupphena
atk-s0510a:1291_7: paṭicchādetvā heṭṭhāpi padumapupphaṃ katvā pupphakalāpaṃ hatthena gahetvā paccekabuddhassa hatthe pattaṃ
atk-s0510a:1291_11: tattha tattha mahājanassa piyā bhaveyyaṃ manāpā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1291_14: taṃ anupagamma padumapupphe eva paṭisandhi bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1291_18: Tasmā ahaṃ itthibhāvaṃ anupagamma puriso bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:1291_20: imaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ atikkamma pariyosāne tumhehi pattaṃ amataṃ pāpuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:1291_21: Evaṃ caturo paṇidhī katvā taṃ padumapupphakalāpaṃ pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā “pupphasadiso eva
atk-s0510a:1291_22: me gandho ceva vaṇṇo ca hotū”ti imaṃ pañcamaṃ paṇidhiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1292_0: Tato paccekabuddho pattañca pupphakalāpañca gahetvā ākāse ṭhatvā –
atk-s0510a:1294_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0510a:1295_0: Imāya gāthāya seṭṭhidhītāya anumodanaṃ katvā “seṭṭhidhītā maṃ gacchantaṃ passatū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā ākāsena nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1295_1: Seṭṭhidhītāya taṃ passantiyā mahatī pīti uppajji.
atk-s0510a:1295_2: Bhavantare kataṃ akusalaṃ kammaṃ anokāsatāya parikkhīṇaṃ ciñcambiladhotatambalohabhājanamiva suddhā jātā.
atk-s0510a:1295_3: Tāvadevassā patikule ñātikule ca sabbo jano tuṭṭho.
atk-s0510a:1295_4: “Kiṃ karomā”ti piyavacanāni ca paṇṇākārāni ca pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1295_8: Tato pabhuti ca naṃ ure vilittacandanaṃ viya āmuttamuttāhāraṃ viya pupphamālā viya ca piyāyanto parihari.
atk-s0510a:1295_9: Sā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ issariyabhogayuttasukhaṃ anubhavitvā kālaṃ katvā purisabhāvena devaloke padumapupphe uppajji.
atk-s0510a:1295_10: So devaputto gacchantopi padumapupphagabbhe eva gacchati,
atk-s0510a:1295_13: Evaṃ so tena iddhānubhāvena anulomapaṭilomaṃ cha devaloke eva saṃsarati.
atk-s0510a:1296_0: Tena ca samayena bārāṇasirañño vīsati itthisahassāni honti.
atk-s0510a:1296_5: Atha rājā “ṭhapetvā mahesiṃ avasesā itthiyo sattāhaṃ dhammanāṭakaṃ karothā”ti yathākāmaṃ bahi carāpesi,
atk-s0510a:1296_9: mahesī nāma puññena ca paññāya ca sabbaitthīnaṃ aggā,
atk-s0510a:1296_10: appeva nāma devo mahesiyā kucchimhi puttaṃ labheyyā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1296_11: Rājā mahesiyā etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Sā āha –
atk-s0510a:1296_15: hirottapparahitāya kuto putto”ti pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā pañca sīlāni samādiyitvā punappunaṃ āvajjesi,
atk-s0510a:1296_16: sīlavatiyā rājadhītāya pañca sīlāni āvajjentiyā puttapatthanācitte uppannamatte sakkassa āsanaṃ saṃkampi.
atk-s0510a:1297_1: “sīlavatiyā rājadhītāya puttavaraṃ demī”ti ākāsenāgantvā deviyā sammukhe ṭhito “kiṃ varesi, devī”ti? “Puttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1297_4: mā cintayī”ti vatvā devalokaṃ gantvā “atthi nu kho ettha khīṇāyuko”ti āvajjento “ayaṃ mahāpadumo uparidevalokaṃ
atk-s0510a:1297_5: gantukāmo ca bhavissatī”ti ñatvā tassa vimānaṃ gantvā “tāta mahāpaduma,
atk-s0510a:1297_10: tattheva ṭhatvā pāramiyo pūretabbā, gaccha, tātā”ti. “Dukkho, mahārāja,
atk-s0510a:1298_0: So devalokā cavitvā bārāṇasirañño uyyāne silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ padumagabbhe nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:1298_1: Tañca rattiṃ paccūsasamaye mahesī supinantena vīsatiitthisahassaparivutā uyyānaṃ gantvā silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ padumagabbhe puttaṃ laddhā viya ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1298_2: Sā pabhātāya rattiyā sīlāni rakkhamānā tattha gantvā ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ addasa,
atk-s0510a:1298_3: taṃ neva tīre hoti na gambhīre.
atk-s0510a:1298_4: Saha dassaneneva cassā tattha puttasineho uppajji.
atk-s0510a:1298_5: Sā sayaṃ eva otaritvā taṃ pupphaṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0510a:1298_11: Rājā sutvā “kattha laddho”ti pucchitvā laddhokāsaṃ sutvā “uyyānañca pokkharaṇiyaṃ padumañca amhākaṃyeva,
atk-s0510a:1298_12: tasmā amhākaṃ khette jātattā khettajo nāmāyaṃ putto”ti vatvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā vīsatisahassaitthiyo dhātikiccaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0510a:1298_13: Yā yā kumārassa ruciṃ ñatvā patthitaṃ patthitaṃ khādanīyaṃ khādāpeti,
atk-s0510a:1298_18: imaṃ bhuñjā”ti vuccamāno bhojanena ubbāḷho ukkaṇṭhito hutvā gopuradvāraṃ gantvā lākhāguḷakena kīḷati.
atk-s0510a:1299_0: Tadā aññataro paccekabuddho bārāṇasiṃ nissāya isipatane vasati.
atk-s0510a:1299_1: So kālasseva vuṭṭhāya senāsanavattasarīraparikammamanasikārādīni sabbakiccāni katvā paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito
atk-s0510a:1299_2: “ajja kattha bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī”ti āvajjento kumārassa sampattiṃ disvā “esa pubbe kiṃ kammaṃ karī”ti
atk-s0510a:1299_3: vīmaṃsanto “mādisassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā catasso patthanā patthesi,
atk-s0510a:1299_6: tassa upāyena ārammaṇaṃ dassemī”ti bhikkhācāravasena kumārassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1299_11: So ekavacaneneva tato nivattitvā attano senāsanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1299_15: So tehi “pabbajitā nāma na kodhaparāyaṇā honti,
atk-s0510a:1299_17: tena yāpentī”ti vuccamānepi “duṭṭho evarūpo nāma samaṇo,
atk-s0510a:1299_18: khamāpessāmi na”nti mātāpitūnaṃ ārocetvā hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā mahatā rājānubhāvena isipatanaṃ gantvā migayūthaṃ disvā pucchi –
atk-s0510a:1299_23: imaṃ sāyathā’ti vatvā paṭijaggantā atthī”ti? “Natthi, sāmi,
atk-s0510a:1300_2: kadā nu kho ahampi evaṃ vaseyya”nti etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0510a:1300_3: Paccekabuddhopi tassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā senāsanamaggañca caṅkamanañca sammajjitvā maṭṭhaṃ katvā ekadvattikkhattuṃ
atk-s0510a:1300_4: caṅkamitvā padanikkhepaṃ dassetvā divāvihārokāsañca paṇṇasālañca sammajjitvā maṭṭhaṃ katvā pavisanapadanikkhepaṃ
atk-s0510a:1300_6: Kumāro tattha gantvā taṃ padesaṃ sammajjitvā maṭṭhakataṃ disvā “vasati maññe ettha so paccekabuddho”ti parijanena bhāsitaṃ sutvā āha –
atk-s0510a:1300_8: idāni hatthiassādīhi attano okāsaṃ akkantaṃ disvā suṭṭhutaraṃ dusseyya,
atk-s0510a:1300_9: idheva tumhe tiṭṭhathā”ti hatthikkhandhā oruyha ekakova senāsanaṃ paviṭṭho vattasīsena susammaṭṭhokāse
atk-s0510a:1300_10: padanikkhepaṃ disvā “so dānāyaṃ samaṇo ettha caṅkamanto na vaṇijjādikammaṃ cintesi,
atk-s0510a:1300_11: addhāyaṃ attano hitameva cintesi maññe”ti pasannamānaso caṅkamaṃ abhiruhitvā dūrīkataputhuvitakko gantvā
atk-s0510a:1300_12: pāsāṇaphalake nisīditvā sañjātaekaggo hutvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ adhigantvā
atk-s0510a:1300_13: purimanayeneva purohitena kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchito gaganatale nisinno imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1301_2: Apica sabbesaṃ āraññikānaṃ catuppadānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1301_4: Araññamhīti gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ araññaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1301_10: Yenicchakaṃ gacchati vocarāyāti yena yena disābhāgena gantumicchati,
atk-s0510a:1302_2: āraññako migo araññe pavane caramāno vissattho gacchati,
atk-s0510a:1302_16: vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0510a:1303_2: yathā migo araññamhi abaddho yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya,
atk-s0510a:1303_3: tathā kadā nu kho ahampi taṇhābandhanaṃ chinditvā evaṃ gaccheyyanti.
atk-s0510a:1303_4: Viññū paṇḍito naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno eko careti.
atk-s0510a:1305_10: eko sivikāya nisīditvā uyyānaṃ gacchantaṃ yāci.
atk-s0510a:1305_13: tassapi vacanaṃ sutvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha ekamantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1305_14: Evaṃ so tehi nibbinno hutvā pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:1305_20: So rañño vacanaṃ anādiyitvā “gacchāmahaṃ taṃ janapadaṃ gahetvā bhuñjāmī”ti tattha gantvā kalahaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:1305_21: puna ubhopi rañño santikaṃ āgantvā aññamaññassa dosaṃ ārocenti.
atk-s0510a:1305_22: Rājā “na sakkā ime tosetu”nti tesaṃ lobhe ādīnavaṃ disvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1306_6: idaṃ me dehī”tiādinā nayena tathā tathā āmantanā hoti,
atk-s0510a:1306_7: tasmā ahaṃ tattha nibbijjitvā yāyaṃ ariyajanasevitā anekānisaṃsā ekantasukhā,
atk-s0510a:1306_8: evaṃ santepi lobhābhibhūtehi sabbakāpurisehi anabhipatthitā pabbajjā,
atk-s0510a:1306_9: taṃ anabhijjhitaṃ paresaṃ avasavattanena bhabbapuggalavasena seritañca pekkhamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā anukkamena paccekabodhiṃ adhigatosmi.
atk-s0510a:1308_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira ekaputtakabrahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1308_3: So tassa ekaputtako piyo ahosi manāpo pāṇasamo,
atk-s0510a:1308_5: So ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto taṃ ṭhapetvā gato.
atk-s0510a:1308_6: Kumāropi taṃ divasaṃyeva uppannena byādhinā mato.
atk-s0510a:1308_7: Amaccā “puttasinehena rañño hadayampi phaleyyā”ti anārocetvāva naṃ jhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1308_8: Rājā uyyāne surāmadena matto puttaṃ neva sarati,
atk-s0510a:1308_10: Atha bhuttāvī nisinno saritvā “puttaṃ me ānethā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:1308_11: Tassa anurūpena vidhānena taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1308_12: Tato sokābhibhūto nisinno evaṃ yoniso manasākāsi –
atk-s0510a:1308_15: Evaṃ anukkamena anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sammasanto paccekasambodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1309_2: Sā duvidhā hoti kāyikā ca vācasikā ca.
atk-s0510a:1309_5: Vācasikā nāma gītaṃ silokabhaṇanaṃ mukhabheriālambarabherīti evamādi.
atk-s0510a:1309_7: Vipulanti yāva aṭṭhimiñjaṃ ahacca ṭhānena sakalattabhāvabyāpakaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1311_2: Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pañca paccekabodhisattā pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke nibbattā.
atk-s0510a:1311_3: Tato cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasirājā ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1311_5: Te cattāropi kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā anukkamena paccekabuddhā hutvā nandamūlakapabbhāre
atk-s0510a:1311_6: vasantā ekadivasaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya vaṃsakkaḷīragāthāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attano kammañca sahāyañca
atk-s0510a:1311_7: āvajjetvā ñatvā bārāṇasirañño upāyena ārammaṇaṃ dassetuṃ okāsaṃ gavesanti.
atk-s0510a:1311_8: So ca rājā tikkhattuṃ rattiyā ubbijjati,
atk-s0510a:1311_11: Purohitena kālasseva vuṭṭhāya sukhaseyyaṃ pucchitopi “kuto me, ācariya,
atk-s0510a:1311_13: Purohitopi “ayaṃ rogo na sakkā yena kenaci uddhaṃ virecanādinā bhesajjakammena vinetuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1311_14: mayhaṃ pana khādanūpāyo uppanno”ti cintetvā “rajjahānijīvitantarāyādīnaṃ pubbanimittaṃ etaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1311_15: mahārājā”ti rājānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ ubbejetvā “tassa vūpasamanatthaṃ ettake ca ettake ca hatthiassarathādayo
atk-s0510a:1311_16: hiraññasuvaṇṇañca dakkhiṇaṃ datvā yañño yajitabbo”ti yaññayajane samādapesi.
atk-s0510a:1312_0: Tato paccekabuddhā anekāni pāṇasahassāni yaññatthāya sampiṇḍiyamānāni disvā “etasmiṃ kamme kate dubbodhaneyyo bhavissati,
atk-s0510a:1312_1: handa naṃ paṭikacceva gantvā pekkhāmā”ti vaṃsakkaḷīragāthāyaṃ vuttanayena āgantvā piṇḍāya caramānā rājaṅgaṇe paṭipāṭiyā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1312_2: Rājā sīhapañjare ṭhito rājaṅgaṇaṃ olokayamāno te addakkhi,
atk-s0510a:1312_4: Tato te pakkosāpetvā ākāsatale paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā katabhattakicce “ke tumhe”ti pucchi. “Mayaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0510a:1312_7: “Catūsu disāsu katthaci kutoci bhayaṃ vā cittutrāso vā amhākaṃ natthi,
atk-s0510a:1312_9: tumhākaṃ taṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ kāraṇā na hotī”ti? “Mayaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0510a:1312_14: Tena no taṃ bhayaṃ na hotī”ti vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1313_7: Na sakkā kho pana asuddhena asuddhaṃ dhovituṃ,
atk-s0510a:1313_9: So “sabbe sattā sukhitā hontū”tiādinā nayena mettādayo cattāropi brahmavihāre bhāvetvā hitapharaṇena cittena amacce āṇāpesi –
atk-s0510a:1314_0: Tato rājā “kalyāṇamittānaṃ vacanena pāpakammato muttomhī”ti tattheva nisinno vipassitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1314_2: kālo”ti vutte “nāhaṃ rājā”ti purimanayeneva sabbaṃ vatvā imaṃ udānabyākaraṇagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1315_1: “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā vā nayena brahmavihārabhāvanāya pharitā catasso disā assa santīti cātuddiso.
atk-s0510a:1315_2: Tāsu catūsu disāsu katthaci satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihanatīti appaṭigho.
atk-s0510a:1315_3: Santussamānoti dvādasavidhassa santosassa vasena santussako ca.
atk-s0510a:1315_5: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhīti ettha parissayanti kāyacittāni,
atk-s0510a:1315_8: bāhirānaṃ sīhabyagghādīnaṃ abbhantarānañca kāmacchandādīnaṃ kāyacittupaddavānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1315_9: Te parissaye adhivāsanakhantiyā ca vīriyādīhi dhammehi ca sahatīti parissayānaṃ sahitā.
atk-s0510a:1315_13: evaṃ itarītarena paccayena santussamāno ettha paṭipattipadaṭṭhāne santose ṭhito catūsu disāsu mettādibhāvanāya cātuddiso,
atk-s0510a:1315_16: appaṭighattā achambhī ca hotīti evaṃ paṭipattiguṇaṃ disvā yoniso paṭipajjitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0510a:1315_17: Atha vā te samaṇā viya santussamāno itarītarena vuttanayena cātuddiso hotīti ñatvā evaṃ cātuddisabhāvaṃ patthayanto yoniso paṭipajjitvā adhigatomhi.
atk-s0510a:1315_18: Tasmā aññopi īdisaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayanto cātuddisatāya parissayānaṃ sahitā appaṭighatāya ca achambhī hutvā eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0510a:1317_3: Tato vītivattesu sokadivasesu ekadivasaṃ amaccā “rājūnaṃ nāma tesu tesu kiccesu aggamahesī avassaṃ icchitabbā,
atk-s0510a:1317_4: sādhu devo aññampi deviṃ ānetū”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1317_10: amaccā “ayaṃ rañño anurūpā”ti ñatvā taṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1317_20: Rājā taṃ abhisiñcitvā sabbaṃ mahesiyā bhogaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0510a:1317_23: Rājā taṃ attano puttaṃ viya sabbiriyāpathesu aṅke ca ure ca katvā viharati.
atk-s0510a:1318_4: Atha kumāro “ehi puttā”ti raññā vuccamānopi hatthena ākaḍḍhiyamānopi pubbe viya rājānaṃ na allīyati.
atk-s0510a:1318_5: Rājā “kiṃ kāraṇa”nti vīmaṃsanto taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “ete mayā saṅgahitāpi paṭikkūlavuttino evā”ti nibbijjitvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito.
atk-s0510a:1318_7: Saparijano rājā pabbajitopi manussā paṇīte paccaye upanenti,
atk-s0510a:1318_11: Itare ujjhāyanti “mayaṃ pariveṇādīni sammajjantā sabbakiccāni karonti,
atk-s0510a:1318_13: So tampi ñatvā “ime yathāvuḍḍhaṃ dīyamānāpi ujjhāyanti,
atk-s0510a:1318_14: aho dussaṅgahā parisā”ti pattacīvaramādāya ekova araññaṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1318_15: Tattha āgatehi ca kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchito imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1318_20: tathāvidhā eva ca atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā.
atk-s0510a:1318_21: Etāhaṃ dussaṅgahabhāvaṃ jigucchanto vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā adhigatoti.
atk-s0510a:1320_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira cātumāsikabrahmadatto nāma rājā gimhānaṃ paṭhame māse uyyānaṃ gato.
atk-s0510a:1320_3: Tattha ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge nīlaghanapattasañchannaṃ koviḷārarukkhaṃ disvā “koviḷāramūle mama sayanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1320_4: paññāpethā”ti vatvā uyyāne kīḷitvā sāyanhasamayaṃ tattha seyyaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:1320_5: Puna gimhānaṃ majjhime māse uyyānaṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:1320_9: tadā koviḷāro sañchinnapatto sukkharukkho viya hoti,
atk-s0510a:1320_10: tadāpi rājā adisvāva taṃ rukkhaṃ pubbaparicayena tattheva seyyaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1320_11: Amaccā jānantāpi rañño āṇattiyā tattha sayanaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1320_12: So uyyāne kīḷitvā sāyanhasamaye tattha seyyaṃ kappento taṃ rukkhaṃ disvā “are,
atk-s0510a:1320_13: ayaṃ pubbe sañchannapatto maṇimayo viya abhirūpadassano ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1320_14: tato maṇivaṇṇasākhantare ṭhapitapavāḷaṅkurasadisehi pupphehi sassirikadassano ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1320_15: muttajālasadisavālikākiṇṇo cassa heṭṭhābhūmibhāgo bandhanā pavuttapupphasañchanno rattakambalasanthato viya ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1320_16: So nāmajja sukkharukkho viya sākhāmattāvaseso ṭhito,
atk-s0510a:1320_17: aho jarāya upahato koviḷāro”ti cintetvā “anupādiṇṇampi tāya jarāya haññati,
atk-s0510a:1320_19: Tadanusāreneva sabbasaṅkhāre dukkhato anattato ca vipassantova “aho vatāhampi sañchinnapatto koviḷāro
atk-s0510a:1320_20: viya apagatagihibyañjano bhaveyya”nti patthayamāno anupubbena tasmiṃ sayanatale dakkhiṇena passena nipannoyeva
atk-s0510a:1320_23: gantu”nti vutte “nāhaṃ rājā”tiādīni vatvā purimanayeneva imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1321_11: “aho vatāhampi oropayitvā gihibyañjanāni sañchinnapatto yathā koviḷāro bhaveyya”nti evaṃ cintayamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā adhigatoti.
atk-s0510a:1324_2: Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane dve paccekabodhisattā pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke uppannā.
atk-s0510a:1324_3: Tato cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasirañño putto,
atk-s0510a:1324_5: Te ekadivasaṃyeva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā ekadivasameva mātu kucchito nikkhamitvā sahapaṃsukīḷakā sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1324_8: tvaṃ tava pituno accayena rajjaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0510a:1324_12: Tato ubhopi yaññopacitā hutvā gāmanigamādīsu bhikkhaṃ caramānā paccantajanapadagāmaṃ gatā.
atk-s0510a:1324_13: Tañca gāmaṃ pañca paccekabuddhā bhikkhācāravelāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1324_14: Tattha manussā paccekabuddhe disvā ussāhajātā āsanāni paññāpetvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā upanāmetvā pūjenti.
atk-s0510a:1324_17: api ca panime manussā yadi icchanti,
atk-s0510a:1324_20: imesaṃ pana pabbajitānaṃ evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0510a:1324_21: addhā ete kiñci sippaṃ jānanti, handa,
atk-s0510a:1324_23: Te manussesu paṭikkantesu okāsaṃ labhitvā “yaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1324_29: evaṃ pārupitabba”ntiādinā nayena ābhisamācārikaṃ ācikkhitvā “imassa sippassa ekībhāvābhirati nipphatti,
atk-s0510a:1324_34: tato te attano attano paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1324_35: Purohitaputto nisinnakālato pabhuti cittasamādhānaṃ laddhā jhānaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0510a:1324_36: Rājaputto muhutteneva ukkaṇṭhito tassa santikaṃ āgato.
atk-s0510a:1324_45: tena hi tvaṃ attano nisinnokāsaṃ eva gaccha,
atk-s0510a:1324_47: So gantvā punapi muhuttakeneva ukkaṇṭhito purimanayeneva tikkhattuṃ āgato.
atk-s0510a:1325_0: Tato naṃ purohitaputto tatheva uyyojetvā tasmiṃ gate cintesi –
atk-s0510a:1325_1: “ayaṃ attano ca kammaṃ hāpeti mama ca,
atk-s0510a:1325_4: Itaro attano paṇṇasālāyeva nisinno punapi muhuttakeneva ukkaṇṭhito tassa santikaṃ āgantvā ito cito ca maggantopi taṃ adisvā cintesi –
atk-s0510a:1325_5: “yo gahaṭṭhakāle paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgatopi maṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhati,
atk-s0510a:1325_6: so dāni mayi āgate dassanampi adātukāmo apakkami. Aho are, citta,
atk-s0510a:1325_9: na so dāni te vase vattissāmi,
atk-s0510a:1325_10: aññadatthu taṃyeva mama vase vattāpessāmī”ti attano senāsanaṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ
atk-s0510a:1325_12: Itaropi araññaṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā tattheva agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1325_13: Te ubhopi manosilātale nisīditvā pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ imā udānagāthāyo abhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1326_1: Sādhuvihārinti appanāvihārena vā upacārena vā samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0510a:1326_6: “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”ti evaṃ pavattavīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1326_8: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāyāti yathā pakatirājā “vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ anatthāvaha”nti ñatvā rajjaṃ pahāya eko carati,
atk-s0510a:1326_10: Atha vā rājāva raṭṭhanti yathā sutasomo rājā raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya eko cari,
atk-s0510a:1326_12: evaṃ eko carīti ayampi tassa attho.
atk-s0510a:1326_13: Sesaṃ vuttānusārena sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritanti.
atk-s0510a:1328_1: Addhā pasaṃsāmāti imissā gāthāya yāva ākāsatale paññattāsane paccekabuddhānaṃ nisajjā,
atk-s0510a:1328_4: yathā so rājā rattiyā tikkhattuṃ ubbijji,
atk-s0510a:1328_7: So ākāsatale paññattesu āsanesu paccekabuddhe nisīdāpetvā “ke tumhe”ti pucchi. “Mayaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0510a:1328_10: “Sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā laddhā nibbikārā bhuñjāma,
atk-s0510a:1328_15: Taṃ paccekabuddhā amataṃ viya nibbikārā bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1328_20: Atha rājā “sundaraṃ datvā vīmaṃsissāmī”ti punapi nimantetvā dve divase mahāsakkāraṃ katvā paṇītena ativicitrena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisi.
atk-s0510a:1328_21: Tepi tatheva nibbikārā paribhuñjitvā rañño maṅgalaṃ vatvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1328_23: aho vatāhampi anavajjabhojī bhaveyya”nti cintetvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya pabbajjaṃ samādāya vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
atk-s0510a:1328_24: paccekabuddho hutvā mañjūsakarukkhamūle paccekabuddhānaṃ majjhe attano ārammaṇaṃ vibhāvento imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1328_26: Kevalaṃ pana sahāyasampadanti ettha asekhehi sīlādikkhandhehi sampannā sahāyā eva sahāyasampadāti veditabbā.
atk-s0510a:1329_5: Attano sīlādīhi seṭṭhe sevamānassa sīlādayo dhammā anuppannā uppajjanti,
atk-s0510a:1329_6: uppannā ca vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0510a:1329_7: Same sevamānassa aññamaññaṃ sādhāraṇena kukkuccassa vinodanena ca laddhā na parihāyanti.
atk-s0510a:1329_8: Ete pana sahāyake seṭṭhe ca same ca aladdhā kuhanādimicchājīvaṃ pahāya dhammena samena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1329_9: bhuñjanto tattha ca paṭighānunayaṃ anuppādento anavajjabhojī hutvā atthakāmo kulaputto eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0510a:1329_10: Ahampi evaṃ caranto imaṃ sampattiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0510a:1331_2: Aññataro kira bārāṇasiyaṃ rājā gimhasamaye divāseyyaṃ upagato ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1331_9: ekavāse asaṅghaṭṭanā”ti cintetvā punappunaṃ dāsiṃ olokesi.
atk-s0510a:1331_10: Tena ca samayena sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā devī taṃ bījayantī ṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0510a:1331_11: Sā “vaṇṇadāsiyā paṭibaddhacitto maññe rājā”ti cintetvā taṃ dāsiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā sayameva pisitumāraddhā.
atk-s0510a:1331_12: Athassā ca ubhosu bāhāsu aneke suvaṇṇavalayā,
atk-s0510a:1331_14: Rājā atisuṭṭhutaraṃ nibbindo dakkhiṇapassena nipannoyeva vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1331_15: Taṃ anuttarasukhena sukhitaṃ nipannaṃ candanahatthā devī upasaṅkamitvā “ālimpāmi,
atk-s0510a:1332_9: disvā bhujasmiṃ suvaṇṇassa valayāni “gaṇavāse sati saṅghaṭṭanā,
atk-s0510a:1332_10: ekavāse asaṅghaṭṭanā”ti evaṃ cintetvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0510a:1334_2: Aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā daharova pabbajitukāmo amacce āṇāpesi –
atk-s0510a:1334_6: arājakaṃ rajjaṃ amhehi na sakkā rakkhituṃ sāmantarājāno āgamma vilumpissanti,
atk-s0510a:1334_13: puttaṃ jātaṃ rajje abhisiñcitvā rajjaṃ pariharatha,
atk-s0510a:1334_18: tāva vijāyanakālaṃ āgamehī”ti punapi rājānaṃ saññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1334_22: yāva paṭibalo hotī”ti bahūhi kāraṇehi saññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1334_23: Tato kumāre paṭibale jāte amacce sannipātāpetvā “paṭibalo dāni ayaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1334_24: taṃ rajje abhisiñcitvā paṭipajjathā”ti amaccānaṃ okāsaṃ adatvā antarāpaṇato kāsāyavatthādayo sabbaparikkhāre
atk-s0510a:1334_25: āharāpetvā antepure eva pabbajitvā mahājanako viya nikkhamitvā gato.
atk-s0510a:1334_30: Mahājano lekhāya sīsaṃ katvā bhūmiyaṃ nipanno paridevamāno “tuyhaṃ dāni, tāta,
atk-s0510a:1334_35: Rājā kumāraṃ disvā “etaṃ mahājanaṃ pariharanto rajjaṃ kāresiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1334_36: kiṃ dāni ekaṃ dārakaṃ pariharituṃ na sakkhissa”nti kumāraṃ gahetvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0510a:1334_37: tattha pubbapaccekabuddhehi vasitapaṇṇasālaṃ disvā vāsaṃ kappesi saddhiṃ puttena.
atk-s0510a:1335_0: Tato kumāro varasayanādīsu kataparicayo tiṇasanthārake vā rajjumañcake vā sayamāno rodati.
atk-s0510a:1335_2: “sītaṃ tāta uṇhaṃ tāta makasā tāta ḍaṃsanti.
atk-s0510a:1335_7: kumāro missakabhattaṃ kaṅguvarakamuggādibahulaṃ acchādentampi taṃ jighacchāvasena bhuñjamāno katipāhaccayena uṇhe ṭhapitapadumaṃ viya milāyi.
atk-s0510a:1335_9: Tato so kumāraṃ saññāpento āha – “nagare, tāta,
atk-s0510a:1335_14: Kumāramātāpi devī “na dāni rājā kumāraṃ gaṇhitvā araññe ciraṃ vasissati,
atk-s0510a:1335_15: katipāheneva nivattissatī”ti cintetvā raññā kattaradaṇḍena likhitaṭṭhāneyeva vatiṃ kārāpetvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:1335_16: Rājā tassā vatiyā avidūre ṭhatvā “ettha te, tāta,
atk-s0510a:1336_0: Ārakkhapurisā kumāraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā deviyā ārocesi.
atk-s0510a:1336_6: Tato devī nirāsāva hutvā puttaṃ gahetvā nagaraṃ gantvā rajje abhisiñci.
atk-s0510a:1336_7: Rājāpi attano vasanaṭṭhāne nisinno vipassitvā paccekabodhiṃ patvā mañjūsakarukkhamūle paccekabuddhānaṃ majjhe imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1337_1: yvāyaṃ ekena dutiyena kumārena sītuṇhādīhi nivedentena sahavāsena taṃ saññāpentassa mama vācābhilāpo tasmiṃ sinehavasena abhisajjanā vā jātā.

atk-s0510a:1337_6: “Ubhayampetaṃ antarāyakaraṃ visesādhigamassā”ti etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno taṃ chaḍḍetvā yoniso paṭipajjitvā paccekabodhimadhigatomhīti.
atk-s0510a:1339_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira seṭṭhiputto daharova seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0510a:1339_3: Tassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1339_5: Atha so daharova samāno “pabbajissāmī”ti mātāpitaro āpucchi,
atk-s0510a:1339_20: Tato so sabbaṃ parijanaṃ paridevamānaṃ anādiyitvā isipatanaṃ gantvā paccekabuddhānaṃ santike pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:1339_23: So varasayane kataparicayo sabbarattiṃ atidukkhito ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1339_24: Pabhāte sarīraparikammaṃ katvā pattacīvaramādāya paccekabuddhehi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:1339_28: So katipāhaṃyeva kiso dubbaṇṇo hutvā nibbijji,

atk-s0510a:1339_33: Tatiyavāre pana pabbajitvā sammā paṭipanno vipassitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ vatvā
atk-s0510a:1339_34: puna paccekabuddhānaṃ majjhe imameva byākaraṇagāthampi abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1340_0: Tattha kāmāti dve kāmā vatthukāmo ca kilesakāmo ca.

atk-s0510a:1340_14: Nigamanampi dvīhi tīhi vā padehi yojetvā purimagāthāsu vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-s0510a:1342_4: Vejjā “satthakammena vinā phāsu na hotī”ti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0510a:1342_5: Rājā tesaṃ abhayaṃ datvā satthakammaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1342_6: Te taṃ phāletvā pubbalohitaṃ nīharitvā nivedanaṃ katvā vaṇaṃ pilotikena bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1342_13: Evaṃ yāva tikkhattuṃ satthakammaṃ kārāpetvā vejjehi parivajjito nibbinditvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:1342_14: araññaṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā sattahi vassehi paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ bhāsitvā
atk-s0510a:1343_2: Tasmā kāmaguṇāpi ete anekabyasanāvahaṭṭhena anatthānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhena ca īti.
atk-s0510a:1343_5: Tasmā ete kilesāsucipaggharaṇato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātaparipakkaparibhinnabhāvato ca gaṇḍo.
atk-s0510a:1343_9: Tasmā kāmaguṇāpete aviditanibbānatthāvahahetutāya sabbupaddavakammaparivatthutāya ca upaddavo.
atk-s0510a:1343_10: Yasmā panete kilesāturabhāvaṃ janentā sīlasaṅkhātaṃ ārogyaṃ loluppaṃ vā uppādentā pākatikameva ārogyaṃ vilumpanti,
atk-s0510a:1343_12: Abbhantaramanupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena pana antotudanaṭṭhena ca dunnīharaṇīyaṭṭhena ca sallaṃ.

atk-s0510a:1346_0: Tattha sītañcāti sītaṃ duvidhaṃ abbhantaradhātukkhobhapaccayañca bāhiradhātukkhobhapaccayañca,

atk-s0510a:1348_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā vīsati vassāni rajjaṃ kāretvā kālaṅkato niraye vīsati vassāni eva paccitvā,
atk-s0510a:1348_3: himavantappadese hatthiyoniyaṃ uppajjitvā sañjātakkhandho padumavaṇṇasakalasarīro uḷāro yūthapati mahānāgo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1348_10: Tato cintesi “idāni mayhaṃ nattako bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kāreti,
atk-s0510a:1348_13: Tato rattiyaṃ niddupagate yūthe yūthaṃ pahāya tameva uyyānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:1348_17: Rājā “maṃ abhimukho etī”ti khurappaṃ sannayhitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1348_18: Tato hatthī “vijjheyyāpi maṃ eso”ti mānusikāya vācāya “brahmadatta,

atk-s0510a:1348_24: mā kañci bhiṃsāpehī”ti hatthino vaṭṭañca ārakkhake ca hatthibhaṇḍe ca upaṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1349_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā hatthikkhandhavaragato “ayaṃ vīsati vassāni rajjaṃ kāretvā niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena tiracchānayoniyaṃ uppanno,
atk-s0510a:1349_3: ekībhāvo eva pana sukho”ti cintetvā tattheva vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1349_4: Taṃ lokuttarasukhena sukhitaṃ amaccā upasaṅkamitvā paṇipātaṃ katvā “yānakālo,
atk-s0510a:1350_3: Yathā ayaṃ hatthī ariyakantesu sīlesu dantattā adantabhūmiṃ nāgacchatīti vā,
atk-s0510a:1350_5: evaṃ kudāssu nāmāhampi ariyakantesu sīlesu dantattā adantabhūmiṃ nāgamanena,
atk-s0510a:1350_7: puna itthattaṃ anāgamanena ca guṇasarīramahantatāya vā nāgo bhaveyyaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1350_8: Yathā cesa yūthāni vivajjayitvā ekacariyasukhena yathābhirantaṃ viharaṃ araññe eko care khaggavisāṇakappo,
atk-s0510a:1350_9: kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ gaṇaṃ vivajjetvā ekavihārasukhena yathābhirantaṃ viharaṃ araññe attano yathā yathā sukhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1350_11: tattakaṃ araññe nivāsaṃ eko care khaggavisāṇakappo eko careyyanti attho.

atk-s0510a:1350_19: kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ parisuddhakāyasamācāratādīhi sīlasamādhinibbedhikapaññādīhi vā uḷāro bhaveyyanti.
atk-s0510a:1350_20: Evaṃ cintento vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0510a:1352_2: Bārāṇasirañño kira putto daharo eva samāno pabbajitukāmo mātāpitaro yāci.
atk-s0510a:1352_5: Tato pubbe vuttaseṭṭhiputtaṃ viya sabbaṃ vatvā anujāniṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1352_8: Tassa mātā pātova vīsatisahassanāṭakitthiparivutā uyyānaṃ gantvā puttaṃ yāguṃ pāyetvā antarā khajjakādīni
atk-s0510a:1352_9: ca khādāpetvā yāva majjhanhikasamayā tena saddhiṃ samullapitvā nagaraṃ pavisati.
atk-s0510a:1352_10: Pitāpi majjhanhike āgantvā taṃ bhojetvā attanāpi bhuñjitvā divasaṃ tena saddhiṃ samullapitvā sāyanhasamayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1353_0: Tena kho pana samayena ādiccabandhu nāma paccekabuddho nandamūlakapabbhāre viharati.
atk-s0510a:1353_6: Atha “dhammatāya nibbindanto aticiraṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “tassa ārammaṇaṃ dassessāmī”ti purimanayeneva manosilātalato āgantvā uyyāne aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1353_9: Rājā “idāni me putto paccekabuddhena saddhiṃ anukkaṇṭhito vasissatī”ti pamuditamano hutvā paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1353_10: sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā tattheva vāsaṃ yācitvā paṇṇasālādivāvihāracaṅkamādisabbaṃ kāretvā vāsesi.
atk-s0510a:1353_11: So tattha vasanto ekadivasaṃ okāsaṃ labhitvā kumāraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0510a:1353_17: kiṃ mayhaṃ ananucchavika”nti vutte “tvaṃ attano ananucchavikaṃ na pekkhasi,
atk-s0510a:1353_18: nanu te mātā vīsatisahassitthīti saddhiṃ pubbaṇhasamaye āgacchantī uyyānaṃ avivittaṃ karoti,
atk-s0510a:1353_19: pitā cassa mahatā balakāyena sāyanhasamaye jagganakaparisā sakalaṃ rattiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1353_20: pabbajitā nāma tava sadisā na honti,
atk-s0510a:1353_21: īdisā pana hontī”ti tattha ṭhitasseva iddhiyā himavante aññataraṃ vihāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0510a:1353_22: So tattha paccekabuddhe ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhite ca caṅkamante ca rajanakakammasūcikammādīni karonte ca disvā āha –
atk-s0510a:1353_26: pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇā nāma attano nissaraṇaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1353_28: ettakaṃva vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā ākāse ṭhatvā aṭṭhāna taṃ saṅgaṇikāratassa,
atk-s0510a:1353_29: yaṃ phassaye sāmayikaṃ vimuttinti imaṃ upaḍḍhugāthaṃ vatvā dissamānoyeva ākāsena nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1353_30: Evaṃ gate paccekabuddhe so attano paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nipajji.
atk-s0510a:1353_32: idāni kuhiṃ gamissatī”ti pamatto niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0510a:1353_33: So tassa pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:1353_34: Tatra ca ṭhito vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā paccekabuddhaṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0510a:1353_35: Tatra ca “kathamadhigata”nti pucchito ādiccabandhunā vuttaṃ upaḍḍhagāthaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1354_8: Sā hi appitappitasamaye eva paccatthikehi vimuccanato “sāmayikā vimuttī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0510a:1354_12: yena kāraṇena vimuttiṃ phassaye iti etaṃ ādiccabandhussa paccekabuddhassa vaco nisamma saṅgaṇikāratiṃ pahāya yoniso paṭipajjanto adhigatomhīti āha.
atk-s0510a:1357_4: atthi nu kho evaṃ vaṭṭapaṭighātakaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ, no”ti?
atk-s0510a:1357_12: sabbepime diṭṭhigatikā”ti sayameva tesaṃ vilomatañca ayuttatañca disvā “vaṭṭapaṭighātakaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ atthi,
atk-s0510a:1357_13: taṃ gavesitabba”nti cintetvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1357_14: Imañca udānagāthaṃ abhāsi paccekabuddhānaṃ majjhe byākaraṇagāthañca.
atk-s0510a:1358_2: Tāni hi maggasammādiṭṭhiyā visūkaṭṭhena vijjhanaṭṭhena vilomaṭṭhena ca visūkāni,
atk-s0510a:1358_6: Patto niyāmanti avinipātadhammatāya sambodhiparāyaṇatāya ca niyatabhāvaṃ adhigato,
atk-s0510a:1358_8: Ettāvatā paṭhamamaggakiccanipphatti ca tassa paṭilābho ca vutto.
atk-s0510a:1358_12: Anaññaneyyoti aññehi idaṃ saccanti na netabbo.
atk-s0510a:1358_14: patte vā paccekabodhiñāṇe aññaneyyatāya abhāvā sayaṃvasitaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1360_2: Bārāṇasirañño kira sūdo antarabhattaṃ pacitvā upanāmesi manuññadassanaṃ sādurasaṃ “appeva nāma me rājā dhanamanuppādeyyā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1360_5: Paṭhamakabaḷe pana mukhe pakkhittamatte sattarasaharaṇisahassāni amateneva phusitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1360_9: “rasaṃ sāyitvā pana sakkarontaṃ maṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggaccheyya ‘lolo ayaṃ rājā rasagaruko”’ti na kiñci abhaṇi.
atk-s0510a:1360_14: Tato sūdo “natthi maññe imassa rañño jivhāviññāṇa”nti.
atk-s0510a:1360_17: ajja sūdo”ti jānantopi pubbe viya paccavekkhitvā avaṇṇabhayena na kiñci abhaṇi.
atk-s0510a:1360_18: Tato sūdo “rājā neva sundaraṃ nāsundaraṃ jānātī”ti cintetvā sabbaṃ paribbayaṃ attanāva gahetvā kiñcideva pacitvā rañño deti.
atk-s0510a:1360_20: ahaṃ nāma vīsati nagarasahassāni bhuñjanto imassa lobhena bhattamattampi na labhāmī”ti nibbijjitvā rajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:1361_5: Nikkuhoti ettha kiñcāpi yassa tividhaṃ kuhanavatthu natthi,
atk-s0510a:1361_7: Imissā pana gāthāya manuññabhojanādīsu vimhayamanāpajjanato nikkuhoti ayamadhippāyo.

atk-s0510a:1363_0: Tesu mohaṃ ṭhapetvā pañcannaṃ kasāvānaṃ tesañca sabbesaṃ mūlabhūtassa mohassa niddhantattā niddhantakasāvamoho.
atk-s0510a:1363_1: Tiṇṇaṃ eva vā kāyavacīmanokasāvānaṃ mohassa ca niddhantattā niddhantakasāvamoho.
atk-s0510a:1363_6: tīsu bhavesu dvādasasu vā āyatanesu bhavavibhavataṇhāvirahito hutvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1363_8: Atha vā tayopi pāde vatvā eko careti eko carituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti evampettha sambandho kātabbo.
atk-s0510a:1365_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā mahaccarājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto manusse koṭṭhāgārato purāṇadhaññādīni bahiddhā nīharante disvā “kiṃ, bhaṇe,
atk-s0510a:1365_6: tesaṃ okāsaṃ kātuṃ ime manussā purāṇadhaññādīni chaḍḍentī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1365_14: natthi dinna”nti ārabbha yāva “bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti vatvā nivāresi.

atk-s0510a:1366_4: taṃ atthakāmo kulaputto pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ parivajjayetha,
atk-s0510a:1366_6: Sayaṃ na seveti attano vasena taṃ na seveyya.
atk-s0510a:1366_13: Taṃ evarūpaṃ sahāyaṃ na seve na bhaje na payirupāse,
atk-s0510a:1368_2: Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane aṭṭha paccekabodhisattā pabbajitvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0510a:1368_11: nesaṃ santike vicitranayadhammadesanaṃ sossāmī”ti attamano dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne
