atk-s0510a:1369_4: Atha “rāgakkhayo hotū”ti upaparikkhanto “rāge khīṇe dosopi mohopi aññataraññatarepi kilesā khīṇā hontī”ti
atk-s0510a:1369_6: Yathāpi hi purisena mahāpathaviṃ vā ākāsaṃ vā aṅguliyā niddisantena na aṅgulimattova padeso niddiṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0510a:1369_7: Api ca kho pana sakalapathavī ākāsā eva niddiṭṭhā honti.
atk-s0510a:1369_8: Evaṃ imehi ekekaṃ atthaṃ niddisantehi aparimāṇā atthā niddiṭṭhā hontī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1369_9: Tato so “kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ bahussuto bhavissāmī”ti tathārūpaṃ bahussutabhāvaṃ patthento rajjaṃ pahāya
atk-s0510a:1369_10: pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1370_1: bahussutanti duvidho bahussuto tīsu piṭakesu atthato nikhilo pariyattibahussuto ca,
atk-s0510a:1370_5: Yuttapaṭibhāno ca muttapaṭibhāno ca yuttamuttapaṭibhāno ca paṭibhānavā.
atk-s0510a:1370_9: Yassa atthañca ñāṇañca lakkhaṇañca ṭhānāṭṭhānañca paripucchantassa paripucchā paṭibhāti,
atk-s0510a:1370_13: Taṃ evarūpaṃ bahussutaṃ dhammadharaṃ bhajetha mittaṃ uḷāraṃ paṭibhānavantaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1370_14: Tato tassānubhāvena attatthaparatthaubhayatthabhedato vā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthabhedato vā anekappakārāni aññāya atthāni,
atk-s0510a:1370_15: tato “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādīsu kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu vineyya kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchaṃ vinetvā
atk-s0510a:1370_16: vināsetvā evaṃ katasabbakicco eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0510a:1372_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira vibhūsakabrahmadatto nāma rājā pātova yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā bhuñjitvā nānāvidhavibhūsanehi
atk-s0510a:1372_3: attānaṃ vibhūsāpetvā mahāādāse sakalaṃ sarīraṃ disvā yaṃ na icchati,
atk-s0510a:1372_5: Tassa ekadivasaṃ evaṃ karontassa bhattavelā majjhanhikā sampattā.
atk-s0510a:1372_6: Vippakatavibhūsitova dussapaṭṭena sīsaṃ veṭhetvā bhuñjitvā divāseyyaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0510a:1372_7: Punapi uṭṭhahitvā tatheva karoto sūriyo oggato.
atk-s0510a:1372_11: ahaṃ sabbathāmena vibhūsantopi imasmiṃ kappake vibhūsane asantuṭṭho lobhaṃ uppādesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1372_13: handāhaṃ lobhaṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1373_0: Tattha khiḍḍā ca rati ca pubbe vuttāva.
atk-s0510a:1373_2: Vatthukāmāpi hi sukhassa visayādibhāvena “sukha”nti vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0510a:1373_4: Evametaṃ khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ kāmasukhañca imasmiṃ okāsaloke analaṅkaritvā alanti akatvā,
atk-s0510a:1373_5: etaṃ tappakanti vā sārabhūtanti vā evaṃ aggahetvā.
atk-s0510a:1373_6: Anapekkhamānoti tena analaṅkaraṇena anapekkhaṇasīlo apihāluko nittaṇho.
atk-s0510a:1373_7: Vibhūsaṭṭhānā virato saccavādīti tattha vibhūtā duvidhā –
atk-s0510a:1375_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira rañño putto daharakāleyeva abhisitto rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0510a:1375_3: So paṭhamagāthāya vuttapaccekabodhisatto viya rajjasiriṃ anubhavanto ekadivasaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0510a:1375_5: kiṃ me ekabhattatthāya iminā pāpena, handa,
atk-s0510a:1375_6: sukhamuppādemī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1378_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira pādalolabrahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1378_3: So pātova yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā bhuñjitvā tīsu pāsādesu tividhāni nāṭakāni passati.
atk-s0510a:1378_8: Tā nāṭakitthiyo “rājānaṃ ramāpessāmā”ti sakkassa devānamindassa accharāyo viya atimanoharaṃ naccagītavāditaṃ payojesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1378_9: Rājā “anacchariyametaṃ daharāna”nti asantuṭṭho hutvā majjhimanāṭakapāsādaṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:1378_11: So tatthapi tatheva asantuṭṭho hutvā mahallakanāṭakapāsādaṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:1378_13: Rājā dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe atītānaṃ tāsaṃ mahallakabhāvena aṭṭhikīḷanasadisaṃ naccaṃ disvā gītañca amadhuraṃ sutvā punadeva daharanāṭakapāsādaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1378_14: puna majjhimanāṭakapāsādanti evampi vicaritvā katthaci asantuṭṭho cintesi –
atk-s0510a:1378_15: “imā nāṭakitthiyo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ accharāyo viya maṃ ramāpetukāmā sabbathāmena naccagītavāditaṃ payojesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1378_18: handāhaṃ lobhaṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1379_2: So hi sajjanti tattha pāṇino kaddame paviṭṭho hatthī viyāti saṅgo.
atk-s0510a:1379_3: Parittamettha sokhyanti ettha pañcakāmaguṇūpabhogakāle viparītasaññāya uppādetabbato kāmāvacaradhammapariyāpannato vā lāmakaṭṭhena sokhyaṃ parittaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1379_6: Appassādo dukkhamevettha bhiyyoti ettha ca yvāyaṃ “yaṃ kho,
atk-s0510a:1379_8: ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1379_15: yadi muddāya yadi gaṇanāyā”ti evamādinā nayenettha dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1379_20: Gaḷo esoti assādaṃ dassetvā ākaḍḍhanavasena baḷiso viya eso,
atk-s0510a:1379_22: Iti ñatvā matimāti evaṃ jānitvā buddhimā paṇḍito puriso sabbametaṃ pahāya eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0510a:1381_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira anivattabrahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1381_3: So saṅgāmaṃ otiṇṇo ajinitvā aññaṃ vā kiccaṃ āraddho aniṭṭhapetvā na nivattati,
atk-s0510a:1381_7: So aggi sukkhāni ceva haritāni ca tiṇādīni dahanto anivattamāno eva gacchati.
atk-s0510a:1381_10: evameva ekādasavidho aggi sabbe satte dahanto anivattamāno gacchati mahādukkhaṃ uppādento,
atk-s0510a:1381_11: kudāssu nāmāhampi imassa dukkhassa nivattanatthaṃ ayaṃ aggi viya ariyamaggañāṇagginā kilese dahanto anivattamāno gaccheyya”nti?
atk-s0510a:1381_12: Tato muhuttaṃ gantvā kevaṭṭe addasa nadiyaṃ macche gaṇhante.
atk-s0510a:1381_13: Tesaṃ jālantare paviṭṭho eko mahāmaccho jālaṃ bhetvā palāyi.
atk-s0510a:1381_15: Rājā tampi vacanaṃ sutvā tappaṭibhāganimittaṃ uppādesi –
atk-s0510a:1381_16: “kudāssu nāmāhampi ariyamaggañāṇena taṇhādiṭṭhijālaṃ bhetvā asajjamāno gaccheyya”nti?
atk-s0510a:1381_17: So rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi,
atk-s0510a:1382_5: Tasmiṃ nadīsalile jālaṃ bhetvā gataambucārīvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0510a:1382_7: Yathā aggi daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ puna na nivattati,
atk-s0510a:1382_9: evaṃ maggañāṇagginā daḍḍhakāmaguṇaṭṭhānaṃ anivattamāno tattha bhiyyo anāgacchantoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0510a:1384_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira cakkhulolabrahmadatto nāma rājā pādalolabrahmadatto viya nāṭakadassanaṃ anuyutto hoti.
atk-s0510a:1384_5: Ayaṃ taṃ taṃ nāṭakaṃ disvā atīva abhinanditvā nāṭakadassanaparivattanena taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhento vicarati.
atk-s0510a:1384_6: So kira nāṭakadassanatthaṃ āgataṃ aññataraṃ kuṭumbiyabhariyaṃ disvā rāgaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0510a:1384_8: ahaṃ imaṃ taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhento apāyaparipūrako bhavissāmi, handa,
atk-s0510a:1384_9: naṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano purimapaṭipattiṃ garahanto tappaṭipakkhaguṇadīpikaṃ imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1385_1: sattagīvaṭṭhikāni paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā parivajjanagahetabbadassanatthaṃ yugamattaṃ pekkhamānoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0510a:1385_5: dvinnaṃ tatiyoti evaṃ gaṇamajjhaṃ pavisitukāmatāya kaṇḍūyamānapādo viya abhavanto,
atk-s0510a:1385_7: Guttindriyoti chasu indriyesu idha manindriyassa visuṃ vuttattā vuttāvasesavasena ca gopitindriyo.
atk-s0510a:1385_12: Anavassutoti imāya paṭipattiyā tesu tesu ārammaṇesu kilesaanvassavavirahito.
atk-s0510a:1387_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññopi cātumāsikabrahmadatto nāma rājā catumāse catumāse uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0510a:1387_3: So ekadivasaṃ gimhānaṃ majjhimamāse uyyānaṃ pavisanto uyyānadvāre pattasañchannaṃ pupphālaṅkatasākhāviṭapaṃ
atk-s0510a:1387_4: pāricchattakakoviḷāraṃ disvā ekaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:1387_5: Tato “raññā aggapupphaṃ gahita”nti aññataropi amacco hatthikkhandhe ṭhito ekameva pupphaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0510a:1387_9: Rājā sāyanhasamaye uyyānā nikkhamanto taṃ disvā “kiṃ kato ayaṃ rukkho,
atk-s0510a:1387_11: idāni nippattapuppho jāto”ti cintento tasseva avidūre apupphitarukkhaṃ sañchannapalāsaṃ addasa.
atk-s0510a:1387_18: Tasmā yāva idampi ayaṃ rukkho viya na viluppati,
atk-s0510a:1387_21: So rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1388_0: Tattha kāsāyavattho abhinikkhamitvāti imassa pādassa gehā nikkhamitvā kāsāyavatthanivattho hutvāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0510a:1388_1: Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti na vitthāritanti.
atk-s0510a:1391_2: Aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā uyyāne amaccaputtehi parivuto silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ kīḷati.
atk-s0510a:1391_3: Tassa sūdo sabbamaṃsānaṃ rasaṃ gahetvā atīva susaṅkhataṃ amatakappaṃ antarabhattaṃ pacitvā upanāmesi.
atk-s0510a:1391_4: So tattha gedhamāpanno kassaci kiñci adatvā attanāva bhuñji.
atk-s0510a:1391_5: Udakaṃ kīḷanto ativikāle nikkhanto sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhuñji.
atk-s0510a:1391_8: Atha pacchā paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppādetvā “aho! Mayā pāpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0510a:1391_9: yvāyaṃ rasataṇhābhibhūto sabbajanaṃ vissaritvā ekakova bhuñjiṃ, handa,
atk-s0510a:1391_10: naṃ rasataṇhaṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano purimapaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0510a:1392_7: Yathā vā pubbe uyyāne rasesu gedhakaraṇasīlo aññaposī āsiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1392_8: evaṃ ahutvā yāya taṇhāya lolo hutvā rasesu gedhaṃ karoti,
atk-s0510a:1392_9: taṃ taṇhaṃ hitvā āyatiṃ taṇhāmūlakassa aññassa attabhāvassānibbattāpanena anaññaposīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0510a:1392_13: gharapaṭipāṭiṃ achaḍḍetvā aḍḍhakulañca daliddakulañca nirantaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisamānoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1392_14: Kule kule appaṭibaddhacittoti khattiyakulādīsu yattha katthaci kilesavasena alaggacitto,
atk-s0510a:1394_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā paṭhamajjhānalābhī ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1394_3: So jhānānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ patvā attano paṭipattisampadaṃ dīpento imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1395_2: Tāni pana yasmā abbhādayo viya candasūriye ceto āvaranti,
atk-s0510a:1395_4: Tāni upacārena vā appanāya vā pahāya vijahitvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1395_10: Evaṃ samathavipassanāsampanno paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhinissayassa pahīnattā anissito,
atk-s0510a:1395_13: Sineho eva hi guṇapaṭipakkhato sinehadosoti vutto.
atk-s0510a:1397_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā catutthajjhānalābhī ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1397_3: Sopi jhānānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano paṭipattisampadaṃ dīpento imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1399_4: kāraṃ parato netvā “somanassaṃ domanassañca vipiṭṭhikatvāna pubbevā”ti adhikāro.
atk-s0510a:1399_12: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”tiādikaṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1399_13: Yathā pubbevāti tīsu paṭhamajjhānādīsu dukkhadomanassasukhāni vipiṭṭhikatvā evamettha catutthajjhāne
atk-s0510a:1399_14: somanassaṃ vipiṭṭhikatvā imāya paṭipadāya laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ eko careti.
atk-s0510a:1401_2: Aññataro kira paccantarājā sahassayodhabalakāyo rajjena khuddako,
atk-s0510a:1401_5: paññavatā pana sakkā sakalajambudīpaṃ gahetu”nti cintetvā sāmantarañño dūtaṃ pāhesi –
atk-s0510a:1401_6: “sattāhabbhantare me rajjaṃ vā detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1401_7: Tato so attano amacce sannipātāpetvā āha –
atk-s0510a:1401_16: tena hi dukkhaṃ aññassa satthena marituṃ, handa,
atk-s0510a:1401_22: Tato rājā “kiṃ me imehi, atthi, bhaṇe,
atk-s0510a:1402_0: Rājā “ete upaparikkhissāmī”ti mahantaṃ citakaṃ sajjāpetvā āha – “mayā, bhaṇe,
atk-s0510a:1402_6: Evaṃ vutte pañcasatā yodhā uṭṭhahiṃsu “mayaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0510a:1402_15: te mayaṃ tena raññā saddhiṃ yujjhitvā marissāmā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1402_16: Tato rājā “pariccattaṃ tumhehi mama jīvita”nti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā tena yodhasahassena parivuto gantvā rajjasīmāya nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:1403_1: so khuddakarājā mama dāsassāpi nappahotī”ti dussitvā sabbaṃ balakāyaṃ ādāya yujjhituṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0510a:1403_2: Khuddakarājā taṃ abbhuyyātaṃ disvā balakāyaṃ āha – “tātā,
atk-s0510a:1403_4: sabbe sampiṇḍitvā asicammaṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ imassa rañño purato ujukaṃ eva gacchathā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1403_6: Athassa sā senā dvidhā bhinditvā antaramadāsi.
atk-s0510a:1403_7: Te taṃ rājānaṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā attano rañño “taṃ māressāmī”ti āgacchantassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1403_9: Rājā tassa abhayaṃ datvā sapathaṃ kārāpetvā attano vase katvā tena saha aññaṃ rājānaṃ abbhuggantvā tassa rajjasīmāya ṭhatvā pesesi –
atk-s0510a:1403_11: So “ahaṃ ekayuddhampi na sahāmī”ti rajjaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0510a:1403_12: Etenupāyena sabbe rājāno gahetvā ante bārāṇasirājānampi aggahesi.
atk-s0510a:1404_2: somhi idāni attano ñāṇasampattiyā sakalajambudīpamaṇḍalassa issaro rājā jāto.
atk-s0510a:1404_3: Taṃ kho pana me ñāṇaṃ lokiyavīriyasampayuttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1404_6: Tato bārāṇasirañño rajjaṃ datvā puttadārañca sakajanapadeyeva ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1404_7: ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano vīriyasampattiṃ dīpento imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1405_6: Alīnacittoti etena vīriyūpatthambhānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ alīnataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0510a:1405_7: Akusītavuttīti etena ṭhānacaṅkamādīsu kāyassa anavasīdanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0510a:1405_8: Daḷhanikkamoti etena “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ padahanavīriyaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0510a:1405_9: yaṃ taṃ anupubbasikkhādīsu padahanto “kāyena ceva paramatthasaccaṃ sacchikarotī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0510a:1405_10: Atha vā etena maggasampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0510a:1405_13: tasmā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalopi daḷho nikkamo assāti “daḷhanikkamo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0510a:1405_14: Thāmabalūpapannoti maggakkhaṇe kāyathāmena ca ñāṇabalena ca upapanno.
atk-s0510a:1405_17: Etena tassa vīriyassa vipassanāñāṇasampayogaṃ dīpento yogapadhānabhāvaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0510a:1407_4: Atthavaṇṇanāya panassā paṭisallānanti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā sallānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1407_6: Jhānanti paccanīkajhāpanato ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānato ca cittaviveko vuccati.
atk-s0510a:1407_7: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nīvaraṇādipaccanīkajhāpanato kasiṇādiārammaṇūpanijjhānato ca “jhāna”nti vuccati.
atk-s0510a:1407_10: Evametaṃ paṭisallānañca jhānañca ariñcamāno ajahamāno anissajjamāno.
atk-s0510a:1407_13: Anudhammacārīti te dhamme ārabbha pavattanena anugataṃ vipassanādhammaṃ caramāno.
atk-s0510a:1407_14: Atha vā dhammesūti ettha dhammāti navalokuttaradhammā,
atk-s0510a:1407_17: Tattha “dhammānaṃ niccaṃ anudhammacārī”ti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ vibhattibyattayena “dhammesū”ti vuttaṃ siyā.
atk-s0510a:1407_18: Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesūti tāya anudhammacāritāsaṅkhātāya vipassanāya aniccākārādidosaṃ tīsu bhavesu
atk-s0510a:1407_19: samanupassanto evaṃ imāya kāyacittavivekasikhāpattavipassanāsaṅkhātāya paṭipadāya adhigatoti vattabbo
atk-s0510a:1409_2: Aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā mahaccarājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0510a:1409_3: Tassa sarīrasobhāya āvajjitahadayā sattā purato gacchantāpi nivattitvā tameva ullokenti,
atk-s0510a:1409_6: Pakatiyā eva hi buddhadassane puṇṇacandasamuddarājadassane ca atitto loko.
atk-s0510a:1409_7: Atha aññatarā kuṭumbiyabhariyāpi uparipāsādagatā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1409_8: Rājā taṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā amaccaṃ āṇāpesi –
atk-s0510a:1409_14: “imā vīsatisahassanāṭakitthiyo devaccharāyo viya maṃ eva ekaṃ abhiramāpenti,
atk-s0510a:1409_15: so dānāhaṃ etāpi atussitvā parassa itthiyā taṇhaṃ uppādesiṃ.
atk-s0510a:1409_16: Sā uppannā apāyameva ākaḍḍhatī”ti taṇhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā “handa,
atk-s0510a:1409_17: naṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1410_5: Atha vā aneḷo ca amūgo ca,
atk-s0510a:1410_14: Evameva tehi appamādādīhi samannāgato niyāmasampāpakena padhānena padhānavā,
atk-s0510a:1410_17: Arahā hi puna saṅkhātabbābhāvato “saṅkhātadhammo”ti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0510a:1412_2: Aññatarassa kira bārāṇasirañño dūre uyyānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0510a:1412_3: so pageva uṭṭhāya uyyānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge yānā oruyha udakaṭṭhānaṃ upagato “mukhaṃ dhovissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1412_4: Tasmiñca padese sīhī sīhapotakaṃ janetvā gocarāya gatā.
atk-s0510a:1412_7: Rājā “sīho kira kassaci na bhāyatī”ti taṃ upaparikkhituṃ bheriādīni ākoṭāpesi,
atk-s0510a:1412_8: sīhapotako taṃ saddaṃ sutvāpi tatheva sayi.
atk-s0510a:1412_10: So tatiyavāre sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā sabbaṃ parisaṃ oloketvā tatheva sayi.
atk-s0510a:1412_14: kudāssu nāmāhampi taṇhādiṭṭhiparitāsaṃ chaḍḍetvā na santaseyyaṃ na bhāyeyya”nti?
atk-s0510a:1412_15: So taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā gacchanto puna kevaṭṭehi macche gahetvā sākhāsu bandhitvā pasārite jāle vātaṃ
atk-s0510a:1412_16: asaṅgaṃyeva gacchamānaṃ disvā tasmiṃ nimittaṃ aggahesi –
atk-s0510a:1412_17: “kudāssu nāmāhampi taṇhādiṭṭhimohajālaṃ phāletvā evaṃ asajjamāno gaccheyya”nti?
atk-s0510a:1413_0: Atha uyyānaṃ gantvā silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyā tīre nisinno vātabbhāhatāni padumāni onamitvā udakaṃ phusitvā
atk-s0510a:1413_1: vātavigame puna yathāṭhāne ṭhitāni udakena anupalittāni disvā tasmiṃ nimittaṃ aggahesi –
atk-s0510a:1413_2: “kudāssu nāmāhampi yathā etāni udake jātāni udakena anupalittāni tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0510a:1413_3: Evaṃ loke jāto lokena anupalitto tiṭṭheyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:1413_5: evaṃ asantasantena asajjamānena anupalittena bhavitabba”nti cintetvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto
atk-s0510a:1414_7: Tesu yo koci vāto yaṃ kiñci padumañca vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0510a:1414_8: Tattha yasmā santāso nāma attasinehena hoti,
atk-s0510a:1414_10: sopi diṭṭhisampayuttena vā diṭṭhivippayuttena vā lobhena hoti,
atk-s0510a:1414_12: Sajjanaṃ pana tattha upaparikkhādivirahitassa mohena hoti,
atk-s0510a:1414_16: Tasmā samathena attasinehaṃ pahāya sīhova saddesu aniccadukkhādīsu asantasanto,
atk-s0510a:1414_17: vipassanāya mohaṃ pahāya vātova jālamhi khandhāyatanādīsu asajjamāno,
atk-s0510a:1414_22: samādhi vipassanāyāti evaṃ dvīsu dhammesu siddhesu tayo khandhā siddhāva honti.
atk-s0510a:1414_24: So sīhova saddesu āghātavatthūsu kujjhitukāmatāya na santasati,
atk-s0510a:1414_25: paññākkhandhena paṭividdhasabhāvo vātova jālamhi khandhādidhammabhede na sajjati,
atk-s0510a:1414_26: samādhikkhandhena vītarāgo padumaṃva toyena rāgena na lippati.
atk-s0510a:1414_27: Evaṃ samathavipassanāhi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi ca yathāsambhavaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ tiṇṇañca akusalamūlānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1414_28: pahānavasena asantasanto asajjamāno alippamāno ca veditabbo.
atk-s0510a:1416_2: Aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā paccantaṃ kupitaṃ vūpasametuṃ gāmānugāmimaggaṃ chaḍḍetvā ujuṃ aṭavimaggaṃ gahetvā mahatiyā senāya gacchati.
atk-s0510a:1416_3: Tena ca samayena aññatarasmiṃ pabbatapāde sīho bālasūriyātapaṃ tappamāno nipanno hoti.
atk-s0510a:1416_5: Rājā “sīho kira na santasatī”ti bheripaṇavādisaddaṃ kārāpesi,
atk-s0510a:1416_10: tadā “sīho mama paṭisattu atthī”ti catūhi pādehi suppatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0510a:1416_11: Taṃ sutvā hatthārohādayo hatthiādīhi orohitvā tiṇagahanāni paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0510a:1416_13: Rañño hatthīpi rājānaṃ gahetvā vanagahanāni pothayamāno palāyi.
atk-s0510a:1416_14: Rājā taṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto rukkhasākhāya olambitvā pathaviṃ patitvā ekapadikamaggena gacchanto paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1416_31: Tato naṃ pabbājetvā pubbe vuttanayeneva ābhisamācārikaṃ sikkhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1416_32: Sopi pubbe vuttanayeneva vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1417_0: Tattha sahanā ca hananā ca sīghajavattā ca sīho.
atk-s0510a:1417_11: tato migānanti sāmivacanaṃ upayogatthe katvā “mige pasayha abhibhuyya cārī”ti paṭivattabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1417_14: Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritanti.
atk-s0510a:1419_3: So “jhānasukhantarāyo rajja”nti jhānānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1420_0: Tattha “sabbe sattā sukhitā bhavantū”tiādinā nayena hitasukhūpanayanakāmatā mettā.
atk-s0510a:1420_1: “Aho vata imamhā dukkhā mucceyyu”ntiādinā nayena ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā karuṇā.
atk-s0510a:1420_3: modanti sādhu suṭṭhū”tiādinā nayena hitasukhāvippayogakāmatā muditā.
atk-s0510a:1420_5: Gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pana uppaṭipāṭiyā mettaṃ vatvā upekkhā vuttā,
atk-s0510a:1420_7: Vimuttinti catassopi etā attano paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā vimuttiyo.
atk-s0510a:1421_2: Kāleti mettaṃ āsevitvā tato vuṭṭhāya karuṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1421_4: tato itarato vā nippītikajjhānato vuṭṭhāya upekkhaṃ āsevamāno eva “kāle āsevamāno”ti vuccati,
atk-s0510a:1421_6: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamānoti dasasu disāsu sabbena sattalokena avirujjhamāno.
atk-s0510a:1421_12: vitthāro pana mettādikathā aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0510a:1423_2: Rājagahaṃ kira nissāya mātaṅgo nāma paccekabuddho viharati sabbapacchimo paccekabuddhānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1423_3: Atha amhākaṃ bodhisatte uppanne devatāyo bodhisattassa pūjanatthāya āgacchantiyo taṃ disvā “mārisā, mārisā,
atk-s0510a:1423_5: So nirodhā vuṭṭhahanto taṃ sutvā attano jīvitakkhayaṃ disvā himavante mahāpapāto nāma pabbato paccekabuddhānaṃ parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1423_6: Tattha ākāsena gantvā pubbe parinibbutapaccekabuddhassa aṭṭhisaṅghātaṃ papāte pakkhipitvā silātale nisīditvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1424_2: tāni ca tena tena maggena sandālayitvā.
atk-s0510a:1424_3: Asantasaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhīti jīvitasaṅkhayo vuccati cuticittassa paribhedo.
atk-s0510a:1424_5: Ettāvatā sopādisesaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ attano dassetvā gāthāpariyosāne anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0510a:1426_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā ādigāthāya vuttappakārameva phītaṃ rajjaṃ samanusāsati.
atk-s0510a:1426_7: mayaṃ attano saraṇaṃ gavesāmā”ti cintetvā aññatarassa rañño santikaṃ gantvā upaṭṭhānaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1426_12: Tato taṃ pavattiṃ sutvāva sīsaṃ cāletvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1426_13: Tepi amaccā “rājā vuṭṭhito”ti sutvā tattha kiñci alabhamānā paramena pārijuññena pīḷitā punadeva āgantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1426_16: “devaṃ dubbalaṃ disvā ājīvikabhayenamhā asukaṃ nāma janapadaṃ gatā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1426_20: So pubbe rogena phuṭṭho viya bāḷhaṃ vedanaṃ dassento gilānālayaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1426_22: Tepi amaccā tatheva puna bahutaraṃ janaṃ gahetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1426_23: Evaṃ rājā yāvatatiyaṃ sabbaṃ pubbasadisaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0510a:1426_25: Tato catutthampi te āgate disvā rājā –
atk-s0510a:1426_27: ye maṃ byādhitaṃ pahāya anapekkhā pakkamiṃsū”ti nibbinno rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1427_3: bhajanāya ca sevanāya ca nāññaṃ kāraṇamatthi,
atk-s0510a:1427_6: Nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittāti “ito kiñci lacchāmā”ti evaṃ attapaṭilābhakāraṇena nikkāraṇā, kevalaṃ –
atk-s0510a:1428_0: “Upakāro ca yo mitto, yo mitto sukhadukkhako;
atk-s0510a:1429_0: Atthakkhāyī ca yo mitto, yo mitto anukampako”ti. –
atk-s0510a:1430_0: Evaṃ vuttena ariyena mittabhāvena samannāgatā dullabhā ajja mittā.
atk-s0510a:1430_8: tassa sampati diṭṭheyeva atthe etesaṃ paññā,
atk-s0510a:1431_0: Khaggavisāṇakappoti khaggena rukkhādayo chindanto viya sakasiṅgena pabbatādayo cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumāno vicaratīti khaggavisāṇo.
atk-s0510a:1431_3: Khaggaṃ visāṇaṃ yassa migassa soyaṃ migo khaggavisāṇo,
atk-s0510a:1431_5: Khaggavisāṇasadiso paccekabuddho eko adutiyo asahāyo careyya vihareyya vatteyya yapeyya yāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1432_13: Dhammavisesadassīti dasakusaladhammānaṃ catusaccadhammassa navalokuttaradhammassa vā visesena passanasīlā.
atk-s0510a:1432_14: Maggaṅgabojjhaṅgagateti sammādiṭṭhādīhi maggaṅgehi satisambojjhaṅgādīhi bojjhaṅgehi gate sampayutte ariyadhamme.
atk-s0510a:1433_4: Ye katasambhārā dhīrā janā jinasāsanamhi sāvakattaṃ sāvakabhāvaṃ na vajanti na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0510a:1433_5: te dhīrā katasambhārā sayambhū sayameva bhūtā paccekajinā paccekabuddhā bhavanti.
atk-s0510a:1434_5: Sabbadukkhoghatiṇṇā sakalasaṃsāraoghaṃ tiṇṇā atikkantā udaggacittā kodhamānādikilesavirahitattā somanassacittā santamanāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1435_5: Paccantasattesu patippacārāti paccantajanapadesu sattesu dayākaruṇādīhi paticaraṇasīlā.
atk-s0510a:1435_6: Dīpā parattha idha vijjalantāti sakalalokānuggahakaraṇena paraloke ca idhaloke ca vijjalantā dīpā padīpasadisāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1435_7: Paccekabuddhā satataṃ hitāmeti ime paccekabuddhā satataṃ sabbakālaṃ sakalalokahitāya paṭipannāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1436_1: Pahīnasabbāvaraṇā janindāti te paccekabuddhā janānaṃ indā uttamā kāmacchandanīvaraṇādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ pañcāvaraṇānaṃ pahīnattā pahīnasabbāvaraṇā.
atk-s0510a:1436_3: Nissaṃsayaṃ lokasudakkhiṇeyyāti ekantena lokassa sudakkhiṇāya aggadānassa paṭiggahetuṃ arahā yuttā,
atk-s0510a:1436_5: Paccekabuddhā satatappitāmeti ime paccekañāṇādhigamā buddhā satataṃ niccakālaṃ appitā suhitā paripuṇṇā,
atk-s0510a:1437_0: 137. Patiekā visuṃ sammāsambuddhato visadisā aññe asādhāraṇabuddhā paccekabuddhā. Atha vā –
atk-s0510a:1438_0: “Upasaggā nipātā ca, paccayā ca ime tayo;
atk-s0510a:1440_0: Vuttattā patisaddassa ekaupasaggatā pati padhāno hutvā sāmibhūto anekesaṃ dāyakānaṃ appamattakampi āhāraṃ paṭiggahetvā saggamokkhassa pāpuṇanato.
atk-s0510a:1440_1: Tathā hi annabhārassa bhattabhāgaṃ paṭiggahetvāpassantasseva bhuñjitvā devatāhi sādhukāraṃ dāpetvā tadaheva
atk-s0510a:1440_2: taṃ duggataṃ seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpetvā koṭisaṅkhadhanuppādanena ca,
atk-s0510a:1440_4: piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahetvā tassa passantasseva ākāsagamanena somanassuppādanena ca,
atk-s0510a:1440_5: padumavatīaggamahesīputtānaṃ mahājanakarañño deviyā ārādhanena gandhamādanato ākāsena āgamma dānapaṭiggahaṇena
atk-s0510a:1440_6: mahājanakabodhisattassa ca deviyā ca somanassuppādanena ca,
atk-s0510a:1440_7: tathā abuddhuppāde chātakabhaye sakalajambudīpe uppanne bārāṇasiseṭṭhino chātakabhayaṃ paṭicca pūretvā
atk-s0510a:1440_8: rakkhite saṭṭhisahassakoṭṭhāgāre vīhayo khepetvā bhūmiyaṃ nikhātadhaññāni ca cāṭisahassesu pūritadhaññāni
atk-s0510a:1440_9: ca khepetvā sakalapāsādabhittīsu mattikāhi madditvā limpitadhaññāni ca khepetvā tadā nāḷimattamevāvasiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1440_10: “idaṃ bhuñjitvā ajja marissāmā”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā sayantassa gandhamādanato eko paccekabuddho āgantvā
atk-s0510a:1440_12: Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā pasādaṃ uppādetvā jīvitaṃ pariccajamāno paccekabuddhassa patte okiri.
atk-s0510a:1440_13: Paccekabuddho vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā attano ānubhāvena passantasseva seṭṭhissa pañcapaccekabuddhasatehi saha paribhuñji.
atk-s0510a:1441_0: Niddamokkantassa seṭṭhino chātatte uppanne so vuṭṭhahitvā bhariyaṃ āha –
atk-s0510a:1441_2: Susikkhitā sā “sabbaṃ dinnaṃ nanū”ti avatvā ukkhaliyā pidhānaṃ vivari.
atk-s0510a:1441_3: Sā ukkhali taṅkhaṇeva sumanapupphamakuḷasadisassa sugandhasālibhattassa pūritā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1441_4: Sā ca seṭṭhi ca santuṭṭhā sayañca sakalagehavāsino ca sakalanagaravāsino ca bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1441_7: Sakalajambudīpavāsino seṭṭhissa gehatoyeva dhaññabījāni gahetvā sukhitā jātā.
atk-s0510a:1441_8: Evamādīsu anekasattanikāyesu sukhotaraṇaparipālanasaggamokkhapāpanesu pati sāmibhūto buddhoti paccekabuddho.
atk-s0510a:1441_9: Paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitānīti paccekabuddhehi ovādānusāsanīvasena suṭṭhu bhāsitāni kathitāni vacanāni.
atk-s0510a:1441_10: Caranti lokamhi sadevakamhīti devalokasahite sattaloke caranti pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1441_11: Sutvā tathā ye na karonti bālāti tathārūpaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitavacanaṃ ye bālā janā na karonti na manasi karonti,
atk-s0510a:1441_12: te bālā dukkhesu saṃsāradukkhesu punappunaṃ uppattivasena caranti pavattanti,
atk-s0510a:1442_1: Paccekabuddhānaṃ subhāsitānīti suṭṭhu bhāsitāni caturāpāyato muccanatthāya bhāsitāni vacanāni.
atk-s0510a:1442_3: Avassavantaṃ pagghantaṃ khuddaṃ madhuṃ yathā madhuravacanānīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1442_4: Ye paṭipattiyuttā paṇḍitajanāpi paṭipattīsu vuttānusārena pavattantā tathārūpaṃ madhuravacanaṃ sutvā vacanakarā bhavanti,
atk-s0510a:1442_5: te paṇḍitajanā saccadasā catusaccadassino sapaññā paññāsahitā bhavantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1443_1: Paccekabuddhehi jinehi bhāsitāti kilese jinanti jiniṃsūti jinā,
atk-s0510a:1443_2: tehi jinehi paccekabuddhehi vuttā bhāsitā kathitā.
atk-s0510a:1443_3: Kathā uḷārā ojavantā pākaṭā santi pavattanti. Tā,
atk-s0510a:1443_4: kathā sakyasīhena sakyarājavaṃsasīhena gotamena tathāgatena abhinikkhamitvā buddhabhūtena naruttamena
atk-s0510a:1443_5: narānaṃ uttamena seṭṭhena pakāsitā pākaṭīkatā desitāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1444_1: Lokānukampāya imāni tesanti lokānukampatāya lokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca imāni vacanāni imā gāthāyo.
atk-s0510a:1444_2: Tesaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vikubbitāni visesena kubbitāni bhāsitānīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1444_4: mativaḍḍhanatthaṃ paññāvaḍḍhanatthañca sayambhusīhena anācariyakena hutvā sayameva bhūtena jātena paṭividdhena
atk-s0510a:1444_5: sīhena abhītena gotamena sammāsambuddhena imāni vacanāni pakāsitāni,
atk-s0510a:1444_6: imā gāthāyo pakāsitā vivaritā uttānīkatāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1448_0: Tadanantaraṃ therāpadānasaṅgahagāthāyo saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “atha therāpadānaṃ suṇāthā”ti āha. Atha- apadāna-
atk-s0510a:1448_3: saddo panāyaṃ kālathirapaññattināmadheyyajeṭṭhādīsu anekesu atthesu vattati.
atk-s0510a:1448_13: Idha panāyaṃ kāle ca thire ca vattati.
atk-s0510a:1448_20: lambako nāma pabbatotiādi āyasmato sāriputtattherassa apadānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1448_21: tassāyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa ca vatthu evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0510a:1449_0: Atīte kira ito kappato satasahassakappādhike ekaasaṅkhyeyyamatthake āyasmā sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā nāmena saradamāṇavo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1449_1: Mahāmoggallāno gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā nāmena sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbiko nāma ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1449_3: Tesu saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ rahogato cintesi –
atk-s0510a:1449_5: tasmā mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagantvā vimokkhamaggo gavesitabbo”ti sahāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “samma,
atk-s0510a:1449_7: Kiṃ tvaṃ pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī”ti vatvā tena “na sakkhissāmī”ti vutte “hotu ahameva pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0510a:1449_8: ratanakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:1449_9: Tassa pabbajitassa anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā brāhmaṇaputtā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1449_10: So pañca abhiññāyo aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi jaṭilānaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0510a:1449_11: Te sabbepi pañcābhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattisuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1450_0: Tena samayena anomadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko satte saṃsāramahoghato
atk-s0510a:1450_1: tāretvā ekadivasaṃ saradatāpasassa ca antevāsikānañca saṅgahaṃ kattukāmo eko adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0510a:1450_2: ākāsena gantvā “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti tāpasassa passantasseva ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1450_3: Saradatāpaso satthu sarīre mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā “sabbaññubuddhoyevāya”nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1451_0: Tasmiṃ samaye tassa antevāsikā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni
atk-s0510a:1451_1: gahetvā āgatā satthāraṃ disvā sañjātapasādā attano ācariyassa satthu ca nisinnākāraṃ oloketvā “ācariya,
atk-s0510a:1451_2: mayaṃ pubbe ‘tumhehi mahantataro koci natthī’ti maññāma,
atk-s0510a:1451_3: ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1451_5: sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha,
atk-s0510a:1451_7: Atha te tāpasā ācariyassa vacanaṃ sutvā “yāva mahā vatāyaṃ purisuttamo”ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1452_4: Tumhehi yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ābhataṃ,
atk-s0510a:1452_5: taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1452_6: Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1452_8: Tato bhojanakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā satthari nisinne sabbe antevāsike pakkosāpetvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:1452_9: Satthā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0510a:1452_10: Tāvadeva satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā aggasāvakā āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1453_1: satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pupphāsanena pūjā kātabbā,
atk-s0510a:1453_3: Te tāvadeva iddhiyā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhassa yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1453_7: Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha “bhante,
atk-s0510a:1453_8: mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ atiruhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:1453_10: Satthari nisinne dve aggasāvakā sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1453_12: Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi nirodhaṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1453_13: Tāpaso sattāhaṃ nirantaraṃ satthu pupphacchattaṃ dhārento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:1453_14: Itare vanamūlaphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1453_15: Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0510a:1453_17: Thero sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā tesaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1453_18: Tassa desanāvasāne satthā dutiyaṃ aggasāvakaṃ anomattheraṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0510a:1453_20: Sopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1453_22: Atha satthā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0510a:1453_23: Desanāvasāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ avasesā sabbepi catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1453_25: Te tāvadeva antarahitatāpasavesā aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā saṭṭhivassikatthero viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1454_0: Saradatāpaso pana “aho vatāhampi ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāvako bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0510a:1454_1: desanākāle uppannaparivitakkatāya aññavihito hutvā maggaphalāni paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0510a:1454_2: Atha satthāraṃ vanditvā tathā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1454_3: Satthā anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “ito kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0510a:1454_4: gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako sāriputto nāma bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ vatvā
atk-s0510a:1454_7: mayā anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamasammāsambuddhassa aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1454_9: Sirivaḍḍho taṃ upadesaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni
atk-s0510a:1454_10: pupphāni vikiritvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā bhikkhūnampi āsanāni paññāpetvā
atk-s0510a:1454_11: mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā saradatāpasena satthāraṃ nimantāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā
atk-s0510a:1454_12: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ mahārahehi vatthehi acchādetvā dutiyasāvakabhāvāya paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1454_13: Satthā tassa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā vuttanayena byākaritvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:1454_14: Sirivaḍḍho haṭṭhapahaṭṭho yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā dutiyacittavāre kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:1454_15: Saradatāpaso cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:1455_0: Tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ ubhinnampi antarā kammaṃ na kathitaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1455_1: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato uppattito puretarameva saradatāpaso rājagahassa avidūre upatissāgāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:1455_2: Taṃdivasamevassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:1455_3: Tasmā moggallāno moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā puttoti moggallāno.
atk-s0510a:1455_5: Atha vā mātukumārikakāle tassā mātāpitūhi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0510a:1455_8: Atha vā sotāpattimaggādimaggassa lābhe ādāne paṭivijjhane alaṃ samatthoti moggallānoti.
atk-s0510a:1455_9: Tāni kira dve kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhasahāyāneva.
atk-s0510a:1455_11: Dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1455_12: Nāmaggahaṇadivase rūpasārībrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā upatissoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1455_13: Itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā kolitoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1455_14: Te ubhopi mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhantā vuddhimanvāya sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1456_0: Athekadivasaṃ te rājagahe giraggasamajjaṃ passantā mahājanaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā
atk-s0510a:1456_1: yoniso ummujjantā “sabbepime oraṃ vassasatāva maccumukhaṃ pavisantī”ti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā “amhehi
atk-s0510a:1456_3: tañca pariyesantehi ekā pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nicchayaṃ katvā pañcamāṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa paribbājakassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1456_4: Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1456_5: Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ parimajjitvā tattha sāraṃ adisvā tato nibbijjitvā tattha tattha
atk-s0510a:1456_9: Evaṃ te mokkhaṃ pariyesantā katikaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-s0510a:1457_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ satthari paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena uruvelakassapādike
atk-s0510a:1457_1: sahassajaṭile dametvā rājagahe viharante ekadivasaṃ upatisso paribbājako paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1457_2: assajittheraṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā “na mayā evarūpo ākappasampanno pabbajito diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0510a:1457_3: santadhammena nāma ettha bhavitabba”nti sañjātapasādo pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āyasmantaṃ udikkhanto piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
atk-s0510a:1457_4: Theropi laddhapiṇḍapāto paribhuñjituṃ patirūpaṃ okāsaṃ gato.
atk-s0510a:1457_6: Bhattakiccapariyosāne cassa attano kuṇḍikāya udakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1457_7: Evaṃ so ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā –
atk-s0510a:1457_9: kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1457_11: Puna tena “kiṃ vādī panāyasmato satthā”ti puṭṭho “imassa sāsanassa gambhīrataṃ dassessāmī”ti attano navakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:1457_12: pavedetvā saṅkhepavasena cassa sāsanadhammaṃ kathento “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0510a:1457_13: Paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva sutvā sahassanayasampanne sotāpattimaggaphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0510a:1457_15: Gāthāpariyosāne pana sotāpanno hutvā uparivisese apavattante “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha – “mā, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1457_21: ahaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyassa katapaṭiññaṃ mocetvā taṃ gahetvā āgamissāmī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1458_0: Kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā “mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya addhānena amataṃ adhigataṃ
atk-s0510a:1458_1: bhavissatī”ti tenevassa visesādhigamaṃ sambhāvetvā amatādhigamaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1458_9: tasmā sañcayassa satthu guṇe pakāsetvā tampi satthu santikaṃ netukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1458_10: So lābhāsāpakato antevāsikabhāvaṃ anicchanto “na sakkomi cāṭi hutvā udakasiñcanaṃ hotu”nti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0510a:1458_11: Te anekehi kāraṇehi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānehi aḍḍhuteyyasatehi antevāsikehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1458_12: Satthā te dūratova āgacchante disvā “etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0510a:1458_13: aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti vatvā tesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena dhammaṃ desetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1458_14: Yathā tesaṃ evaṃ aggasāvakānampi iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ āgatameva.
atk-s0510a:1459_0: Tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāme samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0510a:1459_1: thinamiddhe okkamante satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ suṇanto eva uparimaggattayaṃ
atk-s0510a:1459_3: Āyasmā sāriputto pabbajjāya addhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ rājagahe sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto
atk-s0510a:1459_4: attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1459_5: pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1459_6: Iti dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ satthu samīpe eva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1460_0: Evaṃ pattasāvakapāramīñāṇo āyasmā sāriputto “kena kammena ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti āvajjento taṃ ñatvā
atk-s0510a:1464_0: Tattha himavantassāti himo assa atthīti himavā,
atk-s0510a:1464_4: Assamo sukato mayhanti tasmiṃ lambake pabbate mayhaṃ mamatthāya kato assamo araññavāso āsamantato samoti assamo.
atk-s0510a:1464_5: Natthi paviṭṭhānaṃ samo parissamo etthāti vā assamo,
atk-s0510a:1464_8: Paṇṇasālāti usīrapabbajādīhi paṇṇehi chāditā nivasanapaṇṇasālāti attho.
