atk-s0510a:1689_1: Tena tāpasena thomitākāraṃ pakāsentā dhammasaṅgāhakā therā imā gāthā thavitvānāti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1689_2: Tattha imā gāthāti ettakāhi gāthāhi thavitvāna thomanaṃ katvāna nāmena suruci nāma tāpaso sesaṭṭhakathāsu pana “saradamāṇavo”ti āgato.
atk-s0510a:1689_4: atha vā sundarā ruci ajjhāsayo nibbānālayo assāti suruci.
atk-s0510a:1689_7: So surucitāpaso ajinacammaṃ pattharitvāna pathaviyaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0510a:1689_8: accāsannādayo cha nisajjadose vajjetvā sarado nisīdīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1690_1: Tattha nisinno tāpaso tassa bhagavato ñāṇameva thomento cullāsītisahassānītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1690_5: tāvadeva tattakāni caturāsītisahassāni accuggato atiuggato idāni pavuccatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1691_2: so mahāneru āyato uccato ca vitthārato ca evaṃ mahanto nerurājā koṭisatasahassiyo saṅkhāṇubhedena cuṇṇito cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kato asi.
atk-s0510a:1692_1: sabbaññu tava ñāṇaṃ lakkhe ṭhapiyamānamhi ñāṇe sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā ekekaṃ binduṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:1692_2: ṭhapite tadeva mahānerussa cuṇṇaṃ khayaṃ gaccheyya,
atk-s0510a:1692_3: tava ñāṇaṃ pametave pamāṇaṃ kātuṃ eva na sakkāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1693_1: Sukhumacchikena sukhumacchiddena jālena yo sakalamahāsamudde udakaṃ parikkhipe samantato parikkhaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0510a:1693_2: evaṃ parikkhite ye keci pāṇā udake jātā sabbe te antojālagatā siyuṃ bhaveyyunti attho.
atk-s0510a:1694_2: Tattha yathā udajā pāṇā antojālagatā honti,
atk-s0510a:1694_4: Ye keci puthu anekā titthiyā micchā titthakarā diṭṭhigahanapakkhandā diṭṭhisaṅkhātagahanaṃ paviṭṭhā parāmāsena
atk-s0510a:1694_5: sabhāvato parato āmasanalakkhaṇāya diṭṭhiyā mohitā pihitā santi.
atk-s0510a:1695_1: Tava suddhena nikkilesena ñāṇena anāvaraṇadassinā sabbadhammānaṃ āvaraṇarahitadassanasīlena ete sabbe
atk-s0510a:1695_2: titthiyā antojālagatā ñāṇajālassanto pavesitā vā tathevāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1695_3: Ñāṇaṃ te nātivattareti tava ñāṇaṃ te titthiyā nātikkamantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1696_1: Evaṃ vuttathomanāvasāne bhagavato attano byākaraṇārabbhaṃ dassetuṃ bhagavā tamhi samayetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1696_2: Tattha yasmiṃ samaye tāpaso bhagavantaṃ thomesi,
atk-s0510a:1696_3: tasmiṃ thomanāya pariyosānakāle saṅkhyātikkantaparivāratāya mahāyaso anomadassī bhagavā kilesamārādīnaṃ jitattā jino.
atk-s0510a:1696_4: Samādhimhā appitasamādhito vuṭṭhahitvā sakalajambudīpaṃ dibbacakkhunā olokesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1697_1: Tassa anomadassissa bhagavato munino monasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgatassa nisabho nāma sāvako santacittehi
atk-s0510a:1697_3: tādibhi khīṇāsavehi suddhehi parisuddhakāyakammādiyuttehi chaḷabhiññehi tādīhi aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampanasabhāvehi
atk-s0510a:1698_1: Te tathā āgatā samānā tattha bhagavato samīpe.
atk-s0510a:1698_2: Antalikkhe ākāse ṭhitā bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1698_3: Te sabbe pañjalikā namassamānā ākāsato buddhassa santike otaruṃ orohiṃsūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1699_1: Puna byākaraṇadānassa pubbabhāgakāraṇaṃ pakāsento sitaṃ pātukarītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1700_1: Yo maṃ pupphenāti yo tāpaso mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā anekapupphena maṃ pūjesi,
atk-s0510a:1700_2: ñāṇañca me anu punappunaṃ thavi thomesi,
atk-s0510a:1700_3: tamahanti taṃ tāpasaṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0510a:1700_4: mama bhāsato bhāsantassa vacanaṃ suṇotha savanavisayaṃ karotha manasi karotha.
atk-s0510a:1701_1: Pacchime bhavasampatteti byākaraṇaṃ dadamāno bhagavā āha.
atk-s0510a:1701_2: Tattha pacchime pariyosānabhūte bhave sampatte sati.
atk-s0510a:1701_5: Rūpasāradhanasāravayasārakulasārabhogasārapuññasārādīhi sārehi sāravantatāya sārī nāma brāhmaṇī kucchinā dhārayissati.
atk-s0510a:1702_2: Ettha dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappasatasahassañca pāramī pūritā,
atk-s0510a:1702_3: tathāpi gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ antarakappāni upādāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1703_3: byākaraṇaṃ datvā taṃ thomento so bhagavā ayaṃ bhāgīrathītiādimāha. Gaṅgā, yamunā, sarabhū, mahī,
atk-s0510a:1703_4: aciravatīti imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ gaṅgānaṃ antare ayaṃ bhāgīrathī nāma paṭhamamahāgaṅgā himavantā pabhāvitā himavantato āgatā anotattadahato pabhavā,
atk-s0510a:1703_7: tathā eva ayaṃ sāriputto sake tīsu visārado attano kule pavattamānesu tīsu vedesu visārado apakkhalitañāṇo patthaṭañāṇo.
atk-s0510a:1703_8: Paññāya pāramiṃ gantvā attano sāvakañāṇassa pariyosānaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0510a:1703_9: pāṇine sabbasatte tappayissati santappessati suhittabhāvaṃ karissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1704_1: Himavantamupādāyāti himālayapabbataṃ ādiṃ katvā mahodadhiṃ mahāsamuddaṃ udakabhāraṃ sāgaraṃ pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1704_2: katvā etthantare etesaṃ dvinnaṃ pabbatasāgarānaṃ majjhe yaṃ pulinaṃ yattakā vālukarāsi atthi,
atk-s0510a:1705_1: Tampi sakkā asesenāti taṃ pulinampi nisesena saṅkhātuṃ sakkā sakkuṇeyya bhaveyya,
atk-s0510a:1705_3: Tathā sāriputtassa paññāya anto pariyosānaṃ na tveva bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1706_2: bhavissatīti lakkhe ñāṇalakkhe ñāṇassa ekasmiṃ kale ṭhapiyamānamhi ṭhapite sati gaṅgāya vālukā khīye parikkhayaṃ gaccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1707_1: Mahāsamuddeti caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre catumahāsāgare ūmiyo gāvutādibhedā taraṅgarāsayo gaṇanāto asaṅkhiyā saṅkhyāvirahitā yathā honti,
atk-s0510a:1707_2: tatheva sāriputtassa paññāya anto pariyosānaṃ na hessati na bhavissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1708_1: So evaṃ paññavā sāriputto gotamagottattā gotamaṃ sakyakule jeṭṭhakaṃ sakyapuṅgavaṃ sambuddhaṃ ārādhayitvā
atk-s0510a:1708_2: vattapaṭipattisīlācārādīhi cittārādhanaṃ katvā paññāya sāvakañāṇassa pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gantvā tassa
atk-s0510a:1709_1: So evaṃ aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patto sakyaputtena bhagavatā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvena pavattitaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0510a:1709_2: kataṃ dhammacakkaṃ saddhammaṃ anuvattessati avinassamānaṃ dhāressati.
atk-s0510a:1709_3: Dhammavuṭṭhiyo dhammadesanāsaṅkhātā vuṭṭhiyo vassento desento pakāsento vivaranto vibhajanto uttānīkaronto pavattissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1710_1: Gotamo sakyapuṅgavo bhagavā etaṃ sabbaṃ abhiññāya visesena ñāṇena jānitvā bhikkhusaṅghe ariyapuggalamajjhe
atk-s0510a:1710_2: nisīditvā aggaṭṭhāne sakalapaññādiguṇagaṇābhirame uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapessatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1711_1: Evaṃ so laddhabyākaraṇo somanassappatto pītisomanassavasena udānaṃ udānento aho me sukataṃ kammantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1711_3: Anomadassissa bhagavato satthuno garuno sukataṃ suṭṭhu kataṃ saddahitvā kataṃ kammaṃ puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ aho vimhayaṃ acinteyyānubhāvanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1711_4: Yassa bhagavato ahaṃ kāraṃ puññasambhāraṃ katvā sabbattha sakalaguṇagaṇe pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gato paramaṃ koṭiṃ sampatto,
atk-s0510a:1712_2: me mayhaṃ idha imasmiṃ pacchimattabhāve phalaṃ vipākaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0510a:1712_3: Sumutto suṭṭhu vimutto chekena dhanuggahena khitto saravego iva ahaṃ tena puññaphalena kilese jhāpayiṃ jhāpesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1713_4: Taṃ asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ kilesakālussiyābhāvena acalaṃ katasambhārānaṃ patiṭṭhaṭṭhena padaṃ gavesanto
atk-s0510a:1713_5: pariyesanto sabbe titthiye sakale titthakare diṭṭhuppādake puggale vicinaṃ upaparikkhanto esāhaṃ eso
atk-s0510a:1713_6: ahaṃ bhave kāmabhavādike bhave saṃsariṃ paribbhaminti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1714_1: Attano adhippāyaṃ pakāsento yathāpi byādhito posotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1714_2: Tattha byādhitoti byādhinā pīḷito poso puriso osadhaṃ pariyeseyya yathā,
atk-s0510a:1714_3: tathā ahaṃ asaṅkhataṃ amataṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ gavesanto abbokiṇṇaṃ avicchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ,
atk-s0510a:1714_4: pañcasataṃ jātipañcasatesu attabhāvesu isipabbajjaṃ pabbajinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1715_0: 271. Kutitthe sañcariṃ ahanti lāmake titthe gamanamagge ahaṃ sañcariṃ.
atk-s0510a:1716_2: Kadaliṃ chetvāna phālayeti kadalikkhandhaṃ chetvā dvedhā phāleyya.
atk-s0510a:1716_3: Na tattha sāraṃ vindeyyāti phāletvā ca pana tattha kadalikkhandhe sāraṃ na vindeyya na labheyya,
atk-s0510a:1716_4: so puriso sārena rittako tucchoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1717_2: tatheva tathā eva loke titthiyā nānādiṭṭhigatikā bahujjanā asaṅkhatena nibbānena rittā tucchāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1718_1: Pacchimabhave pariyosānajātiyaṃ brahmabandhu brāhmaṇakule jāto ahaṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1718_2: Mahābhogaṃ chaḍḍetvānāti mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ iva chaḍḍetvā,
atk-s0510a:1718_3: anagāriyaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammavirahitaṃ tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajiṃ paṭipajjinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1720_2: muniṃ mone samāhitanti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1720_4: tasmiṃ mone sammā āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ samāhitaṃ cittanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1720_7: taṃ mahānāgaṃ suṭṭhu phullaṃ vikasitapadumaṃ yathā virocamānanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1721_0: 278-281. Disvā me…pe… pucchituṃ amataṃ padanti uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:1722_1: Vīthintareti vīthiantare anuppattaṃ sampattaṃ upagataṃ taṃ theraṃ upagantvāna samīpaṃ gantvā ahaṃ pucchinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1723_1: Kīdisaṃ te mahāvīrāti sakaladhitipurisasāsane arahantānamantare paṭhamaṃ dhammacakkapavattane,
atk-s0510a:1723_3: anujātaparivārabahulatāya mahāyasa te tava buddhassa kīdisaṃ sāsanaṃ dhammaṃ dhammadesanāsaṅkhātaṃ sāsananti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1723_5: me mayhaṃ sādhu bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ kathayassu kathehīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1724_1: Tato kathitākāraṃ dassento so me puṭṭhotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1724_3: me mayā puṭṭho “sāsanaṃ kīdisa”nti kathito sabbaṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1724_4: Sabbaṃ sāsanaṃ satthagambhīratāya gambhīraṃ desanādhammapaṭivedhagambhīratāya gambhīraṃ paramatthasaccavibhāvitādivasena
atk-s0510a:1724_5: nipuṇaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ taṇhāsallassa hantāraṃ vināsakaraṃ sabbassa saṃsāradukkhassa apanudanaṃ khepanakaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1725_2: Hetuppabhavā hetuto kāraṇato uppannā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā,
atk-s0510a:1725_3: ye dhammā ye sappaccayā sabhāvadhammā santi saṃvijjanti upalabhantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1725_4: Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetuṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgato āha kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1725_5: Tesañca yo nirodhoti tesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ yo nirodho nirujjhanasabhāvo,
atk-s0510a:1725_6: evaṃvādī mahāsamaṇoti sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇaparivāramahantatāya samitapāpattā viddhaṃsitapāpattā ca mahāsamaṇo
atk-s0510a:1726_0: 287. Tato vuttadhammaṃ sutvā attanā paccakkhakatappakāraṃ dassento sohantiādimāha. Taṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0510a:1727_1: Eseva dhammo yaditāvadevāti sacepi ito uttariṃ natthi,
atk-s0510a:1727_4: Paccabyatha paṭividdhatha tumhe asokaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1727_5: Amhehi nāma idaṃ padaṃ bahukehi kappanahutehi adiṭṭhameva abbhatītaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1728_1: Yvāhaṃ dhammaṃ gavesantoti yo ahaṃ dhammaṃ santipadaṃ gavesanto pariyesanto kutitthe kucchitatitthe ninditabbatitthe sañcariṃ paribbhaminti attho.
atk-s0510a:1728_2: So me attho anuppattoti so pariyesitabbo attho mayā anuppatto sampatto,
atk-s0510a:1728_3: idāni pana me mayhaṃ nappamajjituṃ appamādena bhavituṃ kāloti attho.
atk-s0510a:1729_3: patvāna pāpuṇitvā sahāyakaṃ kolitamāṇavaṃ gavesanto pariyesanto assamapadaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1730_1: Dūratova mamaṃ disvāti assamapadato dūratova āgacchantaṃ mamaṃ disvā susikkhito me mama sahāyo ṭhānanisajjādiiriyāpathehi
atk-s0510a:1730_2: sampanno samaṅgībhūto idaṃ upari vuccamānavacanaṃ abravi kathesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1731_2: pasannamukhanettāsi pasannehi sobhanehi daddallamānehi mukhanettehi samannāgato asi.
atk-s0510a:1731_4: Itthambhūto tvaṃ amatādhigato amataṃ nibbānaṃ adhigato asi,
atk-s0510a:1731_5: kacci accutaṃ nibbānapadaṃ adhigato adhigacchīti pucchāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1732_1: Subhānurūpo āyāsīti subhassa pasannavaṇṇassa anurūpo hutvā āyāsi āgacchasi.
atk-s0510a:1732_2: Āneñjakārito viyāti tomarādīhi kārito āneñjo hatthī viya dantova tīhi māsehi susikkhito iva bāhitapāpattā,
atk-s0510a:1732_3: brāhmaṇa dantadamatho sikkhitasikkho nibbānapade upasanto asīti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1733_0: 295. Tena puṭṭho amataṃ mayātiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:1734_1: Apariyositasaṅkappoti “anāgate ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya”nti patthitapatthanāya koṭiṃ appattasaṅkappoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1734_5: mama saṅkappo mayhaṃ patthanā pūrito arahattamaggādhigamena sāvakapāramīñāṇassa pāpuṇanena paripuṇṇoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0510a:1735_1: Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāyāti pathaviyaṃ nibbattā samaye hemantakāle pupphanti vikasanti,
atk-s0510a:1735_3: sabbapāṇinaṃ sabbe devamanusse tosenti somanassayutte karonti yathā.
atk-s0510a:1736_1: Tathevāhaṃ mahāvīrāti mahāvīriyavantasakyakulapasutamahāparivāra te tava sāsane patiṭṭhāya ahaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0510a:1736_2: pupphituṃ arahattamaggañāṇena vikasituṃ samayaṃ kālaṃ esāmi gavesāmi tathevāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1737_1: Vimuttipupphanti sabbakilesehi vimuccanato vimocanato vā vimutti arahattaphalavimuttisaṅkhātaṃ pupphaṃ esanto gavesento,
atk-s0510a:1737_2: tañca kho bhavasaṃsāramocanaṃ kāmabhavādibhavesu saṃsaraṇaṃ gamanaṃ bhavasaṃsāraṃ,
atk-s0510a:1737_4: Vimuttipupphalābhenāti vimuccanaṃ vimuccanti vā katasambhārā etāyāti vimutti,
atk-s0510a:1737_10: Tena vimuttipupphalābhena adhigamanena sabbapāṇinaṃ sabbasatte tosemi somanassaṃ pāpemīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1738_1: “Yāvatā buddhakhettamhī”tiādīsu cakkhuma pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumanta yattake ṭhāne ratanasuttādīnaṃ parittānaṃ āṇā ānubhāvo pavattati,
atk-s0510a:1738_2: tattake satasahassakoṭicakkavāḷasaṅkhāte buddhakhette ṭhapetvāna mahāmuniṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ vajjetvā avasesesu
atk-s0510a:1738_3: sattesu añño koci tava puttassa tuyhaṃ puttena mayā paññāya sadiso samo natthīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1739_1: Paṭipannāti catumaggasamaṅgino ca phalaṭṭhā arahattaphale ṭhitā ca sekhā phalasamaṅgino heṭṭhimehi tīhi
atk-s0510a:1739_2: phalehi samannāgatā ca ete aṭṭha ariyabhikkhū,
atk-s0510a:1739_4: taṃ paññavantaṃ parivārenti sadā sabbakālaṃ sevanti bhajanti payirupāsantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1740_1: Kāyavedanācittadhammānupassanāsaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ kusalā chekā satisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:1743_2: dharaṇiyaṃ ruhā sañjātā vaḍḍhitā cāti dharaṇīruhā rukkhā.
atk-s0510a:1743_3: Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya ruhanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0510a:1743_5: te rukkhā kamena phalaṃ dassayanti phaladhārino honti.
atk-s0510a:1744_2: Tattha sindhuvādi nāma gaṅgā ca sarassatī nāma gaṅgā ca nandiyagaṅgā ca candabhāgāgaṅgā ca gaṅgā nāma
atk-s0510a:1744_3: gaṅgā ca yamunā nāma gaṅgā ca sarabhū nāma gaṅgā ca mahī nāma gaṅgā ca.
atk-s0510a:1744_4: Sandamānānaṃ gacchantīnaṃ etāsaṃ gaṅgānaṃ sāgarova samuddo eva sampaṭicchati paṭiggaṇhāti dhāreti.
atk-s0510a:1744_5: Tadā etā sabbagaṅgā purimaṃ nāmaṃ sindhuvādigaṅgātyādikaṃ purimaṃ nāmapaññattivohāraṃ jahanti chaḍḍenti
atk-s0510a:1744_6: sāgaroteva sāgaro iti eva ñāyati pākaṭā bhavati yathā.
atk-s0510a:1744_7: Tatheva tathā eva ime catubbaṇṇā khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddasaṅkhātā cattāro kulā tavantike tava antike
atk-s0510a:1744_8: samīpe pabbajitvā pattakāsāyacīvaradhārino paricarantā purimaṃ nāmaṃ khattiyādināmadheyyaṃ paññattivohāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1744_10: buddhaputtāti buddhassa orasāti ñāyare pākaṭā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1745_1: Cando candamaṇḍalo abbhā mahikā rajo dhumo rāhūti pañcahi upakkilesehi virahitattā vimalo vigatamalo nimmalo,
atk-s0510a:1745_3: sabbe tārakasamūhe ābhāya maddamāno loke atirocati daddallati yathā.
atk-s0510a:1746_1: Udake jātā udake saṃvaḍḍhā kumudā mandālakā ca bahū saṅkhātikkantā,
atk-s0510a:1746_2: toyena udakena kaddamakalalena ca upalimpanti allīyanti yathā,
atk-s0510a:1746_3: tatheva bahukā sattā aparimāṇā sattā loke jātā saṃvaḍḍhā rāgena ca dosena ca aṭṭitā bandhitā virūhare viruhanti.
atk-s0510a:1747_2: Vārijā padumapupphādayo bahū pupphā pupphanti vikasanti,
atk-s0510a:1747_3: taṃ māsaṃ taṃ kattikamāsaṃ nātivattanti vārijāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1747_4: Samayo pupphanāya soti so kattikamāso pupphanāya vikasanāya samayo kāloti attho.
atk-s0510a:1747_8: Pupphito te vimuttiyāti te tuyhaṃ sissā katasambhārā bhikkhū vimuttiyā arahattaphalañāṇena pupphito vikasito.
atk-s0510a:1747_10: tathā te sāsanaṃ ovādānusāsaniṃ nātivattanti nātikkamantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1748_1: Yathāpi selo himavāti himavā nāma selamayapabbato.
atk-s0510a:1748_2: Sabbapāṇinaṃ sabbesaṃ byādhitānaṃ sattānaṃ osadho osadhavanto sabbanāgānaṃ sabbaasurānaṃ sabbadevānañca ālayo agārabhūto yathā,
atk-s0510a:1748_6: tathā tevijjāya ca chaḷabhiññāya ca iddhiyā ca pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gatā pattā tuvaṃ nissāya vasantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1748_7: Heṭṭhā vā upari vā upamāupameyyavasena gāthānaṃ sambandhanayā suviññeyyāva.
atk-s0510a:1749_1: Āsayānusayaṃ ñatvāti ettha āsayoti ajjhāsayo cariyā,
atk-s0510a:1749_5: ayaṃ mohacarito”tiādinā āsayañca anusayaṃ kilesapavattiñca jānitvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1749_6: Indriyānaṃ balābalanti saddhindriyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ tikkhindriyo mudindriyo svākāro dvākāro
atk-s0510a:1749_8: Bhabbābhabbe viditvānāti “mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ ayaṃ puggalo bhabbo samattho,
atk-s0510a:1749_9: ayaṃ puggalo abhabbo”ti viditvā paccakkhaṃ katvā, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1749_10: sabbaññu tvaṃ cātuddīpikamahāmegho viya dhammadesanāsīhanādena abhītanādena gajjasi sakalaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ ekaninnādaṃ karosi.
atk-s0510a:1750_1: Cakkavāḷapariyantāti samantā cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūretvā parisā nisinnā bhaveyya.
atk-s0510a:1750_2: Te evaṃ nisinnā nānādiṭṭhī anekadassanagāhino vivadamānā dveḷhakajātā vivadanti,
atk-s0510a:1750_3: taṃ tesaṃ vimaticchedanāya dubuddhichindanatthāya sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ cittamaññāya cittācāraṃ ñatvā opammakusalo upamāupameyyesu dakkho tvaṃ, muni,
atk-s0510a:1750_4: ekaṃ pañhaṃ kathentova ekeneva pañhakathanena sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe nisinnānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ vimatiṃ saṃsayaṃ chindasi nikkaṅkhaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1751_1: Upadisasadisehevāti ettha udakassa upari dissanti pākaṭā hontīti upadisā, sevālā.
atk-s0510a:1751_3: Yathā hi upadisā sevālā udakaṃ adissamānaṃ katvā tassupari pattharitvā ṭhitā honti,
atk-s0510a:1751_4: tathā vasudhā pathavī tehi upadisasadisehi eva manussehi nirantaraṃ pattharitvā ṭhitehi pūritā bhaveyya.
atk-s0510a:1751_5: Te sabbeva pathaviṃ pūretvā ṭhitā manussā pañjalikā sirasi añjaliṃ paggahitā kittayuṃ lokanāyakaṃ lokanāyakassa buddhassa guṇaṃ katheyyuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1752_1: Te sabbe devamanussā kappaṃ vā sakalaṃ kappaṃ kittayantā guṇaṃ kathentāpi nānāvaṇṇehi nānappakārehi guṇehi kittayuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1752_2: Tathāpi te sabbe parimetuṃ guṇapamāṇaṃ kathetuṃ na pappeyyuṃ na sampāpuṇeyyuṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1753_1: Sakena thāmena attano balena heṭṭhā upamāupameyyavasena jino jitakileso buddho mayā kittito thomito yathā ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1753_2: evameva sabbe devamanussā kappakoṭīpi kappakoṭisatepi kittentā pakittayuṃ katheyyunti attho.
atk-s0510a:1754_1: Punapi guṇānaṃ appamāṇataṃ dīpetuṃ sace hi koci devo vātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1754_2: Pūritaṃ parikaḍḍheyyāti mahāsamudde pūritaudakaṃ samantato ākaḍḍheyya.
atk-s0510a:1754_3: So puggalo vighātaṃ dukkhameva labheyya pāpuṇeyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1755_1: Vattemi jinasāsananti jinena bhāsitaṃ sakalaṃ piṭakattayaṃ vattemi pavattemi rakkhāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1755_2: Dhammasenāpatīti dhammena paññāya bhagavato catuparisasaṅkhātāya parisāya pati padhānoti dhammasenāpati.
atk-s0510a:1755_3: Sakyaputtassa bhagavato sāsane ajja imasmiṃ vattamānakāle cakkavattirañño jeṭṭhaputto viya sakalaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ pālemīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1756_1: Attano saṃsāraparibbhamaṃ dassento yo koci manujo bhārantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1756_2: Yo koci manujo mānuso bhāraṃ sīsabhāraṃ matthake sīse ṭhapetvā dhāreyya vaheyya,
atk-s0510a:1756_3: sadā sabbakālaṃ so manujo tena bhārena dukkhito pīḷito atibhūto assa bhaveyya.
atk-s0510a:1756_5: Tathā tena pakārena ahaṃ rāgaggidosaggimohaggisaṅkhātehi tīhi aggīhi ḍayhamāno,
atk-s0510a:1756_6: giriṃ uddharito yathā mahāmerupabbataṃ uddharitvā ukkhipitvā sīse ṭhapito bhavabhārena bhavasaṃsāruppattibhārena,
atk-s0510a:1756_7: bharito dukkhito bhavesu saṃsariṃ paribbhaminti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1757_1: Oropito ca me bhāroti idāni pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya so bhavabhāro mayā oropito nikkhitto.
atk-s0510a:1757_2: Bhavā ugghāṭitā mayāti sabbe nava bhavā mayā viddhaṃsitā.
atk-s0510a:1757_3: Sakyaputtassa bhagavato sāsane yaṃ karaṇīyaṃ kattabbaṃ maggapaṭipāṭiyā kilesaviddhaṃsanakammaṃ atthi,
atk-s0510a:1758_1: Puna attano visesaṃ dassento yāvatā buddhakhettamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1758_2: Tattha yāvatā yattake dasasahassacakkavāḷasaṅkhāte buddhakhette sakyapuṅgavaṃ sakyakulajeṭṭhakaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1758_3: ṭhapetvā avasesasattesu kocipi paññāya me mayā samo natthīti dīpeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0510a:1759_0: 356. Puna attano ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento samādhimhītyādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:1760_1: Jhānavimokkhānakhippapaṭilābhīti paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ jhānānaṃ lokato vimuccanato “vimokkha”nti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1760_2: gatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ lokuttaravimokkhānañca khippalābhī sīghaṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1761_1: Evaṃ mahānubhāvassāpi attano sabrahmacārīsu gāravabahumānataṃ pakāsento uddhatavisovātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1761_2: Tattha uddhataviso uppāṭitaghoraviso sappo iva chinnavisāṇova chinditasiṅgo usabho iva ahaṃ idāni nikkhittamānadappova
atk-s0510a:1761_3: chaḍḍitagottamadādimānadappova gaṇaṃ saṅghassa santikaṃ garugāravena ādarabahumānena upemi upagacchāmi.
atk-s0510a:1762_1: Idāni attano paññāya mahattataṃ pakāsento yadirūpinītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1762_2: Evarūpā me mahatī paññā arūpinī samānā yadi rūpinī bhaveyya,
atk-s0510a:1762_3: tadā me mama paññā vasupatīnaṃ pathavissarānaṃ rājūnaṃ sameyya samā bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0510a:1762_4: Evaṃ attano paññāya mahattabhāvaṃ dassetvā tato pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena pubbe kammaṃ saritvā anomadassissātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1762_5: Tattha anomadassissa bhagavato mayā katāya ñāṇathomanāya phalaṃ etaṃ mama paññāmahattanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1763_7: cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”tiādīsu khuracakke “rājā cakkavattī cakkānubhāvena vattanako”tiādīsu ratanacakke.
atk-s0510a:1763_9: Tādinā tādiguṇasamannāgatena sakyaputtena gotamasambuddhena pavattitaṃ desitaṃ piṭakattayasaṅkhātaṃ dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0510a:1763_10: ahaṃ sammā aviparītena anuvattemi anugantvā vattemi,
atk-s0510a:1763_12: Idaṃ anuvattanaṃ desitassa anugantvā pacchā desanaṃ purimabuddhānaṃ katāya ñāṇathomanāya phalanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1764_1: Tato sappurisūpanissayayonisomanasikārādipuññaphalaṃ dassento mā me kadāci pāpicchotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1764_2: Tattha pāpiccho lāmakāya icchāya samannāgato pāpacārī puggalo ca ṭhānanisajjādīsu vattapaṭivattakaraṇe
atk-s0510a:1764_3: kusīto ca jhānasamādhimaggabhāvanādīsu hīnavīriyo ca ganthadhuravipassanādhuravirahitattā appassuto ca
atk-s0510a:1764_4: ācariyupajjhāyādīsu ācāravirahitattā anācāro ca puggalo kadāci kāle katthaci ṭhāne me mayā saha sameto
atk-s0510a:1764_5: samāgato mā ahu mā bhavatūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1765_1: Bahussutoti pariyattipaṭivedhavasena duvidho bahussuto ca puggalo.
atk-s0510a:1765_3: Sīlesu susamāhitoti catupārisuddhisīlamaggasampayuttasīlaaṭṭhaṅguposathasīlādīsu suṭṭhu āhito ṭhapitacitto ca.
atk-s0510a:1765_5: Api muddhani tiṭṭhatu evarūpo puggalo mayhaṃ muddhani sirasi api tiṭṭhatūti attho.
atk-s0510a:1766_1: Attano laddhaphalānisaṃsaṃ vatvā tatthaññe niyojento taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddantetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1767_1: Yamahanti yaṃ assajittheraṃ ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ ādimhi disvā sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhena sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā vimalo malarahito ahuṃ ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1767_2: so assajitthero me mayhaṃ ācariyo lokuttaradhammasikkhāpako ahuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1767_3: Ahaṃ tassa savanāya anusāsanena ajja dhammasenāpati ahuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1767_4: Sabbattha sabbesu guṇesu pāramiṃ patto pariyosānaṃ patto anāsavo nikkileso viharāmi.
atk-s0510a:1768_1: Attano ācariye sagāravaṃ dassento yo me ācariyotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1768_2: Yo assaji nāma thero satthu sāvako me mayhaṃ ācariyo āsi ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1768_3: so thero yassaṃ disāyaṃ yasmiṃ disābhāge vasati,
atk-s0510a:1768_4: ahaṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ ussīsamhi sīsuparibhāge karomīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1769_1: Tato attano ṭhānantarappattabhāvaṃ dassento mama kammantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1769_2: Gotamo bhagavā sakyapuṅgavo sakyakulaketu sabbaññutaññāṇena mama pubbe katakammaṃ saritvāna ñatvā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0510a:1769_3: nisinno aggaṭṭhāne aggasāvakaṭṭhāne maṃ ṭhapesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1770_6: Catumaggacatuphalavasena vā rūpārūpajhānavasena vā aṭṭha vimokkhā saṃsāravimuccanadhammā ca iddhividhādayo
atk-s0510a:1770_7: cha abhiññāyo ca sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā.
atk-s0510a:1770_8: Kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti buddhassa anusiṭṭhi ovādasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ kataṃ arahattamaggañāṇena nipphāditanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1771_0: Itthaṃ sudanti ettha itthanti nidassanatthe nipāto,
atk-s0510a:1771_6: Imā gāthāyoti imā sakalā sāriputtattherāpadānagāthāyo abhāsi kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1774_1: Ayañca thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:1774_2: bhagavato kāletiādi sāriputtattherassa dhammasenāpatino vatthumhi vuttameva.
atk-s0510a:1774_3: Thero hi pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāmakaṃ upanissāya samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:1774_5: mā tuccho tava vāyāmo”tiādinā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā bhagavatā vuccamānaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1774_6: suṇanto eva vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā uparimaggattayaṃ adhigantvā aggaphalakkhaṇe sāvakañāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1775_1: Evaṃ dutiyasāvakabhāvaṃ patvā āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena
atk-s0510a:1775_3: Tattha na omaṃ alāmakaṃ dassanaṃ passanaṃ assāti anomadassī.
atk-s0510a:1775_4: Tassa hi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitasarīrattā sakalaṃ divasaṃ sakalaṃ māsaṃ sakalaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ
atk-s0510a:1775_6: anomaṃ alāmakaṃ nibbānaṃ dassanasīloti vā “anomadassī”ti laddhanāmo bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā.
atk-s0510a:1775_10: So lokajeṭṭho narāsabho anomadassī bhagavā devasaṅghapurakkhato devasamūhehi parivārito.
atk-s0510a:1776_2: tadā nāmena varuṇo nāma ahaṃ nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1776_12: sāmuddikā nāgāti imesaṃ nāgānaṃ antare sāmuddikanāgo ahaṃ mahodadhimhi samudde nivāsiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1777_1: Saṅgaṇiyaṃ gaṇaṃ hitvāti niccaparivārabhūtaṃ sakaparivāraṃ nāgasamūhaṃ hitvā vinā hutvā.
atk-s0510a:1777_4: Sambuddhaṃ parivāretvāti anomadassisambuddhaṃ samantato sevamānā accharā nāgamāṇavikā vādesuṃ dibbavādehi
atk-s0510a:1777_5: gītā vākyādīhi vādesuṃ laddhānurūpato vajjesuṃ tadāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1778_2: Devā tūrāni vajjayunti cātumahārājikā devā dibbatūriyāni vajjiṃsu vādesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:1778_3: Ubhinnaṃ saddaṃ sutvānāti ubhinnaṃ devamanussānaṃ bherisaddaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0510a:1778_4: Tilokagarusamānopi buddho sampabujjhatha jānāti suṇātīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1779_1: Nimantetvāna sambuddhanti sasāvakasaṅghaṃ sambuddhaṃ svātanāya nimantetvā parivāretvā.
atk-s0510a:1779_3: Gantvā ca āsanaṃ paññapetvānāti rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭimaṇḍapasayananisīdanaṭṭhānāni paññāpetvā sajjetvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1779_4: Kālamārocayiṃ ahanti evaṃ katapubbavidhāno ahaṃ “kālo, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1780_1: Khīṇāsavasahassehīti tadā so bhagavā arahantasahassehi parivuto lokanāyako sabbā disā obhāsento me bhavanaṃ upāgami sampattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1781_1: Attano bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojanākāraṃ dassento upaviṭṭhaṃ mahāvīrantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1782_1: Okkākakulasambhavoti okkākarañño paramparāgatarājakule uppanno sakalajambudīpe pākaṭarājakule uppanno
atk-s0510a:1782_2: vā gottena gottavasena gotamo nāma satthā manussaloke bhavissati.
atk-s0510a:1783_1: So pacchā pabbajitvānāti so nāgarājā pacchā pacchimabhave kusalamūlena puññasambhārena codito uyyojito
atk-s0510a:1783_2: sāsane pabbajitvā gotamassa bhagavato dutiyo aggasāvako hessatīti byākaraṇamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:1784_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti adhiṭṭhāniddhivikubbaniddhikammavipākajiddhiādīsu pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gato patto.
atk-s0510a:1784_6: Sabbāsaveti ā samantato savanato pavattanato “āsavā”ti laddhanāme kāmabhavadiṭṭhiavijjādhamme sabbe pariññāya
atk-s0510a:1784_7: samantato aññāya jānitvā pajahitvā anāsavo nikkileso.
atk-s0510a:1785_1: Evaṃ thero attano puññavasena laddhabyākaraṇaṃ vatvā puna pāpacariyaṃ pakāsento pāpamittopanissāyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1785_2: Tattha pāpamitte pāpake lāmake mitte upanissāya nissaye katvā tehi saṃsaggo hutvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1786_3: kena kāraṇena samaṇassa gotamassa lābhasakkāro mahā hutvā nibbatto”ti?
atk-s0510a:1786_6: moggallānaṃ nāma ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nissāya uppanno.
atk-s0510a:1786_7: So hi devalokaṃ gantvā devatāhi katakammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0510a:1786_9: Niraye nibbattānampi kammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0510a:1786_11: Manussā tassa kathaṃ sutvā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ abhiharanti.
atk-s0510a:1786_14: attheso upāyoti sabbe ekacchandā hutvā “yaṃkiñci katvā taṃ māressāmā”ti attano upaṭṭhāke samādapetvā
atk-s0510a:1786_15: kahāpaṇasahassaṃ labhitvā purisaghātake core pakkosāpetvā “mahāmoggallānatthero nāma samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0510a:1786_17: tumhe tattha gantvā taṃ mārethā”ti tesaṃ taṃ sahassaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1786_18: Corā dhanalābhena sampaṭicchitvā “theraṃ māressāmā”ti gantvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1786_19: Thero tehi parikkhittabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuñcikacchiddena nikkhamitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:1786_20: Corā taṃ divasaṃ theraṃ adisvā punekadivasaṃ tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1786_21: Thero ñatvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0510a:1786_24: Pacchimamāse pana sampatte thero attanā katakammassa ākaḍḍhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā na apagacchi.
atk-s0510a:1786_25: Corā taṃ paharantā taṇḍulakamattāni aṭṭhīni karontā bhindiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1786_26: Atha naṃ “mato”ti saññāya ekasmiṃ gumbapiṭṭhe khipitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1787_1: “satthāraṃ passitvā vanditvāva parinibbāyissāmī”ti attabhāvaṃ jhānaveṭhanena veṭhetvā ākāsena satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0510a:1787_11: Tādisassa hi me sāvakassa na dāni dassanaṃ atthī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1787_13: bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā sāriputtatthero viya parinibbānadivase nānappakārā iddhiyo
atk-s0510a:1787_14: katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā kāḷasilāpadesaṃ gantvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0510a:1787_15: “Theraṃ kira corā māresu”nti ayaṃ kathā sakalajambudīpe patthari.
atk-s0510a:1788_0: Rājā ajātasattu core pariyesanatthāya carapurise payojesi.
atk-s0510a:1788_1: Tesu coresu surāpāne suraṃ pivantesu maddesu eko ekassa piṭṭhiṃ paharitvā pātesi.
atk-s0510a:1788_3: kasmā me piṭṭhiṃ paharitvā pātesi, kiṃ pana,
atk-s0510a:1788_6: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ mayā paṭhamaṃ pahatabhāvaṃ na jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0510a:1788_8: mayā pahato”ti vadantānaṃ sutvā te carapurisā sabbe te core gahetvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1788_13: Rājā pañcasate naggasamaṇe gāhāpetvā pañcasatehi corehi saddhiṃ rājaṅgaṇe nābhipamāṇesu āvāṭesu nikhaṇāpetvā palālehi paṭicchādetvā aggiṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1788_14: Atha nesaṃ jhāmabhāvaṃ jānitvā ayanaṅgalehi kasāpetvā sabbe khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1788_23: pubbe pana tena katakammassa anurūpamevā”ti vatvā “kiṃ panassa, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1789_2: bārāṇasiyaṃ eko kulaputto sayameva koṭṭanapacanādīni karonto mātāpitaro paṭijaggi.
atk-s0510a:1789_4: tvaṃ ekakova gehe ca araññe ca kammaṃ karonto kilamasi,
atk-s0510a:1789_7: tāva vo sahatthā upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti tena paṭikkhittāpi punappunaṃ yācitvā kumārikaṃ ānesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1789_8: Sā katipāhameva te upaṭṭhahitvā pacchā tesaṃ dassanamapi anicchantī –
atk-s0510a:1789_9: “na sakkā tava mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti ujjhāyitvā tasmiṃ attano kathaṃ aggaṇhante tassa
atk-s0510a:1789_10: bahigatakāle makacivākakhaṇḍāni ca yāgupheṇake ca gahetvā tattha tattha ākiritvā tenāgantvā “kiṃ ida”nti
atk-s0510a:1789_13: na sakkā etehi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti evaṃ tāya punappunaṃ kathiyamānāya evarūpopi pūritapāramī satto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhijji. So “hotu,
atk-s0510a:1789_15: asukaṭṭhāne nāma tumhākaṃ ñātakā āgamanaṃ paccāsīsanti,
atk-s0510a:1789_16: tattha gamissāmā”ti te yānakaṃ āropetvā ādāya gacchanto aṭavimajjhaṃ pattakāle “tāta,
atk-s0510a:1789_20: ahaṃ otaritvā carāmī”ti pitu hatthe rasmiyo datvā otaritvā gacchanto saddaṃ parivattetvā corānaṃ uṭṭhitasaddamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:1789_25: So mātāpitaro viravantepi corasaddaṃ karonto koṭṭetvā māretvā aṭaviyaṃ khipitvā paccāgami.
atk-s0510a:1790_1: moggallāno ettakaṃ kammaṃ katvā anekavassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tāva pakkāvasesena attabhāvasate evameva koṭṭetvā saṃcuṇṇo maraṇaṃ patto,
atk-s0510a:1790_2: evaṃ moggallānena attano kammānurūpameva maraṇaṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1790_3: Pañcahi corasatehi saddhiṃ pañcatitthiyasatānipi mama puttaṃ appaduṭṭhaṃ dussetvā anurūpameva maraṇaṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1790_4: Appaduṭṭhesu hi padussanto dasahi kāraṇehi anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇātiyevā”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1794_0: Garukaṃ vāpi ābādhaṃ, cittakkhepaṃ va pāpuṇe.
atk-s0510a:1796_0: Parikkhayaṃ va ñātīnaṃ, bhogānaṃ va pabhaṅgunaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1799_1: Pavivekamanuyuttoti pakārena vivekaṃ ekībhāvaṃ anuyutto yojito yuttappayutto.
atk-s0510a:1800_1: Idāni attano puññasambhāravasena pubbacaritassa phalaṃ dassento dharaṇimpi sugambhīrantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1801_4: pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayīti pubbārāme visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassatthambhapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ attano pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesiṃ.
atk-s0510a:1801_5: Ekasmiñhi samaye pubbārāme yathāvuttapāsāde bhagavati viharante sambahulā navakatarā bhikkhū uparipāsāde
atk-s0510a:1801_7: Taṃ sutvā bhagavā te saṃvejetvā attano dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte kātukāmo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0510a:1801_10: nave bhikkhū tiracchānakathamanuyutte”ti taṃ sutvā thero satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ āpokasiṇārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:1801_11: catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “pāsādassa patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya pāsādamatthake
atk-s0510a:1801_16: Te bhikkhū bhītā saṃviggā pāsādassa patanabhayena tato nikkhamitvā bhagavato samīpe aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1801_17: Satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0510a:1801_18: Taṃ sutvā tesu keci sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0510a:1802_0: Vejayantapāsādanti so vejayantapāsādo tāvatiṃsabhavane yojanasahassubbedho anekasahassaniyyūhakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0510a:1802_1: devāsurasaṅgāme asure jinitvā sakke devānaminde nagaramajjhe ṭhite uṭṭhito vijayantena nibbattattā “vejayanto”ti
atk-s0510a:1802_6: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavantaṃ pubbārāme viharantaṃ sakko devarājā upasaṅkamitvā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1802_8: So taṃ sutvā attamano pamudito abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā attano devalokameva gato.
atk-s0510a:1802_10: “ayaṃ sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evarūpaṃ gambhīranibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0510a:1802_15: So tāvadeva tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1802_16: Sakko dibbasampattiyā pamatto hutvā vikkhepaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1802_17: Thero tassa saṃvegajananatthaṃ vejayantapāsādaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi.
atk-s0510a:1805_3: “Sakkaṃ so paripucchatī”ti yathāvuttameva therassa taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttipucchaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “apāvuso, jānāsi,
atk-s0510a:1805_6: Idaṃ therena pāsādakampane kate saṃviggahadayena pamādaṃ pahāya yoniso manasi karitvā pañhassa byākatabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1805_7: Satthārā desitaniyāmeneva hi so tadā kathesi. Tenāha –
atk-s0510a:1805_9: Tattha sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti sakkaṃ devarājaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero satthārā desitāya taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyā sammadeva gahitabhāvaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1806_7: yā te diṭṭhi pure ahū”ti imaṃ brahmalokaṃ upagantuṃ samattho natthi koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā.
atk-s0510a:1806_8: Satthu idhāgamanato pubbe yā tuyhaṃ diṭṭhi ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1806_9: kiṃ ajjāpi idānipi sā diṭṭhi na vigatāti?
atk-s0510a:1806_10: Passasi vītivattantaṃ brahmaloke pabhassaranti brahmaloke vītipatantaṃ mahākappinamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi
atk-s0510a:1806_11: parivāritassa tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa sasāvakassa bhagavato okāsaṃ passasīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1806_12: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā brahmaloke sudhammāya sabhāya sannipatitvā sannisinnassa “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃmahiddhiko,
atk-s0510a:1806_13: so idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti cintentassa brahmuno cittamaññāya tattha gantvā brahmuno matthake ākāse
atk-s0510a:1806_14: nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā obhāsaṃ muñcanto mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ āgamanaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0510a:1806_15: Saha cintanena tepi tattha gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā paccekadisāsu nisīditvā obhāsaṃ vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:1806_17: Satthā brahmuno kallacittataṃ ñatvā catusaccapakāsanaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0510a:1806_19: Taṃ sandhāya codento ajjāpi te, āvuso,
atk-s0510a:1807_0: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
atk-s0510a:1807_1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti –
atk-s0510a:1807_2: ‘natthi samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yo idha āgaccheyyā’ti.
atk-s0510a:1807_3: Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0510a:1807_5: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1807_6: Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā.
atk-s0510a:1808_0: “Atha kho āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa etadahosi ‘kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī’ti?
atk-s0510a:1808_1: Addasa kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno
atk-s0510a:1808_3: Disvāna seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0510a:1808_5: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1808_6: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno puratthimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0510a:1809_2: Addasa kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno
atk-s0510a:1809_5: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1809_6: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0510a:1810_2: Addasa kho āyasmā mahākappino bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno
atk-s0510a:1810_5: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1810_6: Atha kho āyasmā mahākappino pacchimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0510a:1811_2: Addasa kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno
atk-s0510a:1811_5: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1811_6: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho uttaraṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato”.
atk-s0510a:1812_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1813_0: “Ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu;
atk-s0510a:1815_0: “Na me mārisa sā diṭṭhi, yā me diṭṭhi pure ahu;
atk-s0510a:1817_0: Svāhaṃ ajja kathaṃ vajjaṃ, ahaṃ niccomhi sassato”ti.
atk-s0510a:1818_0: “Atha kho bhagavā taṃ brahmānaṃ saṃvejetvā seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso…pe…
atk-s0510a:1818_1: evameva tasmiṃ brahmaloke antarahito jetavane pāturahosi.
atk-s0510a:1818_2: Atha kho so brahmā aññataraṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0510a:1818_8: aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno kassapo kappino anuruddho”ti? ‘Evaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1818_9: mārisā’ti kho so brahmapārisajjo tassa brahmuno paṭissutvā yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a:1818_13: aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno kassapo kappino anuruddho’ti?
atk-s0510a:1818_14: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1821_0: “Atha kho so brahmapārisajjo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā yena so brahmā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a:1824_0: Idamavoca so brahmapārisajjo. Attamano ca so brahmā tassa brahmapārisajjassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
atk-s0510a:1825_0: Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “ayaṃ panattho bakabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo”ti.
atk-s0510a:1826_0: Mahāneruno kūṭanti kūṭasīsena sakalameva sinerupabbatarājaṃ vadasi.
atk-s0510a:1826_1: Vimokkhena apassayīti jhānavimokkhena nissayena abhiññāyena passayīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0510a:1826_6: Ye ca bhūmisayā narāti bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānauttarakurukā ca manussā.
atk-s0510a:1826_10: ekasmiṃ kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “sve, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1826_11: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:1826_12: Taṃdivasañca bhagavato paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokentassa nandopanando nāma nāgarājā ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchi.
atk-s0510a:1826_13: Bhagavā “ayaṃ nāgarājā mayhaṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0510a:1826_14: kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento saraṇagamanassa upanissayaṃ disvā “ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko tīsu ratanesu appasanno,
atk-s0510a:1826_15: ko nu kho imaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko vimoceyyā”ti āvajjento mahāmoggallānattheraṃ addasa.
atk-s0510a:1826_16: Tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
atk-s0510a:1826_20: So dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena setacchattena dhāriyamāno tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto
atk-s0510a:1826_22: Atha kho bhagavā yathā nāgarājā passati,
atk-s0510a:1826_23: tathā katvā tassa vimānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0510a:1827_0: Tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti “ime hi
atk-s0510a:1827_1: nāma muṇḍasamaṇakā amhākaṃ uparibhavanena devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhavanaṃ pavisantipi nikkhamantipi,
atk-s0510a:1827_2: na dāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṃ amhākaṃ matthake pādapaṃsuṃ okirantānaṃ gantuṃ dassāmī”ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṃ
atk-s0510a:1827_3: gantvā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1828_0: Atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “pubbe, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1828_11: nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṃ kupito sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṃ katvā ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0510a:1828_16: āyasmā rāhuloti anukkamena sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1829_3: Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahantaṃ nāgarājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā nandopanandaṃ cuddasakkhattuṃ bhogehi
atk-s0510a:1829_4: parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇamatthake attano phaṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷesi.
atk-s0510a:1829_16: “ayaṃ maṃ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā dhūmāyati ceva pajjalati cā”ti cintetvā “bho,
atk-s0510a:1830_0: Thero taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena nikkhami,
atk-s0510a:1830_5: thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṃ pācīnena ca pacchimena ca caṅkamati. Bhagavā –
atk-s0510a:1830_10: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1830_12: ahaṃ nandopanandasadisānaṃ nāgarājānaṃ satampi sahassampi dameyya”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1831_2: nikkhamanakāle dāni naṃ dāṭhantare pakkhipitvā khādissāmī”ti cintetvā “nikkhamatha, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1831_3: mā maṃ antokucchiyaṃ aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto bādhayitthā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:1831_8: Avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1831_9: imaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ patvā evaṃ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṃ na sakkhissantīti nesaṃ bhagavā nāgarājadamanaṃ nānujāni.
atk-s0510a:1832_0: Nāgarājā “ahaṃ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0510a:1832_2: Thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṃ abhinimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṃ dassento nāgarājānaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0510a:1832_3: Nāgarājā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā “bhante,
atk-s0510a:1832_4: tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi.
atk-s0510a:1832_6: ehi gamissāmā”ti nāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisaṃ katvā gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1832_10: nāgarājā”ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto anāthapiṇḍikassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1833_8: bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapaṭipāṭiyā bhattaṃ sattāhaṃ therassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1834_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye pubbārāme visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritasahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍite pāsāde bhagavati viharante…pe…
atk-s0510a:1837_0: Tattha iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatoti vikubbaniddhiādiiddhiyā pariyosānaṃ gato patto.
atk-s0510a:1838_1: Asmimānanti ahamasmi paññāsīlasamādhisampannotiādi asmimānaṃ na passāmi na akkhāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1838_2: Tadeva dīpento māno mayhaṃ na vijjatīti āha.
atk-s0510a:1838_3: Sāmaṇere upādāyāti sāmaṇere ādiṃ katvā sakale bhikkhusaṅghe garucittaṃ gāravacittaṃ ādarabahumānaṃ ahaṃ karomīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1839_1: Aparimeyye ito kappeti ito amhākaṃ uppannakappato antarakappādīhi aparimeyye ekaasaṅkhyeyyassa upari satasahassakappamatthaketi attho.
atk-s0510a:1839_2: Yaṃ kammamabhinīharinti aggasāvakabhāvassa padaṃ puññasampattiṃ pūresiṃ.
atk-s0510a:1839_3: Tāhaṃ bhūmimanuppattoti ahaṃ taṃ sāvakabhūmiṃ anuppatto āsavakkhayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ patto asmi amhīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1840_1: Atthapaṭisambhidādayo catasso paṭisambhidā sotāpattimaggādayo aṭṭha vimokkhā iddhividhādayo cha abhiññāyo me mayā sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā.
atk-s0510a:1840_2: Buddhassa bhagavato ovādānusāsanīsaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ mayā kataṃ sīlapaṭipattinipphādanavasena pariyosāpitanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1841_1: Evaṃ so ekasseva anomadassībuddhassa santike dvikkhattuṃ byākaraṇaṃ labhi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0510a:1841_2: Heṭṭhā vuttanayena seṭṭhi hutvā tassa bhagavato santike laddhabyākaraṇo tato cuto sāmuddike nāgabhavane
atk-s0510a:1841_3: nibbatto tasseva bhagavato santike dīghāyukabhāvena upahāraṃ katvā nimantetvā bhojetvā mahāpūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1844_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññasambhārāni upacinanto padumuttarabhagavato
atk-s0510a:1844_2: kāle haṃsavatīnagare vedeho nāma asītikoṭivibhavo kuṭumbiko ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1844_6: upāsako hutvā viharanto ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni
atk-s0510a:1844_7: gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:1845_0: Tasmiñca khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1845_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ nisabho”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1845_3: Upāsako taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate satthāraṃ vanditvā “sve, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1845_9: ekaṃ sāmaṇerampi vihāre asesetvā mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1845_11: Upāsako satthu adhivāsanaṃ ñatvā gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1845_12: Satthā pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisinno dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
atk-s0510a:1846_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthiṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0510a:1846_1: Upāsako disvā uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1846_8: So therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1846_9: Tato theraṃ anugantvā nivatto satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha –
atk-s0510a:1846_11: ‘satthāpi gehe nisinno’ti vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0510a:1846_12: Atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atirekaguṇo”ti?
atk-s0510a:1846_16: so bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati.
atk-s0510a:1846_20: so abbhokāseyeva vasatī”ti bhagavā “ayañca ayañcetassa guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya tassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1847_0: Upāsakopi pakatiyā jalamānadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0510a:1847_2: yaṃnūnāhaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ aggabhāvatthāya patthanaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:1847_3: So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena satta divase mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0510a:1847_4: mahābhikkhusaṅghassa ticīvarāni datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1847_5: satta divase dānaṃ dentassa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1847_6: imināhaṃ na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ vā patthemi,
atk-s0510a:1847_7: idaṃ pana me kammaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike mahānisabhattherena pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanatthāya
atk-s0510a:1847_13: anāgate satasahassakappāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0510a:1847_14: tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1847_15: Taṃ sutvā upāsako “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ sampattiṃ amaññittha.
atk-s0510a:1847_16: So yāvatāyukaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādāya rakkhitvā nānappakāraṃ puññakammaṃ katvā kālaṃkatvā sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:1848_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavutikappe vipassisammāsambuddhe bandhumatīnagaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1848_1: upanissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ parijiṇṇabrāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:1848_2: Tasmiñca kāle vipassī bhagavā sattame saṃvacchare dhammaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0510a:1848_10: So brāhmaṇo kenacideva kiccena brāhmaṇānaṃ sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā gacchati,
atk-s0510a:1848_11: brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe acchati,
atk-s0510a:1848_13: Tasmiṃ pana divase so brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “bhoti,
atk-s0510a:1848_16: ahaṃ mātugāmo bhīrukajātikā rattiṃ sotuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0510a:1848_17: divā sossāmī”ti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:1848_18: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1848_19: Atha brāhmaṇo taṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0510a:1849_0: Tasmiñca samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane nisinno cittabījaniṃ gahetvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento
atk-s0510a:1849_1: viya sineruṃ manthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmanthento viya ca dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1849_2: Brāhmaṇassa parisapariyantena nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmeyeva sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji.
atk-s0510a:1849_7: apārupitvā bahi vicarituṃ na sakkomī”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1849_8: Athassa nikkhante paṭhame majjhimayāmeti tatheva pīti uppajji.
atk-s0510a:1849_9: So tatheva cintetvā tatheva adātukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1849_10: Athassa majjhime yāme nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji.
atk-s0510a:1849_11: Tadā so maccheraṃ jinitvā vatthaṃ saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1849_12: Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me,
atk-s0510a:1850_0: Tasmiṃ samaye bandhumā rājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0510a:1850_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti.
atk-s0510a:1850_5: Brāhmaṇo tenāgantvā pucchito “avasesā hatthiyānādīni āruyha asicammādīni gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti,
atk-s0510a:1850_7: Ahaṃ pana pacchato āgacchantassa kūṭagoṇassa muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ jinitvā pārutavatthaṃ dasabalassa adāsiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1850_8: taṃ me jitaṃ maccheraṃ acchariya”nti āha.
atk-s0510a:1850_9: So āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0510a:1850_12: brāhmaṇo jānātī”ti tassa pasīditvā vatthayugaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1850_14: “rājā mayhaṃ tuṇhī nisinnassa paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa adāsi,
atk-s0510a:1850_16: satthuyeva anucchavika”nti tampi vatthayugaṃ dasabalassa adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1850_17: Rājā “kiṃ brāhmaṇena kata”nti pucchitvā “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā aññānipi dve vatthayugāni pesesi,
atk-s0510a:1850_19: Puna rājā ‘aññānipi cattārī’ti evaṃ vatvā yāva evaṃ dvattiṃsa vatthayugāni pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1850_20: Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti attano atthāya ekaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1850_23: Tato paṭṭhāya ca so satthu vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0510a:1851_0: Atha taṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanakaṃ attano pārutaṃ rattakambalaṃ datvā āha –
atk-s0510a:1851_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti cintetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ tathāgatassa mañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1851_3: Athekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:1851_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo kambale paṭihaññanti,
atk-s0510a:1851_12: na maya”nti pasīditvā yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1851_13: taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma dānaṃ datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1851_14: Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāma catusaṭṭhi hotī”ti catusaṭṭhisalākabhattāni upaṭṭhapetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:1852_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe bhagavato koṇāgamanassa bhagavato kassapassa cāti dvinnaṃ antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyakule nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:1852_1: So vaḍḍhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ vicarati.
atk-s0510a:1852_2: Tasmiñca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetumāraddho.
atk-s0510a:1852_6: karothā”ti uttarisāṭakaṃ datvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāci hāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1853_0: Gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:1853_1: Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya –
atk-s0510a:1853_3: Sā gehaṅgaṇe ṭhitā sutvā “imāya dinnabhattaṃ esa mā bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:1853_5: maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā,
atk-s0510a:1853_6: evarūpassa pana dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramissa paccekabuddhassa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na yutta”nti āha.
atk-s0510a:1853_9: bhante”ti kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā paṇītabhattassa catumadhurassa ca
atk-s0510a:1853_10: pūretvā upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ pattaṃ paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:1853_12: evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1853_14: Tepi dve jāyampatikā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā sagge nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1853_15: Puna tato cavitvā upāsako kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavasampanne kule nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:1853_16: itarāpi tādisasseva seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:1853_18: Tassā pubbe aniṭṭhavipākassa pāpakammassa ānubhāvena patikulaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya ummārantarato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:1853_19: sakalaṃ gehaṃ ugghāṭitavaccakūpo viya duggandhaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1853_20: Kumāro “kassāyaṃ gandho”ti pucchitvā “seṭṭhikaññāyā”ti sutvā “nīharatha na”nti tassāyeva kulagharaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1853_21: Sā teneva nīhārena sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivatti.
atk-s0510a:1854_1: Tassa satasahasagghanikāhi suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi yojanubbedhaṃ cetiyaṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1854_2: Tasmiṃ cetiye kariyamāne sā seṭṭhidhītā cintesi –
atk-s0510a:1854_4: kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti attano ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ bhañjāpetvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthiṇṇaṃ caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:1854_5: Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha uppalapupphahatthake ādāya cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0510a:1854_6: Tasmiñca khaṇe ekā iṭṭhakāpanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti.
atk-s0510a:1854_7: Seṭṭhidhītā vaḍḍhakiṃ āha “imaṃ me iṭṭhakaṃ ettha ṭhapethā”ti.
atk-s0510a:1854_11: Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ yojetvā tena bandhanena iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā upari aṭṭhahi
atk-s0510a:1854_12: uppalapupphahatthakehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāyato candanagandho vāyatu,

atk-s0510a:1874_16: Thero “satthā nisīditukāmo”ti ñatvā attano paṭapilotikaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ catugguṇaṃ katvā paññapesi.
atk-s0510a:1875_0: Satthā tattha nisīditvā hatthena cīvaraṃ parimajjanto “mudukā kho tyāyaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:1875_11: mayā hi imassa paṃsukūlassa gahitadivase udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi,
atk-s0510a:1875_12: imaṃ buddhaparibhogajiṇṇacīvaraṃ nāma na sakkā parittaguṇena dhāretuṃ,
atk-s0510a:1875_13: paṭibalenevidaṃ paṭipattipūraṇasamatthena jātipaṃsukūlikena dhāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā therena saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0510a:1876_0: Evaṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā therassa cīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi,
atk-s0510a:1876_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe acetanāpi ayaṃ mahāpathavī “dukkaraṃ, bhante, akattha,
atk-s0510a:1876_3: attano pārutacīvaraṃ sāvakena parivattitapubbaṃ nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0510a:1876_4: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampi.
atk-s0510a:1876_6: kiṃ me idāni uttari kattabba”nti unnatiṃ akatvā satthu santikeyeva terasa dhutaguṇe samādāya sattadivasamattaṃ puthujjano ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1876_7: Aṭṭhame divase saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:1876_11: apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavako kulesu appagabbho”ti evamādinā pasaṃsitvā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1876_13: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti dhutavādānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1877_1: Evaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito āyasmā mahākassapo mahāsāvakabhāvaṃ patto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā
atk-s0510a:1877_3: Tattha padumuttarassāti tassa kira bhagavato mātukucchito nikkhamanakālato paṭṭhāya pādānaṃ nikkhepanasamaye
atk-s0510a:1877_4: akkantakkantapāde satasahassapattā padumā pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1877_6: Sakalasattanikāyesu ekekena satasatapuññe kate tassa puññassa sataguṇapuññānaṃ katattā bhagavatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1877_7: Lokajeṭṭhassa tādinoti sattalokassa padhānabhūtassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyabhāvaṃ pattattā tādino.
atk-s0510a:1877_8: Nibbute lokanāthamhīti sattalokassa paṭisaraṇabhūte bhagavati khandhaparinibbānena parinibbute,
atk-s0510a:1877_10: Pūjaṃ kubbanti santhunoti sadevakassa lokassa sāsanato “satthā”ti laddhanāmassa bhagavato sādhukīḷaṃ kīḷantā pūjaṃ karontīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1878_1: Aggiṃ cinantī janatāti janasamūhā āḷāhanatthāya aggiṃ cinantā rāsiṃ karontā āsamantato moditā santuṭṭhā
atk-s0510a:1878_2: pakārena moditā santuṭṭhā pūjaṃ karontīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1878_3: Tesu saṃvegajātesūti tesu janasamūhesu saṃvegappattesu utrāsaṃ labhantesu me mayhaṃ pīti hāso udapajjatha pātubhavīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1879_1: Ñātimitte samānetvāti mama bandhusahāye samānetvā rāsiṃ katvā.
atk-s0510a:1879_2: Mahāvīro bhagavā parinibbuto adassanaṃ agamāsīti idaṃ vacanaṃ abraviṃ kathesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1879_3: Handa pūjaṃ karomaseti handāti vossaggatthe nipāto,
atk-s0510a:1879_4: tena kāraṇena mayaṃ sabbe samāgatā pūjaṃ karomāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1880_1: Sādhūti te paṭissutvāti te mama ñātimittā sādhu iti sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ iti paṭisuṇitvā mama vacanaṃ sampaṭichitvā
atk-s0510a:1880_2: me mayhaṃ bhiyyo atirekaṃ hāsaṃ pītiṃ janiṃsu uppādesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:1881_1: Tato attano katapuññasañcayaṃ dassento buddhasmiṃ lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1881_5: katvā kāretvā ca puññasañcayaṃ puññarāsiṃ kāhāsiṃ akāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1882_1: Katvāna agghiyaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ cetiyapūjanaṭṭhāne tālapantīhi tālapāḷīhi cittitaṃ sobhitaṃ agghiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:1882_2: katvāna kāretvā ca sakaṃ cittaṃ attano cittaṃ pasādetvā cetiyaṃ pūjayuttamanti uttamaṃ buddhadhātunidhāpitaṃ
atk-s0510a:1883_2: Tattha aggikkhandhovāti ākāse jalamāno aggikkhandhova aggirāsi iva taṃ cetiyaṃ sattahi ratanehi jalati
atk-s0510a:1883_3: phullito vikasitapuppho sālarukkharājā iva ākāse indalaṭṭhīva indadhanu iva ca catuddisā catūsu disāsu
atk-s0510a:1884_1: Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvāti tasmiṃ jotamānadhātugabbhamhi cittaṃ manaṃ pasādetvā somanassaṃ katvā tena
atk-s0510a:1884_2: cittappasādena bahuṃ anekappakāraṃ kusalaṃ puññaṃ katvāna “dhātugabbhe ca sāsane ca ettakāni puññāni
atk-s0510a:1884_3: mayā katānī”ti evaṃ puññakammaṃ saritvāna kālaṃkatvā tidasaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ suttappabuddho viya ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:1885_3: Sattahi bhūmīhi saṃ suṭṭhu uggataṃ ubbiddhaṃ uccaṃ mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ vimānaṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1886_1: Tasmiṃ vimāne sabbasovaṇṇamayā sakalasovaṇṇamayāni kūṭāgārasahassāni ahuṃ ahesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:1886_2: Sakatejena attano ānubhāvena sabbā dasa disā pabhāsayaṃ obhāsentāni jalanti vijjotantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1887_1: Tasmiṃ mayhaṃ pātubhūtavimāne aññepi niyyūhā pamukhasālāyo santi vijjanti.
atk-s0510a:1887_3: Lohitaṅgamayā rattamaṇimayā tadā tepi niyyūhā catasso disā ābhāya pabhāya jotantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1888_1: Sabbe deve sakalachadevaloke deve abhibhomi abhibhavāmi.
atk-s0510a:1888_3: Mayā katassa puññakammassa idaṃ phalanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1889_2: Tattha ito kappato heṭṭhā saṭṭhisahassakappamatthake cāturanto catumahādīpavanto vijitāvī sabbaṃ paccatthikaṃ
atk-s0510a:1889_3: vijitavanto ahaṃ ubbiddho nāma cakkavattī rājā hutvā pathaviṃ āvasiṃ rajjaṃ kāresinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1890_1: Tatheva bhaddake kappeti pañcabuddhapaṭimaṇḍitattā bhaddake nāma kappe.
atk-s0510a:1890_2: Tiṃsakkhattuṃ tiṃsajātiyā catudīpamhi issaro padhāno cakkaratanādīhi sattahi ratanehi sampanno samaṅgībhūto
atk-s0510a:1890_3: sakakammābhiraddho attano kamme dasa rājadhamme abhiraddho allīno cakkavattī rājā amhī ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1890_4: Attano cakkavattikāle anubhūtasampattiṃ dassento “tatthāpi bhavanaṃ mayha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1890_5: Tattha tasmiṃ cakkavattirajjamhi mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ mama pāsādaṃ indalaṭṭhīva uggataṃ ākāse ṭhitavijjotamānā
atk-s0510a:1890_6: vijjullatā iva uggataṃ sattabhūmikādibhedehi uccaṃ āyāmato dīghato ca uccato ca catuvīsatiyojanaṃ vitthārato
atk-s0510a:1890_8: Sabbesaṃ janānaṃ manaṃ allīnabhāvena rammaṇaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1890_9: Daḷhehi dvādasahatthehi vā tiṃsahatthehi vā uccehi pākāratoraṇehi sampannanti dasseti.
atk-s0510a:1891_2: Pakkhittā paṇṇavīsatīti vīsatiāpaṇapakkhittaṃ nirantaraṃ vīthiparicchedanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1894_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:1894_3: Vayappatto ekadivasaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1894_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ dānaṃ patthetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1894_5: mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uttamāni vatthāni datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1894_6: Satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:1894_7: Sopi tattha puññāni karonto satthari parinibbute sattayojanike kanakathūpe bahukaṃsapātiyo dīparukkhehi
atk-s0510a:1894_8: dīpakapallikāhi ca “dibbacakkhuñāṇassa upanissayo hotū”ti uḷāraṃ dīpapūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1894_9: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbikagehe
atk-s0510a:1894_10: nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute niṭṭhite yojanike kanakathūpe bahukaṃsapātiyo sappimaṇḍassa
atk-s0510a:1894_11: pūretvā majjhe ca ekekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā mukhavaṭṭiyā mukhavaṭṭiṃ phusāpento cetiyaṃ parikkhipāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1894_12: Attanā gahitakaṃsapātiṃ sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā sīse ṭhapetvā sabbarattiṃ cetiyaṃ anupariyāyi.
atk-s0510a:1895_0: Evaṃ tasmimpi attabhāve yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto
atk-s0510a:1895_3: So sumanaseṭṭhissa nāma gehe kammaṃ karonto jīvati.
atk-s0510a:1895_4: Ekadivasaṃ so upariṭṭhaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya gandhamādanapabbatato ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0510a:1895_5: bārāṇasīnagaradvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:1895_6: attano atthāya ṭhapitaṃ bhāgabhattaṃ patte pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhassa dātukāmo ārabhi.
atk-s0510a:1895_8: So taṃ netvā paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1895_9: Paccekabuddho taṃ gahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:1895_10: Taṃ divasaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa chatte adhivatthā devatā –
atk-s0510a:1895_15: “evaṃ devatāya anumoditaṃ idameva uttamadāna”nti cintetvā tattha pattiṃ yāci.
atk-s0510a:1895_17: Tena pasannacitto sumanaseṭṭhi tassa sahassaṃ datvā “ito paṭṭhāya tuyhaṃ sahatthena kammakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0510a:1895_18: patirūpaṃ gehaṃ katvā niccaṃ vasāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:1896_0: Yasmā nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitassa paccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāto taṃ divasameva uḷāravipāko hoti,
atk-s0510a:1896_1: tasmā sumanaseṭṭhi rañño santikaṃ gacchanto taṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:1896_2: Rājā pana taṃ ādaravasena olokesi. Seṭṭhi –
atk-s0510a:1896_4: ayaṃ oloketabbayuttoyevā”ti vatvā tadā tena katakammaṃ attanāpissa sahassadinnabhāvañca kathesi.
atk-s0510a:1896_5: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa tussitvā sahassaṃ datvā “asukasmiṃ ṭhāne gehaṃ katvā vasāhī”ti gehaṭṭhānamassa āṇāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1896_6: Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhāpentassa mahantā mahantā nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1896_8: Rājā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ uddharāpetvā rāsikataṃ disvā –
atk-s0510a:1896_9: “ettakaṃ dhanaṃ imasmiṃ nagare kassa gehe atthī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:1896_11: “Tena hi ayaṃ annabhāro imasmiṃ nagare mahādhanaseṭṭhi nāma hotū”ti taṃ divasameva tassa seṭṭhichattaṃ ussāpesi.
atk-s0510a:1897_0: So seṭṭhi hutvā yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:1897_1: dīgharattaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato uppajjanakakāle kapilavatthunagare sukkodanasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:1897_3: So mahānāmasakkassa kaniṭṭhabhātā bhagavato cūḷapitu putto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:1897_5: Athassa mātā ekadivasaṃ “mama putto natthīti padaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0510a:1897_6: taṃ jānāpessāmī”ti cintetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ tucchakaṃyeva aññāya suvaṇṇapātiyā pidahitvā tassa pesesi,
atk-s0510a:1897_9: Evaṃ mahāpuñño tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu alaṅkatanāṭakitthīhi parivuto devo viya mahāsampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0510a:1898_0: Amhākampi bodhisatto tasmiṃ samaye tusitapurā cavitvā suddhodanamahārājassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:1898_1: anukkamena vuddhippatto ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe vasitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena
atk-s0510a:1898_2: paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā isipatane migadāye dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā
atk-s0510a:1898_3: lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:1898_7: mama puttaṃ ānethā”ti sahassasahassaparivāre dasa amacce pesesi.
atk-s0510a:1898_9: Tesu udāyittherena cārikāgamanaṃ āyācito bhagavā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto rājagahato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0510a:1898_10: kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā ñātisamāgame anekāni pāṭihāriyāni dassetvā pāṭihāriyavicittaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1898_11: kathetvā mahājanaṃ amatapānaṃ pāyetvā dutiyadivase pattacīvaramādāya nagaradvāre ṭhatvā “kiṃ nu kho kulanagaraṃ
atk-s0510a:1898_12: āgatānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇa”nti āvajjamāno “sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ āciṇṇa”nti ñatvā sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0510a:1898_13: Rājā “putto te piṇḍāya caratī”ti sutvā turitaturito āgantvā antaravīthiyaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā attano nivesanaṃ pavesetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:1898_14: Bhagavā tattha kattabbaṃ ñātisaṅgahaṃ katvā rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājetvā nacirasseva kapilavatthunagarato
atk-s0510a:1899_0: Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājā sākiyagaṇaṃ sannipātetvā āha –
atk-s0510a:1899_3: nattāpi me rāhulakumāro khattiyagaṇena saddhiṃ taṃ parivāretvā acarissa,
atk-s0510a:1899_5: Idāni pana mama putto buddho jāto,
atk-s0510a:1900_1: so attano kaniṭṭhaṃ anuruddhaṃ sakkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca – “etarahi,
atk-s0510a:1900_3: abhiññātā abhiññātā sakyakumārā bhagavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ anupabbajanti,
atk-s0510a:1900_4: amhākañca kulā natthi koci agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
atk-s0510a:1900_7: Taṃ sutvā anuruddho gharāvāse ruciṃ akatvā attasattamo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito.
atk-s0510a:1900_9: Evaṃ anupiyaṃ gantvā pabbajitesu pana tesu tasmiṃyeva antovasse bhaddiyatthero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0510a:1900_13: bhagutthero ca kimilatthero ca pacchā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:1900_14: Tesaṃ sabbesampi therānaṃ attano attano āgataṭṭhānesu pubbapatthanābhinīhāro āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0510a:1900_15: Ayaṃ anuruddhatthero dhammasenāpatissa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā cetiyaraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāyaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:1900_18: Satthā “anuruddho aṭṭhame mahāpurisavitakke kilamatī”ti ñatvā “tassa saṅkappaṃ pūressāmī”ti tattha gantvā
atk-s0510a:1900_19: paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūretvā catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0510a:1900_20: mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ kathetvā ākāse uppatitvā bhesakalāvanameva gato.
atk-s0510a:1901_0: Thero tathāgate gatamatteyeva tevijjo mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā “satthā mayhaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūretvā adāsi,
atk-s0510a:1901_1: so ca me manoratho matthakaṃ patto”ti buddhānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ attano ca paṭivedhadhammaṃ ārabbha imā udānagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0510a:1904_0: “Yadā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi;
atk-s0510a:1907_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. ;
atk-s0510a:1908_0: Atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā jetavane mahāvihāre viharanto “dibbacakkhukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anuruddho aggo”ti aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:1909_1: Evaṃ so bhagavato santikā dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena

atk-s0510a:1948_5: narakaggikappuṭṭhānaggidukkhaggisaṅkhātehi vā tīhi aggīhi ḍayhanto parimuttiṃ parimuccanupāyaṃ gavesāmi pariyesāmi tathevāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1948_6: Yathā rājadaṇḍaṃ ito gato patto parimuttiṃ gavesati,
atk-s0510a:1948_7: tathā ahaṃ bhavadaṇḍappatto parimuttiṃ gavesāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1949_1: Puna saṃsārato mocanaṃ upamopameyyavasena dassento yathā visādotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1949_2: Tattha visena sappavisena ā samantato daṃsīyittha daṭṭho hotīti visādo,
atk-s0510a:1949_4: Atha vā visaṃ halāhalavisaṃ adati gilatīti visādo,
atk-s0510a:1949_8: tassa visassa vighātāya vināsāya upāyanaṃ upāyabhūtaṃ agadaṃ osadhaṃ gaveseyya pariyeseyya,
atk-s0510a:1949_9: taṃ gavesamāno visaghātakaṃ visanāsakaṃ agadaṃ osadhaṃ passeyya dakkheyya.
atk-s0510a:1949_10: So taṃ attano diṭṭhaṃ osadhaṃ pivitvā visamhā visato parimuttiyā parimocanakāraṇā sukhī assa bhaveyya yathāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1950_1: Tathevāhanti yathā yena pakārena so naro visahato,
atk-s0510a:1950_2: savisena sappena daṭṭho visakhādako vā osadhaṃ pivitvā sukhī bhaveyya,
atk-s0510a:1950_3: tatheva tena pakārena ahaṃ avijjāya mohena saṃ suṭṭhu pīḷito.
atk-s0510a:1950_4: Saddhammāgadamesahanti ahaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ osadhaṃ esaṃ pariyesantoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1951_1: Dhammāgadaṃ gavesantoti saṃsāradukkhavisassa vināsāya dhammosadhaṃ gavesanto.
atk-s0510a:1951_2: Addakkhiṃ sakyasāsananti sakyavaṃsapabhavassa gotamassa sāsanaṃ saddakkhinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1951_3: Aggaṃ sabbosadhānaṃ tanti sabbesaṃ osadhānaṃ antare taṃ sakyasāsanasaṅkhātaṃ dhammosadhaṃ aggaṃ uttamanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1951_4: Sabbasallavinodananti rāgasallādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ sallānaṃ vinodanaṃ vūpasamakaraṃ dhammosadhaṃ dhammasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0510a:1951_5: osadhaṃ pivitvā sabbaṃ visaṃ sakalasaṃsāradukkhavisaṃ samūhaniṃ nāsesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1951_6: Ajarāmaranti taṃ dukkhavisaṃ samūhanitvā ajaraṃ jarāvirahitaṃ amaraṃ maraṇavirahitaṃ sītibhāvaṃ rāgapariḷāhādivirahitattā
atk-s0510a:1951_7: sītalabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ ahaṃ phassayiṃ paccakkhamakāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1952_1: Puna kilesatamassa upamaṃ dassento yathā bhūtaṭṭitotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1952_2: Tattha yathā yena pakārena bhūtaṭṭito bhūtena yakkhena aṭṭito pīḷito poso puriso bhūtaggāhena yakkhaggāhena
atk-s0510a:1952_3: pīḷito dukkhito bhūtasmā yakkhaggāhato parimuttiyā mocanatthāya bhūtavejjaṃ gaveseyya.
atk-s0510a:1953_1: Taṃ gavesamāno ca bhūtavijjāya suṭṭhu kovidaṃ chekaṃ bhūtavejjaṃ passeyya,
atk-s0510a:1953_2: so bhūtavejjo tassa yakkhaggahitassa purisassa āvesabhūtaṃ vihane vināseyya,
atk-s0510a:1953_3: samūlañca mūlena saha āyatiṃ anāsevakaṃ katvā vināsaye viddhaṃseyyāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1954_1: Mahāvīra vīruttama tamaggāhena kilesandhakāraggāhena pīḷito ahaṃ tatheva tena pakāreneva tamato kilesandhakārato
atk-s0510a:1954_2: parimuttiyā mocanatthāya ñāṇālokaṃ paññāālokaṃ gavesāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1955_1: Atha tadanantaraṃ kilesatamasodhanaṃ kilesandhakāranāsakaṃ sakyamuniṃ addasanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1955_2: So sakyamuni me mayhaṃ tamaṃ andhakāraṃ kilesatimiraṃ bhūtavejjova bhūtakaṃ yakkhaggahitaṃ iva vinodesi dūrī akāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1956_1: So ahaṃ evaṃ vimutto saṃsārasotaṃ saṃsārapavāhaṃ saṃ suṭṭhu chindiṃ chedesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:1956_2: taṇhāsotaṃ taṇhāmahoghaṃ nivārayiṃ niravasesaṃ appavattiṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1956_3: Bhavaṃ ugghāṭayiṃ sabbanti kāmabhavādikaṃ sabbaṃ navabhavaṃ ugghāṭayiṃ vināsesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1956_4: Mūlato vināsento bhūtavejjo iva mūlato ugghāṭayinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1957_2: Tattha garuṃ bhāriyaṃ nāgaṃ gilatīti garuḷo.
atk-s0510a:1957_3: Garuṃ vā nāgaṃ lāti ādadātīti garuḷo,
atk-s0510a:1957_5: Attano bhakkhaṃ sakagocaraṃ pannagaṃ pakārena parahatthaṃ na gacchatīti pannagoti laddhanāmaṃ nāgaṃ gahaṇatthāya opatati avapatati,
atk-s0510a:1957_6: samantā samantato yojanasataṃ satayojanappamāṇaṃ mahāsaraṃ mahāsamuddaṃ attano pakkhavātehi vikkhobheti āloḷeti yathāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1958_1: So supaṇṇo vihaṅgamo vehāsagamanasīlo pannagaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā adhosīsaṃ olambetvā viheṭhayaṃ tattha tattha
atk-s0510a:1958_2: vividhena heṭhanena heṭhento ādāya daḷhaṃ gahetvā yena kāmaṃ yattha gantukāmo,
atk-s0510a:1959_2: yathā garuḷo balī balavā pannagaṃ gahetvā pakkamati,
atk-s0510a:1959_3: tathā eva ahaṃ asaṅkhataṃ paccayehi akataṃ nibbānaṃ gavesanto paṭipattipūraṇavasena pariyesanto dose
atk-s0510a:1959_4: sakaladiyaḍḍhakilesasahasse vikkhālayiṃ visesena samucchedappahānena sodhesiṃ ahanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1960_1: Yathā garuḷo pannagaṃ gahetvā bhuñjitvā viharati,
atk-s0510a:1960_2: tathā ahaṃ dhammavaraṃ uttamadhammaṃ diṭṭho passanto etaṃ santipadaṃ nibbānapadaṃ anuttaraṃ uttaravirahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:1960_3: maggaphalehi ādāya gahetvā vaḷañjetvā viharāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1961_1: Idāni nibbānassa dullabhabhāvaṃ dassento āsāvatī nāma latātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1961_2: Tattha sabbesaṃ devānaṃ āsā icchā etissaṃ latāyaṃ atthīti āsāvatī nāma latā,
atk-s0510a:1961_3: cittalatāvane anekavicittāhi latāhi gahanībhūte vane uyyāne jātā nibbattāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1961_4: Tassā latāya vassasahassena vassasahassaccayena ekaṃ phalaṃ nibbattate ekaṃ phalaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0510a:1962_1: Taṃ devāti taṃ āsāvatiṃ lataṃ tāva dūraphalaṃ tattakaṃ cirakālaṃ atikkamitvā phalaṃ gaṇhantaṃ saṃvijjamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:1962_3: sā āsāvatī nāma latuttamā latānaṃ antare uttamalatā evaṃ devānaṃ piyā ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1963_2: Tāhaṃ paricare munīti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:1963_5: Sāyaṃpātaṃ namassāmīti sāyanhasamayañca pubbaṇhasamayañcāti dvikkhattuṃ namassāmi paṇāmaṃ karomi.
atk-s0510a:1963_6: Yathā devā tāvatiṃsā devā viya āsāvatīlataṃ sāyaṃpātañca payirupāsantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1964_1: Avañjhā pāricariyāti yasmā buddhadassanahetu nibbānappatti ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1964_2: tasmā buddhapāricariyā vattapaṭipattikiriyā avañjhā atucchā namassanā paṇāmakiriyā ca amoghā atucchā.
atk-s0510a:1964_3: Tathā hi dūrāgataṃ dūrato saṃsāraddhānato āgatampi,
atk-s0510a:1964_4: santaṃ saṃvijjamānaṃ khaṇoyaṃ ayaṃ buddhuppādakkhaṇo na virādhayi nātikkami,
atk-s0510a:1965_1: Buddhadassanahetu nibbānappatto ahaṃ āyatiṃ uppajjanakabhave mama paṭisandhiṃ vicinanto upaparikkhanto na passāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1965_2: Nirūpadhi khandhūpadhikilesūpadhīhi virahito vippamutto sabbakilesehi vinābhūto upasanto kilesapariḷāhābhāvena santamānaso carāmi ahanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1966_1: Puna attano buddhadassanāya upamaṃ dassento yathāpi padumaṃ nāmātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1966_2: Sūriyaraṃsena sūriyaraṃsisamphassena yathā padumaṃ nāma api pupphati vikasati mahāvīra vīruttama ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:1966_3: tathā eva buddharaṃsena buddhena bhagavatā desitadhammaraṃsippabhāvena pupphitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1967_1: Puna buddhadassanena nibbānadassanaṃ dīpento yathā balākātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1967_2: Tattha balākayonimhi balākajātiyaṃ sadā sabbasmiṃ kāle pumā puriso yathā na vijjati.
atk-s0510a:1967_3: Pume avijjamāne kathaṃ balākānaṃ gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hotīti ce?
atk-s0510a:1967_4: Meghesu gajjamānesu saddaṃ karontesu meghagajjanaṃ sutvā tā balākiniyo sadā sabbakāle gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti aṇḍaṃ dhārentīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1967_5: Yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ megho na gajjati megho saddaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0510a:1967_6: tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ ciraṃ cirakālena gabbhaṃ aṇḍaṃ dhārenti.
atk-s0510a:1967_7: Yadā yasmiṃ kāle megho pavassati pakārena gajjitvā vassati vuṭṭhidhāraṃ paggharati,
atk-s0510a:1967_8: tadā tasmiṃ kāle bhārato gabbhadhāraṇato parimuccanti aṇḍaṃ pātentīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1968_2: Padumuttarassa buddhassa dhammameghena vohāraparamatthadesanāsaṅkhātameghena gajjato gajjantassa desentassa
atk-s0510a:1968_3: dhammameghassa saddena ghosānusārena ahaṃ tadā dhammagabbhaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ dānasīlādipuññasambhāragabbhaṃ
atk-s0510a:1969_1: Satasahassupādāya kappasatasahassaṃ ādiṃ katvā puññagabbhaṃ dānasīlādipuññasambhāraṃ ahaṃ dharemi pūremi.
atk-s0510a:1969_2: Yāva dhammamegho dhammadesanā na gajjati buddhena na desīyati,
atk-s0510a:1969_3: tāva ahaṃ bhārato saṃsāragabbhabhārato nappamuccāmi na mocemi na visuṃ bhavāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1970_1: sakyamuni sakyavaṃsappabhava yadā yasmiṃ kāle suddhodanamahārājassa tava pitu ramme ramaṇīye kapilavatthave
atk-s0510a:1970_2: kapilavatthunāmake nagare tuvaṃ dhammameghena gajjati ghoseti,
atk-s0510a:1970_3: tadā tasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ bhārato saṃsāragabbhabhārato parimucciṃ mutto ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1971_1: Tato paraṃ attanā adhigate maggaphale dassento suññatantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1971_2: Tattha attaattaniyādīnaṃ abhāvato suññataṃ vimokkhañca rāgadosamohasabbakilesanimittānaṃ abhāvato,
atk-s0510a:1971_4: appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhañca ariyamaggaṃ adhigañchiṃ bhāvesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1971_5: Caturo ca phale sabbeti cattāri sāmaññaphalāni sabbāni sacchi akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1971_6: Dhammevaṃ vijaṭayiṃ ahanti ahaṃ evaṃ sabbadhamme jaṭaṃ gahanaṃ vijaṭayiṃ viddhaṃsesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:1973_1: Tato paraṃ attanā adhigatavisesameva dassento aparimeyyupādāyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1973_4: Taṃ aparimeyyaṃ kappaṃ upādāya ādiṃ katvā tava sāsanaṃ tuyhaṃ sāsanaṃ “anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane
atk-s0510a:1973_8: So me atthoti so patthanāsaṅkhāto attho me mayā anuppatto nipphāditoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1973_9: Anuttaraṃ santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ anuppattaṃ adhigatanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1974_1: So ahaṃ adhigatattā vinaye vinayapiṭake pāramiṃ patto pariyosānappatto.
atk-s0510a:1974_2: Yathāpi pāṭhiko isīti yathā padumuttarassa bhagavato sāsane vinayadharānaṃ aggo isi bhikkhu pāṭhiko pākaṭo ahosi,
atk-s0510a:1974_4: Na me samasamo atthīti vinayadhāritāya me mayā samasamo samāno añño na atthīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1974_5: Sāsanaṃ ovādānusāsanīsaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ dhāremi pūremīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1975_1: Punapi attano visesaṃ dassento vinaye khandhake cāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1975_6: Ettha etasmiṃ sakale vinayapiṭake mayhaṃ vimati dveḷhakaṃ natthi na saṃvijjati.
atk-s0510a:1975_10: kārādike byañjane vā me vimati saṃsayo natthīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1976_1: Niggahe paṭikamme cāti pāpabhikkhūnaṃ niggahe ca sāpattikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ parivāsadānādike paṭikamme ca
atk-s0510a:1976_2: ṭhānāṭṭhāne ca kāraṇe ca akāraṇe ca kovido chekoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1976_3: Osāraṇe ca tajjanīyādikammassa paṭippassaddhivasena osāraṇe pavesane ca.
atk-s0510a:1976_4: Vuṭṭhāpane ca āpattito vuṭṭhāpane nirāpattikaraṇe ca chekoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1976_5: Sabbattha pāramiṃ gatoti sabbasmiṃ vinayakamme pariyosānaṃ patto,
atk-s0510a:1977_1: Vinaye khandhake cāpīti vuttappakāre vinaye ca khandhake ca,
atk-s0510a:1977_3: Ubhato viniveṭhetvāti vinayato khandhakato cāti ubhayato nibbattetvā vijaṭetvā nayaṃ āharitvā.
atk-s0510a:1978_1: Niruttiyā ca kusaloti “rukkho paṭo kumbho mālā citta”ntiādīsu vohāresu cheko.
atk-s0510a:1978_2: Atthānatthe ca kovidoti atthe vaḍḍhiyaṃ anatthe hāniyañca kovido dakkhoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1978_3: Anaññātaṃ mayā natthīti vinayapiṭake sakale vā piṭakattaye mayā anaññātaṃ aviditaṃ apākaṭaṃ kiñci natthīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1978_4: Ekaggo satthu sāsaneti buddhasāsane ahameva eko vinayadharānaṃ aggo seṭṭho uttamoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1979_1: Rūpadakkhe ahaṃ ajjāti ajja etarahi kāle sakyaputtassa bhagavato sāsane pāvacane ahaṃ rūpadakkhe rūpadassane
