atk-s0510a:1979_2: vinayavinicchayadassane sabbaṃ kaṅkhaṃ sakalaṃ saṃsayaṃ vinodemi vināsemīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1979_3: Chindāmi sabbasaṃsayanti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādikaṃ kālattayaṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0510a:1979_4: soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chindāmi vūpasamemi sabbaso viddhaṃsemīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1980_1: Padaṃ anupadañcāpīti padaṃ pubbapadañca anupadaṃ parapadañca akkharaṃ ekekamakkharañca byañjanaṃ sithiladhanitādidasavidhaṃ byañjanavidhānañca.
atk-s0510a:1980_4: Sabbattha kovidoti sabbesu chasu ṭhānesu chekoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1981_1: Tato paraṃ bhagavatoyeva guṇe pakāsento yathāpi rājā balavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:1981_2: Tattha yathā balavā thāmabalasampanno senābalasampanno vā rājā,
atk-s0510a:1981_3: paraṃ paresaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ senaṃ niggaṇhitvā nissesato gahetvā palāpetvā vā,
atk-s0510a:1981_5: Vijinitvāna saṅgāmanti saṅgāmaṃ parasenāya samāgamaṃ yuddhaṃ vijinitvā visesena jinitvā jayaṃ patvā.
atk-s0510a:1981_6: Nagaraṃ tattha māpayeti tattha tasmiṃ vijitaṭṭhāne nagaraṃ pāsādahammiyādivibhūsitaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ māpaye kārāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1982_1: Pākāraṃ parikhañcāpīti tattha māpitanagare pākāraṃ sudhādhavalaiṭṭhakāmayapākārañca kārayeti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1982_5: Esikaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakanti nagarasobhanatthaṃ ussāpitaesikāthambhañca mahantaṃ koṭṭhakañca catubhūmakādidvārakoṭṭhakañca kāraye.
atk-s0510a:1982_6: Aṭṭālake ca vividheti catubhūmakādibhede atiuccaaṭṭālake ca vividhe nānappakārake bahū kāraye kārāpeyyāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1983_1: Siṅghāṭakaṃ caccarañcāti na kevalaṃ pākārādayo kāraye,
atk-s0510a:1983_2: siṅghāṭakaṃ catumaggasandhiñca caccaraṃ antarāvīthiñca kārayeti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1983_3: Suvibhattantarāpaṇanti suṭṭhu vibhattaṃ vibhāgato koṭṭhāsavantaṃ antarāpaṇaṃ anekāpaṇasahassaṃ kārāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1983_4: Kārayeyya sabhaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ māpitanagare sabhaṃ dhammādhikaraṇasālaṃ kāraye.
atk-s0510a:1983_5: Atthānatthavinicchayaṃ vaḍḍhiñca avaḍḍhiñca vinicchayakaraṇatthaṃ vinicchayasālaṃ kārayeti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1984_3: Balakāyassa rakkhāyāti hatthiassarathapattisaṅkhātassa balakāyassa senāsamūhassa ārakkhaṇatthāya so nagarasāmiko rājā,
atk-s0510a:1984_4: senāpaccaṃ senāpatiṃ senānāyakaṃ mahāmattaṃ ṭhapeti ṭhānantare patiṭṭhapetīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1985_1: Ārakkhatthāya bhaṇḍassāti jātarūparajatamuttāmaṇiādirājabhaṇḍassa ārakkhaṇatthāya samantato gopanatthāya
atk-s0510a:1985_2: me mayhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ mā vinassīti nidhānakusalaṃ rakkhaṇe kusalaṃ chekaṃ naraṃ purisaṃ bhaṇḍarakkhaṃ bhaṇḍarakkhantaṃ
atk-s0510a:1986_1: Mamatto hoti yo raññoti yo paṇḍito rañño mamatto māmako pakkhapāto hoti.
atk-s0510a:1986_2: Vuddhiṃ yassa ca icchatīti assa rañño vuddhiñca virūḷhiṃ yo icchati kāmeti,
atk-s0510a:1986_3: tassa itthambhūtassa paṇḍitassa rājā adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchayādhipaccaṃ deti mittassa mittabhāvassa paṭipajjitunti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1987_3: idaṃ nimittaṃ asubha”nti evaṃ nimittajānanasatthesu ca.
atk-s0510a:1987_4: Lakkhaṇesu cāti itthipurisānaṃ hatthapādalakkhaṇajānanasatthesu ca kovidaṃ chekaṃ ajjhāyakaṃ anekesaṃ
atk-s0510a:1987_5: sissānaṃ byākaraṇavācakaṃ mantadharaṃ vedattayasaṅkhātamantadhārakaṃ paṇḍitaṃ so rājā porohicce purohitaṭṭhānantare
atk-s0510a:1988_1: Etehaṅgehi sampannoti etehi vuttappakārehi aṅgehi avayavehi sampanno samaṅgībhūto so rājā “khattiyo”ti pavuccati kathīyatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1988_2: Sadā rakkhanti rājānanti ete senāpaccādayo amaccā sadā sabbakālaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ rakkhanti gopenti. Kimiva?
atk-s0510a:1988_3: Cakkavākova dukkhitaṃ dukkhappattaṃ sakañātiṃ rakkhanto cakkavāko pakkhī ivāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1989_2: yathā so rājā senāpaccādiaṅgasampanno nagaradvāraṃ thaketvā paṭivasati,
atk-s0510a:1989_3: tatheva tuvaṃ hatāmitto nihatapaccatthiko khattiyo iva sadevakassa lokassa saha devehi pavattamānassa
atk-s0510a:1989_4: lokassa dhammarājā dhammena samena rājā dasapāramitādhammaparipūraṇena rājabhūtattā “dhammarājā”ti pavuccati
atk-s0510a:1990_1: Titthiye nīharitvānāti dhammarājabhāvena paṭipakkhabhūte sakalatitthiye nīharitvā nissesena haritvā nibbisevanaṃ
atk-s0510a:1990_2: katvā sasenakaṃ dhārañcāpi senāya saha vasavattimārampi nīharitvā.
atk-s0510a:1990_3: Tamandhakāraṃ vidhamitvāti tamasaṅkhātaṃ mohandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā viddhaṃsetvā.
atk-s0510a:1990_5: khandhāyatanadhātupaṭiccasamuppādabalabojjhaṅgagambhīranayasamantapaṭṭhānadhammasaṅkhātaṃ vā nagaraṃ amāpayi nimmini patiṭṭhāpesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1991_1: Sīlaṃ pākārakaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpite dhammanagare catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pākāraṃ.
atk-s0510a:1991_2: Ñāṇaṃ te dvārakoṭṭhakanti te tuyhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaāsayānusayañāṇaanāgataṃsañāṇaatītaṃsañāṇādikameva ñāṇaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1991_4: asithilaparakkama te tuyhaṃ dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti sabbaññutaññāṇakāraṇā saddahanasaddhā ussāpitaalaṅkāraalaṅkatathambhoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1991_5: Dvārapālo ca saṃvaroti te tuyhaṃ chadvārikasaṃvaro rakkhāvaraṇagutti dvārapālo dvārarakkhakoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1992_3: mune ñāṇavanta te tuyhaṃ pāṭihāriyādianekavidhā paññā caccaraṃ maggasamodhānaṃ nagaravīthīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1992_4: Iddhipādañca siṅghāṭanti tuyhaṃ chandavīriyacittavīmaṃsasaṅkhātā cattāro iddhipādā siṅghāṭaṃ catumaggasanti.
atk-s0510a:1992_5: Dhammavīthi sumāpitanti sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhātāya vīthiyā suṭṭhu māpitaṃ sajjitaṃ,
atk-s0510a:1993_1: Suttantaṃ abhidhammañcāti tava tuyhaṃ ettha dhammanagare suttantaṃ abhidhammaṃ vinayañca kevalaṃ sakalaṃ
atk-s0510a:1993_2: suttageyyādikaṃ navaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammasabhā dhammādhikaraṇasālāti attho.
atk-s0510a:1994_6: Esā dhammakuṭī tavāti esā sabbanavalokuttaradhammasaṅkhātā tava tuyhaṃ dhammakuṭi vasanagehanti attho.
atk-s0510a:1995_1: Paññāya aggo nikkhittoti paññāvasena paññavantānaṃ aggo.
atk-s0510a:1995_2: Iti bhagavatā nikkhitto ṭhapito thero paṭibhāne ca paññāya kattabbe kicce,
atk-s0510a:1995_3: yuttamuttapaṭibhāne vā kovido cheko nāmena sāriputtoti pākaṭo tava tuyhaṃ dhammasenāpati tayā desitassa
atk-s0510a:1995_4: piṭakattayadhammasamūhassa dhāraṇato pati padhāno hutvā senākiccaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0510a:1996_2: cutūpapāte cutiyā upapattiyā ca kusalo cheko.
atk-s0510a:1996_3: Iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatoti “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
atk-s0510a:1996_4: bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotī”tiādinā vuttāya iddhippabhedāya pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gato patto nāmena kolito
atk-s0510a:1996_5: nāma moggallānatthero porohicco tava tuyhaṃ purohitoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:1997_4: durāsado āsādetuṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ dukkho asakkuṇeyyoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1997_5: Dhutavādiguṇenaggoti tecīvarikaṅgādīni terasa dhutaṅgāni vadati ovadatīti dhutavādīguṇena dhutaṅgaguṇena
atk-s0510a:1997_6: aggo seṭṭho mahākassapatthero tava tuyhaṃ akkhadasso vohārakaraṇe padhānoti attho.
atk-s0510a:1998_2: bahūnaṃ caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānaṃ sutattā bhagavatā bhikkhusaṅghato ca uggahitattā bahussuto
atk-s0510a:1998_3: anekesaṃ chasatasahassasaṅkhyānaṃ āgamadhammānaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīnañca paramatthadhammānaṃ dhāraṇato dhammadharo ānando.
atk-s0510a:1998_4: Sabbapāṭhī ca sāsaneti buddhasāsane sabbesaṃ pāṭhīnaṃ paṭhantānaṃ sajjhāyantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo seṭṭhoti sabbapāṭhī nāmena ānando nāma thero.
atk-s0510a:1998_5: Dhammārakkho tavāti tava tuyhaṃ dhammassa piṭakattayadhammabhaṇḍassa ārakkho rakkhako pālako,
atk-s0510a:1999_1: Ete sabbe atikkammāti bhagavā bhagyavā sammāsambuddho ete sāriputtādayo mahānubhāvepi there atikkamma vajjetvā mamaṃyeva pamesi pamāṇaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0510a:1999_3: Vinicchayaṃ me pādāsīti vinayaññūhi paṇḍitehi desitaṃ pakāsitaṃ vinaye vinicchayaṃ dosavicāraṇaṃ me mayhaṃ bhagavā pādāsi pakārena adāsi,
atk-s0510a:2000_1: Yo koci vinaye pañhanti yo koci bhikkhu buddhasāvako vinayanissitaṃ pañhaṃ maṃ pucchati,
atk-s0510a:2000_2: tattha tasmiṃ pucchitapañhe me mayhaṃ cintanā vimati kaṅkhā natthi.
atk-s0510a:2000_3: Tañhevatthaṃ taṃ eva pucchitaṃ atthaṃ ahaṃ kathemīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2001_1: Yāvatā buddhakhettamhīti yāvatā yattake ṭhāne buddhassa āṇākhette taṃ mahāmuniṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:2001_2: vinaye vinayapiṭake vinayavinicchayakaraṇe vā mādiso mayā sadiso natthi,
atk-s0510a:2002_1: Bhikkhusaṅghe nisīditvā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno gotamo bhagavā evaṃ gajjati sīhanādaṃ karoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0510a:2002_5: upālissa upālinā samo sadiso natthīti evaṃ gajjati.
atk-s0510a:2003_1: Yāvatāti yattakaṃ buddhabhaṇitaṃ buddhena desitaṃ navaṅgaṃ suttageyyādisatthusāsanaṃ satthunā pakāsitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2003_2: sabbaṃ vinayogadhaṃ taṃ vinaye antopaviṭṭhaṃ vinayamūlakaṃ iccevaṃ passino passantassa.
atk-s0510a:2004_1: Mama kammaṃ saritvānāti gotamo sakyapuṅgavo sakyavaṃsappadhāno,
atk-s0510a:2004_2: mama kammaṃ mayhaṃ pubbapatthanākammaṃ atītaṃsañāṇena saritvāna paccakkhato ñatvā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe gato “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2004_4: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti maṃ etadagge ṭhāne ṭhapesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2005_1: Satasahassupādāyāti satasahassakappe ādiṃ katvā yaṃ imaṃ ṭhānaṃ apatthayiṃ patthesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2005_2: so me attho mayā anuppatto adhigato paṭiladdho vinaye pāramiṃ gato koṭiṃ pattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2006_1: Sakyānaṃ sakyavaṃsarājūnaṃ nandijanano somanassakārako ahaṃ pure pubbe kappako āsiṃ ahosiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2006_2: taṃ jātiṃ taṃ kulaṃ taṃ yoniṃ vijahitvā visesena jahitvā chaḍḍetvā mahesino sammāsambuddhassa putto jāto
atk-s0510a:2007_1: Tato paraṃ attano dāsakule nibbattanāpadānaṃ dassento ito dutiyake kappetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2007_2: Tattha ito bhaddakappato heṭṭhā dutiye kappe nāmena añjaso nāma khattiyo eko rājā anantatejo saṅkhyātikkantatejo
atk-s0510a:2007_3: amitayaso pamāṇātikkantaparivāro mahaddhano anekakoṭisatasahassadhanavā bhūmipālo pathavīpālako rakkhako
atk-s0510a:2008_1: Tassa raññoti tassa tādisassa rājino putto ahaṃ candano nāma khattiyo khattiyakumāro ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2008_2: So ahaṃ jātimadena ca yasamadena ca bhogamadena ca upatthaddho thambhito unnatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2009_1: Nāgasatasahassānīti satasahassahatthino mātaṅgā mātaṅgakule jātā tidhā pabhinnā akkhikaṇṇakosasaṅkhātehi
atk-s0510a:2009_2: tīhi ṭhānehi pabhinnā madagaḷitā sabbālaṅkārabhūsitā sabbehi hatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkatā sadā sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0510a:2010_1: Sabalehi paretohanti tadā tasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ sabalehi attano senābalehi pareto parivārito uyyānaṃ gantukāmako
atk-s0510a:2010_2: icchanto sirikaṃ nāma nāgaṃ hatthiṃ āruyha abhiruhitvā nagarato nikkhaminti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2011_1: Caraṇena ca sampannoti sīlasaṃvarādipannarasacaraṇadhammena samannāgato guttadvāro pihitacakkhādichadvāro
atk-s0510a:2011_2: susaṃvuto suṭṭhu rakkhitakāyacitto devalo nāma sambuddho paccekasambuddho,
atk-s0510a:2011_3: mama mayhaṃ purato sammukhe āgacchi pāpuṇīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2012_1: Pesetvā sirikaṃ nāganti taṃ āgataṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā ahaṃ sirikaṃ nāma nāgaṃ abhimukhaṃ pesetvā buddhaṃ āsādayiṃ ghaṭṭesiṃ padussesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2012_2: Tato sañjātakopo soti tato tasmā mayā atīva pīḷetvā pesitattā so hatthināgo mayi sañjātakopo padaṃ attano pādaṃ nuddharate na uddharati,
atk-s0510a:2013_1: Nāgaṃ duṭṭhamanaṃ disvāti duṭṭhamanaṃ kuddhacittaṃ nādaṃ disvā ahaṃ buddhe paccekabuddhe kopaṃ akāsiṃ dosaṃ uppādesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2013_2: Vihesayitvā sambuddhanti devalaṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ vihesayitvā viheṭhetvā ahaṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2014_1: Sātaṃ tattha na vindāmīti tasmiṃ āsādane sātaṃ na vindāmi.
atk-s0510a:2014_2: Āsādananimittaṃ madhuraṃ sukhaṃ na labhāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2014_3: Siro pajjalito yathāti siro mama sīsaṃ pajjalito yathā pajjalamānaṃ viya hotīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2014_4: Pariḷāhena ḍayhāmīti paccekabuddhe kopassa katattā pacchānutāpapariḷāhena ḍayhāmi uṇhacitto homīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2015_1: Sasāgarantāti teneva pāpakammabalena sasāgarantā sāgarapariyosānā sakalamahāpathavī me mayhaṃ ādittā viya jalitā viya hoti khāyatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2015_2: Pitu santikupāgammāti evaṃ bhaye uppanne ahaṃ attano pitu rañño santikaṃ upāgamma upagantvā idaṃ vacanaṃ abraviṃ kathesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2016_1: Āsīvisaṃva kupitanti āsīvisaṃ sabbaṃ kupitaṃ kuddhaṃ iva jalamānaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ iva mattaṃ tidhā pabhinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2016_2: dantiṃ dantavantaṃ kuñjaraṃ uttamaṃ hatthiṃ iva ca āgataṃ yaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ sayambhuṃ sayameva buddhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0510a:2017_1: Āsādito mayā buddhoti so paccekabuddho mayā āsādito ghaṭṭito ghoro aññehi ghaṭṭetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ghoro,
atk-s0510a:2017_2: uggatapo pākaṭatapo jino pañca māre jitavā evaṃguṇasampanno paccekabuddho mayā ghaṭṭitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2017_3: Purā sabbe vinassāmāti tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe kataanādarena sabbe mayaṃ vinassāma vividhenākārena nassāma,
atk-s0510a:2017_5: Khamāpessāma taṃ muninti taṃ paccekabuddhaṃ muniṃ yāva na vinassāma,
atk-s0510a:2018_1: No ce taṃ nijjhāpessāmāti attadantaṃ damitacittaṃ samāhitaṃ ekaggacittaṃ taṃ paccekabuddhaṃ no ce nijjhāpessāma khamāpessāma.
atk-s0510a:2018_2: Orena sattadivasā sattadivasato orabhāge sattadivase anatikkamitvā sampuṇṇaṃ raṭṭhaṃ me sabbaṃ vidhamissati vinassissati.
atk-s0510a:2019_1: Sumekhalo kosiyo cāti ete sumekhalādayo cattāro rājāno isayo āsādayitvā ghaṭṭetvā anādaraṃ katvā saraṭṭhakā
atk-s0510a:2019_2: saha raṭṭhajanapadavāsīhi duggatā vināsaṃ gatāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2020_1: Yadā kuppanti isayoti yadā yasmiṃ kāle saññatā kāyasaññamādīhi saññatā santā brahmacārino uttamacārino
atk-s0510a:2020_3: tadā sasāgaraṃ sapabbataṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ vināsentīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2021_1: Tiyojanasahassamhīti tesaṃ isīnaṃ ānubhāvaṃ ñatvā te khamāpetuṃ accayaṃ aparādhaṃ desanatthāya pakāsanatthāya
atk-s0510a:2021_3: Sayambhuṃ upasaṅkaminti sayambhuṃ paccekabuddhaṃ upasaṅkamiṃ samīpaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2022_1: Allavatthāti mayā saddhiṃ rāsibhūtā sabbe janā allavatthā udakena tintavatthauttarāsaṅgā allasirā tintakesā
atk-s0510a:2022_2: pañjalīkatā muddhani kataañjalipuṭā buddhassa paccekamunino pāde pādasamīpe nipatitvā nipajjitvā idaṃ
atk-s0510a:2023_2: mayā tumhesu aññāṇena kataṃ aparādhaṃ khamassu tvaṃ vinodehi,
atk-s0510a:2023_4: Jano janasamūho taṃ bhagavantaṃ abhi visesena yācati.
atk-s0510a:2023_5: Pariḷāhaṃ dosamohehi katacittadukkhapariḷāhaṃ amhākaṃ vinodehi tanuṃ karohi,
atk-s0510a:2023_6: no amhākaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sakalaraṭṭhajanapadavāsino mā vināsaya mā vināsehīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2024_1: Sadevamānusā sabbeti sabbe mānusā sadevā sadānavā pahārādādīhi asurehi saha sarakkhasā ayomayena kūṭena
atk-s0510a:2024_2: mahāmuggarena sadā sabbakālaṃ me siraṃ mayhaṃ matthakaṃ bhindeyyuṃ padāleyyuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2025_1: Tato paraṃ buddhānaṃ khamitabhāvañca kopābhāvañca pakāsento dake aggi na saṇṭhātītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2025_2: Tattha yathā udake aggi na saṇṭhāti na patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0510a:2025_3: yathā bījaṃ sele silāmaye pabbate na viruhati,
atk-s0510a:2025_4: yathā agade osadhe kimi pāṇako na saṇṭhāti.
atk-s0510a:2025_5: Tathā kopo cittappakopo dummanatā buddhe paṭividdhasacce paccekabuddhe na jāyati na uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2026_1: Punapi buddhānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento yathā ca bhūmītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2026_2: Tattha yathā ca bhūmi pathavī acalā niccalā,
atk-s0510a:2026_4: Yathā sāgaro mahāsamuddo appameyyo pametuṃ pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo,
atk-s0510a:2026_7: evaṃ tathā buddho akkhobhiyo khobhetuṃ āloḷetuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2027_1: Tato paraṃ paccekabuddhassa khamanavacanaṃ dassento sadā khantā mahāvīrātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2027_2: Tattha mahāvīrā uttamavīriyavantā buddhā tapassino pāpānaṃ tapanato “tapo”ti laddhanāmena vīriyena samannāgatā
atk-s0510a:2027_3: khantā ca khantiyā ca sampannā khamitā ca paresaṃ aparādhaṃ khamitā sahitā sadā sabbakālaṃ bhavantīti
atk-s0510a:2027_5: Khantānaṃ khamitānañcāti tesaṃ buddhānaṃ khantānaṃ khantiyā yuttānaṃ khamitānaṃ parāparādhakhamitānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2027_6: sahitānañca gamanaṃ chandādīhi agatigamanaṃ na vijjatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2028_1: Iti idaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā sambuddho paccekasambuddho pariḷāhaṃ sattānaṃ uppannadāhaṃ vinodayaṃ vinodayanto
atk-s0510a:2028_2: mahājanassa purato sannipatitassa sarājakassa mahato janakāyassa sammukhato tadā tasmiṃ kāle nabhaṃ ākāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2029_1: Tena kammenahaṃ dhīrāti dhīra dhitisampanna ahaṃ tena kammena paccekabuddhe katena anādarakammena imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2029_2: pacchimattabhave hīnattaṃ lāmakabhāvaṃ rājūnaṃ kappakakammakaraṇajātiṃ ajjhupāgato sampattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2029_3: Samatikkamma taṃ jātinti taṃ parāyattajātiṃ saṃ suṭṭhu atikkamma atikkamitvā.
atk-s0510a:2029_4: Pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puranti bhayarahitaṃ nibbānapuraṃ nibbānamahānagaraṃ pāvisiṃ paviṭṭho āsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2030_1: Tadāpi maṃ mahāvīrāti vīruttama tadāpi tasmiṃ paccekabuddhassa āsādanasamaye api sayambhū paccekabuddho
atk-s0510a:2030_2: pariḷāhaṃ āsādanahetu uppannaṃ kāyacittadarathaṃ vinodesi dūrīakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2030_3: Ḍayhamānaṃ tato eva pacchānutāpena kukkuccena ḍayhamānaṃ santapantaṃ maṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ dosaṃ dosato dassane
atk-s0510a:2030_4: suṭṭhu saṇṭhitaṃ disvā khamāpayi taṃ aparādhaṃ adhivāsesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2031_3: tihaggībhi rāgaggidosaggimohaggisaṅkhātehi vā nirayaggipetaggisaṃsāraggisaṅkhātehi vā tīhi aggīhi ḍayhamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2031_4: dukkhamanubhavantaṃ maṃ bhagavā sītibhāvaṃ domanassavināsena santakāyacittasaṅkhātaṃ sītibhāvaṃ nibbānameva
atk-s0510a:2031_6: Tayo aggī vuttappakāre te tayo aggī nibbāpesi vūpasamesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2032_1: Evaṃ attano hīnāpadānaṃ bhagavato dassetvā idāni aññepi tassa savane niyojetvā ovadanto “yesaṃ sotāvadhānatthī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2032_2: Tattha yesaṃ tumhākaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ sotassa avadhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ atthi vijjati,
atk-s0510a:2032_3: te tumhe bhāsato sāsantassa mama vacanaṃ suṇātha manasi karotha.
atk-s0510a:2032_4: Atthaṃ tumhaṃ pavakkhāmīti yathā yena pakārena mama mayā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2032_5: tathā tena pakārena nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ paramatthaṃ tumhākaṃ pavakkhāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2033_2: Tattha sayambhuṃ sayameva bhūtaṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātaṃ santacittaṃ samāhitaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ vimānetvā
atk-s0510a:2033_3: anādaraṃ katvā tena kammena katenākusalena ajja imasmiṃ vattamānakāle ahaṃ nīcayoniyaṃ parāyattajātiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2034_1: Mā vo khaṇaṃ virādhethāti buddhuppādakkhaṇaṃ vo tumhe mā virādhetha gaḷitaṃ mā karotha,
atk-s0510a:2034_2: hi saccaṃ khaṇātītā buddhuppādakkhaṇaṃ atītā atikkantā sattā socare socanti,
atk-s0510a:2034_3: “mayaṃ alakkhikā dummedhā bhavāmā”ti evaṃ socantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2034_4: Sadatthe attano atthe vuḍḍhiyaṃ vāyameyyātha vīriyaṃ karotha.
atk-s0510a:2034_5: Vo tumhehi khaṇo buddhuppādakkhaṇo samayo paṭipādito nipphādito pattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2035_1: Tato paraṃ saṃsāragatānaṃ ādīnavaṃ upamāupameyyavasena dassento ekaccānañca vamanantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2035_2: Ekaccānaṃ kesañci puggalānaṃ vamanaṃ uddhaṃ uggiraṇaṃ ekaccānaṃ virecanaṃ adhopaggharaṇaṃ eke ekaccānaṃ halāhalaṃ visaṃ mucchākaraṇavisaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2035_3: ekaccānaṃ puggalānaṃ osadhaṃ rakkhanupāyaṃ bhagavā evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā akkhāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2036_1: Vamanaṃ paṭipannānanti paṭipannānaṃ maggasamaṅgīnaṃ vamanaṃ saṃsārachaḍḍanaṃ saṃsāramocanaṃ bhagavā akkhāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2036_2: Phalaṭṭhānaṃ phale ṭhitānaṃ virecanaṃ saṃsārapaggharaṇaṃ akkhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2036_3: Phalalābhīnaṃ phalaṃ labhitvā ṭhitānaṃ nibbānaosadhaṃ akkhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2036_4: Gavesīnaṃ manussadevanibbānasampattiṃ gavesīnaṃ pariyesantānaṃ puññakhettabhūtaṃ saṅghaṃ akkhāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2037_1: Sāsanena viruddhānanti sāsanassa paṭipakkhānaṃ halāhalaṃ kutūhalaṃ pāpaṃ akusalaṃ akkhāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2037_2: Yathā āsīvisoti assaddhānaṃ katapāpānaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃsāre dukkhāvahanato āsīvisasadisaṃ yathā āsīviso
atk-s0510a:2037_3: diṭṭhamattena bhasmakaraṇato diṭṭhaviso sappo attanā daṭṭhaṃ naraṃ jhāpeti ḍayhati dukkhāpeti.
atk-s0510a:2037_4: Taṃ naraṃ taṃ assaddhaṃ katapāpaṃ naraṃ halāhalavisaṃ evaṃ jhāpeti catūsu apāyesu ḍayhati sosesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2038_1: Sakiṃ pītaṃ halāhalanti visaṃ halāhalaṃ pītaṃ sakiṃ ekavāraṃ jīvitaṃ uparundhati nāseti.
atk-s0510a:2038_2: Sāsanena sāsanamhi virajjhitvā aparādhaṃ katvā puggalo kappakoṭimhi koṭisaṅkhye kappepi ḍayhati nijjhāyatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2039_1: Evaṃ assaddhānaṃ puggalānaṃ phalavipākaṃ dassetvā idāni buddhānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassento khantiyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2039_3: so buddho khantiyā khamanena ca avihiṃsāya sattānaṃ avihiṃsanena ca mettacittavatāya ca mettacittavantabhāvena
atk-s0510a:2039_4: ca sadevakaṃ saha devehi vattamānaṃ lokaṃ tāreti atikkamāpeti nibbāpeti,
atk-s0510a:2039_5: tasmā kāraṇā buddhā vo tumhehi avirādhiyā virujjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyyā,
atk-s0510a:2040_1: Lābhe ca alābhe ca na sajjanti na bhajanti na lagganti.
atk-s0510a:2040_2: Sammānane ādarakaraṇe ca vimānane anādarakaraṇe ca acalā pathavīsadisā buddhā bhavanti,
atk-s0510a:2040_3: tasmā kāraṇā te buddhā tumhehi na virodhiyā na virodhetabbā virujjhituṃ asakkuṇeyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2041_2: Tattha vadhakāvadhakesu sabbesu sattesu samako samamānaso muni buddhamunīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2042_1: Etesaṃ paṭigho natthīti etesaṃ buddhānaṃ paṭigho caṇḍikkaṃ dosacittataṃ natthi na saṃvijjati.
atk-s0510a:2042_2: Rāgomesaṃ na vijjatīti imesaṃ buddhānaṃ rāgopi rajjanaṃ allīyanaṃ na vijjati,
atk-s0510a:2042_5: vadhakassa ca orasassa cāti sabbesaṃ samako samacitto buddho hotīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2043_1: Punapi buddhānaṃyeva ānubhāvaṃ dassento panthe disvāna kāsāvantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2043_2: Tattha mīḷhamakkhitaṃ gūthasammissaṃ kāsāvaṃ kasāvena rajitaṃ cīvaraṃ isiddhajaṃ ariyānaṃ dhajaṃ parikkhāraṃ,
atk-s0510a:2043_3: panthe magge chaḍḍitaṃ disvāna passitvā añjaliṃ katvā dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ añjalipuṭaṃ sirasi katvā sirasā
atk-s0510a:2043_4: sirena vanditabbaṃ isiddhajaṃ arahattaddhajaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakadīpakaṃ cīvaraṃ namassitabbaṃ
atk-s0510a:2044_2: Ye ca buddhā vattamānā idāni jātā ca ye buddhā anāgatā ajātā abhūtā anibbattā apātubhūtā ca ye buddhā.
atk-s0510a:2044_3: Dhajenānena sujjhantīti anena isiddhajena cīvarena ete buddhā sujjhanti visuddhā bhavanti sobhanti.
atk-s0510a:2044_4: Tasmā tena kāraṇena ete buddhā namassiyā namassitabbā vanditabbāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2045_1: Tato paraṃ attano guṇaṃ dassento satthukappantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2045_2: Tattha satthukappaṃ buddhasadisaṃ suvinayaṃ sundaravinayaṃ sundarākārena dvārattayadamanaṃ hadayena cittena
atk-s0510a:2045_4: Vinayaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ namassamāno vandamāno vinaye ādaraṃ kurumāno viharissāmi sabbadā sabbasmiṃ kāle vāsaṃ kappemīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2046_1: Vinayo āsayo mayhanti vinayapiṭakaṃ mayhaṃ okāsabhūtaṃ savanadhāraṇamanasikaraṇauggahaparipucchāpavattanavasena okāsabhūtaṃ gehabhūtanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2046_2: Vinayo ṭhānacaṅkamanti vinayo mayhaṃ savanādikiccakaraṇena ṭhitaṭṭhānañca caṅkamanaṭṭhānañca.
atk-s0510a:2046_3: Kappemi vinaye vāsanti vinayapiṭake vinayatantiyā savanadhāraṇapavattanavasena vāsaṃ sayanaṃ kappemi karomi.
atk-s0510a:2046_4: Vinayo mama gocaroti vinayapiṭakaṃ mayhaṃ gocaro āhāro bhojanaṃ niccaṃ dhāraṇamanasikaraṇavasenāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2047_1: Vinaye pāramippattoti sakale vinayapiṭake pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ patto.
atk-s0510a:2047_2: Samathe cāpi kovidoti pārājikādisattāpattikkhandhānaṃ samathe vūpasame ca vuṭṭhāne ca kovido cheko,
atk-s0510a:2053_0: Evaṃ vuttesu ca sattasu adhikaraṇasamathesu atikovido chekoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2053_2: catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu kappasatasahassesu sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamāya vīriyavanta satthuno devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2053_3: anusāsakassa taṃ tava pāde pādayuge upāli bhikkhu vandati paṇāmaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2054_1: So ahaṃ pabbajitvā sambuddhaṃ namassamāno paṇāmaṃ kurumāno dhammassa ca tena bhagavatā desitassa navalokuttaradhammassa
atk-s0510a:2054_2: sudhammataṃ sundaradhammabhāvaṃ jānitvā dhammañca namassamāno gāmato gāmaṃ purato punaṃ nagarato nagaraṃ
atk-s0510a:2055_1: Kilesā jhāpitā mayhanti mayā paṭividdhaarahattamaggañāṇena mayhaṃ cittasantānagatā sabbe diyaḍḍhasahassasaṅkhā
atk-s0510a:2055_3: Bhavā sabbe samūhatāti kāmabhavādayo sabbe nava bhavā mayā samūhatā saṃ suṭṭhu ūhatā khepitā viddhaṃsitā.
atk-s0510a:2055_7: avijjāsavoti sabbe cattāro āsavā parikkhīṇā parisamantato khayaṃ pāpitā.
atk-s0510a:2055_8: Idāni imasmiṃ arahattappattakāle punabbhavo punuppattisaṅkhāto bhavo bhavanaṃ jāti natthīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2056_2: Tattha buddhaseṭṭhassa uttamabuddhassa santike samīpe ekanagare vā mama āgamanaṃ svāgataṃ suṭṭhu āgamanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2056_3: sundarāgamanaṃ vata ekantena āsi ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2056_6: Kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti buddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ anusiṭṭhi sāsanaṃ kataṃ nipphāditaṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2056_7: pūretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā arahattamaggañāṇādhigamena sampāditanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2057_1: Paṭisambhidā catassoti atthapaṭisambhidādayo catasso paññāyo sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā.
atk-s0510a:2057_2: Vimokkhāpi ca aṭṭhimeti cattāri maggañāṇāni cattāri phalañāṇānīti ime aṭṭha vimokkhā saṃsārato muccanūpāyā sacchikatāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2060_0: Imā cha abhiññā sacchikatā paccakkhaṃ katā.
atk-s0510a:2060_1: Imesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ sacchikaraṇena buddhassa sāsanaṃ katanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2061_2: Āyasmā upāli theroti thirasīlādiguṇayutto sāvako imā pubbacaritāpadānadīpikā gāthāyo abhāsittha kathayitthāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2064_1: Ayaṃ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2064_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike
atk-s0510a:2064_3: dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ attano sāsane paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammarattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2064_4: ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2064_6: Satthāpissa anantarāyataṃ disvā bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2064_7: So yāvajīvaṃ puññāni karonto satthari parinibbute cetiye patiṭṭhāpiyamāne antocetiye ratanagharaṃ kārāpesi,
atk-s0510a:2065_0: So evaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahākālo nāma kuṭumbiko
atk-s0510a:2065_1: hutvā aṭṭhakarīsamatte khette sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitasālitaṇḍulehi asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ sampādetvā
atk-s0510a:2065_2: tattha madhusappisakkarādayo pakkhipitvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2065_10: minaggaṃ koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasasse nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0510a:2066_0: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto amhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:2066_1: bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2066_2: Tassa koṇḍaññoti gottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2066_3: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā lakkhaṇamantesu ca pāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2066_4: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurato cavitvā kapilavatthupure suddhodanamahārājassa gehe nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2066_5: Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhuttarasatesu brāhmaṇesu upanītesu ye aṭṭha brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇapariggahaṇatthaṃ mahātalaṃ upanītā.
atk-s0510a:2066_6: So tesu sabbanavako hutvā mahāpurisassa lakkhaṇanipphattiṃ disvā “ekaṃsena ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0510a:2066_7: niṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāsattassa abhinikkhamanaṃ udikkhanto vicarati.
atk-s0510a:2067_0: Bodhisattopi kho mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhamāno anukkamena vuddhippatto ñāṇaparipākaṃ gantvā ekūnatiṃsatime
atk-s0510a:2067_1: vasse mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamanto anomānadītīre pabbajitvā anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā padhānaṃ padahi.
atk-s0510a:2067_2: Tadā koṇḍañño māṇavo mahāsattassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā lakkhaṇapariggāhakabrāhmaṇānaṃ puttehi vappamāṇavādīhi
atk-s0510a:2067_3: saddhiṃ attapañcamo pabbajitvā anukkamena bodhisattassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbassāni taṃ upaṭṭhahanto
atk-s0510a:2067_4: tassa oḷārikāhāraparibhogena nibbinno apakkamitvā isipatanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2067_5: Atha kho bodhisatto oḷārikāhāraparibhogena laddhakāyabalo vesākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke
atk-s0510a:2067_6: nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā abhisambuddho hutvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva vītināmetvā
atk-s0510a:2067_7: pañcavaggiyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ isipatanaṃ gantvā tesaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttantaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:2067_8: Desanāpariyosāne koṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2067_9: Atha pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttantadesanāya arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2068_1: Evaṃ so arahattaṃ patvā “kiṃ kammaṃ katvā ahaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ adhigatomhī”ti upadhārento attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2068_2: paccakkhato ñatvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ udānavasena dassento padumuttarasambuddhantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2068_4: Lokajeṭṭhaṃ vināyakanti sakalassa sattalokassa jeṭṭhaṃ padhānanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2068_5: Visesena veneyyasatte saṃsārasāgarassa paratīraṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ neti sampāpetīti vināyako,
atk-s0510a:2068_12: Paṭhamaṃ addasaṃ ahanti paṭhamaṃ vesākhapuṇṇamiyā rattiyā paccūsasamaye buddhabhūtaṃ padumuttarasambuddhaṃ ahaṃ addakkhinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2069_1: Yāvatā bodhiyā mūleti yattakā bodhirukkhasamīpe yakkhā samāgatā rāsibhūtā sambuddhaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ taṃ
atk-s0510a:2069_2: buddhaṃ pañjalīkatā dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ añjalipuṭaṃ sirasi ṭhapetvā vandanti namassantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2070_1: Sabbe devā tuṭṭhamanāti buddhabhūtaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā te sabbe devā tuṭṭhacittā ākāse sañcarantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2070_2: Andhakāratamonudoti ativiya andhakāraṃ mohaṃ nudo khepano ayaṃ buddho anuppattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2071_1: Tesaṃ hāsaparetānanti hāsehi pītisomanassehi samannāgatānaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ mahānādo mahāghoso avattatha pavattati,
atk-s0510a:2071_2: sammāsambuddhasāsane kilese saṃkilese dhamme jhāpayissāmāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2072_1: Devānaṃ giramaññāyāti vācāya thutivacanena saha udīritaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ jānitvā haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena
atk-s0510a:2072_2: somanassasahagatena cittena ādibhikkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ āhāraṃ buddhabhūtassa ahaṃ adāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2073_1: Sattāhaṃ abhinikkhammāti mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā sattāhaṃ padhānaṃ katvā sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2073_2: arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ bodhiṃ ajjhagamaṃ adhigañchiṃ ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2073_3: Idaṃ me paṭhamaṃ bhattanti idaṃ bhattaṃ sarīrayāpanaṃ brahmacārissa uttamacārissa me mayhaṃ iminā devaputtena paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2074_1: Tusitā hi idhāgantvāti tusitabhavanato idha manussaloke āgantvā yo devaputto me mama bhikkhaṃ upānayi adāsi,
atk-s0510a:2074_2: taṃ devaputtaṃ kittayissāmi kathessāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0510a:2074_3: Bhāsato bhāsantassa mama vacanaṃ suṇāthāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2075_2: Agārāti attano uppannabrāhmaṇagehato nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā cha saṃvaccharāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontena bodhisattena saha vasissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2076_1: Tato sattamake vasseti tato pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sattame saṃvacchare.
atk-s0510a:2076_2: Buddho saccaṃ kathessatīti chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ katvā sattamasaṃvacchare buddho hutvā bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2076_5: Koṇḍañño nāma nāmenāti nāmena gottanāmavasena koṇḍañño nāma.
atk-s0510a:2076_6: Paṭhamaṃ sacchikāhitīti pañcavaggiyānamantare paṭhamaṃ ādito eva sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ sacchikāhiti paccakkhaṃ karissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2077_1: Nikkhantenānupabbajinti nikkhantena bodhisattena saha nikkhamitvā anupabbajinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2077_2: Tathā anupabbajitvā mayā padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ sukataṃ suṭṭhu kataṃ daḷhaṃ katvā katanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2077_3: Kilese jhāpanatthāyāti kilese sosanatthāya viddhaṃsanatthāya anagāriyaṃ agārassa ahitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammavirahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2078_2: ñeyyaṃ vā jānanto devehi saha vattamāne satta loke buddho migāraññaṃ migadāya vihāraṃ abhigantvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:2078_3: me mayā sacchikatena iminā sotāpattimaggañāṇena amatabheriṃ amatamahānibbānabheriṃ ahari pahari dassesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2079_1: So dānīti so ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ sotāpanno idāni arahattamaggañāṇena amataṃ santaṃ vūpasantasabhāvaṃ padaṃ pajjitabbaṃ pāpuṇitabbaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2079_2: anuttaraṃ uttaravirahitaṃ nibbānaṃ patto adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2079_3: Sabbāsave pariññāyāti kāmāsavādayo sabbe āsave pariññāya pahānapariññāya pajahitvā anāsavo nikkileso viharāmi iriyāpathavihārena vāsaṃ kappemi.
atk-s0510a:2080_0: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammabhāvaṃ dīpento “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2080_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2080_3: So dvīhi aggasāvakehi attani kariyamānaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ,
atk-s0510a:2080_5: vivekābhiratiyā viharitukāmo ca attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇampi
atk-s0510a:2080_6: papañcaṃ maññamāno satthāraṃ āpucchitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā chaddantehi nāgehi upaṭṭhiyamāno chaddantadahatīre
atk-s0510a:2080_8: Evaṃ tattha vasantaṃ theraṃ ekadivasaṃ sakko devarājā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ṭhito evamāha “sādhu me, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2080_10: Thero tassa catusaccagabbhaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ amatogadhaṃ buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0510a:2080_11: Taṃ sutvā sakko attano pasādaṃ pavedento –
atk-s0510a:2083_1: Thero chaddantadahatīre dvādasa vassāni vasitvā upakaṭṭhe parinibbāne satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā tattheva gantvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0510a:2086_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2086_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2086_2: bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pabbatapāde guhāyaṃ vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:2086_3: Bhagavā tassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ gocarāya pakkantakāle tassa sayanaguhaṃ pavisitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2086_4: Sīho gocaraṃ gahetvā nivatto guhadvāre ṭhatvā bhagavantaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho jalajathalajapupphehi pūjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2086_5: katvā cittaṃ pasādento bhagavato ārakkhaṇatthāya aññe vāḷamige apanetuṃ tīsu velāsu sīhanādaṃ nadanto
atk-s0510a:2086_9: Bhagavā “sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā vaṭṭissati imassa ettako upanissayo”ti tassa passantasseva ākāsaṃ pakkhanditvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0510a:2087_0: Sīho buddhaviyogadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ katvā haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:2087_1: vayappatto nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0510a:2087_2: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:2087_3: bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṃ rañño udenassa purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2087_5: So vayappato tayo vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante vācento mahagghasabhāvena ananurūpācārattā
atk-s0510a:2087_6: tehi pariccatto rājagahaṃ gantvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṃ disvā sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2087_8: Satthārā upāyena mattaññutāya patiṭṭhāpento vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2087_9: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā bhagavato sammukhā “yaṃ sāvakehi pattabbaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2087_11: bhikkhusaṅghe ca “yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi,
atk-s0510a:2087_16: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīhanādikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2088_1: Evaṃ etadaggaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā pubbe katapuññasambhāraṃ saritvā somanassavasena attano puññakammāpadānaṃ vibhāvento padumuttarotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2088_4: Cittakūṭe vasī tadāti yadā ahaṃ sīho migarājā hutvā himavantapabbatasamīpe vasāmi,
atk-s0510a:2088_5: tadā padumuttaro nāma satthā anekehi ca osadhehi,
atk-s0510a:2088_6: anekehi ca ratanehi cittavicittatāya cittakūṭe cittapabbatasikhare vasīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2089_1: Abhītarūpo tatthāsinti abhītasabhāvo nibbhayasabhāvo migarājā tattha āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2089_2: Catukkamoti catūhi disāhi kamo gantuṃ samattho.
atk-s0510a:2089_3: Yassa saddaṃ suṇitvānāti yassa migarañño sīhanādaṃ sutvā bahujjanā bahusattā vikkhambhanti visesena khambhanti bhāyanti.
atk-s0510a:2090_1: Suphullaṃ padumaṃ gayhāti bhagavati pasādena supupphitapadumapupphaṃ ḍaṃsitvā.
atk-s0510a:2090_2: Narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ āsabhaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ sambuddhaṃ upagacchiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2090_4: Vuṭṭhitassa samādhimhāti nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitassa buddhassa taṃ pupphaṃ abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2091_1: Catuddisaṃ namassitvāti catūsu disāsu namassitvā sakaṃ cittaṃ attano cittaṃ pasādetvā ādarena patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:2092_0: 617. Tato buddhena dinnabyākaraṇaṃ pakāsento padumuttarotiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0510a:2093_2: mayaṃ buddhā”ti vadantānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ seṭṭho uttamo buddho āgatoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2093_3: Tassa āgatassa bhagavato taṃ dhammaṃ sossāma suṇissāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2094_1: Tesaṃ hāsaparetānanti hāsehi somanassehi paretānaṃ abhibhūtānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ tesaṃ devamanussānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2094_2: Lokanāyakoti lokassa nāyako saggamokkhasampāpako mama saddaṃ mayhaṃ sīhanādaṃ pakittesi pakāsesi kathesi,
atk-s0510a:2094_3: dīghadassī anāgatakāladassī mahāmuni munīnamantare mahanto muni.
atk-s0510a:2095_1: Nāmena padumo nāma cakkavattī hutvā catusaṭṭhiyā jātiyā issariyaṃ issarabhāvaṃ rajjaṃ kārayissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2096_0: 623. Kappasatasahassamhīti sāmyatthe bhummavacanaṃ, kappasatasahassānaṃ pariyosāneti attho.
atk-s0510a:2097_1: Pakāsite pāvacaneti tena gotamena bhagavatā piṭakattaye pakāsite desiteti attho.
atk-s0510a:2097_2: Brahmabandhu bhavissatīti tadā gotamassa bhagavato kāle ayaṃ sīho migarājā brāhmaṇakule nibbattissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2097_3: Brahmaññā abhinikkhammāti brāhmaṇakulato nikkhamitvā tassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2098_4: Sabbāsave sakalāsave pariññāya pahāya anāsavo nikkileso nibbāyissati khandhaparinibbānena nibbuto bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2099_2: Vāḷamigasamākuleti kāḷasīhādīhi caṇḍamigasaṅgehi ākule saṃkiṇṇeti attho.
atk-s0510a:2102_0: Gaṅgā bhāgīrathī nāmātiādikaṃ āyasmato khadiravaniyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2102_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2102_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare titthanāvikakule nibbattitvā mahāgaṅgāya payāgatitthe titthanāvāya kammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2102_3: karonto ekadivasaṃ sasāvakasaṅghaṃ bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ upagataṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ
atk-s0510a:2102_4: yojetvā mahantena pūjāsakkārena paratīraṃ pāpetvā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ satthārā āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:2102_5: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādānaṃ pavattetvā
atk-s0510a:2103_0: So tato paṭṭhāya puññāni upacinanto devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2103_1: magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme rūpasāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2103_2: Taṃ vayappattaṃ mātāpitaro gharabandhanena bandhitukāmā hutvā tassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2103_3: So sāriputtattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā ayyo upatisso imaṃ vibhavaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajito,
atk-s0510a:2103_4: tena vantaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ kathāhaṃ anubhavissāmī”ti jātasaṃvego pāsaṃ anupagacchamānamigo viya ñātake vañcetvā
atk-s0510a:2103_5: hetusampattiyā codiyamāno bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā dhammasenāpatino kaniṭṭhabhāvaṃ nivedetvā attano
atk-s0510a:2103_7: Bhikkhū taṃ pabbājetvā paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ upasampādetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2103_8: So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā khadiravanaṃ pavisitvā vissamanto ghaṭento vāyamanto ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2103_9: So arahā hutvā satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca vandituṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya nikkhamitvā
atk-s0510a:2103_10: anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ dhammasenāpatiñca vanditvā katipāhaṃ jetavane vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:2103_11: Atha naṃ satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi –
atk-s0510a:2103_14: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āraññakānaṃ yadidaṃ revato”ti.
atk-s0510a:2104_1: Evaṃ etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pītisomanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento gaṅgā bhāgīrathītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2104_2: Tattha gaṅgāti gāyamānā ghosaṃ kurumānā gacchatīti gaṅgā.
atk-s0510a:2104_5: Anotattadahaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne āvaṭṭagaṅgāti ca pabbatamatthakena gataṭṭhāne bahalagaṅgāti
atk-s0510a:2104_6: ca tiracchānapabbataṃ vijjhitvā gataṭṭhāne umaṅgagaṅgāti ca tato bahalapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcayojanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2104_7: ākāsena gataṭṭhāne ākāsagaṅgāti ca tassā patitaṭṭhānaṃ bhinditvā jātaṃ pañca yojanaṃ pokkharaṇīkūlaṃ
atk-s0510a:2104_8: bhinditvā tattha pana pañcaṅguli viya pañca dhārā hutvā gaṅgā yamunā sarabhū mahī aciravatīti pañca nāmā
atk-s0510a:2104_9: hutvā jambudīpaṃ pañca bhāgaṃ pañca koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā pañca bhāge pañca koṭṭhāse itā gatā pavattāti bhāgīrathī.
atk-s0510a:2104_10: Gaṅgā ca sā bhāgīrathī ceti gaṅgābhāgīrathī.
atk-s0510a:2104_11: “Bhāgīrathī gaṅgā”ti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pubbacariyavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2104_12: Himavantā pabhāvitāti satte hiṃsati sītena hanati matheti āloḷetīti himo,
atk-s0510a:2104_14: tato himavantato paṭṭhāya pabhāvitā pavattā sandamānāti himavantapabhāvitā.
atk-s0510a:2104_15: Kutitthe nāviko āsinti tassā gaṅgāya caṇḍasotasamāpanne visamatitthe kevaṭṭakule uppanno nāviko āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2104_16: Orime ca tariṃ ahanti sampattasampattamanusse pārimā tīrā orimaṃ tīraṃ ahaṃ tariṃ tāresinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2105_1: Padumuttaro nāyakoti dvipadānaṃ uttamo satte nibbānaṃ nāyako pāpanako padumuttarabuddho mama puññasampattiṃ nipphādento.
atk-s0510a:2105_2: Vasīsatasahassehi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi gaṅgāsotaṃ tarituṃ titthaṃ pattoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2106_1: Bahū nāvā samānetvāti sampattaṃ taṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā vaḍḍhakīhi suṭṭhu saṅkhataṃ kataṃ nipphāditaṃ
atk-s0510a:2106_2: bahū nāvāyo samānetvā dve dve nāvāyo ekato katvā tassā nāvāya upari maṇḍapachadanaṃ katvā narāsabhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2107_1: Āgantvāna ca sambuddhoti evaṃ saṅghaṭitāya nāvāya tattha āgantvāna tañca nāvakaṃ nāvamuttamaṃ āruhīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2107_2: Vārimajjhe ṭhito satthāti nāvamārūḷho satthā gaṅgājalamajjhe ṭhito samāno imā somanassapaṭisaṃyuttagāthā abhāsatha kathesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2108_1: Yo so tāresi sambuddhanti yo so nāviko gaṅgāsotāya sambuddhaṃ atāresi.
atk-s0510a:2108_2: Saṅghañcāpi anāsavanti na kevalameva sambuddhaṃ tāresi,
atk-s0510a:2108_4: Tena cittapasādenāti tena nāvāpājanakāle uppannena somanassasahagatacittapasādena devaloke chasu kāmasaggesu
atk-s0510a:2109_1: Nibbattissati te byamhanti devaloke uppannassa te tuyhaṃ byamhaṃ vimānaṃ sukataṃ suṭṭhu nibbattaṃ nāvasaṇṭhitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2109_3: Ākāse pupphachadananti nāvāya uparimaṇḍapakatakammassa nissandena sabbadā gatagataṭṭhāne ākāse pupphachadanaṃ dhārayissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2110_1: Aṭṭhapaññāsakappamhīti ito puññakaraṇakālato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhapaṇṇāsakappaṃ atikkamitvā nāmena tārako nāma
atk-s0510a:2110_2: cakkavattī khattiyo cāturanto catūsu dīpesu issaro vijitāvī jitavanto bhavissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2111_1: Revato nāma nāmenāti revatīnakkhattena jātattā “revato”ti laddhanāmo brahmabandhu brāhmaṇaputtabhūto bhavissati brāhmaṇakule uppajjissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2113_1: Vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayhanti evaṃ padumuttarena bhagavatā byākato ahaṃ kamena pāramitākoṭiṃ patvā me mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2113_2: vīriyaṃ asithilavīriyaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ dhuravāhaṃ dhurādhāraṃ yogehi khemassa nibbhayassa nibbānassa
atk-s0510a:2113_4: Dhāremi antimaṃ dehanti idānāhaṃ sammāsambuddhasāsane pariyosānasarīraṃ dhāremīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2114_0: So aparabhāge attano jātagāmaṃ gantvā “cālā, upacālā,
atk-s0510a:2114_2: sīsūpacālā”ti tayo bhāgineyye ānetvā pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojesi.
atk-s0510a:2115_0: Tasmiñca samaye therassa kocideva ābādho uppanno,
atk-s0510a:2115_3: Revatatthero dhammasenāpatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā tesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ satuppādavasena ovadiyamāno cāletigāthaṃ abhāsittha.
atk-s0510a:2115_4: Tattha cāle upacāle sīsūpacāleti tesaṃ ālapanaṃ. Cālā, upacālā,
atk-s0510a:2115_5: sīsūpacālāti hi itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmā tayo dārakā pabbajitāpi tathā vohariyyanti. “Cālī, upacālī,
atk-s0510a:2115_8: taṃ dassento “patissatā nu kho viharathā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ āha –
atk-s0510a:2115_16: tikkhajavananibbedhikapaññatāya vālavedhirūpo satthukappo tumhākaṃ mātulatthero āgato,
atk-s0510a:2115_17: tasmā samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā satisampajaññayuttā eva hutvā viharatha,
atk-s0510a:2116_0: Taṃ sutvā te sāmaṇerā dhammasenāpatissa paccuggamanādivattaṃ katvā ubhinnaṃ mātulattherānaṃ paṭisanthāravelāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2116_2: Dhammasenāpati revatattherena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā te sāmaṇere upasaṅkami.
atk-s0510a:2116_3: Te tathā kālaparicchedassa katattā there upasaṅkamante uṭṭhahitvā vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero –
atk-s0510a:2116_4: “katarakataravihārena viharathā”ti pucchitvā tehi “imāya imāyā”ti vutte dārakepi evaṃ vinento –
atk-s0510a:2116_5: “mayhaṃ bhātiko saccavādī vata dhammassa anudhammacāri”nti theraṃ pasaṃsanto pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2119_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2119_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare satthu vemātikabhātā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2119_5: So attano puttassa sumanakumārassa vayappattassa haṃsavatīnagarato vīsayojanasate ṭhāne bhoganagaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2119_6: So kadāci kadāci āgantvā satthārañca pitarañca passati.
atk-s0510a:2119_7: Tadā rājā satthārañca satasahassaparimāṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca sayameva sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi,
atk-s0510a:2120_1: Kumāro tassa kupitabhāvaṃ rañño anārocetvā sayameva taṃ vūpasamesi.
atk-s0510a:2120_2: Taṃ sutvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso “varaṃ te tāva dammi,
atk-s0510a:2120_4: Kumāro “satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca temāsaṃ upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ avañjhaṃ kātuṃ icchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:2120_13: Tena ca samayena bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0510a:2120_21: Atha thero tassa passantasseva pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “rājaputto, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2120_24: Thero punapi buddhāsanaṃ gahetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ nimujjitvā tassa passantassa bahipariveṇe pātubhavitvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe āsanaṃ paññāpesi.
atk-s0510a:2120_25: Kumāro taṃ disvā “mahanto vatāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0510a:2121_1: Rājaputto satthāraṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2121_2: thero tumhākaṃ sāsane vallabho maññe”ti? “Āma, kumāra,
atk-s0510a:2121_7: ahampi ayaṃ thero viya anāgate buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo”ti so buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa sattāhaṃ khandhāvāre bhattaṃ datvā sattame divase, “bhante,
atk-s0510a:2121_8: mayā pitu santikā tumhākaṃ temāsaṃ paṭijagganavaro laddho,
atk-s0510a:2121_9: temāsaṃ me vassāvāsaṃ adhivāsethā”ti vatvā satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā saparivāraṃ bhagavantaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2121_10: yojane yojane satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vasanānucchavike vihāre kāretvā tattha tattha vasāpento attano
atk-s0510a:2121_11: vasanaṭṭhānasamīpe satasahassena kīte sobhananāmake uyyāne satasahassena kāritaṃ vihāraṃ pavesāpetvā –
atk-s0510a:2124_1: So vassūpanāyikadivase satthu mahādānaṃ pavattetvā “iminā nīhārena dānaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti puttadāre amacce
atk-s0510a:2124_2: ca dāne kiccakaraṇe ca niyojetvā sayaṃ sumanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānasamīpeyeva vasanto evaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:2124_4: Upakaṭṭhāya pana pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:2124_6: yadetaṃ mayā khandhāvārato paṭṭhāya puññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0510a:2124_8: atha kho ahampi sumanatthero viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko vallabho bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2124_9: Satthā tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2125_0: So tasmiṃ buddhuppāde vassasatasahassaṃ puññāni katvā tato parampi tattha tattha bhave uḷārāni puññakammāni
atk-s0510a:2125_1: upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā ekassa therassa
atk-s0510a:2125_2: piṇḍāya carato pattaggahaṇatthaṃ uttarasāṭakaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2125_3: Puna sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā aṭṭha paccekabuddhe disvā te bhojetvā attano maṅgaluyyāne
atk-s0510a:2125_4: aṭṭha paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā tesaṃ nisīdanatthāya aṭṭha sabbaratanamayapīṭhe ceva maṇiādhārake ca paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0510a:2126_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure
atk-s0510a:2126_1: nibbattitvā tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbattitvā sabbe ñātake ānandite karonto jātoti ānandotveva
atk-s0510a:2126_3: So anukkamena vayappatto katābhinikkhamane sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke paṭhamaṃ kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0510a:2126_4: gantvā tato nikkhamante bhagavati tassa parivāratthaṃ pabbajituṃ nikkhamantehi bhaddiyādīhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0510a:2126_5: bhagavato santike pabbajitvā āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa santike dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0510a:2127_0: Tena ca samayena bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhā upaṭṭhākā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2127_9: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno bhikkhū āmantesi – “ahaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2127_11: idāni mahallako ekacce bhikkhū ‘iminā maggena gacchāmī’ti vutte aññena maggena gacchanti,
atk-s0510a:2127_15: Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2127_18: Etenupāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe mahāsāvakā “ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi,
atk-s0510a:2127_19: ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti uṭṭhahiṃsu ṭhapetvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2128_14: bhagavā attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ na dassati,
atk-s0510a:2128_19: “Ettake guṇe labhato satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ ko bhāro”ti upavādamocanatthaṃ ime cattāro paṭikkhepā, “sace, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2128_21: sacāhaṃ desantarato āgatāgate tāvadeva dassetuṃ labhāmi,
atk-s0510a:2128_24: sace bhagavā parammukhā desitaṃ dhammaṃ puna mayhaṃ byākarissasi,
atk-s0510a:2128_26: “Ettakampi satthu santike anuggahaṃ na labhatī”ti upavādamocanatthañceva dhammabhaṇḍāgārikabhāvaparipūraṇatthañca
atk-s0510a:2128_27: imā catasso yācanāti ime aṭṭha vare gahetvā nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2128_28: Tasseva ṭhānantarassa atthāya kappasatasahassaṃ pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2129_0: So upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasabalaṃ duvidhena udakena tividhena dantakaṭṭhena hatthapādaparikammena
atk-s0510a:2129_2: “imāya nāma velāya satthu idaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0510a:2129_3: idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti divasabhāgaṃ santikāvacaro hutvā rattibhāge mahantaṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2129_4: gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ navavāre anupariyāyati satthari pakkosante paṭivacanadānāya,
atk-s0510a:2129_6: Atha naṃ satthā jetavane ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno anekapariyāyena pasaṃsitvā bahussutānaṃ satimantānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2129_7: gatimantānaṃ dhitimantānaṃ upaṭṭhākānañca bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2130_0: Evaṃ satthārā pañcasu ṭhānesu etadagge ṭhapito catūhi acchariyabbhūtadhammehi samannāgato satthu dhammakosārakkho
atk-s0510a:2130_1: ayaṃ mahāthero sekhova samāno satthari parinibbute heṭṭhā vuttanayena bhikkhūhi samuttejito devatāya
atk-s0510a:2130_2: ca saṃvejito “sveyeva ca dāni dhammasaṅgīti kātabbā,
atk-s0510a:2130_4: yvāyaṃ sekho sakaraṇīyo asekhehi therehi saddhiṃ dhammaṃ gāyituṃ sannipātaṃ gantu”nti sañjātussāho vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2130_5: paṭṭhapetvā bahudeva rattiṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto caṅkame vīriyasamataṃ alabhitvā tato vihāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0510a:2130_9: ekasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci,
atk-s0510a:2131_1: Evaṃ chaḷabhiññādiguṇapaṭimaṇḍito upaṭṭhākādiguṇehi etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā
atk-s0510a:2131_3: Tattha ārāmadvārāti sabbasattānaṃ dhammadesanatthāya vihāradvārato nikkhamitvā bahidvārasamīpe katamaṇḍapamajjhe
atk-s0510a:2131_4: supaññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno padumuttaro nāma mahāmuni sammāsambuddho.
atk-s0510a:2131_5: Vassanto amataṃ vuṭṭhinti dhammadesanāmahāamatadhārāhi dhammavassaṃ vassanto.
atk-s0510a:2131_6: Nibbāpesi mahājananti mahājanassa cittasantānagatakilesaggiṃ nibbāpesi vūpasamesi,
atk-s0510a:2131_7: mahājanaṃ nibbānāmatapānena santiṃ sītibhāvaṃ pāpesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2132_1: Satasahassaṃ te dhīrāti parivārasampattiṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0510a:2132_2: Chahi abhiññāhi iddhividhādiñāṇakoṭṭhāsehi samannāgatā anekasatasahassacakkavāḷesu khaṇena gantuṃ samatthāhi
atk-s0510a:2132_3: iddhīhi samannāgatattā mahiddhikāte dhīrā satasahassakhīṇāsavā chāyāva anapāyinīti katthaci anapagatā
atk-s0510a:2132_4: chāyā iva taṃ sambuddhaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ parivārenti parivāretvā dhammaṃ suṇantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2133_1: Hatthikkhandhagato āsinti tadā bhagavato dhammadesanāsamaye ahaṃ hatthipiṭṭhe nisinno āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2133_2: Setacchattaṃ varuttamanti patthetabbaṃ uttamaṃ setacchattaṃ mama matthake dhārayanto hatthipiṭṭhe nisinnoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2133_3: Sucārurūpaṃ disvānāti sundaraṃ cāruṃ manohararūpavantaṃ dhammaṃ desiyamānaṃ sambuddhaṃ disvā me mayhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2133_4: vitti santuṭṭhi somanassaṃ udapajjatha uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2134_1: Oruyha hatthikkhandhamhāti taṃ bhagavantaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā hatthipiṭṭhito oruyha orohitvā narāsabhaṃ naravasabhaṃ upagacchiṃ samīpaṃ gatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2134_2: Ratanamayachattaṃ meti ratanabhūsitaṃ me mayhaṃ chattaṃ buddhaseṭṭhassa matthake dhārayinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2135_1: Mama saṅkappamaññāyāti mayhaṃ pasādena uppannaṃ saṅkappaṃ ñatvā isīnaṃ antare mahantabhūto so padumuttaro bhagavā.
atk-s0510a:2135_2: Taṃ kathaṃ ṭhapayitvānāti taṃ attanā desiyamānaṃ dhammakathaṃ ṭhapetvā mama byākaraṇatthāya imā gāthā abhāsatha kathesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2136_3: Soṇṇālaṅkārabhūsitaṃ chattaṃ yo so rājakumāro me matthake dhāresīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2136_4: Tamahaṃ kittayissāmīti taṃ rājakumāraṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0510a:2136_5: Suṇotha mama bhāsatoti bhāsantassa mama vacanaṃ suṇotha ohitasotā manasi karothāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2137_1: Ito gantvā ayaṃ posoti ayaṃ rājakumāro ito manussalokato cuto tusitaṃ gantvā āvasissati tattha viharissati.
atk-s0510a:2137_2: Tattha accharāhi purakkhato parivārito tusitabhavanasampattiṃ anubhossatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2138_1: Catuttiṃsakkhattunti tusitabhavanato cavitvā tāvatiṃsabhavane uppanno catuttiṃsavāre devindo devarajjaṃ karissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2138_2: Balādhipo aṭṭhasatanti tāvatiṃsabhavanato cuto manussaloke uppanno balādhipo caturaṅginiyā senāya adhipo
atk-s0510a:2138_3: padhāno aṭṭhasatajātīsu padesarājā hutvā vasudhaṃ anekaratanavaraṃ pathaviṃ āvasissati puthabyaṃ viharissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2139_1: Aṭṭhapaññāsakkhattunti aṭṭhapaññāsajātīsu cakkavattī rājā bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2139_2: Mahiyā sakalajambudīpapathaviyā vipulaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ padesarajjaṃ kārayissati.
atk-s0510a:2140_0: 654. Sakyānaṃ kulaketussāti sakyarājūnaṃ kulassa dhajabhūtassa buddhassa ñātako bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2141_4: Nivātavutti anavaññattiko athaddho kāyapāgabbiyādithaddhabhāvavirahito sabbapāṭhī sakalapiṭakattayadhārī bhavissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2142_1: Padhānapahitatto soti so ānandatthero vīriyakaraṇāya pesitacitto.
atk-s0510a:2143_1: Santi āraññakāti araññe bhavā mahāvane jātā.
atk-s0510a:2143_3: Tidhā pabhinnāti akkhikaṇṇakosasaṅkhātehi tīhi ṭhānehi bhinnamadā.
atk-s0510a:2143_7: Kuñjarasaṅkhātā nāgā hatthirājāno santi saṃvijjanti yathā,
atk-s0510a:2143_8: tathā satasahassasaṅkhyā khīṇāsavasaṅkhātā paṇḍitā mahiddhikā arahantanāgā santi,
atk-s0510a:2143_10: Na honti paṇidhimhi teti te paṇidhimhi tādisā na honti,
atk-s0510a:2143_11: kiṃ sabbe te bhayabhītā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asamatthāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2154_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0510a:2154_3: dharamāne bhagavati devaloke vasitvā nibbute bhagavati uppannattā viññutaṃ patto bhagavato sārīrikacetiyaṃ disvā “aho me alābhā,
atk-s0510a:2154_4: bhagavato dharamāne kāle asampatto”ti cintetvā cetiye cittaṃ pasādetvā somanassajāto sabbaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0510a:2154_5: devatānimmitasadisaṃ dhammāsane sīhāsanaṃ kāretvā jīvamānakabuddhassa viya pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2154_8: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ dīpadhūpapupphagandhādīhi anekavidhaṃ pūjaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto cha kāmasagge
atk-s0510a:2154_9: aparāparaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā manussesu cakkavattisampattiṃ anekakkhattuṃ anubhavitvā saṅkhyātikkantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2154_10: padesarajjasampattiñca anubhavitvā kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ katvā etthantare
atk-s0510a:2154_11: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:2154_12: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento
atk-s0510a:2155_1: Evaṃ pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassaṃ uppādetvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2155_5: Vitthārite pāvacaneti pāvacane piṭakattaye vitthārite patthaṭe pākaṭeti attho.
atk-s0510a:2155_6: Bāhujaññamhi sāsaneti sikkhattayasaṅgahite buddhasāsane anekasatasahassakoṭikhīṇāsavasaṅkhātehi bahujanehi ñāte adhigateti attho.
atk-s0510a:2156_1: Pasannacitto sumanoti tadā ahaṃ buddhassa dharamānakāle asampatto nibbute tasmiṃ devalokā cavitvā manussalokaṃ
atk-s0510a:2156_2: upapanno tassa bhagavato sārīrikadhātucetiyaṃ disvā pasannacitto saddhāsampayuttamano sundaramano “aho
atk-s0510a:2156_3: mamāgamanaṃ svāgamana”nti sañjātapasādabahumāno “mayā nibbānādhigamāya ekaṃ puññaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0510a:2156_4: bhagavato cetiyasamīpe bhagavantaṃ uddissa hiraññasuvaṇṇaratanādīhi alaṅkaritvāva sīhāsanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2156_10: Tena cittappasādenāti dharamānassa viya bhagavato sīhāsanaṃ mayā kataṃ,
atk-s0510a:2157_1: Āyāmena catubbīsāti tatrupapannassa devabhūtassa sato mayhaṃ sukataṃ puññena nibbattitaṃ pātubhūtaṃ āyāmena
atk-s0510a:2157_2: uccato catubbīsayojanaṃ vitthārena tiriyato catuddasayojanaṃ tāvadeva nibbattikkhaṇeyeva āsi ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2158_1: Catunnavute ito kappeti ito kappato catunavute kappe yaṃ kammaṃ akariṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2158_2: tadā tato paṭṭhāya puññabalena kañci duggatiṃ nābhijānāmi,
atk-s0510a:2159_2: Indanāmā tayo janāti indanāmakā tayo cakkavattirājāno ekasmiṃ kappe tīsu jātīsu indo nāma cakkavattī rājā ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2159_4: Sumananāmakā tayo janā tikkhattuṃ cakkavattirājāno ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2160_1: Samasattatito kappeti ito kappato anūnādhike sattatime kappe varuṇanāmakā varuṇo cakkavattīti evaṃnāmakā
atk-s0510a:2160_2: tayo cakkavattirājāno cakkaratanasampannā catudīpamhi issarā ahesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:2163_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2163_2: bhagavato kāle vanakammiko hutvā ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2163_3: Tasmiṃ samaye sabbe saddhā pasannā upāsakā ekacchandā “bhagavato upaṭṭhānasālaṃ karomā”ti dabbasambhāratthāya
atk-s0510a:2163_4: vanaṃ pavisitvā taṃ upāsakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ ekaṃ thambhaṃ dethā”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2163_5: So taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “tumhe mā cintayitthā”ti te sabbe uyyojetvā ekaṃ sāramayaṃ thambhaṃ gahetvā satthu dassetvā tesaṃyeva adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2163_6: So teneva somanassajāto tadeva mūlaṃ katvā aññāni dānādīni puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2163_7: aparāparaṃ chasu kāmāvacaresu dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca aggacakkavattisampattiṃ anekavāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2163_8: anubhavitvā asaṅkhyeyyaṃ padesarajjasampattiñca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde saddhāsampanne ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2163_9: kule nibbatto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0510a:2163_10: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā manasikaronto nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2164_1: So evaṃ pattaarahatto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhatthassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2164_4: Saraṇaṃ gatā ca te buddhanti “buddhaṃ saraṇa”nti gatā bhajiṃsu jāniṃsu vā te upāsakā.
atk-s0510a:2164_5: Tathāgataṃ saddahanti buddhaguṇaṃ attano cittasantāne ṭhapentīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2165_1: Sabbe saṅgamma mantetvāti sabbe samāgamma sannipatitvā mantetvā aññamaññaṃ saññāpetvā ekacchandā hutvā
atk-s0510a:2165_2: māḷaṃ upaṭṭhānasālaṃ satthuno atthāya kubbanti karontīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2165_3: Dabbasambhāresu ekatthambhaṃ alabhantā brahāvane mahāvane vicinantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2166_1: Tehaṃ araññe disvānāti ahaṃ te upāsake araññe disvāna gaṇaṃ samūhaṃ upagamma samīpaṃ gantvā añjaliṃ paggahetvāna
atk-s0510a:2166_2: dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi katvā ahaṃ gaṇaṃ upāsakasamūhaṃ “tumhe imaṃ vanaṃ kimatthaṃ āgatatthā”ti
atk-s0510a:2167_1: Te sīlavanto upāsakā me mayā puṭṭhā “māḷaṃ mayaṃ kattukāmā hutvā ekatthambho amhehi na labbhatī”ti viyākaṃsu visesena kathayiṃsūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2168_2: ahaṃ taṃ dassāmi satthuno santikaṃ ahaṃ thambhaṃ āharissāmi,
atk-s0510a:2168_3: te bhavanto thambhaharaṇe appossukkā ussāharahitā bhavantūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2169_1: Yaṃ yaṃ yonupapajjāmīti yaṃ yaṃ yoniṃ devattaṃ atha mānusaṃ upagacchāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2169_3: yasmiṃ yasmiṃ devaloke vā manussaloke vāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2172_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2172_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare ekasmiṃ kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavato santike dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0510a:2172_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento
atk-s0510a:2172_4: bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjāsakkārabahulaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2172_5: anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa evarūpo sāvako bhaveyya”nti paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2173_0: So tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu saṃsaranto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle dhammatāya nāma nadiyā mahanto
atk-s0510a:2173_1: kacchapo hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ nadiṃ tarituṃ tīre ṭhitaṃ disvā sayaṃ bhagavantaṃ tāretukāmo
atk-s0510a:2173_3: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0510a:2173_4: So haṭṭhatuṭṭho vegena sotaṃ chindanto sīghataraṃ paratīraṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0510a:2173_5: Bhagavā tassa anumodanaṃ vadanto bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ kathetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2174_0: So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ suddhodanamahārājassa
atk-s0510a:2174_2: tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase ñātisaṅghaṃ nandayanto jātoti “nando”tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2174_3: Tassa vayappattakāle bhagavā pavattitavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṃ karonto anukkamena kapilavatthuṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:2174_4: ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathetvā dutiyadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho
atk-s0510a:2174_5: “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā nivesanaṃ gantvā “dhammañcare
atk-s0510a:2174_6: sucarita”nti gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale rājānaṃ sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā tatiyadivase
atk-s0510a:2174_8: Satthā nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā maṅgalaṃ vatvā tassa hatthato pattaṃ aggahetvāva vihāraṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:2174_9: taṃ pattahatthaṃ vihāraṃ āgataṃ anicchamānaṃyeva pabbājetvā tathāpabbājitattāyeva anabhiratiyā pīḷitaṃ ñatvā upāyena tassa taṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodesi.
atk-s0510a:2174_10: So yoniso paṭisaṅkhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2174_11: Thero puna divase bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2174_12: bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2174_18: Athassa bhagavā savisesaṃ indriyesu guttadvārataṃ ñatvā taṃ guṇaṃ vibhāvento “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2174_20: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti indriyesu guttadvārabhāvena naṃ etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2174_21: Thero hi “indriyāsaṃvaraṃ nissāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto,
atk-s0510a:2174_22: tamahaṃ suṭṭhu niggaṇhissāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2175_1: Evaṃ so etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassappatto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2175_2: Vatthaṃ khomaṃ mayā dinnanti khomaraṭṭhe jātaṃ vatthaṃ bhagavati cittappasādena gāravabahumānena mayā paramasukhumaṃ khomavatthaṃ dinnanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2175_3: Sayambhussāti sayameva bhūtassa jātassa ariyāya jātiyā nibbattassa.
atk-s0510a:2175_5: tassa mahesino sayambhussa cīvaratthāya khomavatthaṃ mayā dinnanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2176_1: Taṃ me buddho viyākāsīti ettha tanti sāmyatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2176_2: tassa vatthadāyakassa me dānaphalaṃ visesena akāsi kathesi buddhoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2176_5: tassa jalamānānaṃ devabrahmānaṃ uttamanāyako padhānoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2176_6: Iminā vatthadānenāti iminā vatthadānassa nissandena tvaṃ anāgate hemavaṇṇo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhavissasi.
atk-s0510a:2177_1: Dve sampattiṃ anubhotvāti dibbamanussasaṅkhātā dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā.
atk-s0510a:2177_2: Kusalamūlehi coditoti kusalāvayavehi kusalakoṭṭhāsehi codito pesito,
atk-s0510a:2177_3: “tvaṃ iminā puññena satthu kulaṃ pasavāhī”ti pesito viyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2177_4: “Gotamassa bhagavato kaniṭṭho tvaṃ bhavissasī”ti byākāsīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2178_1: Rāgaratto sukhasīloti kilesakāmehi ratto allīno kāyasukhacittasukhānubhavanasabhāvo.
atk-s0510a:2178_2: Kāmesu gedhamāyutoti vatthukāmesu gedhasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya āyuto yojitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2178_5: tadā tasmā tvaṃ attano bhātukena gotamabuddhena codito pabbajjāya uyyojito tassa santike pabbajissasīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2179_1: Pabbajitvāna tvaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ gotamassa bhagavato sāsane tvaṃ pabbajitvā kusalamūlena mūlabhūtena
atk-s0510a:2179_2: puññasambhārena codito bhāvanāyaṃ niyojito sabbāsave sakalāsave pariññāya jānitvā pajahitvā anāmayo niddukkho
atk-s0510a:2180_1: Satakappasahassamhīti ito kappato pubbe satakappādhike sahassame kappamhi ceḷanāmakā cattāro cakkavattirājāno ahesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:2180_2: Saṭṭhi kappasahassānīti kappasahassāni saṭṭhi ca atikkamitvā heṭṭhā ekasmiṃ kappe cattāro janā upaceḷā
atk-s0510a:2180_3: nāma cakkavattirājāno catūsu jātīsu ahesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:2181_1: Pañcakappasahassamhīti pañcakappādhike sahassame kappamhi ceḷā nāma cattāro janā cakkavattirājāno sattahi
atk-s0510a:2184_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato cūḷapanthakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2184_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2184_5: mahāpanthakatthero arahattaṃ patvā phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmento cintesi –
atk-s0510a:2184_6: “kathaṃ nu kho sakkā cūḷapanthakampi imasmiṃ sukhe patiṭṭhāpetu”nti.
atk-s0510a:2184_7: So attano ayyakaṃ dhanaseṭṭhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “sace,
atk-s0510a:2184_14: So dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhito bhātu santike –
atk-s0510a:2185_0: “Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ;
atk-s0510a:2187_0: Gāthaṃ uggaṇhanto catūhi māsehi uggahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0510a:2187_5: catūhi māsehi ekaṃ gāthampi gahetuṃ na sakkosi,
atk-s0510a:2187_6: pabbajitakiccaṃ pana tvaṃ kathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessasi,
atk-s0510a:2187_7: nikkhama ito”ti so therena paṇāmiko dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpe rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2188_0: Tena ca samayena satthā jīvakambavane viharati.
atk-s0510a:2188_3: Tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāpanthako bhattuddesako hoti.
atk-s0510a:2188_4: So “pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭicchathā”ti vutto “cūḷapanthakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ paṭicchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:2188_5: Taṃ sutvā cūḷapanthako bhiyyosomattāya domanassappatto ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2188_6: Satthā tassa cittakkhedaṃ ñatvā “cūḷapanthako mayā katena upāyena bujjhissatī”ti tassa avidūraṭṭhāne attānaṃ dassetvā “kiṃ, panthaka,
atk-s0510a:2188_14: rajoharaṇa’nti manasi karohī”ti iddhiyā suddhaṃ coḷakkhaṇḍaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2188_21: imaṃ upādiṇṇakasarīraṃ nissāya kiliṭṭhaṃ aññathā jātaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2188_23: evaṃ cittampī”ti khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tasmiṃyeva nimitte jhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2189_0: Satthā ekūnehi pañcabhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ gantvā jīvakassa nivesane paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2189_1: Cūḷapanthako pana attano bhikkhāya appaṭicchitattā eva na gato.
atk-s0510a:2189_4: na gaṇhathā”ti vutte “vihāre eko bhikkhu atthi,
atk-s0510a:2189_8: Cūḷapanthakattheropi rūpena kiriyāya ca ekampi ekena asadisaṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ nimminitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2189_9: So puriso vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bahubhāvaṃ disvā gantvā jīvakassa kathesi –
atk-s0510a:2189_21: So punāgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ jīvakassa ārocesi jīvako paṭividdhasaccattā “iddhimā maññe,
atk-s0510a:2189_23: paṭhamaṃ kathentaṃ ayyameva ‘tumhe satthā pakkosatī’ti vatvā cīvarakaṇṇe gaṇhāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:2190_0: Satthā tasmiṃ khaṇe yāguñca khajjakādibhedañca paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:2190_1: Katabhattakicco bhagavā āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ āṇāpesi “anumodanaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0510a:2190_2: So pabhinnapaṭisambhido sineruṃ gahetvā mahāsamuddaṃ manthento viya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṅkhobhento satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhanto anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2190_3: Dasabale bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gate dhammasabhāyaṃ kathā udapādi ‘aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo,
atk-s0510a:2190_4: yatra hi nāma cattāro māse ekagāthaṃ gahetuṃ asakkontampi lahukena khaṇeneva evaṃ mahiddhikaṃ akaṃsū’ti,
atk-s0510a:2190_5: tathā hi jīvakassa nivesane nisinno bhagavā ‘evaṃ cūḷapanthakassa cittaṃ samāhitaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2190_6: vīthipaṭipannā vipassanā’ti ñatvā yathānisinnoyeva attānaṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0510a:2190_9: ito pana aññopi ariyassa vinaye saṃkileso rajo’ti dassento –
atk-s0510a:2191_0: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0510a:2192_0: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitvā bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane.
atk-s0510a:2195_2: Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā āgantvā buddhāsane nisīditvā “kiṃ vadetha,
atk-s0510a:2195_5: cūḷapanthakena idāni mayhaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā lokuttharadāyajjaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2195_6: pubbe pana lokiyadāyajjaṃ laddha”nti vatvā tehi yācito cūḷaseṭṭhijātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:2195_7: Aparabhāge naṃ satthā ariyagaṇaparivuto dhammāsane nisinno manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetovivaṭṭakusalānañca aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2196_1: Evaṃ so pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pītisomanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2196_3: Gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho soti so padumuttaro nāma satthā gaṇamhā mahatā bhikkhusamūhato vūpakaṭṭho visuṃ bhūto vivekaṃ upagato.
atk-s0510a:2196_4: Tadā mama tāpasakāle himavante himālayapabbatasamīpe vasi vāsaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0510a:2197_2: tadāti yadā so bhagavā himavantaṃ upagantvā vasi,
atk-s0510a:2197_3: tadā ahampi himavantasamīpe kataassame ā samantato kāyacittapīḷāsaṅkhātā parissayā samanti etthāti assamoti laddhanāme araññāvāse vasāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2197_4: Acirāgataṃ mahāvīranti aciraṃ āgataṃ mahāvīriyavantaṃ lokanāyakaṃ padhānaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ upesinti sambandho,
atk-s0510a:2198_1: Pupphacchattaṃ gahetvānāti evaṃ upagacchanto ca padumuppalapupphādīhi chāditaṃ pupphamayaṃ chattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2198_2: narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ bhagavantaṃ chādento upagacchiṃ samīpaṃ gatosmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2198_3: Samādhiṃ samāpajjantanti rūpāvacarasamādhijjhānaṃ samāpajjantaṃ appetvā nisinnassa antarāyaṃ ahaṃ akāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2199_1: Ubho hatthehi paggayhāti taṃ susajjitaṃ pupphacchattaṃ dvīhi hatthehi ukkhipitvā ahaṃ bhagavato adāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2199_2: Paṭiggahesīti taṃ mayā dinnaṃ pupphacchattaṃ padumuttaro bhagavā sampaṭicchi,
atk-s0510a:2200_1: Satapattachattaṃ paggayhāti ekekasmiṃ padumapupphe satasatapattānaṃ vasena satapattehi padumapupphehi
atk-s0510a:2200_2: chāditaṃ pupphacchattaṃ pakārena ādarena gahetvā tāpaso mama adāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2200_3: Tamahaṃ kittayissāmīti taṃ tāpasaṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2200_4: Mama bhāsato bhāsamānassa vacanaṃ suṇotha manasi karotha.
atk-s0510a:2201_1: Pañcavīsatikappānīti iminā pupphacchattadānena pañcavīsativāre tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko hutvā devarajjaṃ karissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2201_2: Catuttiṃsatikkhattuñcāti catuttiṃsativāre manussaloke cakkavattī rājā bhavissati.
atk-s0510a:2202_1: Yaṃ yaṃ yoninti manussayoniādīsu yaṃ yaṃ jātiṃ saṃsarati gacchati upapajjati.
atk-s0510a:2202_2: Tattha tattha yoniyaṃ abbhokāse suññaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhantaṃ nisinnaṃ ṭhitaṃ vā padumaṃ dhārayissati upari chādayissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2203_1: Pakāsite pāvacaneti tena bhagavato sakalapiṭakattaye pakāsite dīpite manussattaṃ manussajātiṃ labhissati upapajjissati.
atk-s0510a:2203_2: Manomayamhi kāyamhīti manena jhānacittena nibbattoti manomayo,
atk-s0510a:2203_4: tathā kāyaṃ pavatteti cittagatikaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2203_5: Tamhi manomaye kāyamhi so tāpaso cūḷapanthako nāma hutvā uttamo aggo bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2203_6: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttattā uttānattā ca suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:2204_1: Sariṃ kokanadaṃ ahanti ahaṃ bhagavato nimmitacoḷakaṃ parimajjanto kokanadaṃ padumaṃ sarinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2204_2: Tattha cittaṃ vimucci meti tasmiṃ kokanade padume mayhaṃ cittaṃ adhimucci allīno,
atk-s0510a:2205_1: Ahaṃ manomayesu cittagatikesu kāyesu sabbattha sabbesu pāramiṃ pariyosānaṃ gato pattoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2208_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2208_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto heṭṭhā vuttanayena satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0510a:2208_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā
atk-s0510a:2208_4: yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2208_5: Parinibbute bhagavati tassa thūpaṃ pūjetvā saṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattetvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:2208_6: ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā anuppanne buddhe cakkavattī rājā hutvā mahājanaṃ pañcasīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0510a:2208_8: So anuppanneyeva amhākaṃ bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:2208_12: Saṃsāre pana saṃvegabahulatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā cūḷagandhāraṃ nāma vijjaṃ sādhetvā tāya
atk-s0510a:2208_13: vijjāya ākāsacārī paracittavidū ca hutvā rājagahe lābhaggayasaggapatto paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:2209_0: Atha amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ upagato.
atk-s0510a:2209_1: Tato paṭṭhāya buddhānubhāvena tassa sā vijjā na sampajjati,
atk-s0510a:2209_4: “sutaṃ kho panetaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ ‘yattha mahāgandhāravijjā dharati,
atk-s0510a:2209_5: tattha cūḷagandhāravijjā na sampajjatī’ti samaṇassa pana gotamassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya nāyaṃ mama vijjā sampajjati,
atk-s0510a:2209_7: yaṃnūnāhaṃ taṃ payirupāsitvā tassa santike taṃ vijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:2209_14: Tassa bhagavā dhammaṃ kathetvā caritānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2209_15: So upanissayasampannatāya nacirasseva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2210_1: Yā pana purimajātiyaṃ tassovāde ṭhatvā sagge nibbattā devatā,
atk-s0510a:2210_2: tā kataññutaṃ nissāya tasmiṃ sañjātabahumānā sāyaṃ pātaṃ theraṃ payirupāsitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0510a:2210_3: Tasmā naṃ bhagavā devatānaṃ ativiya piyamanāpabhāvena aggabhāve ṭhapesi “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2210_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ yadidaṃ pilindavaccho”ti.
atk-s0510a:2210_6: Evaṃ so pattaaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ anussaritvā pītisomanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2211_2: pasaṭṭhā vā medhā yassa so sumedho,
atk-s0510a:2211_3: aggo ca so puggalo cāti aggapuggalo,
atk-s0510a:2211_4: tasmiṃ sumedhe lokanāyake aggapuggale khandhaparinibbānena nibbute satīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2211_5: Pasannacitto sumanoti saddhāya pasāditacitto somanassena sundaramano ahaṃ tassa sumedhassa bhagavato thūpapūjaṃ cetiyapūjaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2212_1: Ye ca khīṇāsavā tatthāti tasmiṃ samāgame ye ca khīṇāsavā pahīnakilesā chaḷabhiññā chahi abhiññāhi samannāgatā
atk-s0510a:2212_3: te sabbe khīṇāsave ahaṃ tattha samānetvā suṭṭhu ādarena ānetvā saṅghabhattaṃ sakalasaṅghassa dātabbabhattaṃ akāsiṃ tesaṃ bhojesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2213_1: Upaṭṭhāko tadā ahūti tadā mama saṅghabhattadānakāle sumedhassa bhagavato nāmena sumedho nāma upaṭṭhākasāvako ahu ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2213_2: So sāvako mayhaṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ anumodittha anumodito ānisaṃsaṃ kathesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2214_1: Tena cittappasādenāti tena thūpapūjākaraṇavasena uppannena cittappasādena devaloke dibbavimānaṃ upapajjiṃ upagato asmīti attho,
atk-s0510a:2214_3: Chaḷāsītisahassānīti tasmiṃ vimāne cha asītisahassāni devaccharāyo me mayhaṃ cittaṃ ramiṃsu ramāpesunti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2215_1: Mameva anuvattantīti tā accharāyo sabbakāmehi dibbehi rūpādivatthukāmehi upaṭṭhahantiyo mamaṃ eva anuvattanti
atk-s0510a:2215_2: mama vacanaṃ anukaronti sadā niccakālanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2218_1: Ayampi āyasmā purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2218_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2218_3: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento senāsanavisodhanavijjotanādikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2218_5: So tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde amhākaṃ bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2218_6: paṭicca yasodharāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā rāhuloti laddhanāmo mahatā khattiyaparivārena vaḍḍhi.
atk-s0510a:2218_8: So pabbajitvā satthu santike anekehi suttapadehi suladdhovādo paripakkañāṇo vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2218_9: Arahā pana hutvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā aññaṃ byākaronto –
atk-s0510a:2220_0: Yañcamhi putto buddhassa, yañca dhammesu cakkhumā.
atk-s0510a:2221_0: “Yañca me āsavā khīṇā, yañca natthi punabbhavo;
atk-s0510a:2227_1: Tattha ubhayeneva sampannoti jātisampadā paṭipattisampadāti ubhayasampattiyāpi sampanno samannāgato.
atk-s0510a:2227_2: Rāhulabhaddoti maṃ vidūti “rāhulabhaddo”ti maṃ sabrahmacārino sañjānanti.
atk-s0510a:2227_3: Tassa hi jātasāsanaṃ sutvā bodhisattena, “rāhu, jāto,
atk-s0510a:2227_4: bandhanaṃ jāta”nti vuttavacanaṃ upādāya suddhodanamahārājā “rāhulo”ti nāmaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:2227_5: Tattha ādito pitarā vuttapariyāyameva gahetvā āha –
atk-s0510a:2227_8: Aparabhāge satthā taṃ sikkhākāmabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2227_10: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ yadidaṃ rāhulo”ti.
atk-s0510a:2228_1: Evaṃ so pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2228_2: Sattabhūmimhi pāsādeti pasādaṃ somanassaṃ janetīti pāsādo.
atk-s0510a:2228_3: Uparūpari ṭhitā satta bhūmiyo yasmiṃ pāsāde soyaṃ sattabhūmi,
atk-s0510a:2228_5: Ādāsaṃ santhariṃ ahanti ādāsatalaṃ nipphādetvā lokajeṭṭhassa bhagavato tādino ahaṃ santharaṃ adāsiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2229_2: Dvipadindo dvipadānaṃ indo sāmi narāsabho mahāmuni gandhakuṭiṃ tehi saha upāgami pāvisīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2230_1: Virocento gandhakuṭinti taṃ gandhakuṭiṃ sobhayamāno devānaṃ devo devadevo narānaṃ āsabho narāsabho jeṭṭho
atk-s0510a:2230_2: satthā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisīditvā imā byākaraṇagāthāyo abhāsatha kathesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2231_1: Yenāyaṃ jotitā seyyāti yena upāsakena ayaṃ pāsādasaṅkhātā seyyā jotitā pabhāsitā pajjalitā.
atk-s0510a:2231_2: Ādāsova kaṃsalohamayaṃ ādāsatalaṃ iva suṭṭhu samaṃ katvā santhatā.
atk-s0510a:2231_3: Taṃ upāsakaṃ kittayissāmi pākaṭaṃ karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2232_1: Aṭṭhānametaṃ yaṃ tādīti yaṃ yena kāraṇena tādī iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvattā tādī agāre gharāvāse ratiṃ allīnabhāvaṃ ajjhagā pāpuṇi,
atk-s0510a:2233_1: Nikkhamitvā agārasmāti gharāvāsato nikkhamitvā taṃ tiṇadalamiva pariccajitvā subbato susikkhito pabbajissati.
atk-s0510a:2233_2: Rāhulo nāma nāmenāti suddhodanamahārājena pesitaṃ kumārassa jātasāsanaṃ sutvā pitarā siddhatthena,
atk-s0510a:2233_4: bandhanaṃ jāta”nti vuttanāmattā rāhulo nāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2233_5: “Yathā candasūriyānaṃ vimānapabhāya kiliṭṭhakaraṇena rāhu asurindo upeti gacchati,
atk-s0510a:2233_6: evamevāyaṃ mama abhinikkhamanapabbajjādīnaṃ antarāyaṃ karontoriva jāto”ti adhippāyena,
