atk-s0510a:2233_8: Arahā so bhavissatīti so tādiso upanissayasampanno vipassanāyaṃ yuttappayutto arahā khīṇāsavo bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2234_1: Kikīva aṇḍaṃ rakkheyyāti aṇḍaṃ bījaṃ rakkhamānā kikī sakuṇī iva appamatto sīlaṃ rakkheyya,
atk-s0510a:2234_2: cāmarī viya vāladhinti vālaṃ rakkhamānā kaṇḍakesu vāle laggante bhindanabhayena anākaḍḍhitvā maramānā
atk-s0510a:2234_3: cāmarī viya jīvitampi pariccajitvā sīlaṃ abhinditvā rakkheyya.
atk-s0510a:2234_5: tena nepakkena samannāgato nipako khaṇḍachiddādibhāvaṃ apāpetvā rakkhaṇato sīlasampanno bhavissatīti evaṃ so bhagavā byākaraṇamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2234_6: So evaṃ pattaarahattaphalo ekadivasaṃ vivekaṭṭhāne nisinno somanassavasena evaṃ rakkhiṃ mahāmunītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2237_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2237_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0510a:2237_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ
atk-s0510a:2237_4: ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde nālakagāme
atk-s0510a:2237_7: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadāya
atk-s0510a:2237_8: ekavassiko “ariyagabbhaṃ vaḍḍhemī”ti ekaṃ kulaputtaṃ attano santike upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ satthu
atk-s0510a:2237_10: Satthārā cassa tassa avassikassa bhikkhuno saddhivihārikabhāvaṃ sutvā “atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2237_12: bāhullāya āvatto”ti garahito “idānāhaṃ yadi parisaṃ nissāya satthārā garahito,
atk-s0510a:2237_13: parisaṃyeva pana nissāya satthu pasādaṃ karissāmī”ti vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2237_14: Arahā pana hutvā sayampi sabbe dhutaṅgadhamme samādāya vattati,
atk-s0510a:2237_16: tena naṃ bhagavā samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2237_17: So aparena samayena kosambiyaṃ kalahe uppanne bhikkhusaṅghe ca dvidhābhūte ekena bhikkhunā taṃ kalahaṃ parivajjitukāmena “etarahi kho kalaho uppanno,
atk-s0510a:2237_19: kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabba”nti puṭṭho vivekavāsato paṭṭhāya tassa paṭipattiṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:2237_20: Evaṃ thero tassa bhikkhuno ovādadānāpadesena attano tathā paṭipannabhāvaṃ dīpento aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2238_1: So evaṃ pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaraṃ bhagavantantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2238_2: Pabbhāramhi nisīdantanti purato bhāraṃ namitaṃ onamitanti pabbhāraṃ vivekakāmaṃ vanamajjhe sayaṃjātapabbatapabbhāre
atk-s0510a:2238_3: nisinnaṃ naruttamaṃ bhagavantaṃ ahaṃ upagacchiṃ samīpaṃ gatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2239_1: Kaṇikārapuppha disvāti tathā upagacchanto tasmiṃ padese supupphitaṃ kaṇikāraṃ disvā.
atk-s0510a:2239_2: Vaṇṭe chetvānahaṃ tadāti tasmiṃ tathāgatassa diṭṭhakāle taṃ pupphaṃ vaṇṭe vaṇṭasmiṃ chetvāna chinditvāna.
atk-s0510a:2239_3: Alaṅkaritvā chattamhīti tena pupphena chattaṃ chādetvā.
atk-s0510a:2239_4: Buddhassa abhiropayinti pabbhāre nisinnassa buddhassa muddhani akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2240_1: Piṇḍapātañca pādāsinti tasmiṃyeva nisinnassa bhagavato piṇḍapātaṃ pakārena adāsiṃ bhojesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2240_3: Buddhena navame tatthāti tasmiṃ vivekaṭṭhāne buddhena saha navame aṭṭha samaṇe samitapāpe khīṇāsavabhikkhū bhojesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2241_0: Yaṃ vadanti sumedhoti yaṃ gotamasammāsambuddhaṃ bhūripaññaṃ pathavisamānaṃ paññaṃ sumedhaṃ sundaraṃ sabbaññutādipaññavantaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2241_1: Sumedho iti sundarapañño iti vadanti paṇḍitā ito kappato satasahasse kappe eso gotamo sammāsambuddho bhavissatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2244_1: Ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2244_2: bhagavato uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto pitu accayena
atk-s0510a:2244_3: gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena dassitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ vaṃsānugataṃ dhanaṃ disvā “imaṃ ettakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2244_4: dhanarāsiṃ mayhaṃ pituayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0510a:2244_5: mayā pana gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2244_6: So abhiññālābhiṃ ekaṃ tāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tena devalokādhipacce niyojito yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato
atk-s0510a:2244_7: cuto devaloke nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto manussaloke
atk-s0510a:2244_8: bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthassa kulassa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2244_9: Tena samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatte nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātaṃ khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesi.
atk-s0510a:2244_10: Atha so kulaputto anukkamena viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2245_0: Tena kho pana samayena satthā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2245_1: So taṃ disvā pasannamānaso satasahassabhikkhuparivutassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthesi.
atk-s0510a:2245_2: Satthā anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2245_3: So satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2245_4: So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvenavute kappe phussassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2245_5: kāle satthu vemātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahantesu tesaṃ puññakiriyāsu sahāyakiccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2245_6: Evaṃ tattha tattha bhave bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kururaṭṭhe
atk-s0510a:2245_8: tassa bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthakule nibbattattā raṭṭhapāloti vaṃsānugatameva nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2245_9: So mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena yobbanappatto mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena saṃyojito mahante
atk-s0510a:2246_0: Atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṃ caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṃ anupāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2246_1: Taṃ sutvā raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:2246_2: pabbajitukāmo sattāhaṃ bhattacchedaṃ katvā kicchena kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0510a:2246_3: pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa santike pabbajitvā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2246_5: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā mātāpitaro passituṃ thullakoṭṭhikaṃ gantvā tattha sapadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2246_6: piṇḍāya caranto pitu nivesane ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ labhitvā taṃ amataṃ viya paribhuñjanto pitarā nimantito
atk-s0510a:2246_7: svātanāya adhivāsetvā dutiyadivase pitu nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte itthāgārajane
atk-s0510a:2246_11: yāsaṃ tvaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carasī”tiādīni vatvā palobhanakammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe tassādhippāyaṃ viparivattetvā
atk-s0510a:2248_0: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti.
atk-s0510a:2250_0: Aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhaṃ, saha vatthehi sobhati.
atk-s0510a:2252_0: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.
atk-s0510a:2254_0: Alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino.

atk-s0510a:2261_1: Imā gāthā vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño korabyassa migājinavanuyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2261_2: Therassa kira pitā sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu aggaḷaṃ dāpetvā malle āṇāpesi “nikkhamituṃ mā detha,
atk-s0510a:2261_5: Atha rājā korabyo therassa tattha nisinnabhāvaṃ sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā “idha,
atk-s0510a:2261_7: pabbajanto byādhipārijuññaṃ vā jarābhogañātipārijuññaṃ vā patto pabbajati,
atk-s0510a:2261_8: tvaṃ pana kiñcipi pārijuññaṃ anupagato eva kasmā pabbajasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:2261_12: ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso”ti imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammuddesānaṃ attanā viditabhāvaṃ kathetvā tassā desanāya anugītiṃ kathento –
atk-s0510a:2262_0: “Passāmi loke sadhane manusse, laddhāna vittaṃ na dadanti mohā;
atk-s0510a:2263_0: Luddhā dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ karonti, bhiyyova kāme abhipatthayanti.
atk-s0510a:2265_0: Oraṃ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṃ samuddassapi patthayetha.
atk-s0510a:2266_0: “Rājā ca aññe ca bahū manussā, avītataṇhā maraṇaṃ upenti;
atk-s0510a:2267_0: Ūnāva hutvāna jahanti dehaṃ, kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi titti.
atk-s0510a:2268_0: “Kandanti naṃ ñātī pakiriya kese, ‘aho vatā no amarā’ti cāhu;
atk-s0510a:2269_0: Vatthena naṃ pārutaṃ nīharitvā, citaṃ samodhāya tato ḍahanti.
atk-s0510a:2270_0: “So ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamāno, ekena vatthena pahāya bhoge;
atk-s0510a:2271_0: Na mīyamānassa bhavanti tāṇā, ñātī ca mittā atha vā sahāyā.
atk-s0510a:2272_0: “Dāyādakā tassa dhanaṃ haranti, satto pana gacchati yena kammaṃ;
atk-s0510a:2273_0: Na mīyamānaṃ dhanamanveti kiñci, puttā ca dārā ca dhanañca raṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2274_0: “Na dīghamāyuṃ labhate dhanena, na cāpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti;
atk-s0510a:2275_0: Appaṃ hidaṃ jīvitamāhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2276_0: “Aḍḍhā daliddā ca phusanti phassaṃ, bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭho;
atk-s0510a:2277_0: Bālo hi bālyā vadhitova seti, dhīro ca no vedhati phassaphuṭṭho.
atk-s0510a:2278_0: “Tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānamidhādhigacchati;
atk-s0510a:2279_0: Abyositattā hi bhavābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā.
atk-s0510a:2281_0: Tassappapañño abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2282_0: “Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo;
atk-s0510a:2283_0: Evaṃ pajā pecca paramhi loke, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo.
atk-s0510a:2284_0: “Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
atk-s0510a:2285_0: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0510a:2286_0: “Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0510a:2287_0: Etampi disvāna pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo.
atk-s0510a:2289_0: Avañjhā mayhaṃ pabbajjā, anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2293_0: Sohaṃ viddho tadā santo, sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2298_1: Evaṃ thero rañño korabyassa dhammaṃ desetvā satthu santikameva gato.
atk-s0510a:2298_2: Satthā ca aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2299_1: Evaṃ so thero pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2299_2: Varanāgo mayā dinnoti tassa bhagavato rūpakāye pasīditvā varo uttamo seṭṭho īsādanto rathīsāsadisadanto urūḷhavā bhāravaho rājāraho vā.
atk-s0510a:2299_6: Saṅghārāmaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa vasanatthāya ārāmaṃ vihāraṃ akārayiṃ kāresiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2300_1: Catupaññāsasahassānīti tasmiṃ kārāpite vihārabbhantare catupaññāsasahassāni pāsādāni ca ahaṃ akārayiṃ kāresinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2300_2: Mahoghadānaṃ karitvānāti sabbaparikkhārasahitaṃ mahoghasadisaṃ mahādānaṃ sajjetvā mahesino munino niyyādesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2301_1: Anumodi mahāvīroti caturāsaṅkhyeyyasatasahassesu kappesu abbocchinnaussāhasaṅkhātena vīriyena mahāvīro
atk-s0510a:2301_2: sayambhū sayameva bhūto jāto laddhasabbaññutaññāṇo aggo seṭṭho puggalo anumodi vihārānumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2301_3: Sabbe jane hāsayantoti sakalānantāparimāṇe devamanusse hāsayanto santuṭṭhe kurumāno amatanibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0510a:2301_4: catusaccadhammadesanaṃ desesi pakāsesi vivari vibhaji uttānī akāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2302_1: Taṃ me viyākāsīti taṃ mayhaṃ katapuññaṃ balaṃ visesena pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2302_9: sambhāravante satte nibbānaṃ neti pāpetīti vā nāyako,
atk-s0510a:2302_10: jalanuttamo ca so nāyako cāti jalanuttamanāyako.
atk-s0510a:2302_11: Bhikkhusaṅghe nisīditvāti bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno imā gāthā abhāsatha pākaṭaṃ katvā kathesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2305_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2305_2: bhagavato kāle aññatarassa kuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2305_3: Ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā bījapūraphalāni satthu upanesi,
atk-s0510a:2305_5: So bhikkhu satthari saṅghe ca abhippasanno salākabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅghuddesavasena tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ khīrabhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2305_6: So tehi puññehi aparāparaṃ devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavanto ekadā manussayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekassa paccekabuddhassa khīrabhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2306_0: Evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva paribbhamanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde purimakammanissandena
atk-s0510a:2306_1: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarāya duggatitthiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:2306_2: Sā taṃ dasamāse kucchinā pariharitvā paripakke gabbhe vijāyanakāle vijāyituṃ asakkontī mucchaṃ āpajjitvā bahuvelaṃ matā viya nipajji.
atk-s0510a:2306_3: Ñātakā “matā”ti saññāya susānaṃ netvā citakaṃ āropetvā devatānubhāvena vātavuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhitāya aggiṃ adatvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2306_4: Dārako pacchimabhavikattā devatānubhāveneva arogo hutvā mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0510a:2306_6: Devatā manussarūpenupagamma taṃ gahetvā susānagopakassa gehe ṭhapetvā katipāhaṃ kālaṃ patirūpena āhārena posesi.
atk-s0510a:2306_7: Tato paraṃ susānagopako attano puttaṃ katvā vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0510a:2306_8: So tathā vaḍḍhento tassa puttena suppiyena nāma dārakena saddhiṃ kīḷanto vicari.
atk-s0510a:2306_9: Tassa susāne jātasaṃvaḍḍhabhāvato sopākoti samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2307_0: Athekadivasaṃ sattavassikaṃ taṃ bhagavā paccūsavelāyaṃ ñāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā veneyyabandhave olokento
atk-s0510a:2307_2: Dārako pubbahetunā codiyamāno pasannamānaso satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2307_4: So dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pitarā “anuññātosī”ti vutto pitaraṃ satthu santikaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0510a:2307_5: Tassa pitā satthāraṃ vanditvā “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājetha,
atk-s0510a:2307_8: So mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā susāne viharanto nacirasseva mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2307_9: Arahā hutvāpi aññesaṃ sosānikabhikkhūnaṃ mettābhāvanāvidhiṃ dassento “yathāpi ekaputtasmi”nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2307_11: yathā ekaputtake piye manāpe mātā pitā ca kusalī ekantahitesī bhaveyya,
atk-s0510a:2307_12: evaṃ puratthimādibhedāsu sabbāsu disāsu kāmabhavādibhedesu vā sabbesu bhavesu daharādibhedāsu sabbāsu
atk-s0510a:2307_13: avatthāsupi ṭhitesu sabbesu sattesu ekantahitesitāya kusalī bhaveyya “mitto, udāsino,
atk-s0510a:2307_14: paccatthiko”ti sīmaṃ akatvā sīmāya sambhedavasena sabbattha ekarasaṃ mettaṃ bhāveyyāti imaṃ pana gāthaṃ
atk-s0510a:2307_15: vatvā “sace tumhe āyasmanto evaṃ mettaṃ bhāveyyātha,
atk-s0510a:2307_16: ye te bhagavatā ‘sukhaṃ supatī’tiādinā ekādasa mettānisaṃsā ca vuttā,
atk-s0510a:2307_17: ekaṃsena tesaṃ bhāgino bhavathā”ti ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2308_1: Evaṃ so pattaphalādhigamo attano katapuññaṃ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento pabbhāraṃ sodhayantassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2308_3: taṃ pabbajitānurūpattā iṭṭhakapākāraṃ katvā dvārakavāṭaṃ yojetvā bhikkhūnaṃ vasanatthāya adāsi,
atk-s0510a:2308_5: taṃ sodhayantassa mama santikaṃ siddhattho nāma bhagavā āgacchi pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2309_1: Buddhaṃ upagataṃ disvāti evaṃ mama santikaṃ āgataṃ disvā tādino iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu akampiyasabhāvattā tādiguṇayuttassa
atk-s0510a:2309_2: lokajeṭṭhassa buddhassa santharaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādisantharaṃ kaṭṭhattharaṃ paññāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā pupphāsanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2310_1: Pupphāsane nisīditvāti tasmiṃ paññatte pupphāsane nisīditvā lokanāyako siddhattho bhagavā.
atk-s0510a:2310_2: Mamañca gatimaññāyāti mayhaṃ gatiṃ āyatiṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ aññāya jānitvā aniccataṃ aniccabhāvaṃ udāhari kathesi.
atk-s0510a:2311_1: Aniccā vata saṅkhārāti vata ekantena saṅkhārā paccayehi samecca samāgantvā karīyamānā sabbe sappaccayadhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā.
atk-s0510a:2311_2: Uppādavayadhamminoti uppajjitvā vinassanasabhāvā uppajjitvā pātubhavitvā ete saṅkhārā nirujjhanti vinassantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2311_3: Tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ visesena upasamo sukho,
atk-s0510a:2312_1: Idaṃ vatvāna sabbaññūti sabbadhammajānanako bhagavā lokānaṃ jeṭṭho vuḍḍho narānaṃ āsabho padhāno vīro
atk-s0510a:2312_2: idaṃ aniccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammadesanaṃ vatvāna kathetvā ambare ākāse haṃsarājā iva nabhaṃ ākāsaṃ abbhuggamīti
atk-s0510a:2313_1: Sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ attano laddhiṃ khantiṃ ruciṃ ajjhāsayaṃ jahitvāna pahāya.
atk-s0510a:2313_2: Bhāvayāniccasaññahanti anicce aniccanti pavattasaññaṃ ahaṃ bhāvayiṃ vaḍḍhesiṃ manasi akāsiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2313_3: Tattha kālaṃ kato ahanti tattha tissaṃ jātiyaṃ tato jātito ahaṃ kālaṃ kato mato.
atk-s0510a:2314_1: Dve sampattī anubhotvāti manussasampattidibbasampattisaṅkhātā dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā.
atk-s0510a:2314_4: Pacchime bhave sampatteti pariyosāne bhave sampatte pāpuṇite.
atk-s0510a:2314_5: Sapākayonupāgaminti sakaṃ pacitabhattaṃ sapākaṃ yoniṃ upāgamiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2314_6: Yassa kulassa attano pacitabhattaṃ aññehi abhuñjanīyaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2317_1: Ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto piyadassissa
atk-s0510a:2317_3: So ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ nhatvā ekacīvaraṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā somanassappatto apphoṭesi.
atk-s0510a:2317_4: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyā avidūre aññatarasmiṃ gāmake tādisena kammanissandena daliddakule nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:2317_6: So vayappatto khujjakāsitanaṅgalakuddālaparikkhāro hutvā kasiyā jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:2317_7: So ekadivasaṃ raññā pasenadinā kosalena bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahādāne pavattiyamāne dānūpakaraṇāni
atk-s0510a:2317_8: gahetvā āgacchantehi manussehi saddhiṃ dadhighaṭaṃ gahetvā āgato bhikkhūnaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ disvā “ime
atk-s0510a:2317_9: samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhumavatthanivatthā subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu senāsanesu viharanti,
atk-s0510a:2317_10: yaṃnūnāhampi pabbajeyya”nti cintetvā aññataraṃ mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano pabbajādhippāyaṃ nivedesi.
atk-s0510a:2317_11: So taṃ karuṇāyanto pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0510a:2317_12: So araññe viharanto ekakavihāre nibbinno ukkaṇṭhito hutvā vibbhamitukāmo ñātigāmaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0510a:2317_13: kacchaṃ bandhitvā khettaṃ kasante kiliṭṭhavatthanivatthe samantato rajokiṇṇasarīre vātātapena sussante
atk-s0510a:2317_14: khettaṃ kassake manusse disvā “mahantaṃ vatime sattā jīvikanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhavantī”ti saṃvegaṃ
atk-s0510a:2317_16: Ñāṇassa paripākagatattā cassa yathāgahitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2317_17: So aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā vivekaṃ labhitvā yonisomanasikaronto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2318_1: Evaṃ so pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento āhutiṃ yiṭṭhukāmohantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2318_7: Visāle māḷake ṭhitoti parisuddhapaṇḍarapulinatalābhirāme vipule māḷake ṭhito.
atk-s0510a:2319_1: Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhantiādīsu mahāyasaṃ mahāparivāraṃ sabbalokaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ vinetānaṃ visesena
atk-s0510a:2319_2: netāraṃ nibbānasampāpakaṃ sayambhuṃ sayameva bhūtaṃ anācariyakaṃ aggapuggalaṃ seṭṭhapuggalaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2319_3: bhagyavantādiguṇayuttaṃ jutimantaṃ nīlapītādipabhāsampannaṃ sāvakehi purakkhataṃ parivāritaṃ ādiccamiva
atk-s0510a:2319_4: sūriyamiva rocantaṃ sobhamānaṃ rathiyaṃ vīthiyaṃ paṭipannakaṃ gacchantaṃ piyadassiṃ nāma sambuddhaṃ addasinti
atk-s0510a:2319_6: Añjaliṃ paggahetvānāti bandhañjalipuṭaṃ sirasi katvā sakaṃ cittaṃ attano cittaṃ pasādayiṃ itthambhūtassa
atk-s0510a:2319_9: Āgacchatu mahāmunīti mahito pūjāraho muni bhagavā mama nivesanaṃ āgacchatu.
atk-s0510a:2320_1: Mama saṅkappamaññāyāti mayhaṃ cittasaṅkappaṃ ñatvā loke sattaloke anuttaro uttaravirahito satthā khīṇāsavasahassehi
atk-s0510a:2320_2: arahantasahassehi parivuto mama dvāraṃ mayhaṃ gehadvāraṃ upāgami sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2321_3: mama namakkāro te tuyhaṃ atthu bhavatu.
atk-s0510a:2321_4: Purisuttama purisānaṃ uttama adhikaguṇavisiṭṭha te tuyhaṃ mama namakkāro atthu.
atk-s0510a:2321_5: Pāsādaṃ pasādajanakaṃ mama nivesanaṃ abhiruhitvā sīhāsane uttamāsane nisīdatanti āyācinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2322_1: Danto dantaparivāroti sayaṃ dvārattayena danto tathā dantāhi bhikkhubhikkhunīupāsakaupāsikāsaṅkhātāhi catūhi parisāhi parivārito.
atk-s0510a:2322_2: Tiṇṇo tārayataṃ varoti sayaṃ tiṇṇo saṃsārato uttiṇṇo nikkhanto tārayataṃ tārayantānaṃ visiṭṭhapuggalānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2322_3: varo uttamo bhagavā mamārādhanena pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā pavarāsane uttamāsane nisīdi nisajjaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:2323_1: Yaṃ me atthi sake geheti attano gehe yaṃ āmisaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ sampāditaṃ rāsikataṃ atthi.
atk-s0510a:2323_2: Tāhaṃ buddhassa pādāsinti buddhassa buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa taṃ āmisaṃ pādāsiṃ pa-
atk-s0510a:2323_4: Pasanno sehi pāṇibhīti attano dvīhi hatthehi passannacitto gahetvā pādāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2324_2: Vedajāto jātavedo uppannasomanasso katañjalī sirasi ṭhapitaañjalipuṭo buddhaseṭṭhaṃ namassāmi seṭṭhassa buddhassa paṇāmaṃ karomīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2324_3: Aho buddhassuḷāratāti paṭividdhacatusaccassa satthuno uḷāratā mahantabhāvo aho acchariyanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2325_1: Aṭṭhannaṃ payirūpāsatanti payirupāsantānaṃ bhuñjaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ antare khīṇāsavā arahantova bahūti attho.
atk-s0510a:2325_2: Tuyheveso ānubhāvoti eso ākāsacaraṇaummujjananimujjanādiānubhāvo tuyheva tuyhaṃ eva ānubhāvo, nāññesaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2325_3: Saraṇaṃ taṃ upemahanti taṃ itthambhūtaṃ tuvaṃ saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyananti upemi gacchāmi jānāmi vāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2326_1: Lokajeṭṭho narāsabho piyadassī bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisīditvā imā byākaraṇagāthā abhāsatha kathesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2331_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto ito kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0510a:2331_2: anuppanneyeva padumuttare bhagavati lokanāthe haṃsavatīnagare aññatarassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa ekaputtako
atk-s0510a:2331_5: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto attano parivārabhūtehi catucattālīsāya māṇavasahassehi
atk-s0510a:2331_6: saddhiṃ pabbatapāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññāyo ca nibbattesi.
atk-s0510a:2332_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya viharanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_1: paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento nandatāpasassa antevāsikajaṭilānaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2332_2: nandatāpasassa ca dvīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāvakaṭṭhānantarassa patthanaṃ disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_3: katvā pubbaṇhasamaye pattacīvaramādāya aññaṃ kañci anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro nandatāpasassa antevāsikesu
atk-s0510a:2332_4: phalāphalatthāya gatesu “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti passantasseva nandatāpasassa ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_6: Nandatāpaso buddhānubhāvañceva lakkhaṇapāripūriñca disvā lakkhaṇamante sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato
atk-s0510a:2332_7: nāma agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0510a:2332_8: pabbajanto loke vivaṭacchedo sabbaññū buddho hoti,
atk-s0510a:2332_9: ayaṃ purisājānīyo nissaṃsayaṃ buddho”ti ñatvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2332_11: Nandatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2332_12: Tasmiṃ samaye catucattālīsasahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā ācariyassa santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2332_13: sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnākāraṃ oloketvā āhaṃsu – “ācariya,
atk-s0510a:2332_14: mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma,
atk-s0510a:2332_15: ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti.
atk-s0510a:2332_18: tumhe sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ upametuṃ icchatha,
atk-s0510a:2332_19: sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṃ mā maṃ upamitthā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:2332_22: na amhākaṃ ācariyo evaṃ upamaṃ āhareyya.
atk-s0510a:2332_23: Yāva mahāvatāyaṃ purisājānīyo”ti pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2332_28: tumhehi yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ābhataṃ,
atk-s0510a:2332_29: taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā sahattheneva dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0510a:2332_30: Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2332_32: Tato bhojanakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2332_34: Satthu cittaṃ ñatvā satasahassamattā khīṇāsavā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2333_3: Tumhehi ajja uḷāraṃ bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0510a:2333_5: Acinteyyattā iddhivisayassa te muhutteneva vaṇṇagandharasasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhānaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2333_9: Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu nandatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito, “bhante,
atk-s0510a:2333_10: amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ āruyha nisīdathā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:2333_12: Evaṃ nisinne satthari satthu ākāraṃ ñatvā bhikkhū attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2333_13: Nandatāpaso mahantaṃ pupphacchattaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa matthake dhārento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2333_14: Satthā “tāpasānaṃ ayaṃ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0510a:2333_15: Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhikkhūpi samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2333_16: Tathāgate sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ
atk-s0510a:2333_17: paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2333_18: Nandatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi agantvā pupphacchattaṃ dhārentoyeva sattāhaṃ pītisukheneva vītināmesi.
atk-s0510a:2334_0: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya araṇavihāriaṅgena dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ ekaṃ sāvakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2334_2: So cakkavattirañño santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso attano visaye ṭhatvā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā anumodanamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2334_3: Tassa desanāvasāne satthā sayaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0510a:2334_4: Satthu desanāvasāne sabbepi catucattālīsasahassatāpasā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā –
atk-s0510a:2334_10: Tassa kira araṇavihārittherassa dhammaṃ sotuṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya –
atk-s0510a:2334_11: “aho vatāhampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane iminā sāvakena laddhaguṇaṃ labheyya”nti cittaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0510a:2334_12: So tena vitakkena maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0510a:2334_13: Tathāgataṃ pana vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha sammukhe ṭhito evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0510a:2334_16: “Araṇavihāriaṅgena ca dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena ca etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patto eso bhikkhū”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0510a:2334_17: yvāyaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ pupphacchattaṃ dhārentena sakkāro kato,
atk-s0510a:2334_18: tena adhikārena aññaṃ sampattiṃ na patthemi,
atk-s0510a:2334_19: anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ thero viya dvīhaṅgehi samannāgato sāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2335_0: Satthā “samijjhissati nu kho imassa tāpasassa patthanā”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā olokento kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā samijjhanakabhāvaṃ disvā, “tāpasa,
atk-s0510a:2335_1: na te ayaṃ patthanā moghaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0510a:2335_2: anāgate kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0510a:2335_3: tassa santike samijjhissatī”ti dhammakathaṃ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0510a:2335_5: tāva satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ paggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2335_6: So aparabhāge kālena kālaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇitvā aparihīnajjhānova kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2335_7: Tato pana cuto aparānipi pañca jātisatāni pabbajitvā āraññakova ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2335_8: kassapasammāsambuddhakālepi pabbajitvā āraññako hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūresi.
atk-s0510a:2335_9: Etaṃ kira vattaṃ aparipūretvā mahāsāvakabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantā nāma natthi,
atk-s0510a:2335_11: So vīsativassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsadevaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2336_0: Evaṃ so tāvatiṃsabhavane aparāparaṃ uppajjanavasena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto manussaloke
atk-s0510a:2336_1: anekasatakkhattuṃ cakkavattirājā padesarājā ca hutvā uḷāraṃ manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2336_2: uppannakāle sāvatthiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa gehe anāthapiṇḍikassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2337_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:2337_1: tattha veḷuvanapaṭiggahaṇādinā lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ upanissāya sītavane vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:2337_2: Tadā anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā attano sahāyassa rājagahaseṭṭhino gehaṃ
atk-s0510a:2337_3: gantvā buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ sītavane viharantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale
atk-s0510a:2337_4: patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya yācitvā tato pañcacattālīsayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccāgena
atk-s0510a:2337_5: vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā sāvatthiyaṃ aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ jetassa kumārassa uyyānabhūmiṃ koṭisanthārena kiṇitvā
atk-s0510a:2337_7: Vihāramahadivase ayaṃ subhūtikuṭumbiko anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:2337_8: So upasampanno dve mātikā paguṇā katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto mettājhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2337_9: nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2338_0: So dhammaṃ desento yasmā satthārā desitaniyāmena anodissakaṃ katvā deseti,
atk-s0510a:2338_2: Yasmā ca piṇḍāya caranto ghare ghare mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti “evaṃ dāyakānaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti,
atk-s0510a:2338_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ araṇavihārīnaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānañca yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti dvayaṅgasamannāgate aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2338_7: Evamayaṃ mahāthero attanā pūritapāramīnaṃ phalassa matthakaṃ arahattaṃ patvā loke abhiññāto abhilakkhito
atk-s0510a:2338_8: hutvā bahujanahitāya janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2339_0: Rājā bimbisāro therassa āgamanaṃ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “idheva, bhante, vasatha,
atk-s0510a:2339_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vo karissāmī”ti vatvā pakkanto vissari.
atk-s0510a:2339_4: Manussā avuṭṭhitāya upaddutā rañño nivesanadvāre ukkuṭṭhiṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2339_5: Rājā “kena nu kho kāraṇena devo na vassatī”ti vīmaṃsanto “therassa abbhokāsavāsena maññe na vassatī”ti cintetvā tassa paṇṇakuṭiṃ kārāpetvā “imissaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2339_7: Thero kuṭiṃ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārake pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2339_10: Atha thero lokassa avuṭṭhikabhayaṃ vidhamitukāmo attano ajjhattikabāhiravatthukassa parissayassa abhāvaṃ pavedento “channā me kuṭikā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0510a:2340_0: Kasmā panete mahātherā attano guṇe pakāsentīti?
atk-s0510a:2340_1: Iminā dīghena addhunā anadhigatapubbaṃ paramagambhīraṃ ativiya santaṃ paṇītaṃ attanā adhigatalokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2341_1: Evaṃ so pattaarahattaphalo pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno ca attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2341_2: Tattha himavantassāti himālayapabbatassa avidūre āsanne samīpe pabbatapāde manussānaṃ gamanāgamanasampanne sañcaraṇaṭṭhāneti attho.
atk-s0510a:2341_3: Nisabho nāma pabbatoti pabbatānaṃ jeṭṭhattā nāmena nisabho nāma selamayapabbato ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2341_4: Assamo sukato mayhanti tattha pabbate mayhaṃ vasanatthāya assamo araññāvāso suṭṭhu kato.
atk-s0510a:2341_6: Paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti paṇṇehi chāditā sālā mayhaṃ nivāsanatthāya suṭṭhu māpitā niṭṭhāpitāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2342_1: Kosiyo nāma nāmenāti mātāpitūhi katanāmadheyyena kosiyo nāma.
atk-s0510a:2342_3: Ekākiyo aññesaṃ abhāvā ahaṃ eva eko.
atk-s0510a:2342_4: Adutiyo dutiyatāpasarahito jaṭilo jaṭādhārī tāpaso tadā tasmiṃ kāle nisabhe pabbate vasāmi viharāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2343_2: na bhuñjāmi ahaṃ tadāti tadā tasmiṃ nisabhapabbate vasanakāle tiṇḍukādiphalaṃ muḷālādimūlaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2343_3: kārapaṇṇādipaṇṇañca rukkhato ocinitvā na bhuñjāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2343_4: Evaṃ sati kathaṃ jīvatīti taṃ dassento pavattaṃva supātāhanti āha.
atk-s0510a:2343_5: Tattha pavattaṃ sayameva jātaṃ supātaṃ attano dhammatāya patitaṃ paṇṇādikaṃ nissāya āhāraṃ katvā ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:2343_6: tāvade tasmiṃ kāle jīvāmi jīvikaṃ kappemīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2343_8: tassa sayameva patitāni paṇḍupaṇṇāni rukkhapattāni upanissāya jīvāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2344_1: Nāhaṃ kopemi ājīvanti ahaṃ jīvitaṃ cajamānopi pariccāgaṃ kurumānopi taṇhāvasena phalamūlādiāhārapariyesanāya
atk-s0510a:2344_2: sammā ājīvaṃ na kopemi na nāsemīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2344_3: Ārādhemi sakaṃ cittanti sakaṃ cittaṃ attano manaṃ appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā ca ārādhemi pasādemi.
atk-s0510a:2344_4: Vivajjemi anesananti vejjakammadūtakammādivasena anesanaṃ ayuttapariyesanaṃ vivajjemi dūraṃ karomi.
atk-s0510a:2345_1: Rāgūpasaṃhitaṃ cittanti yadā yasmiṃ kāle mama rāgena sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0510a:2345_2: tadā sayameva attanāyeva paccavekkhāmi ñāṇena paṭivekkhitvā vinodemi.
atk-s0510a:2345_3: Ekaggo taṃ damemahanti ahaṃ ekasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe aggo samāhito taṃ rāgacittaṃ damemi damanaṃ karomi.
atk-s0510a:2346_1: Rajjase rajjanīye cāti rajjanīye allīyitabbe rūpārammaṇādivatthusmiṃ rajjase allīno asi bhavasi.
atk-s0510a:2346_2: Dussanīye ca dussaseti dūsitabbe dosakaraṇavatthusmiṃ dūsako asi.
atk-s0510a:2346_3: Muyhase mohanīye cāti mohitabbe mohakaraṇavatthusmiṃ moyhasi mūḷho asi bhavasi.
atk-s0510a:2346_4: Tasmā tuvaṃ vanā vanato araññavāsato nikkhamassu apagacchāhīti evaṃ attānaṃ damemīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2350_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato upavānattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2350_1: Ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2350_2: bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavati parinibbute tassa dhātuṃ gahetvā manussadevanāgagaruḷakumbhaṇḍayakkhagandhabbehi
atk-s0510a:2350_3: sattaratanamaye sattayojanike thūpe kate tattha sudhotaṃ attano uttarasāṭakaṃ veḷagge laggetvā ābandhitvā
atk-s0510a:2350_5: Taṃ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṃ ṭhapito adissamānakāyo taṃ
atk-s0510a:2350_6: ākāse dhārento cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2350_7: So taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso hutvā tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2350_8: sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā upavānoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2350_9: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2350_11: tadā thero uṇhodakaṃ tathārūpaṃ pānakañca bhesajjaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi.
atk-s0510a:2351_1: Evaṃ so pattaarahattaphalo adhigataetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2351_3: Tattha sabbesaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhammānaṃ pāragū pariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ gato patto padumuttaro nāma jino
atk-s0510a:2351_4: jitapañcamāro bhagavā aggikkhandho iva chabbaṇṇā buddharaṃsiyo jalitvā sabbalokaṃ dhammapajjotena obhāsetvā
atk-s0510a:2351_5: sambuddho suṭṭhu buddho avijjāniddūpagatāya pajāya savāsanāya kilesaniddāya paṭibuddho vikasitanettapaṅkajo
atk-s0510a:2351_6: parinibbuto khandhaparinibbānena nibbuto adassanaṃ gatoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2352_0: 57. Jaṅghāti cetiyakaraṇakāle upacinitabbānaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ ṭhapanatthāya, nibandhiyamānasopānapanti.
atk-s0510a:2353_1: Sudhotaṃ rajakenāhanti vatthadhovakena purisena suṭṭhu dhovitaṃ suvisuddhakataṃ,
atk-s0510a:2353_2: uttareyyapaṭaṃ mama uttarasāṭakaṃ ahaṃ veḷagge laggitvā dhajaṃ katvā ukkhipiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2356_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2356_2: bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā andhamātāpitaro upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2356_6: evaṃ duggatito mocessāmī”ti nisabhaṃ nāma vipassissa bhagavato aggasāvakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tīṇi saraṇāni gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:2356_7: So tāni vassasatasahassāni rakkhitvā teneva kammena tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:2356_8: tato paraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare mahāsālakule
atk-s0510a:2356_9: nibbatto viññutaṃ patto sattavassikova dārakehi parivuto ekaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2356_10: Tattha eko khīṇāsavatthero tassa dhammaṃ desetvā saraṇāni adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2356_11: So tāni gahetvā pubbe attano rakkhitāni saraṇāni saritvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2357_1: So arahattappatto upasampanno hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nagare bandhumatiyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2357_2: Tattha mātu upaṭṭhāko ahunti ahaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhāko bharako bandhumatīnagare ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2358_2: Tividhaggīhi ḍayhareti rāgaggidosaggimohaggisaṅkhātehi tīhi aggīhi ḍayhare ḍayhanti sabbe sattāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2359_1: Aṭṭha hetū labhāmahanti aṭṭha kāraṇāni sukhassa paccayabhūtāni kāraṇāni labhāmi ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2362_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:2362_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto purimabhave katākusalakammānurūpena daliddo hutvā appannapānabhojano
atk-s0510a:2362_3: paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā jīvanto saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ ñatvā pabbajitukāmopi pabbajjaṃ alabhamāno anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:2362_4: bhagavato sāvakassa nisabhattherassa santike pañca sikkhāpadāni samādiyi.
atk-s0510a:2362_6: Tena kammena so devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2362_7: Mātāpitaro sīlaṃ samādiyante disvā attano sīlaṃ saritvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:2363_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto udānavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nagare candavatiyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2363_2: Bhatako āsahaṃ tadāti tadā mama puññakaraṇakāle ahaṃ bhatako bhatiyā kammakārako āsiṃ ahosiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2363_3: Parakammāyane yuttoti bhatiyā paresaṃ kammakaraṇe āyutto yojito okāsābhāvena saṃsārato muccanatthāya ahaṃ pabbajjaṃ na labhāmi.
atk-s0510a:2364_1: Mahandhakārapihitāti mahantehi kilesandhakārehi pihitā saṃvutā thakitā.
atk-s0510a:2364_2: Tividhaggīhi ḍayhareti narakaggipetaggisaṃsāraggisaṅkhātehi tīhi aggīhi ḍayhanti.
atk-s0510a:2364_3: Ahaṃ pana kena upāyena kena kāraṇena visaṃyutto bhaveyyanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2365_2: tassābhāvena ahaṃ varāko dukkhito bhatako bhatiyā jīvanako yaṃnūnāhaṃ pañcasīlaṃ rakkheyyaṃ paripūrayanti
atk-s0510a:2365_3: pañcasīlaṃ samādiyitvā paripūrento yaṃnūna rakkheyyaṃ sādhukaṃ bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ katvā paripāleyyanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2366_1: Svāhaṃ yasamanubhavinti so ahaṃ devamanussesu mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhaviṃ tesaṃ sīlānaṃ vāhasā ānubhāvenāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2366_2: Kappakoṭimpi tesaṃ sīlānaṃ phalaṃ kittento ekakoṭṭhāsameva kittaye pākaṭaṃ kareyyanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2369_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2369_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto piṇḍāya carantaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇabyāmappabhāmaṇḍalopasobhitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2369_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā gehaṃ netvā varaannapānena santappetvā sampavāretvā bhojesi.
atk-s0510a:2369_4: So teneva cittappasādena tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cavitvā manussaloke
atk-s0510a:2369_5: nibbattitvā manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato aparāparaṃ devamanussasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2369_6: ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto sāsane pasīditvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2369_7: So pubbe katapuññanāmavasena annasaṃsāvakattheroti pākaṭanāmo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2370_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto “evaṃ mayā iminā puññasambhārānubhāvena pattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2370_2: arahatta”nti attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ udānavasena pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2370_3: Tattha suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa bhagavato soyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo,
atk-s0510a:2370_5: Gacchantaṃ antarāpaṇeti vessānaṃ āpaṇapantīnaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ gacchamānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2370_7: lokapajjotaṃ sakalalokadīpabhūtaṃ appameyyaṃ pamāṇavirahitaṃ anopamaṃ upamāvirahitaṃ jutindharaṃ pabhādhāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2370_8: nīlapītādichabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo dhārakaṃ siddhatthaṃ disvā paramaṃ uttamaṃ pītiṃ alatthaṃ alabhinti
atk-s0510a:2373_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2373_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto siddhatthe bhagavati cittaṃ pasādetvā tassa bhagavato gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2373_3: candanāgarukāḷānusāriādinā katehi anekehi dhūpehi dhūpapūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2373_4: So tena puññena devesu ca manussesu ca ubhayasampattiyo anubhavanto nibbattanibbattabhave pūjanīyo hutvā
atk-s0510a:2373_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto puññasambhārānubhāvena sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0510a:2373_6: arahattaṃ patvā katadhūpapūjāpuññattā nāmena dhūpadāyakattheroti sabbattha pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2373_7: So pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2373_8: Siddho paripuṇṇo sabbaññutaññāṇādiguṇasaṅkhāto attho payojanaṃ yassa bhagavato soyaṃ siddhattho,
atk-s0510a:2373_9: tassa siddhatthassa bhagavato bhagyādiguṇavantassa lokajeṭṭhassa sakalalokuttamassa tādino iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādisassa acalasabhāvassāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2376_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2376_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto sāsane pasannacitto cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu purāṇavālukaṃ apanetvā
atk-s0510a:2376_4: Tena kammena so devaloke nibbatto tattha dibbehi ratanehi vijjotamāne anekayojane kanakavimāne dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2376_5: anubhavitvā tato cuto manussaloke sattaratanasampanno cakkavattī rājā hutvā manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2376_6: aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto sāsane pasanno pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2376_8: So attano katapuññanāmasadisena nāmena pulinapūjakattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2377_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento vipassissa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2377_4: vividhe attatthaparatthādibhede atthe passatīti vā vipassī,
atk-s0510a:2377_6: tassa vipassissa bodhiyā pādaputtame uttame bodhirukkhamaṇḍalamāḷake purāṇapulinaṃ vālukaṃ chaḍḍetvā suddhaṃ paṇḍaraṃ pulinaṃ ākiriṃ santhariṃ.
atk-s0510a:2380_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2380_2: bhagavato kāle candabhāgānadiyaṃ susumāro hutvā nibbatto nadītīraṃ upagataṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0510a:2380_4: Bhagavā tassa anukampāya piṭṭhiyaṃ pāde ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2380_5: So tuṭṭho udaggo pītivegena mahussāho hutvā sotaṃ chindanto sīghena javena bhagavantaṃ paratīraṃ nesi.
atk-s0510a:2380_6: Bhagavā tassa cittappasādaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ ito cuto devaloke nibbattissati,
atk-s0510a:2380_7: tato paṭṭhāya sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto ito catunnavutikappe amataṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2381_0: So tathā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:2381_2: So vayappatto “amataṃ pariyesissāmī”ti paribbājako hutvā ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0510a:2381_3: dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho hutvā sāsane pabbajitvā sīladiṭṭhīnaṃ avisodhitattā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ
atk-s0510a:2381_4: asakkonto aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ visesaṃ nibbattetvā aññaṃ byākarontaṃ disvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā saṅkhepena
atk-s0510a:2381_9: So satthu ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0510a:2381_11: Uppanne ābādhe jātasaṃvego vīriyārambhavatthuṃ ñatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2382_1: Evaṃ so katasambhārānurūpena pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento candabhāgānadītīretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2382_3: ca candappabhākiraṇasassirīkābhā nadamānā saddaṃ kurumānā gacchatīti candabhāgānadī,
atk-s0510a:2382_4: tassā candabhāgānadiyā tīre susumāro ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2382_5: Tattha susumāroti khuddakamacchagumbe khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karonto māretīti susumāro,
atk-s0510a:2382_7: Sabhojanapasutohanti ahaṃ sabhojane sakagocare pasuto byāvaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2382_8: Nadītitthaṃ agacchahanti bhagavato āgamanakāle ahaṃ nadītitthaṃ agacchiṃ pattomhi.
atk-s0510a:2383_1: Siddhattho tamhi samayeti tasmiṃ mama titthagamanakāle siddhattho bhagavā aggapuggalo sabbasattesu jeṭṭho
atk-s0510a:2383_2: seṭṭho sayambhū sayameva bhūto jāto buddhabhūto so bhagavā nadiṃ taritukāmo nadītīraṃ upāgami.
atk-s0510a:2384_1: Pettikaṃ visayaṃ mayhanti mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādīhi paramparānītaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2385_1: Mama uggajjanaṃ sutvāti mayhaṃ uggajjanaṃ ārādhanaṃ sutvā mahāmuni bhagavā abhiruhīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2388_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2388_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno piṇḍāya carantaṃ vipassiṃ
atk-s0510a:2388_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso añjaliṃ paggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2388_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjanīyo hutvā ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2388_5: buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā sāsane pasīditvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte
atk-s0510a:2389_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya disvā udānavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2389_2: Vipassiṃ satthavāhagganti vāṇije kantārā vahati tāretīti satthavāho.
atk-s0510a:2389_3: Vāḷakantārā coḷakantārā dubbhikkhakantārā nirudakakantārā yakkhakantārā appabhakkhakantārā ca tāreti
atk-s0510a:2389_4: uttāreti patāreti nittāreti khemantabhūmiṃ pāpetīti attho. Ko so?
atk-s0510a:2389_7: Tathā hi so tividhaṃ bodhiṃ patthayante katapuññasambhāre satte jātikantārā jarākantārā byādhikantārā
atk-s0510a:2389_8: maraṇakantārā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsakantārā ca sabbasmā saṃsārakantārā ca tāreti uttāreti
atk-s0510a:2389_10: Satthavāho ca so aggo seṭṭho padhāno cāti satthavāhaggo,
atk-s0510a:2389_12: Naravaraṃ vināyakanti narānaṃ antare asithilaparakkamoti naravīro, taṃ.
atk-s0510a:2389_13: Visesena katapuññasambhāre satte neti nibbānapuraṃ pāpetīti vināyako, taṃ.
atk-s0510a:2390_1: Adantadamanaṃ tādinti rāgadosamohādikilesasampayuttattā kāyavacīmanodvārehi adante satte dametīti adantadamano, taṃ.
atk-s0510a:2390_3: Mahāvādiṃ mahāmatinti sakasamayaparasamayavādīnaṃ antare attanā samadhikapuggalavirahitattā mahāvādī,
atk-s0510a:2390_4: mahatī pathavisamānā merusamānā ca mati yassa so mahāmati,
atk-s0510a:2390_5: taṃ mahāvādiṃ mahāmatiṃ sambuddhanti iminā tulyādhikaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2393_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2393_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto sāsane abhippasanno ratanattayamāmako vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2393_3: bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso khomadussena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2393_4: So tadeva mūlaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2393_5: Chasu devesu aparāparaṃ dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā tato cavitvā manussaloke cakkavattiādianekavidhamanussasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2393_6: anubhavitvā paripākagate puññasambhāre imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto satthu santike
atk-s0510a:2393_7: dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2394_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento nagare bandhumatiyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2394_3: te bandhū yasmiṃ nagare aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭitā vasanti,
atk-s0510a:2394_5: Ropemi bījasampadanti dānasīlādipuññabījasampattiṃ ropemi paṭṭhapemīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2400_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2400_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto vuttanayena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0510a:2400_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā
atk-s0510a:2400_5: So ekadivasaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya nisinnassa manosilācuṇṇapiñjaraṃ mahantaṃ kadaliphalakaṇṇikaṃ upanesi,
atk-s0510a:2400_7: So tena puññakammena ekādasakkhattuṃ devesu devarajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0510a:2401_0: So evaṃ aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabuddhakāle bhummadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2401_1: Dīghāyukabuddhānañca nāma na anvaddhamāsiko uposatho hoti.
atk-s0510a:2401_2: Tathā hi vipassissa bhagavato chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2401_3: kassapadasabalo pana chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe māse pātimokkhaṃ osāresi,
atk-s0510a:2401_4: tassa pātimokkhassa osāraṇakāle disāvāsikā dve sahāyakā bhikkhū “uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti gacchanti.
atk-s0510a:2401_7: kiṃ nu kho bhedake sati bhijjeyya,
atk-s0510a:2401_9: Tesaṃ okāsaṃ olokayamānā tesaṃ avidūre gacchati.
atk-s0510a:2402_0: Atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattacīvaraṃ datvā sarīravaḷañjanatthaṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dhotahatthapādo hutvā gumbasamīpato nikkhamati.
atk-s0510a:2402_1: Bhummadevatā tassa therassa pacchato pacchato uttamarūpā itthī hutvā kese vidhunitvā saṃvidhāya bandhantī
atk-s0510a:2402_2: viya piṭṭhiyaṃ paṃsuṃ puñchamānā viya sāṭakaṃ saṃvidhāya nivāsayamānā viya ca hutvā therassa padānupadikā
atk-s0510a:2402_4: Ekamante ṭhito sahāyakatthero taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvāva domanassajāto “naṭṭho dāni me iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dīgharattānugato sineho,
atk-s0510a:2402_6: ettakaṃ kālaṃ iminā saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ na kareyya”nti cintetvā āgacchantaṃyeva naṃ “gaṇhāhāvuso,
atk-s0510a:2402_8: tādisena pāpena saddhiṃ ekamaggena na gacchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:2402_9: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadayaṃ tikhiṇasattiṃ gahetvā viddhaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2402_12: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dukkaṭamattampi āpattiṃ na jānāmi,
atk-s0510a:2402_16: kiṃ tvaṃ evaṃvidhena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne hutvā nikkhanto”ti?
atk-s0510a:2402_18: nāhaṃ evarūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ passāmī”ti tassa yāvatatiyaṃ kathentassāpi itaro thero kathaṃ asaddahitvā attanā
atk-s0510a:2402_19: diṭṭhakāraṇaṃyeva bhūtattaṃ katvā gaṇhanto tena saddhiṃ ekamaggena agantvā aññena maggena satthu santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0510a:2402_20: Itaropi bhikkhu aññena maggena satthu santikaṃyeva gato.
atk-s0510a:2403_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ pavisanavelāya so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuṃ uposathagge disvā sañjānitvā
atk-s0510a:2403_2: nāhaṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2403_3: Atha bhummadevatā “bhāriyaṃ mayā kammaṃ kata”nti mahallakaupāsakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ gantvā – “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2403_6: ‘ahaṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ na karomī’ti bahi ṭhitomhī”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0510a:2403_10: Mayā tumhākaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya ‘daḷhā nu kho imesaṃ therānaṃ metti,
atk-s0510a:2403_11: no daḷhā’ti bhijjanābhijjanabhāvaṃ olokentena taṃ kammaṃ kata”nti.
atk-s0510a:2403_16: Devaputto kathentoyeva dibbānubhāvena ṭhatvā therassa pādamūle patitvā “mayhaṃ, bhante, khamatha,
atk-s0510a:2403_18: uposathaṃ karothā”ti theraṃ yācitvā uposathaggaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0510a:2403_19: So thero uposathaṃ tāva ekaṭṭhāne akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2403_20: Mittasanthavavasena pana puna tena saddhiṃ na ekaṭṭhāne vasi.
atk-s0510a:2403_22: Aparabhāge cuditakatthero pana vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2404_0: Bhummadevatā tassa kammassa nissandena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ apāyato na muccittha.
atk-s0510a:2404_1: Sace pana kālena kālaṃ manussattaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0510a:2404_2: aññena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari patati.
atk-s0510a:2404_3: So amhākaṃ bhagavato uppannakāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:2404_5: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā mahallakakāle satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho sāsane pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:2404_6: Tassa upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya ekā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā itthī tasmiṃ gāmaṃ pavisante saddhiṃyeva pavisati,
atk-s0510a:2404_11: Tassa pana purimakammassa nissandena sā aññesaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2405_2: eko imissā amhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0510a:2405_4: Vihāragatampi naṃ sāmaṇerā ceva daharabhikkhū ca parivāretvā “dhāno koṇḍo jāto”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0510a:2405_5: Athassa teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍadhāno theroti nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2405_6: So uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya tehi kariyamānaṃ keḷiṃ sahituṃ asakkonto ummādaṃ gahetvā “tumhe koṇḍā,
atk-s0510a:2405_12: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, dhāna,
atk-s0510a:2405_16: nibaddhaṃ vihesaṃ sahituṃ asakkonto evaṃ kathemī”ti.
atk-s0510a:2405_17: “Tvaṃ pubbe katakammaṃ yāvajjadivasā jīrāpetuṃ na sakkosi,
atk-s0510a:2405_18: puna evaṃ pharusavācaṃ mā vada bhikkhū”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0510a:2407_0: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0510a:2409_0: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti. –
atk-s0510a:2410_0: Imañca pana tassa therassa mātugāmena saddhiṃ vicaraṇabhāvaṃ kosalaraññopi kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2410_2: naṃ vīmaṃsathā”ti pesetvā sayampi mandeneva parivārena saddhiṃ therassa santikaṃ gantvā ekamante olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2410_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero sūcikammaṃ karonto nisinno hoti.
atk-s0510a:2410_4: Sāpi itthī avidūre ṭhāne ṭhitā viya paññāyati.
atk-s0510a:2411_0: Rājā taṃ disvā “atthi taṃ kāraṇa”nti tassā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2411_1: Sā tasmiṃ āgacchante therassa vasanapaṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhā viya ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2411_2: Rājāpi tāya saddhiṃ eva paṇṇasālāyaṃ pavisitvā sabbattha olokento adisvā “nāyaṃ mātugāmo,
atk-s0510a:2411_3: therassa eko kammavipāko”ti saññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ therassa samīpena gacchantopi theraṃ avanditvā tassa
atk-s0510a:2411_4: kāraṇassa abhūtabhāvaṃ ñatvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā theraṃ vanditvā ekamante nisinno “kacci, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2411_10: evarūpenupakkilesena saddhiṃ carantānaṃ tumhākaṃ ke nāma pasīdissanti,
atk-s0510a:2411_11: ito paṭṭhāya vo katthaci gamanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0510a:2411_13: tumhe yonisomanasikāre mā pamajjitthā”ti vatvā nibaddhabhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2411_14: Thero rājānaṃ upatthambhakaṃ labhitvā bhojanasappāyena ekaggacitto hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2412_0: Tadā mahāsubhaddā ugganagare micchādiṭṭhikule vasamānā “satthā maṃ anukampatū”ti uposathaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0510a:2412_1: nirāmagandhā hutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhitā “imāni pupphāni antare aṭṭhatvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2412_3: dasabalo imāya saññāya sve pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatū”ti saccakiriyaṃ katvā aṭṭha sumanapupphamuṭṭhiyo vissajjesi.
atk-s0510a:2412_4: Pupphāni gantvā dhammadesanāvelāya satthu matthake vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2412_5: Satthā taṃ sumanapupphavitānaṃ disvā citteneva subhaddāya bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetvā punadivase aruṇe uṭṭhite ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda,
atk-s0510a:2412_15: Ānando “satthā tādisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ na dāpeti,
atk-s0510a:2412_16: ariyānaṃyeva dāpetī”ti vitakkaṃ uppādetvā gantvā satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0510a:2412_21: bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti “kuṇḍadhānassa salākaṃ dassāmī”ti gamanaṃ abhinīhari.
atk-s0510a:2412_22: Kuṇḍadhāno tassa purāgamanā eva abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā ākāse ṭhatvā “āharāvuso ānanda,
atk-s0510a:2412_24: mādisaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantaṃ na satthā vāretī”ti hatthaṃ pasāretvā salākaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:2412_25: Satthā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2412_26: Yasmā ayaṃ thero rājānaṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvā sappāyāhārapaṭilābhena samāhitacitto vipassanāya kammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2412_28: Evaṃbhūtassāpi imassa therassa guṇe ajānantā ye puthujjanā bhikkhū “ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhati,
atk-s0510a:2412_29: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti vimatiṃ uppādenti.
atk-s0510a:2412_30: Tesaṃ taṃ vimatividhamanatthaṃ thero ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto “pañca chinde”ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2413_1: Evaṃ so pūritapuññasambhārānurūpena arahā hutvā pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena
atk-s0510a:2413_3: Tattha satthāhaṃ sattadivasaṃ nirodhasamāpattivihārena paṭisallīnaṃ vivekabhūtanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2416_0: Sobhito nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato sāgatattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2416_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2416_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto nāmena sobhito nāma hutvā
atk-s0510a:2416_3: tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo.
atk-s0510a:2416_4: So ekadivasaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā sobhamānaṃ uyyānadvārena gacchantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2416_5: disvā atīva pasannamānaso anekehi upāyehi anekehi guṇavaṇṇehi thomanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2416_6: Bhagavā tassa thomanaṃ sutvā “anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane sāgato nāma sāvako bhavissatī”ti byākaraṇaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2416_7: So tato paṭṭhāya puññāni karonto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2416_8: Kappasatasahassadevamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2416_9: Tassa mātāpitaro somanassaṃ vaḍḍhento sujāto āgatoti sāgatoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2416_10: So sāsane pasīditvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0510a:2417_1: Evaṃ so puññasambhārānurūpena pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sobhito nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2417_2: Tattha tadā puññasambhārassa paripūraṇasamaye nāmena sobhito nāma brāhmaṇo ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2418_4: sabbaññu tuvaṃ pathaṃ sappurisamaggaṃ nibbānādhigamanupāyaṃ ācikkhase kathesi desesi vibhaji uttāniṃ akāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2421_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2421_2: bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakulagehe nibbattetvā vuddhippatto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0510a:2421_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2421_4: sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento dānādīni puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2421_5: kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena gacchanto satthāraṃ ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphehi
atk-s0510a:2422_0: So tena puññakammena aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattetvā kassapadasabalassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulaghare
atk-s0510a:2422_1: nibbattitvā parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ dasasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2422_2: katvā “bhagavā mayhaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū”ti pattharaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2422_3: Tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2422_5: tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti kañcanamāṇavotveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2422_6: So vuddhimanvāya tayo vede uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0510a:2423_1: tvaṃ tattha gantvā satthāraṃ idhānehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0510a:2423_4: Desanāpariyosāne so sattahi janehi saddhiṃ sahapaṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2423_7: Te tāvadeva dvaṅgulamattakesamassukā iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2423_9: rājā pajjoto tumhākaṃ pāde vandituṃ dhammañca sotuṃ icchatī”ti satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0510a:2423_12: Thero attaṭṭhamo tattha gantvā rājānaṃ pasādetvā avantīsu sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā puna satthu santikameva gato.
atk-s0510a:2424_3: mama sāvakānaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2424_4: patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaranāthassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2424_5: Tattha padumaṃ nāma cetiyanti padumehi chāditattā vā padumākārehi katattā vā bhagavato vasanagandhakuṭivihārova pūjanīyabhāvena cetiyaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2424_7: āḷavakacetiya”nti vutte tesaṃ yakkhānaṃ nivasanaṭṭhānaṃ pūjanīyaṭṭhānattā cetiyanti vuccati,
atk-s0510a:2424_10: Na hi aparinibbutassa bhagavato sarīradhātūnaṃ abhāvā dhātucetiyaṃ akari.
atk-s0510a:2424_11: Silāsanaṃ kārayitvāti tassā padumanāmikāya gandhakuṭiyā pupphādhāratthāya heṭṭhā phalikamayaṃ silāsanaṃ kāretvā.
atk-s0510a:2424_12: Suvaṇṇenābhilepayinti taṃ silāsanaṃ jambonadasuvaṇṇena abhivisesena lepayiṃ chādesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2425_1: Ratanāmayaṃ sattahi ratanehi kataṃ chattaṃ paggayha muddhani dhāretvā vāḷabījaniñca setapavaracāmariñca paggayha buddhassa abhiropayiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2425_2: Lokabandhussa tādinoti sakalalokabandhusadisassa tādiguṇasamaṅgissa buddhassa dhāresinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2428_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2428_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0510a:2428_3: kulappasādakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā tajjaṃ abhinīhāraṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0510a:2429_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bodhisattassa mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase
atk-s0510a:2429_2: bodhisattena saddhiṃ ekadivasaṃyeva jātoti taṃ divasaṃyeva naṃ dukūlacumbaṭake nipajjāpetvā bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānatthāya nayiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2429_8: kāḷudāyīti ime satta ekadivase jātattā sahajātā nāma ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2429_9: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase jātattā udāyitveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2429_11: So bodhisattena saddhiṃ kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vuddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2430_0: Aparabhāge lokanāthe mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke
atk-s0510a:2430_1: rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante suddhodanamahārājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā purisasahassaparivāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2430_3: So dhammadesanāvelāyaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā saparivāro arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2430_6: Sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2430_7: Arahattappattito paṭṭhāya pana ariyā majjhattāva honti.
atk-s0510a:2430_8: Tasmā raññā pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa na kathesi.
atk-s0510a:2430_10: na sāsanaṃ suyyatī”ti aparaṃ amaccaṃ purisasahassehi pesesi.
atk-s0510a:2430_11: Tasmimpi tathā paṭipanne aparampi pesesīti evaṃ navahi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ nava amacce pesesi.
atk-s0510a:2431_1: “ettakā janā mayi sinehābhāvena dasabalassa idhāgamanatthāya na kiñci kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0510a:2431_6: tvaṃ purisasahassaparivāro rājagahaṃ gantvā dasabalaṃ idhānehī”ti vatvā pesesi.
atk-s0510a:2431_9: evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ idhānessāmī”ti vatvā “yaṃ kiñci katvā mama puttaṃ dassehī”ti vutto rājagahaṃ gantvā

atk-s0510a:2457_0: Tattha buddhassa puttomhīti sabbaññubuddhassa orassa putto amhi.
atk-s0510a:2457_1: Asayhasāhinoti abhisambodhito pubbe ṭhapetvā mahābodhisattaṃ aññehi sahituṃ vahituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhassa
atk-s0510a:2457_2: sakalassa bodhisambhārassa mahākāruṇikādhikārassa ca sahanato vahanato,
atk-s0510a:2457_3: tato parampi aññehi sahituṃ abhibhavituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhānaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ sahanato abhibhavanato,
atk-s0510a:2457_10: siddhatthoti dve nāmāni pitarāyeva gahitānī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0510a:2457_13: Pitupitā mayhaṃ tuvaṃsīti ariyajātivasena mayhaṃ pitu sammāsambuddhassa lokavohārena tvaṃ pitā asi.
atk-s0510a:2457_15: Dhammenāti sabhāvena ariyajāti lokiyajātīti dvinnaṃ jātīnaṃ sabhāvasamodhānena.
atk-s0510a:2457_18: Ettha ca “buddhassa puttomhī”tiādiṃ vadanto thero aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2458_0: Evaṃ pana attānaṃ jānāpetvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhena raññā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasabhojanassa
atk-s0510a:2458_1: pattaṃ pūretvā dinne gamanākāraṃ dassesi. “Kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0510a:2458_9: Yāva ca mama putto imaṃ nagaraṃ sampāpuṇāti,
atk-s0510a:2458_10: tāvassa ito piṇḍapātaṃ harathā”ti vutte thero bhattakiccaṃ katvā rañño parisāya ca dhammaṃ kathetvā satthu
atk-s0510a:2458_11: āgamanato puretarameva sakalarājanivesanaṃ ratanattaye abhippasannaṃ karonto sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva
atk-s0510a:2458_12: satthu āharitabbabhattapuṇṇaṃ pattaṃ ākāse vissajjetvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ upanāmetvā
atk-s0510a:2458_15: Evaṃ saṭṭhiyojanamagge divase divase yojanaṃ gacchantassa bhagavato rājagehatoyeva piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2458_16: Atha naṃ bhagavā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ pituno sakalanivesanaṃ pasādetī”ti “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2458_18: mama sāvakānaṃ kulappasādakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷudāyī”ti kulappasādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2459_1: Evaṃ so katapuññasambhārānurūpena arahattaṃ patvā pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena
atk-s0510a:2459_3: Addhānaṃ paṭipannassāti apararaṭṭhaṃ gamanatthāya dūramaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa.
atk-s0510a:2459_4: Carato cārikaṃ tadāti antomaṇḍalaṃ majjhemaṇḍalaṃ bahimaṇḍalanti tīṇi maṇḍalāni tadā cārikaṃ carato carantassa
atk-s0510a:2459_5: padumuttarabuddhassa bhagavato suphullaṃ suṭṭhu phullaṃ pabodhitaṃ gayha gahetvā na kevalameva padumaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2459_6: uppalañca mallikaṃ vikasitaṃ ahaṃ gayha ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā pūresinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2459_7: Paramannaṃ gahetvānāti paramaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ madhuraṃ sabbasupakkaṃ sāliodanaṃ gahetvā satthuno adāsiṃ bhojesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2460_1: Sakyānaṃ nandijananoti sakyarājakulānaṃ bhagavato ñātīnaṃ ārohapariṇāharūpayobbanavacanālapanasampattiyā nandaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ janento uppādento.
atk-s0510a:2460_2: Ñātibandhu bhavissatīti ñāto pākaṭo bandhu bhavissati.
atk-s0510a:2463_0: Atthadassī tu bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato mogharājattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2463_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2463_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2463_3: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:2463_4: tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle puna brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2463_5: vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato ekadivasaṃ atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ rathiyaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2463_6: disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā “yāvatā rūpino satthā”tiādīhi chahi
atk-s0510a:2463_7: gāthāhi abhitthavitvā bhājanaṃ pūretvā madhuṃ upanesi.
atk-s0510a:2463_9: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabhagavato kāle kaṭṭhavāhanassa nāma rañño amacco
atk-s0510a:2463_10: hutvā nibbatto tena satthu ānayanatthāya pesito satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:2463_11: pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento
atk-s0510a:2463_12: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mogharājāti laddhanāmo bāvarīyabrāhmaṇassa santike uggahitasippo
atk-s0510a:2463_13: saṃvegajāto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tāpasasahassaparivāro ajitādīhi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ pesito
atk-s0510a:2463_14: tesaṃ pannarasamo hutvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanapariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2463_15: Arahattaṃ pana patvā satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti visesena tividhenapi lūkhena samannāgataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhāresi.
atk-s0510a:2463_16: Tena naṃ satthā lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2464_1: Evaṃ so paṇidhānānurūpena arahattaphalaṃ patvā attano pubbasambhāraṃ disvā pubbakammāpadānaṃ pakāsento atthadassī tu bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2465_3: Aneḷakaṃ niddosaṃ makkhikaṇḍavirahitaṃ khuddamadhunā ghaṭaṃ pūretvā taṃ ubhohi hatthehi paggayha pakārena
atk-s0510a:2465_4: ādarena gahetvā mahesino bhagavato upanesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2468_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassimhi
atk-s0510a:2468_2: lokanāthe parinibbute ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto ratanattaye pasanno bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā ucchūhi
atk-s0510a:2468_3: maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā pariyosāne santipadaṃ paṇidhesi.
atk-s0510a:2468_4: So tato cuto devesu ca manussesu ca ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2468_5: nibbatto sāsane pasīditvā saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā adhimuttattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2469_1: Evaṃ katasambhāravasena arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2472_1: Esopāyasmā purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2472_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā gehaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2472_3: pabbajitvā himavantaṃ nissāya vane vasanto bahūni lasuṇāni ropetvā tadeva vanamūlaphalañca khādanto vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:2472_4: So bahūni lasuṇāni kājenādāya manussapathaṃ āharitvā pasanno dānaṃ datvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhesajjatthāya datvā gacchati.
atk-s0510a:2472_5: Evaṃ so yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā teneva puññabalena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2472_6: kamena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde uppanno paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0510a:2473_1: Attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2473_2: Tattha himālayapabbatassa pariyosāne manussānaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne yadā vipassī bhagavā udapādi,
atk-s0510a:2473_4: Lasuṇaṃ upajīvāmīti rattalasuṇaṃ ropetvā tadeva gocaraṃ katvā jīvikaṃ kappemīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2474_1: Khāriyo pūrayitvānāti tāpasabhājanāni lasuṇena pūrayitvā kājenādāya saṅghārāmaṃ saṅghassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2474_2: hemantādīsu tīsu kālesu saṅghassa catūhi iriyāpathehi vasanavihāraṃ agacchiṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2474_3: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittenāti ahaṃ santuṭṭho somanassayuttacittena saṅghassa lasuṇaṃ adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2475_2: niratassahanti narānaṃ aggassa seṭṭhassa assa vipassissa bhagavato sāsane nirato nissesena rato ahanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2475_4: modahanti ahaṃ saṅghassa lasuṇadānaṃ datvā saggamhi suṭṭhu aggasmiṃ devaloke āyukappaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno modiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2478_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa
atk-s0510a:2478_2: bhagavato parinibbutakāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto sāsane pasanno vaḍḍhakīnaṃ mūlaṃ datvā atimanoharaṃ
atk-s0510a:2478_3: dīghaṃ bhojanasālaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā paṇītenāhārena bhojetvā mahādānaṃ datvā cittaṃ pasādesi.
atk-s0510a:2478_4: So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesuyeva saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2478_5: kulagehe nibbatto paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2479_1: Evaṃ so katapuññasambhāravasena arahattaṃ patvā attanā pubbe katakusalakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2479_3: Tattha nibbuteti vadataṃ “mayaṃ buddhā”ti vadantānaṃ antare vare uttame sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbuteti attho.
atk-s0510a:2479_4: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittenāti saddhatāya haṭṭhapahaṭṭho somanassayuttacittatāya pahaṭṭhena cittena uttamaṃ
atk-s0510a:2479_5: thūpaṃ seṭṭhaṃ cetiyaṃ avandiṃ paṇāmayinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2480_1: Vaḍḍhakīhi kathāpetvāti “bhojanasālāya pamāṇaṃ kittaka”nti pamāṇaṃ kathāpetvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2480_2: Mūlaṃ datvānahaṃ tadāti tadā tasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ kammakaraṇatthāya tesaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ mūlaṃ datvā āyāgaṃ
atk-s0510a:2480_3: āyataṃ dīghaṃ bhojanasālaṃ ahaṃ santuṭṭho somanassacittena kārapesahaṃ kārāpesiṃ ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2481_0: 97. Āyāgassa idaṃ phalanti bhojanasāladānassa idaṃ vipākanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2484_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2484_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto puttadārehi vaḍḍhito vibhavasampanno mahābhogo,
atk-s0510a:2484_3: so ratanattaye pasanno saddhājāto dhammasabhāyaṃ dhammāsanassa piṭṭhito ratanamayaṃ dhammacakkaṃ kāretvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2484_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu nibbattaṭṭhānesu sakkasampattiṃ cakkavattisampattiñca anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2484_5: kamena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe uppanno vibhavasampanno sañjātasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2484_6: vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā pubbe katakusalanāmasadisanāmena dhammacakkikattheroti pākaṭo jāto ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2485_1: So puññasambhārānurūpena pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā jātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2485_2: Sīhāsanassa sammukhāti sīhassa bhagavato nisinnassa sammukhā buddhāsanassa abhimukhaṭṭhāneti attho,
atk-s0510a:2485_3: dhammacakkaṃ me ṭhapitanti mayā dhammacakkākārena ubhato sīharūpaṃ dassetvā majjhe ādāsasadisaṃ kāretvā kataṃ dhammacakkaṃ ṭhapitaṃ pūjitaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2485_5: Viññūhi medhāvīhi “atīva sundara”nti vaṇṇitaṃ thomitaṃ sukataṃ dhammacakkanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2486_1: Cāruvaṇṇova sobhāmīti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo iva sobhāmi virocāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2486_3: tassa khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddajātisaṅkhātehi catūhi vaṇṇehi sobhāmi virocāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2486_4: Sayoggabalavāhanoti suvaṇṇasivikādīhi yoggehi ca senāpatimahāmattādīhi sevakehi balehi ca hatthiassarathasaṅkhātehi vāhanehi ca sahitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2486_5: Bahujjanā bahavo manussā anuyantā mamānuvattantā niccaṃ niccakālaṃ parivārentīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2489_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tesu tesu bhavesu nibbānādhigamūpāyabhūtāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2489_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto mahaddhano mahābhogo satthari pasanno sattahi ratanehi
atk-s0510a:2489_3: vicittaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ kapparukkhaṃ kāretvā siddhatthassa bhagavato cetiyassa sammukhe ṭhapetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2489_4: So evarūpaṃ puññaṃ katvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto kamena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2489_5: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā ratanattaye pasanno dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:2489_6: satthu ārādhetvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā pubbe katakusalanāmena kapparukkhiyattheroti pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2490_1: So evaṃ pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2490_2: Thūpaseṭṭhassa sammukhāti seṭṭhassa uttamassa dhātunihitathūpassa cetiyassa sammukhaṭṭhāne vicittadusse
atk-s0510a:2490_3: anekavaṇṇehi visamena visadisena cittena manohare cinapaṭṭasomārapaṭṭādike dusse.
atk-s0510a:2490_4: Lagetvā olaggetvā kapparukkhaṃ ṭhapesiṃ ahaṃ patiṭṭhapesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2495_1: Eso hi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2495_2: kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā gehaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2495_4: Tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā vivekakāmo himavantaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:2495_5: Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ puṇṇacandamiva virocamānaṃ dūratova disvā pasannamānaso ajinacammaṃ aṃse katvā añjaliṃ
atk-s0510a:2495_6: paggayha vanditvā ṭhitakova dasanakhasamodhānañjaliṃ sirasi patiṭṭhapetvā anekāhi upamāhi anekehi thutivacanehi
atk-s0510a:2495_9: “ayaṃ tāpaso anāgate gotamassa nāma bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā vinaye tikhiṇapaññānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākaraṇamadāsi.
atk-s0510a:2495_10: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2495_11: Tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare upālittherassa bhāgineyyo hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2495_12: So kamena vuddhippatto mātulassa upālittherasa santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2495_13: So attano ācariyassa samīpe vasitattā vinayapañhe tikhiṇañāṇo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2495_16: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayapañhe tikhiṇapaññānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yadidaṃ bhāgineyyupālī”ti taṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:2496_1: So evaṃ etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento khīṇāsavasahassehītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2496_2: Tattha ā samantato yāvabhavaggā savanti pavattantīti āsavā.
atk-s0510a:2496_4: te khīṇā sositā visositā viddhaṃsitā yehi teti khīṇāsavā,
atk-s0510a:2496_7: Pareto parivuto lokanāyako lokassa nibbānapāpanako vivekaṃ anuyutto paṭisallituṃ ekībhavituṃ gacchateti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2497_3: Tidaṇḍaparidhārakoti kuṇḍikaṭṭhapanatthāya tidaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dhārentoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2497_4: Bhikkhusaṅghena paribyūḷhaṃ parivāritaṃ lokanāyakaṃ addasanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2500_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:2500_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto puttadārehi vaḍḍhito vibhavasampanno bhagavato caṅkamanatthāya
atk-s0510a:2500_3: sobhanaṃ caṅkamaṃ kāretvā sudhāparikammaṃ kāretvā ādāsatalamiva samaṃ vijjotamānaṃ katvā dīpadhūpapupphādīhi
atk-s0510a:2500_4: sajjetvā bhagavato niyyādetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītenāhārena pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2500_5: So evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:2500_6: Tattha pāḷiyā vuttanayena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā antarā okkākakulappasutoti taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷiyā vuttānusārena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2500_7: Pacchimabhave pana koliyarājavaṃse jāto vayappatto koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāritattā koṭikaṇṇoti,
atk-s0510a:2500_9: So bhagavati pasanno dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2501_1: So arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento anomadassissa muninotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2501_2: Tattha anomadassissāti anomaṃ alāmakaṃ sundaraṃ dassanaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitattā byāmappabhāmaṇḍalopasobhitattā
atk-s0510a:2501_3: ārohapariṇāhena samannāgatattā ca dassanīyaṃ sarīraṃ yassa bhagavato so anomadassī,
atk-s0510a:2501_6: Sudhāya lepanaṃ katvāti sudhāya avalittaṃ katvā dīpadhūpapupphadhajapaṭākādīhi ca alaṅkataṃ caṅkamaṃ kārayiṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2502_2: sabbe ete sattasattaticakkavattirājāno yasodharanāmena ekanāmakāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2503_1: Aṅgīrasoti aṅgato sarīrato niggatā rasmi yassa so aṅgīraso,
atk-s0510a:2503_2: chandadosamohabhayāgatīhi vā pāpācāravasena vā caturāpāyaṃ na gacchatīti nāgo,
atk-s0510a:2503_3: mahanto pūjito ca so nāgo ceti mahānāgo.
atk-s0510a:2506_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2506_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhippatto puttadārehi vaḍḍhito nagaravāsino puññāni
atk-s0510a:2506_3: karonte disvā sayampi puññāni kātukāmo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā thūlapaṭalikādianekāni
atk-s0510a:2506_4: mahārahāni sayanāni paññāpetvā tattha nisinne bhagavati sasaṅghe paṇītenāhārena bhojetvā mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2506_5: So evaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2506_6: kāḷigodhāya nāma deviyā putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2506_7: So viññutaṃ patto ārohapariṇāhahatthapādarūpasampattiyā bhaddattā ca kāḷigodhāya deviyā puttattā ca bhaddiyo kāḷigodhāputtoti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2506_8: Satthari pasīditvā mātāpitaro ārādhetvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2507_1: So arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarasambuddhantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2507_3: Mettacittanti mijjati sinehati nandati sabbasatteti mettā,
atk-s0510a:2507_11: Sabbalokagganāyakanti sakalalokassa aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ nibbānassa nayanato pāpanato nāyakaṃ padumuttarasambuddhaṃ
