atk-s0510a:2508_2: Atha vā bhattapūpakhajjabhojjayāguādayo yāvakālikattā āmisaṃ pānabhojanañca gahetvā puññakkhette anuttare satthuno dadantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2509_1: Āsanaṃ buddhayuttakanti buddhayoggaṃ buddhārahaṃ buddhānucchavikaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ āsananti attho.
atk-s0510a:2512_0: Araññe kuṭikaṃ katvātiādikaṃ āyasmato sanniṭṭhāpakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2512_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2512_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharabandhanena baddho gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā vatthukāmakilesakāme
atk-s0510a:2512_3: pahāya himavantassa avidūre pabbatantare araññavāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:2512_4: Tasmiṃ kāle padumuttaro bhagavā vivekakāmatāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2512_5: Atha so tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā nisīdanatthāya tiṇasantharaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2512_6: Tattha nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ anekehi madhurehi tiṇḍukādīhi phalāphalehi santappesi.
atk-s0510a:2512_7: So tena puññakammena tato cuto devesu ca manussesu ca aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2512_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto saddhāsampanno pabbajito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2512_10: Khuragge arahattaphalappattiyaṃ viya nirussāheneva santipadasaṅkhāte nibbāne suṭṭhu ṭhitattā sanniṭṭhāpakattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2513_1: Arahā pana hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento araññe kuṭikaṃ katvātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2513_2: Tattha araññeti sīhabyagghādīnaṃ bhayena manussā ettha na rajjanti na ramanti na allīyantīti araññaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2513_4: Kuṭikanti tiṇacchadanakuṭikaṃ katvā pabbatantare vasāmi vāsaṃ kappesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2513_5: Lābhena ca alābhena ca yasena ca ayasena ca santuṭṭho vihāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2514_3: jalajuttamena samānaṃ nāmaṃ yassa so jalajuttamanāmako,
atk-s0510a:2517_0: Sumedho nāma sambuddhotiādikaṃ āyasmato pañcahatthiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2517_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0510a:2517_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā ratanattaye pasanno vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:2517_4: So tehi pañcauppalahatthehi vīthiyaṃ caramānaṃ sumedhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2517_5: Tāni gantvā ākāse vitānaṃ hutvā chāyaṃ kurumānāni tathāgateneva saddhiṃ gacchiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2517_6: So taṃ disvā somanassajāto pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro yāvajīvaṃ tadeva puññaṃ anussaritvā tato cuto devaloke
atk-s0510a:2517_7: nibbatto aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhājāto
atk-s0510a:2517_8: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2518_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā paccakkhato paññāya diṭṭhapubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sumedho nāma sambuddhotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2518_2: Tattha sumedhoti sundarā medhā catusaccapaṭivedhapaṭisambhidādayo paññā yassa so bhagavā sumedho sambuddho
atk-s0510a:2521_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katapuññasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2521_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno parinibbutassa vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2521_4: So teneva cittappasādena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto dibbasampattiṃ manussasampattiñcāti
atk-s0510a:2521_5: dve sampattiyo anekakkhattuṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ amhākaṃ sammāsambuddhakāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2521_6: viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā sāsane pabbajito ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2521_7: Tassa rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīsu tattha tattha viharantassa vihāro padumapupphehi chādīyati,
atk-s0510a:2522_1: Attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2522_3: vipassissa sammāsambuddhassa sarīre citamāniyamāne citake āropite suphullaṃ padumakalāpaṃ ahaṃ gahetvā citakaṃ āropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2525_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2525_2: bhagavato kāle aññatarasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā hatthidaṇḍasuvaṇṇādīhi sayanatthāya
atk-s0510a:2525_3: mañcaṃ kāretvā anagghehi vicittattharaṇehi attharitvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2525_5: So tena puññakammena dibbamanussasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2525_6: viññutaṃ patvā satthu sāsane pasanno pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2526_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2529_1: Ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tesu tesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2529_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā uccavatthukaṃ sudhāparikammakataṃ
atk-s0510a:2529_3: rajatarāsisadisaṃ sobhamānaṃ caṅkamaṃ kāretvā muttadalasadisaṃ setapulinaṃ attharitvā bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2529_5: caṅkamaṃ paṭiggahetvā ca pana sukhaṃ kāyacittasamādhiṃ appetvā “ayaṃ anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane sāvako bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2529_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2529_7: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto saddhāsampanno sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā katapuññanāmena
atk-s0510a:2530_1: So ekadivasaṃ attanā pubbe katapuññakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento atthadassissa muninotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2530_2: Tattha atthadassissāti atthaṃ payojanaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ nibbānaṃ dakkhati passatīti atthadassī,
atk-s0510a:2530_3: atha vā atthaṃ nibbānaṃ dassanasīlo jānanasīloti atthadassī,
atk-s0510a:2530_4: tassa atthadassissa munino monena ñāṇena samannāgatassa bhagavato manoramaṃ manallīnaṃ bhāvanīyaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ caṅkamaṃ kāresinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2533_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave nibbānādhigamanatthāya puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2533_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne saddhāsampanne ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbato viññutaṃ patvā gharabandhanena
atk-s0510a:2533_3: baddho ratanattaye pasanno parinibbānamañce nipannaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā sannipatitā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāyo
atk-s0510a:2533_4: ca disvā pasannamānaso nigguṇḍikeṭakanīlakāsokāsitādianekehi sugandhapupphehi pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2533_5: So tena puññakammena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā tusitādīsu dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā tato manussesu
atk-s0510a:2533_6: manussasampattiyo anubhavitvā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhānesu ca sugandhehi pupphehi pūjito ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2533_7: Imasmiṃ pana buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvāpi
atk-s0510a:2533_8: yāva buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānakālo tāva aladdhabuddhadassano bhagavato parinibbānamañce nipannakāleyeva
atk-s0510a:2534_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassavasena pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro lokavidūtiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2534_4: nibbāyissatināsavoti idaṃ parinibbānamañce nipannova padumuttaro bhagavā byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2536_1: So attano paṭipattiṃ dassento pubbakammena saṃyuttotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2536_5: Buddhassa oraso puttoti buddhassa urasā hadayena niggataovādānusāsaniṃ sutvā pattaarahattaphaloti attho.
atk-s0510a:2536_6: Dhammajomhi sunimmitoti dhammato kammaṭṭhānadhammato jāto ariyāya jātiyā sunimmito suṭṭhu nipphāditasabbakicco amhi bhavāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2537_1: Dhammarājaṃ upagammāti dhammena sabbasattānaṃ rājānaṃ issarabhūtaṃ bhagavantaṃ upagantvā samīpaṃ gantvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2537_2: Apucchiṃ pañhamuttamanti uttamaṃ khandhāyatanadhātusaccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pañhaṃ apucchinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2537_3: Kathayanto ca me pañhanti eso amhākaṃ bhagavā me mayhaṃ pañhaṃ kathayanto byākaronto.
atk-s0510a:2537_4: Dhammasotaṃ upānayīti anupādisesanibbānadhātusaṅkhātaṃ dhammasotaṃ dhammapavāhaṃ upānayi pāvisīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2538_4: Nibbāyi anupādānoti upādāne pañcakkhandhe aggahetvā nibbāyi na paññāyi adassanaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0510a:2538_6: Dīpova telasaṅkhayāti vaṭṭitelānaṃ saṅkhayā abhāvā padīpo iva nibbāyīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2539_1: Sattayojanikaṃ āsīti tassa parinibbutassa padumuttarassa bhagavato ratanamayaṃ thūpaṃ sattayojanubbedhaṃ āsi ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2539_2: Dhajaṃ tattha apūjesinti tattha tasmiṃ cetiye sabbabhaddaṃ sabbato bhaddaṃ sabbaso manoramaṃ dhajaṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2540_1: Kassapassa ca buddhassāti padumuttarassa bhagavato kālato paṭṭhāya āgatassa devamanussesu saṃsarato me
atk-s0510a:2540_2: mayhaṃ oraso putto tisso nāma kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako jinasāsane buddhasāsane dāyādo
atk-s0510a:2541_1: Tassa hīnena manasāti tassa mama puttassa tissassa aggasāvakassa hīnena lāmakena manasā cittena abhaddakaṃ
atk-s0510a:2541_2: asundaraṃ ayuttakaṃ “antako pacchimo”ti vācaṃ vacanaṃ abhāsiṃ kathesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2541_3: Tena kammavipākenāti tena arahantabhakkhānasaṅkhātassa akusalakammassa vipākena.
atk-s0510a:2541_4: Pacchime addasaṃ jinanti pacchime pariyosāne parinibbānakāle mallānaṃ upavattane sālavane parinibbānamañce
atk-s0510a:2541_5: nipannaṃ jinaṃ jitasabbamāraṃ amhākaṃ gotamasammāsambuddhaṃ addasaṃ ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2541_7: Tassa pacchā tassa bhagavato avasānakāle nibbānāsannakāle me mayhaṃ bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ catusaccapaṭivijjhanaṃ āsi ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2542_1: Pabbājesi mahāvīroti mahāvīriyo sabbasattahito karuṇāyutto jitamāro muni mallānaṃ upavattane sālavane
atk-s0510a:2542_2: pacchime sayane parinibbānamañce sayitova maṃ pabbājesīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2543_1: Ajjeva dāni pabbajjāti ajja eva bhagavato parinibbānadivaseyeva mama pabbajjā,
atk-s0510a:2543_3: ajja eva dvipaduttamassa sammukhā parinibbānaṃ ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2546_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katapuññasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2546_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthari pasīditvā sattaratanamayaṃ suvaṇṇagghiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2546_4: Tāni pupphāni ākāsaṃ samuggantvā vitānākārena aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2546_5: Atha naṃ bhagavā “anāgate gotamassa nāma bhagavato sāsane cundo nāma sāvako bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:2546_6: So tena puññakammena tato cuto devaloke upapanno kamena chasu kāmāvacaradevesu sukhaṃ anubhavitvā manussesu
atk-s0510a:2546_7: cakkavattiādisampattiyo ca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule rūpasāriyā putto sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0510a:2546_9: Tassa viññutaṃ pattassa ārohapariṇāharūpavayānaṃ sundaratāya sakārassa cakāraṃ katvā cundoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2546_10: So vayappatto gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ pabbajjāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā bhātuttherassa santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2547_1: So pattaarahattaphalo ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2548_1: Vitiṇṇakaṅkho sambuddhoti visesena maggādhigamena vicikicchāya khepitattā vitiṇṇakaṅkho asaṃsayo sambuddho.
atk-s0510a:2548_2: Tiṇṇoghehi purakkhatoti kāmoghādīnaṃ catunnaṃ oghānaṃ tiṇṇattā atikkantattā oghatiṇṇehi khīṇāsavehi purakkhato parivāritoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2549_1: Upaṭṭhahiṃ mahāvīranti uttamatthassa nibbānassa pattiyā pāpuṇanatthāya kappasatasahassādhikesu caturāsaṅkhyeyyesu
atk-s0510a:2549_2: kappesu pāramiyo pūrentena katavīriyattā mahāvīraṃ buddhaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2549_3: Aññe ca pesale bahūti na kevalameva buddhaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2549_4: pesale piyasīle sīlavante aññe ca bahuaggappatte sāvake,
atk-s0510a:2549_5: me mayhaṃ bhātaraṃ sāriputtattherañca upaṭṭhahinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2550_1: Bhātaraṃ me upaṭṭhahitvāti mayhaṃ bhātaraṃ upaṭṭhahitvā vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā tassa parinibbutakāle bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2550_2: paṭhamaṃ parinibbutattā tassa dhātuyo gahetvā pattamhi okiritvā lokajeṭṭhassa narānaṃ āsabhassa buddhassa
atk-s0510a:2551_1: Ubho hatthehi paggayhāti taṃ mahā dinnaṃ dhātuṃ so bhagavā attano ubhohi hatthehi pakārena gahetvā taṃ
atk-s0510a:2551_2: dhātuṃ saṃsuṭṭhu dassayanto aggasāvakaṃ sāriputtattheraṃ kittayi pakāsesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2556_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu pūritapuññasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2556_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto vibhavasampanno saddhājāto bhagavati
atk-s0510a:2556_3: pasanno gimhakāle suvaṇṇarajatamuttāmaṇimayaṃ bījaniṃ kāretvā bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2556_4: So tena puññakammena devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā imassa amhākaṃ sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0510a:2556_5: uppannakāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto gharabandhanena bandhitvā gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajjāya ca
atk-s0510a:2556_6: ānisaṃsaṃ disvā saddhāsampanno sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2557_1: So “kena mayā puññakammena ayaṃ lokuttarasampatti laddhā”ti attano pubbakammaṃ anussaranto taṃ paccakkhato
atk-s0510a:2557_4: Bījanikā mayā dinnāti visesena santāpayantānaṃ sattānaṃ santāpaṃ nibbāpenti sītalaṃ vātaṃ janetīti bījanī,
atk-s0510a:2557_6: sā sattaratanamayā vijjotamānā bījanikā mayā kārāpetvā dinnāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2560_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2560_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto sakkaṭabyākaraṇe vedattaye ca pāraṅgato gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2560_3: pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:2560_4: Tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā vivekakāmatāya uccaṃ ekaṃ pabbataṃ āruyha jalitaggikkhanto viya nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2560_5: Taṃ tathānisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā tāpaso somanassajāto añjaliṃ paggayha anekehi kāraṇehi thomesi.
atk-s0510a:2560_6: So tena puññakammena tato cuto chasu kāmāvacaradevesu dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato manussaloke sataraṃsī nāma cakkavattī rājā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2560_7: Tampi sampattiṃ anekakkhattuṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto pubbapuññasambhāravasena
atk-s0510a:2560_8: ñāṇassa paripakkattā sattavassikova pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2561_1: So “ahaṃ kena kammena sattavassikova santipadaṃ anuppattosmī”ti saramāno pubbakammaṃ ñāṇena paccakkhato
atk-s0510a:2561_2: disvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ udānavasena pakāsento ucciyaṃ selamāruyhātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2561_3: Tattha ucciyanti uccaṃ selamayaṃ pabbataṃ āruyha nisīdi padumuttaroti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2561_4: Pabbatassāvidūramhīti bhagavato nisinnassa pabbatassa āsannaṭṭhāneti attho.
atk-s0510a:2561_5: Brāhmaṇo mantapāragūti mantasaṅkhātassa vedattayassa pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ koṭiṃ gato eko brāhmaṇoti attho,
atk-s0510a:2561_6: aññaṃ viya attānaṃ niddisati ayaṃ mantapāragūti.
atk-s0510a:2561_7: Upaviṭṭhaṃ mahāvīranti tasmiṃ pabbate nisinnaṃ vīravantaṃ jinaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2561_9: Devadevaṃ sakalachakāmāvacarabrahmadevānaṃ atidevaṃ narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ āsataṃ seṭṭhaṃ lokanāyakaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ
atk-s0510a:2561_10: nayantaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpentaṃ ahaṃ añjaliṃ dasanakhasamodhānañjalipuṭaṃ sirasi muddhani paggahetvāna patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:2562_0: 12. Abhāsathāti “yenāyaṃ añjalī dinno…pe… arahā so bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2565_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2565_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā sukhamanubhavanto satthu
atk-s0510a:2565_3: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthari pasanno dantasuvaṇṇarajatamuttamaṇimayaṃ mahārahaṃ mañcaṃ kārāpetvā cīnapaṭṭakambalādīni
atk-s0510a:2565_5: Bhagavā tassa anuggahaṃ karonto tattha sayi.
atk-s0510a:2565_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto tadanurūpaṃ ākāsagamanasukhaseyyādisukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2565_7: buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pāpuṇitvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2566_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2567_1: Sukhette bījasampadāti yathā tiṇakacavararahite kaddamādisampanne sukhette vuttabījāni sāduphalāni nipphādenti,
atk-s0510a:2567_2: evameva rāgadosādidiyaḍḍhasahassakilesasaṅkhātatiṇakacavararahite suddhasantāne puññakkhette vuttadānāni appānipi samānāni mahapphalāni hontīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2570_1: Ayampi purimamunivaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2570_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto parinibbute bhagavati nagaravāsino bodhipūjaṃ kurumāne disvā vicittaghaṭe
atk-s0510a:2570_9: Evaṃ so devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā sabbapariḷāhavippamutto nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sītibhāvamupagato
atk-s0510a:2570_10: sukhito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasanno pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2571_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumutarassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2571_3: Mahābodhimaho ahūti mahābodhirukkhassa pūjā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2571_4: Vicittaṃ ghaṭamādāyāti anekehi cittakammasuvaṇṇakammehi vicittaṃ sobhamānaṃ gandhodakapuṇṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ gahetvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2572_0: 26. Nhānakāle ca bodhiyāti bodhiyā pūjākaraṇasamayeti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2575_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarajinādicce
atk-s0510a:2575_2: loke pātubhūte ekasmiṃ vibhavasampannakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya mahaddhano mahābhogo gharāvāsaṃ vasamāno
atk-s0510a:2575_3: sāsane pasanno satthari pasādabahumāno ājānīyena sindhavena pūjaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0510a:2575_4: pūjetvā ca pana “buddhādīnaṃ samaṇānaṃ hatthiassādayo na kappanti,
atk-s0510a:2575_5: kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ dassāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ agghāpetvā tadagghanakena kahāpaṇena kappiyaṃ kappāsikakambalakojavādikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2575_7: So tena puññakammena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devesu ca manussesu ca hatthiassādianekavāhanasampanno
atk-s0510a:2575_8: sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhāsampanno sāsane
atk-s0510a:2575_9: pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0510a:2576_1: So “kena nu kho kāraṇena idaṃ mayā santipadaṃ adhigata”nti upadhārento pubbakammaṃ ñāṇena paccakkhato
atk-s0510a:2576_2: ñatvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ udānavasena pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2576_4: Ājānīyamadāsahanti ājānīyaṃ uttamajātisindhavaṃ ahaṃ adāsiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2577_1: Sapattabhāroti sassa attano pattāni aṭṭha parikkhārāni bhārāni yassa so sapattabhāro,
atk-s0510a:2579_0: 40. Carimoti pariyosāno koṭippatto bhavoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2582_1: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2582_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto saddhājāto sāsane pasanno dānaphalaṃ saddahanto
atk-s0510a:2582_4: datvā ca pana bhojanasālāyaṃ bhojanatthāya nisinnāsanaṃ jātisumanamallikādīhi alaṅkari.
atk-s0510a:2582_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto anekavidhaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2582_7: kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddho pasanno pabbajitvā na cirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2583_1: So evaṃ pattasantipado “kena nu kho puññena idaṃ santipadaṃ anuppatta”nti ñāṇena upadhārento pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2583_4: Piṇḍapātaṃ adāsahanti tattha tattha laddhānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ kabaḷaṃ kabaḷaṃ katvā pātabbato khāditabbato āhāro piṇḍapāto,
atk-s0510a:2584_0: 44. Akittayi piṇḍapātanti mayā dinnapiṇḍapātassa guṇaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2585_1: Saṃvuto pātimokkhasminti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena saṃvuto pihito paṭicchannoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2585_2: Indriyesu ca pañcasūti cakkhundriyādīsu pañcasu indriyesu rūpādīhi gopito indriyasaṃvarasīlañca gopitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2588_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro uppannuppannabhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2588_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāse vasanto bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2588_3: patiṭṭhito saddho pasanno mahājanehi bodhipūjaṃ kayiramānaṃ disvā sayampi bodhiṃ parivāretvā dīpaṃ jāletvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2588_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā sabbattheva uppannabhave
atk-s0510a:2588_5: jalamāno jotisampannavimānādīsu vasitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2588_6: vuddhippatto saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2589_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2589_3: Ujudiṭṭhi ahosahanti vaṅkaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ chaḍḍetvā uju avaṅkaṃ nibbānābhimukhaṃ pāpuṇanasammādiṭṭhi ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2590_1: Padīpadānaṃ pādāsinti ettha pakārena dibbati jotatīti padīpo,
atk-s0510a:2593_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2593_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā sundarehi anekehi vatthehi
atk-s0510a:2593_4: So tena puññakammena uppannuppannabhave uccakule nibbatto pūjaniyo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2593_5: Aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya puttadārehi vaḍḍhitvā mahābhogo
atk-s0510a:2593_6: yasavā saddhājāto satthari pasanno gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2594_1: So pattaarahattaphalo pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2594_3: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittenāti somanassasahagatacittayuttattā haṭṭho paripuṇṇarūpakāyo saddhāsampayuttacittatāya
atk-s0510a:2594_5: Dhajamāropayiṃ ahanti dhunāti kampati calatīti dhajaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2594_6: taṃ dhajaṃ āropayiṃ veḷagge laggetvā pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2595_1: Patitapattāni gaṇhitvāti patitāni bodhipattāni gahetvā ahaṃ bahi chaḍḍesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2595_2: Antosuddhaṃ bahisuddhanti anto cittasantānanāmakāyato ca bahi cakkhusotādirūpakāyato ca suddhiṃ adhi
atk-s0510a:2595_3: visesena muttaṃ kilesato vimuttaṃ anāsavaṃ sambuddhaṃ viya sammukhā uttamaṃ bodhiṃ avandiṃ paṇāmamakāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2598_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katakusalasambhāro padumuttaramuninā dhammapajjote jotamāne ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2598_3: So satthari pasīditvā mahājanena saddhiṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto dhajena saha padumakalāpaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0510a:2598_5: taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā ativiya somanassajāto ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2598_6: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā jīvitapariyosāne sagge nibbatto dhajamiva chakāmāvacare pākaṭo pūjito ca dibbasampattimanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2598_7: manussesu ca cakkavattisampattimanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne saddhāsampanne ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2598_8: kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhājāto pañcavassikova pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā katapuññanāmena
atk-s0510a:2599_1: Attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento catusaccaṃ pakāsentotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2599_2: Tattha saccanti tathaṃ avitathaṃ aviparītaṃ saccaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2599_4: taṃ catusaccaṃ pakāsento loke pākaṭaṃ karontoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2599_6: Amataṃ vuṭṭhinti amatamahānibbānavuṭṭhidhāraṃ pavassanto paggharanto sadevakaṃ lokaṃ temento sabbakilesapariḷāhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2600_1: Sadhajaṃ padumaṃ gayhāti dhajena saha ekato katvā padumaṃ padumakalāpaṃ gahetvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2600_2: Aḍḍhakose ṭhito ahanti ubho ukkhipitvā ṭhito ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2603_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:2603_2: bhagavato kāle aññatarasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto sukhappatto sāsane pasanno asanabodhito phalaṃ
atk-s0510a:2603_3: gahetvā tato vuṭṭhitabodhitaruṇe gahetvā bodhiṃ ropesi,
atk-s0510a:2603_4: yathā na vinassati tathā udakāsiñcanādikammena rakkhitvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2603_5: So tena puññena devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto paripakkasambhārattā
atk-s0510a:2603_6: sattavassikova samāno pabbajitvā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0510a:2604_1: So pubbasambhāramanussaritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento jātiyā sattavassohantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2604_2: Tattha jātiyāti mātugabbhato nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2604_3: Sattavasso paripuṇṇasarado ahaṃ lokanāyakaṃ tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2605_4: pañcakkhandhato ca mutto hutvā jāto nibbatto buddho jātoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2606_1: Asano nāmadheyyenāti nāmapaññattiyā nāmasaññāya asano nāma asanarukkho bodhi ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2606_2: Dharaṇīruhapādapoti vallirukkhapabbatagaṅgāsāgarādayo dhāretīti dharaṇī, kā sā? Pathavī,
atk-s0510a:2606_5: pādasaṅkhātena mūlena siñcitodakaṃ pivati āporasaṃ sinehaṃ dhāretīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2606_6: Dharaṇīruho ca so pādapo cāti dharaṇīruhapādapo,
atk-s0510a:2606_7: taṃ uttamaṃ asanaṃ bodhiṃ pañca vassāni paricariṃ posesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2607_1: Pupphitaṃ pādapaṃ disvāti taṃ mayā positaṃ asanabodhirukkhaṃ pupphitaṃ accharayoggabhūtapupphattā abbhutaṃ
atk-s0510a:2607_2: lomahaṃsakaraṇaṃ disvā sakaṃ kammaṃ attano kammaṃ pakittento pakārena kathayanto buddhaseṭṭhassa santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:2612_0: Pavanaṃ kānanaṃ disvātiādikaṃ āyasmato sakacintaniyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2612_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2612_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya tassa bhagavato āyupariyosāne uppanno dharamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2612_3: bhagavantaṃ apāpuṇitvā parinibbutakāle isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vasanto vivekaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0510a:2612_4: vanaṃ patvā tatthevekāya kandarāya pulinacetiyaṃ katvā bhagavati saññaṃ katvā sadhātukasaññañca katvā
atk-s0510a:2612_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto dvīsu aggaṃ aggasampattiṃ aggañca cakkavattisampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2612_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vibhavasampanno saddhāsampanno satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2613_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pavanaṃ kānanaṃ disvātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2613_2: Tattha pavananti pakārena vanaṃ patthaṭaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ gahanabhūtanti pavanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2613_3: Kānanaṃ avakucchitaṃ ānanaṃ avahanaṃ satataṃ sīhabyagghayakkharakkhasamaddahatthiassasupaṇṇauragehi vihaṅgagaṇasaddakukkuṭakokilehi
atk-s0510a:2613_5: taṃ kānanasaṅkhātaṃ pavanaṃ manussasaddavirahitattā appasaddaṃ nissaddanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2613_7: Isīnaṃ anuciṇṇanti buddhapaccekabuddhaarahantakhīṇāsavasaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ anuciṇṇaṃ nisevitanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2613_8: Āhutīnaṃ paṭiggahanti āhunaṃ vuccati pūjāsakkāraṃ paṭiggahaṃ gehasadisanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2614_1: Thūpaṃ katvāna veḷunāti veḷupesikāhi cetiyaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2614_2: Nānāpupphaṃ samokirinti campakādīhi anekehi pupphehi samokiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2614_3: Sammukhā viya sambuddhanti sajīvamānassa sambuddhassa sammukhā iva nimmitaṃ uppāditaṃ cetiyaṃ ahaṃ abhi visesena vandiṃ paṇāmamakāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2617_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa
atk-s0510a:2617_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhāsampanno dhammaṃ sutvā somanassappatto nānāpupphāni
atk-s0510a:2617_3: ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā buddhassa upari abbhukkiri.
atk-s0510a:2617_4: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto saggasampattiñca cakkavattisampattiñca anubhavitvā sabbattha
atk-s0510a:2617_5: pūjito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbato vuddhippatto sāsane pasīditvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2617_8: tasmiṃ ākāse pupphānaṃ avakiritattā avopupphiyattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2618_1: Evaṃ pattasantipado attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vihārā abhinikkhammātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2618_2: Tattha vihārāti visesena harati catūhi iriyāpathehi apatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ āharati pavatteti etthāti vihāro,
atk-s0510a:2618_3: tasmā vihārā abhi visesena nikkhamma nikkhamitvā.
atk-s0510a:2618_4: Abbhuṭṭhāsi ca caṅkameti caṅkamanatthāya saṭṭhiratane caṅkame abhivisesena uṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0510a:2618_6: Catusaccaṃ pakāsentoti tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamanto dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggasaccasaṅkhātaṃ catusaccaṃ
atk-s0510a:2618_7: pakāsento pākaṭaṃ karonto amataṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ desento vibhajanto uttānīkaronto tasmiṃ caṅkameti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2619_2: buddhaseṭṭhassa tādinoti seṭṭhassa tādiguṇasamaṅgissa sikhissa buddhassa giraṃ saddaṃ ghosaṃ aññāya jānitvā.
atk-s0510a:2619_3: Nānāpupphaṃ gahetvānāti nāgapunnāgādianekāni pupphāni gahetvā āharitvā.
atk-s0510a:2619_4: Ākāsamhi samokirinti caṅkamantassa bhagavato muddhani ākāse okiriṃ pūjesiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2620_1: Tena kammena dvipadindāti dvipadānaṃ devabrahmamanussānaṃ inda padhānabhūta.
atk-s0510a:2620_3: Pattomhi acalaṃ ṭhānanti tumhākaṃ santike pabbajitvā acalaṃ ṭhānaṃ nibbānaṃ patto amhi bhavāmi.
atk-s0510a:2620_4: Hitvā jayaparājayanti dibbamanussasampattisaṅkhātaṃ jayañca caturāpāyadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ parājayañca hitvā chaḍḍetvā nibbānaṃ pattosmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2623_0: Sindhuyā nadiyā tīretiādikaṃ āyasmato paccāgamaniyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2623_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2623_2: bhagavato kāle sindhuyā gaṅgāya samīpe cakkavākayoniyaṃ nibbatto pubbasambhārayuttattā pāṇino akhādanto
atk-s0510a:2623_4: Tasmiṃ samaye vipassibhagavā sattānuggahaṃ karonto tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2623_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe so cakkavāko vijjotamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tuṇḍena sālarukkhato sālapupphaṃ chinditvā āgamma pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2623_6: So teneva cittappasādena tato cuto devaloke uppanno aparāparaṃ chakāmāvacarasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato
atk-s0510a:2623_7: cuto manussaloke uppajjitvā cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2623_8: nibbatto viññutaṃ patto pubbacaritavasena satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2623_9: cakkavāko hutvā bhagavantaṃ disvā katthaci gantvā pupphamāharitvā pūjitattā pubbapuññanāmena paccāgamaniyattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2624_1: Attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sindhuyā nadiyā tīretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2624_2: Sīti saddaṃ kurumānā dhunāti kampatīti sindhu,
atk-s0510a:2624_4: Cakkavāko ahaṃ tadāti cakkaṃ sīghaṃ gacchantaṃ iva udake vā thale vā ākāse vā sīghaṃ vāti gacchatīti cakkavāko.
atk-s0510a:2624_5: Tadā vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanakāle ahaṃ cakkavāko ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2624_6: Suddhasevālabhakkhohanti aññagocaraamissattā suddhasevālameva khādanto ahaṃ vasāmi.
atk-s0510a:2624_7: Pāpesu ca susaññatoti pubbavāsanāvasena pāpakaraṇe suṭṭhu saññato tīhi dvārehi saññato susikkhito.
atk-s0510a:2625_1: Addasaṃ virajaṃ buddhanti rāgadosamohavirahitattā virajaṃ nikkilesaṃ buddhaṃ addasaṃ addakkhiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2625_2: Gacchantaṃ anilañjaseti anilañjase ākāsapathe gacchantaṃ buddhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2625_3: Tuṇḍena mayhaṃ mukhatuṇḍena tālaṃ sālapupphaṃ paggayha paggahetvā vipassissābhiropayiṃ vipassissa bhagavato pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2628_0: Usabhaṃ pavaraṃ vīrantiādikaṃ āyasmato parappasādakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2628_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2628_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2628_3: sākkharappabhedānaṃ lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo nāmena selabrāhmaṇoti pākaṭo siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2628_4: disvā dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi asītianubyañjanehi cāti sayaṃ sobhamānaṃ disvā pasannamānaso anekehi
atk-s0510a:2628_6: So tena puññakammena devaloke sakkamārādayo cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu cakkavattisampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:2628_7: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīdisvā
atk-s0510a:2628_9: buddhassa thutiyā sattānaṃ sabbesaṃ cittappasādakaraṇato parappasādakattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2629_1: Ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento usabhaṃ pavaraṃ vīrantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2629_2: Tattha usabhanti vasabho nisabho visabho āsabhoti cattāro jeṭṭhapuṅgavā.
atk-s0510a:2629_6: gavakoṭisatasahassajeṭṭhako āsabhoti ca yassa kassaci thutiṃ karontā brāhmaṇapaṇḍitā bahussutā attano attano paññāvasena thutiṃ karonti,
atk-s0510a:2629_7: buddhānaṃ pana sabbākārena thutiṃ kātuṃ samattho ekopi natthi.
atk-s0510a:2630_0: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0510a:2631_0: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. –
atk-s0510a:2632_8: Suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo iva vaṇṇo yassa sambuddhassa so suvaṇṇavaṇṇo,
atk-s0510a:2632_9: taṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhaṃ disvā ko nāma satto nappasīdatīti.
atk-s0510a:2635_0: Vessabhū nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato bhisadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2635_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa
atk-s0510a:2635_2: bhagavato kāle himavantasmiṃ hatthiyoniyaṃ nibbatto tasmiṃ paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:2635_3: Tasmiṃ samaye vessabhū bhagavā vivekakāmo himavantamagamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2635_4: Taṃ disvā so hatthināgo pasannamānaso bhisamuḷālaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ bhojesi.
atk-s0510a:2635_5: So tena puññakammena hatthiyonito cuto devaloke uppajjitvā tattha cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2635_6: manussattamāgato manussesu cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mahābhoge aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2635_7: kule nibbatto pubbavāsanābalena satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2636_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento vessabhū nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2636_2: Tattha vessabhūti vessaṃ bhunāti atikkamatīti vessabhū.
atk-s0510a:2636_3: Atha vā vesse vāṇijakamme vā kāmarāgādike vā kusalādikamme vā vatthukāmakilesakāme vā bhunāti abhibhavatīti vessabhū,
atk-s0510a:2636_5: Isīnaṃ tatiyo ahūti kusaladhamme esati gavesatīti isi, “vipassī, sikhī,
atk-s0510a:2636_6: vessabhū”ti vuttattā tatiyo isi tatiyo bhagavā ahu ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2636_7: Kānanaṃ vanamoggayhāti kānanasaṅkhātaṃ vanaṃ ogayha ogahetvā pāvisīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2637_1: Bhisamuḷālaṃ gaṇhitvāti dvipadacatuppadānaṃ chātakaṃ bhisati hiṃsati vināsetīti bhisaṃ, ko so?
atk-s0510a:2638_1: Karena ca parāmaṭṭhoti taṃ mayā dinnadānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2638_2: vessabhūvarabuddhinā uttamabuddhinā vessabhunā karena hatthatalena parāmaṭṭho katasamphasso ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2638_4: samaṃ tena kutottarinti tena sukhena samaṃ sukhaṃ nābhijānāmi,
atk-s0510a:2638_5: tato uttariṃ tato paraṃ tato adhikaṃ sukhaṃ kutoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2641_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2641_2: bhagavato kāle himavantappadese nesādakule uppanno migasūkarādayo vadhitvā khādanto viharati.
atk-s0510a:2641_3: Tadā lokanātho lokānuggahaṃ sattānuddayatañca paṭicca himavantamagamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2641_4: Tadā so nesādo bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano khādanatthāya ānītaṃ varamadhuramaṃsaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2641_7: So teneva puññena teneva somanassena tato cuto sugatīsu saṃsaranto cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2641_8: manussesu cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto satthari pasīditvā
atk-s0510a:2642_1: Catupaṭisambhidāpañcābhiññādibhedaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento giriduggacaro āsintiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2642_2: Girati saddaṃ karotīti giri, ko so?
atk-s0510a:2642_7: Tasmiṃ giridugge pabbatantare caro caraṇasīlo āsiṃ ahosiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2642_8: Abhijātova kesarīti abhi visesena jāto nibbatto kesarīva kesarasīho iva giriduggasmiṃ carāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2643_1: Giriduggaṃ pavisiṃ ahanti ahaṃ tadā tena maṃsadānena pītisomanassajāto pabbatantaraṃ pāvisiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2646_0: Pakkhijāto tadā āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato vatthadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2646_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2646_2: bhagavato kāle supaṇṇayoniyaṃ nibbatto gandhamādanapabbataṃ gacchantaṃ atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2646_3: pasannamānaso supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā mahagghaṃ dibbavatthaṃ ādāya bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2646_4: Sopi bhagavā paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2646_5: So teneva somanassena vītināmetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto tattha aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:2646_6: puññāni anubhavitvā tato manussesu manussasampattinti sabbattha mahagghaṃ vatthābharaṇaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2646_7: tato uppannuppannabhave vatthacchāyāya gatagataṭṭhāne vasanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2646_8: viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva chaḷabhiññappattakhīṇāsavo ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2647_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pakkhijāto tadā āsintiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2647_2: Tattha pakkhijātoti pakkhandati upalavati sakuṇo etenāti pakkhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2647_5: Supaṇṇoti sundaraṃ paṇṇaṃ pattaṃ yassa so supaṇṇo,
atk-s0510a:2647_7: Garuḷādhipoti nāge gaṇhanatthāya garuṃ bhāraṃ pāsāṇaṃ giḷantīti garuḷā,
atk-s0510a:2650_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:2650_2: bhagavato kāle vānarayoniyaṃ nibbatto himavante kapirājā hutvā paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:2650_3: Tasmiṃ samaye anomadassī bhagavā tassānukampāya himavantamagamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2650_4: Atha so kapirājā bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sumadhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ khuddamadhunā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2650_5: Atha bhagavā tassa passantasseva taṃ sabbaṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2650_6: Atha so somanassasampannahadayo teneva pītisomanassena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2650_7: aparāparaṃ tattha dibbasukhamanubhavitvā manussesu ca manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2650_8: vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiññappatto ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2651_1: So aparabhāge attanā katakusalabījaṃ disvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento anomadassī bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2651_3: appamāṇe nirūpadhīti so bhagavā sabbaloke appamāṇe satte “sukhī hontū”tiādinā nirupadhi upadhivirahitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2651_4: katvā mettāya mettacittena aphari patthari vaḍḍhesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2652_0: 54. Kapi ahaṃ tadā āsinti tadā tassāgamanakāle kapirājā ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2655_0: Sumano nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato sumanattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2655_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa
atk-s0510a:2655_2: bhagavato kāle mālākārassa kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhājāto bhagavati pasannamānaso sumanamālāmuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0510a:2655_4: So tena puññena devamanussesu dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2655_5: vuddhimanvāya puttadārehi vaḍḍhitvā sumananāmena pākaṭo satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2656_1: So arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sumano nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2656_2: Sundaraṃ manaṃ cittaṃ yassa so sumano.
atk-s0510a:2656_3: Saddhāpasādabahumānena yutto nāmena sumano nāma mālākāro tadā ahaṃ ahosiṃ.
atk-s0510a:2657_1: Sikhino lokabandhunoti sikhā muddhā kāsatīti sikhī.
atk-s0510a:2657_2: Atha vā sampayuttasampayoge khādati viddhaṃsetīti sikhī, kā sā?
atk-s0510a:2657_7: evamayampi bhagavā nīlapītādiraṃsīhi jotati sakalalokasannivāse pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0510a:2657_8: Sakasantānagatasabbakilese soseti viddhaṃseti jhāpetīti vohāranāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2657_11: tassa sikhino lokabandhuno bhagavato sumanapupphaṃ abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2660_0: Abhītarūpaṃ sīhaṃ vātiādikaṃ āyasmato pupphacaṅkoṭiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2660_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa
atk-s0510a:2660_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto mahāvibhavasampanno satthari pasīditvā pasannākāraṃ
atk-s0510a:2660_3: dassento suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ anojapupphamocinitvā caṅkoṭakaṃ pūretvā bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā “bhagavā,
atk-s0510a:2660_4: imassa nissandena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne suvaṇṇavaṇṇo pūjanīyo hutvā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇeyya”nti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2660_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu nibbatto sabbattha pūjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo abhirūpo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2660_6: So aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā
atk-s0510a:2660_7: pabbajito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2661_1: So pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento abhītarūpaṃ sīhaṃ vātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2661_2: Tattha sīhanti dvipadacatuppadādayo satte abhibhavati ajjhottharatīti sīho,
atk-s0510a:2661_4: taṃ abhītarūpaṃ sīhaṃ iva nisinnaṃ pūjesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2661_5: Pakkhīnaṃ aggaṃ garuḷarājaṃ iva pavaraṃ uttamaṃ byaggharājaṃ iva abhi visesena jātaṃ sabbasīhānaṃ visesaṃ
atk-s0510a:2661_6: kesarasīhaṃ iva tilokassa saraṇaṃ sikhiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2661_8: Anejaṃ nikkilesaṃ khandhamārādīhi aparājitaṃ nisinnaṃ sikhinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2661_9: Māraṇānagganti sabbakilesānaṃ māraṇe sosane viddhaṃsane aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ kilese mārentānaṃ paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2661_11: Bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ parivāritaṃ parivāretvā nisinnaṃ sikhinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2662_1: Caṅkoṭake ṭhapetvānāti uttamaṃ anojapupphaṃ karaṇḍake pūretvā sikhīsambuddhaṃ seṭṭhaṃ samokiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2667_0: Āpāṭaliṃ ahaṃ pupphantiādikaṃ āyasmato nāgasamālattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2667_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa
atk-s0510a:2667_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tathārūpasajjanasaṃsaggassa
atk-s0510a:2667_3: alābhena satthari dharamānakāle dassanasavanapūjākammamakaritvā parinibbutakāle tassa bhagavato sārīrikadhātuṃ
atk-s0510a:2667_4: nidahitvā katacetiyamhi cittaṃ pasādetvā pāṭalipupphaṃ pūjetvā somanassaṃ uppādetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā
atk-s0510a:2667_5: teneva somanassena tato kālaṃ kato tusitādīsu chasu devalokesu sukhamanubhavitvā aparabhāge manussesu
atk-s0510a:2667_6: manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto nāgarukkhapallavakomaḷasadisasarīrattā
atk-s0510a:2667_7: nāgasamāloti mātāpitūhi katanāmadheyyo bhagavati pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2668_1: So pacchā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento āpāṭaliṃ ahaṃ pupphantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2668_3: ādarena vā pāṭalipupphaṃ gahetvā ahaṃ thūpamhi abhiropesiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2668_4: Ujjhitaṃ sumahāpatheti sabbanagaravāsīnaṃ vandanapūjanatthāya mahāpathe nagaramajjhe vīthiyaṃ ujjhitaṃ uṭṭhāpitaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2668_6: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2671_0: Akkantañca padaṃ disvātiādikaṃ āyasmato padasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2671_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro uppannuppannabhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2671_2: kāle ekasmiṃ saddhāsampanne upāsakagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno bhagavatā tassa anukampāya
atk-s0510a:2671_3: dassitaṃ padacetiyaṃ disvā pasanno lomahaṭṭhajāto vandanapūjanādibahumānamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2671_4: So teneva sukhette sukatena puññena tato cuto sagge nibbatto tattha dibbasukhamanubhavitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0510a:2671_5: manussesu jāto manussasampattiṃ sabbamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampannakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2672_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento akkantañca padaṃ disvātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2672_4: ayaṃ pana tassa saddhāsampannataṃ ñatvā “eso imaṃ passatū”ti padacetiyaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0510a:2672_5: tasmā so tasmiṃ pasīditvā vandanapūjanādisakkāramakāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2675_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:2675_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto saddhājāto dumagge laggitaṃ bhagavato paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ
atk-s0510a:2675_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussasampattimanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2675_5: nibbatto saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2676_1: So pattaarahattādhigamo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento dumagge paṃsukūlikantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2676_6: Paṃsumiva paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ amanuññabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2676_8: satthuno paṃsukūlaṃ dumagge laggitaṃ disvā ahaṃ añjaliṃ paggahetvā taṃ paṃsukūlaṃ avandiṃ paṇāmamakāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2679_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2679_2: bhagavato kāle himavantassa samīpe araññāvāse vasanto vanamūlaphalāhāro vivekavasenāgataṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2679_4: Bhagavā tassa cittaṃ pasādetuṃ passantasseva paribhuñji.
atk-s0510a:2679_5: So tena cittappasādena kālaṃ katvā tusitādīsu sampattimanubhavitvā pacchā manussasampattiñca anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2679_6: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vibhavasampattiṃ patto taṃ pahāya sāsane pabbajito nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2680_1: So tato attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento kānanaṃ vanamoggayhātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2680_3: Vasāmi vipine ahanti vivekavāso ahaṃ vasāmīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2684_0: Khaṇḍo nāmāsi nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato ekasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2684_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2684_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasannamānaso tassa satthuno khaṇḍaṃ nāma
atk-s0510a:2684_3: aggasāvakaṃ bhikkhāya caramānaṃ disvā saddahitvā piṇḍapātamadāsi.
atk-s0510a:2684_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2684_5: nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2684_6: So ekadivasaṃ piṇḍapātassa saññaṃ manasikaritvā paṭiladdhavisesattā ekasaññakattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2685_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento khaṇḍo nāmāsi nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2685_2: Tattha tassa aggasāvakattherassa kilesānaṃ khaṇḍitattā khaṇḍoti nāmaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2688_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:2688_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto buddhuppādato pageva uppannattā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2688_3: pabbajitvā himavantassa avidūre ekaṃ saraṃ nissāya paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:2688_4: Tasmiṃ samaye tisso bhagavā tassānukampāya ākāsena agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2688_5: Atha kho so tāpaso ākāsato oruyha ṭhitaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tiṇaṃ lāyitvā tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0510a:2688_6: katvā nisīdāpetvā bahumānādarena pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā paṭikuṭiko hutvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2688_7: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto anekavidhasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2688_8: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2689_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2689_3: Mahājātassaroti ettha pana saranti ettha pānīyatthikā dvipadacatuppadādayo sattāti saraṃ,
atk-s0510a:2689_4: atha vā saranti ettha nadīkandarādayoti saraṃ,
atk-s0510a:2689_5: mahanto ca so sayameva jātattā saro ceti mahājātassaro.
atk-s0510a:2689_7: Satapattehi sañchannoti ekekasmiṃ pupphe satasatapattānaṃ vasena satapatto,
atk-s0510a:2689_9: Nānāsakuṇamālayoti aneke haṃsakukkuṭakukkuhadeṇḍibhādayo ekato kuṇanti saddaṃ karontīti sakuṇāti laddhanāmānaṃ pakkhīnaṃ ālayo ādhārabhūtoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2692_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0510a:2692_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya bhagavato cīvarakammaṃ kātuṃ pañca sūciyo adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2692_3: So tena puññena devamanussesu puññamanubhavitvā vicaranto uppannuppannabhave tikkhapañño hutvā pākaṭo
atk-s0510a:2692_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajanto tikkhapaññatāya
atk-s0510a:2693_1: So aparabhāge puññaṃ paccavekkhanto taṃ disvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento tiṃsakappasahassamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2694_1: Pañcasūcī mayā dinnāti ettha sūcati chiddaṃ karoti vijjhatīti sūci,
atk-s0510a:2694_2: pañcamattā sūcī pañcasūcī mayā dinnāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2697_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:2697_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatto vuddhippatto kusalākusalaññū satthari pasīditvā
atk-s0510a:2697_4: So tena puññena bahudhā sukhasampattiyo anubhavanto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2697_5: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2698_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2698_2: Tattha antarāpaṇeti ā samantato hiraññasuvaṇṇādikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ paṇenti vikkiṇanti pattharanti etthāti āpaṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2698_5: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kañcanagghiyasaṃkāsaṃ dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇaṃ sambuddhaṃ disvā pāṭalipupphaṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2701_0: Migaluddo pure āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato ṭhitañjaliyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2701_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tatthuppannabhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:2701_2: bhagavato kāle purākatena ekena kammacchiddena nesādayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto migasūkarādayo
atk-s0510a:2701_4: Tasmiṃ samaye tisso bhagavā tassānukampāya himavantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2701_5: So taṃ dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇehi asītānubyañjanabyāmappabhāhi ca jalamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā somanassajāto paṇāmaṃ katvā gantvā paṇṇasanthare nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2701_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe devo gajjanto asani pati,
atk-s0510a:2701_8: So tena puññena sukhette katakusalattā akusalavipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sagge nibbatto kāmāvacarasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2701_9: anubhavitvā manussesu manussasampattiyo ca anubhavitvā aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2701_10: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya purākatavāsanāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2702_1: So tato paraṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento migaluddo pure āsintiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2702_2: Tattha migaluddoti migānaṃ māraṇaṃ upagacchatīti migaluddo.
atk-s0510a:2702_3: Miganti sīghaṃ vātavegena gacchanti dhāvantīti migā,
atk-s0510a:2702_4: tesaṃ migānaṃ māraṇe luddo dāruṇo lobhīti migaluddo.
atk-s0510a:2702_5: So ahaṃ pure bhagavato dassanasamaye migaluddo āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2702_6: Araññe kānaneti arati gacchati migasamūho etthāti araññaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2702_7: atha vā ā samantato rajjanti tattha vivekābhiratā buddhapaccekabuddhādayo mahāsārappattā sappurisāti araññaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2702_8: Kā kucchitākārena vā bhayānakākārena vā nadanti saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0510a:2702_10: tasmiṃ araññe kānane migaluddo pure āsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2702_11: Tattha addasaṃ sambuddhanti tattha tasmiṃ araññe upagataṃ sambuddhaṃ addasaṃ addakkhinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2702_13: tasmā manodvārānusārena cakkhuviññāṇaṃ purecārikaṃ kāyaviññāṇasamaṅgiṃ pāpeti appetīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2703_1: Tato me asanīpātoti ā samantato sananto gajjanto patatīti asani,
atk-s0510a:2706_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato tipadumiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2706_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2706_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatiyaṃ mālākārakulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto mālākārakammaṃ katvā vasanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0510a:2706_3: anekavidhāni jalajathalajapupphāni gahetvā rañño santikaṃ gantukāmo evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0510a:2706_4: “rājā imāni tāva pupphāni disvā pasanno sahassaṃ vā dhanaṃ gāmādikaṃ vā dadeyya,
atk-s0510a:2706_6: kiṃ me etesu sundara”nti tena “bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā saggamokkhasampattiyo nipphādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0510a:2706_8: Tāni gantvā ākāsaṃ chādetvā pattharitvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2706_11: So tena puññena devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2706_12: satthari pasīditvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2707_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2707_3: Sabbadhammāna pāragūti sabbesaṃ navalokuttaradhammānaṃ pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gato paccakkhaṃ katoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2707_4: Danto dantaparivutoti sayaṃ kāyavācādīhi danto etadagge ṭhapitehi sāvakehi parivutoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2712_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2712_3: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0510a:2712_4: disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā candabhāgāya nadiyā samīpe vasati,
atk-s0510a:2712_5: vivekakāmatāya himavantaṃ gantvā nisinnaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā vanditvā tassa guṇaṃ pasīditvā timirapupphaṃ gahetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2712_6: So tena puññena devesu ca manussesu ca sampattimanubhavanto saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2712_7: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2713_1: So aparabhāge pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento candabhāgānadītīretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2713_3: Anubhotaṃ vajāmahanti gaṅgāya āsanne vasanabhāvena sabbattha rammabhāvena gaṅgāto heṭṭhā sotānusārena
atk-s0510a:2713_4: ahaṃ vajāmi gacchāmi tattha tattha vasāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2713_5: Nisinnaṃ samaṇaṃ disvāti samitapāpattā sositapāpattā samaṇasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ disvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2714_1: Evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadāti ayaṃ bhagavā sayaṃ tiṇṇo sabbasatte tārayissati saṃsārato uttāreti sayaṃ kāyadvārādīhi damito ayaṃ bhagavā pare dameti.
atk-s0510a:2715_4: Sayaṃ santo santakāyacitto paresaṃ santakāyacittaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0510a:2715_5: Sayaṃ mutto saṃsārato muccito pare saṃsārato mocayissati.
atk-s0510a:2715_6: So ayaṃ bhagavā sayaṃ nibbuto kilesaggīhi nibbuto paresampi kilesaggīhi nibbāpessatīti ahaṃ tadā evaṃ cintesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2716_1: Gahetvā timirapupphanti sakalaṃ vanantaṃ nīlakāḷaraṃsīhi andhakāraṃ viya kurumānaṃ khāyatīti timiraṃ
atk-s0510a:2716_2: pupphaṃ taṃ gahetvā kaṇṇikāvaṇṭaṃ gahetvā matthake sīsassa upari ākāse okiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2719_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:2719_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto purākatavāsanāvasena saddhājāto sattavassikakāleyeva pabbajito
atk-s0510a:2719_4: So ekadivasaṃ atīva nīlamaṇippabhāni naṅgalakasitaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitasattapupphāni gahetvā ākāse pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2719_5: So yāvatāyukaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2719_6: kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2720_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento jātiyā sattavassohantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2720_2: Tattha jātiyā sattavassoti mātugabbhato nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇasattavassikoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2720_3: Pabbajiṃ anagāriyanti agārassa hitaṃ āgāriyaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ natthi āgāriyanti anagāriyaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2721_2: Atha vā sugatena desitaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipattipūraṇavasena haṭṭhamānaso tuṭṭhacitto pūjetvāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2724_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2724_2: kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto pabbajitvā rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ pūrayamāno araññe viharati.
atk-s0510a:2724_5: Tadā bhagavā tassa kāruññena tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2724_6: Atha so nipannakova uṭṭhituṃ asakkonto sirasi añjaliṃ katvā bhagavato paṇāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:2724_7: So tato cuto tusitabhavane uppanno tattha sampattimanubhavitvā evaṃ cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2724_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2725_1: So aparabhāge attano puññasampattiyo oloketvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento rukkhamūle nisinnohantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2725_2: Tattha ruhati paṭiruhati uddhamuddhaṃ ārohatīti rukkho,
atk-s0510a:2725_4: Byādhito paramena cāti paramena adhikena kharena kakkhaḷena byādhinā rogena byādhito,
atk-s0510a:2725_6: Paramakāruññappattomhīti paramaṃ adhikaṃ kāruññaṃ dīnabhāvaṃ dukkhitabhāvaṃ pattomhi araññe kānaneti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2726_1: Pañcevāsuṃ mahāsikhāti sirasi piḷandhanatthena sikhā vuccati cūḷā.
atk-s0510a:2726_2: Maṇīti jotamānaṃ makuṭaṃ tassa atthīti sikho,
atk-s0510a:2726_3: cakkavattino ekanāmakā pañceva cakkavattino āsuṃ ahesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:2729_0: Abhibhū nāma so bhikkhūtiādikaṃ āyasmato adhopupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2729_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2729_2: kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā aparabhāge kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ pahāya
atk-s0510a:2729_3: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattilābhī iddhīsu ca vasībhāvaṃ patvā himavantasmiṃ paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:2729_4: Tassa sikhissa bhagavato abhibhū nāma aggasāvako vivekābhirato himavantamagamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2729_5: Atha so tāpaso taṃ aggasāvakattheraṃ disvā therassa ṭhitapabbataṃ āruhanto pabbatassa heṭṭhātalato sugandhāni
atk-s0510a:2729_9: Tattha ekena ajagarena pīḷito aparabhāge aparihīnajjhāno teneva upaddavena upadduto kālaṃ katvā brahmalokaparāyano
atk-s0510a:2729_10: hutvā brahmasampattiṃ chakāmāvacarasampattiñca anubhavitvā manussesu manussasampattiyo ca khepetvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2729_11: buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2729_13: So aparabhāge attano katapuññanāmena adhopupphiyattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:2730_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento abhibhū nāma so bhikkhūtiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2730_4: sasantānaparasantānagatakilese abhibhavati viheseti viddhaṃsetīti vā abhibhū.
atk-s0510a:2730_7: Abhibhū nāma aggasāvako so bhikkhūti attho,
atk-s0510a:2731_1: Ajagaro maṃ pīḷesīti tathārūpaṃ sīlasampannaṃ jhānasampannaṃ tāpasaṃ pubbe katapāpena verena ca mahanto ajagarasappo pīḷesi.
atk-s0510a:2731_2: So teneva upaddavena upadduto aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo āsi.
atk-s0510a:2734_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tesu tesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2734_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2734_3: pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ajinacammadharo himavantamhi vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0510a:2734_5: Atha so tāpaso tamupagataṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā tassa bhagavato sarīrato nikkhantachabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsīsu
atk-s0510a:2734_7: So teneva puññena ito cuto tusitādīsu dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā aparabhāge manussasampattiyo ca anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2734_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tatthādīnavaṃ disvā gehaṃ
atk-s0510a:2735_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pabbate himavantamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2735_2: Tattha pabbateti pakārena brūhati vaḍḍhetīti pabbato,
atk-s0510a:2735_4: himavanto ca so pabbato cāti himavantapabbato.
atk-s0510a:2735_6: Tasmiṃ himavantamhi pabbate vāsaṃ kappesiṃ pure ahanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2738_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katakusalo uppannuppannabhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto phussassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2738_2: kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tattha dosaṃ disvā taṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2738_3: pabbajitvā himavantapabbate vasanto vākacīranivasano vivekasukhena viharati.
atk-s0510a:2738_4: Tasmiṃ samaye so phussaṃ bhagavantaṃ taṃ padesaṃ sampattaṃ disvā tassa sarīrato nikkhantachabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo
atk-s0510a:2738_5: ito cito vidhāvantiyo daṇḍadīpikānikkhantavipphurantamiva disvā tasmiṃ pasanno añjaliṃ paggahetvā vanditvā
atk-s0510a:2738_6: cittaṃ pasādetvā teneva pītisomanassena kālaṃ katvā tusitādīsu nibbatto tattha cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2738_7: ca anubhavitvā aparabhāge manussasampattiyo ca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto
atk-s0510a:2739_1: So aparabhāge pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pabbate himavantamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2742_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katakusalasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto phussassa
atk-s0510a:2742_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto sukhappatto taṃ sabbaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kharājinacammadhārī
atk-s0510a:2742_4: Tasmiñca samaye phussaṃ bhagavantaṃ tattha sampattaṃ disvā pasannamānaso madhurāni phalāni gahetvā bhojesi.
atk-s0510a:2742_5: So teneva kusalena devalokādīsu puññasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2742_6: vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2743_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ anussaritvā pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pabbate himavantamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2746_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto phussassa
atk-s0510a:2746_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto saddhājāto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantamhi
atk-s0510a:2746_3: araññāvāse vasanto attano anukampāya upagatassa bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā dhammesu cittaṃ pasādetvā yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0510a:2746_4: ṭhatvā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tusitādīsu chasu kāmāvacarasampattiyo ca manussesu manussasampattiyo ca
atk-s0510a:2746_5: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhājāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2747_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pabbate himavantamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2750_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2750_2: kāle kulagehe nibbatto sāsane pabbajitvā vattapaṭipattiyā sāsanaṃ sobhayanto mahājane bodhipūjaṃ kurumāne
atk-s0510a:2750_3: disvā anekāni pupphāni sugandhodakāni ca gāhāpetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2750_4: So tena puññena devaloke nibbatto cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2750_5: vuddhimanvāya saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2751_1: So arahā hutvā jhānaphalasukhena vītināmetvā pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vipassissa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2751_2: Tattha visesaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ passatīti vipassī,
atk-s0510a:2751_5: tassa vipassissa bhagavato mahābodhimaho ahūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2751_6: Tatrāpi mahābodhīti bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2751_7: tamettha nisinno bhagavā paṭivijjhatīti kaṇikārapādaparukkhopi bodhicceva vuccati,
atk-s0510a:2751_8: mahito ca so devabrahmanarāsurehi bodhi ceti mahābodhi,
atk-s0510a:2751_9: mahato buddhassa bhagavato bodhīti vā mahābodhi,
atk-s0510a:2754_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto phussassa
atk-s0510a:2754_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya padumasampannaṃ ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ pavisitvā bhisamuḷāle
atk-s0510a:2754_3: khādanto pokkharaṇiyā avidūre gacchamānaṃ phussaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tato padumāni ocinitvā
atk-s0510a:2754_5: tāni pupphāni ākāse vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2754_6: So bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso pabbajitvā vattapaṭipattisāro samaṇadhammaṃ pūretvā tato cuto tusitabhavanamalaṃ
atk-s0510a:2754_7: kurumāno viya tattha uppajjitvā kamena cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo ca manussasampattiyo ca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2754_8: buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2755_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pokkharavanaṃ paviṭṭhotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2755_4: padumagacchasaṇḍehi maṇḍitaṃ majjhaṃ paviṭṭho ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2760_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2760_2: bhagavato kāle bhagavati dharamāne puññaṃ kātumasakkonto parinibbute bhagavati tassa dhātuṃ nidahitvā
atk-s0510a:2760_4: So tena puññena catunnavutikappato paṭṭhāya etthantare caturāpāyamadisvā devamanussasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2760_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2761_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento pūjārahetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2761_3: tesu pūjārahesu mālādipadumavatthābharaṇacatupaccayādīhi pūjayato pūjayantassa puggalassa puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:2761_4: sahassasatasahassādivasena saṅkhyaṃ kātuṃ kenaci mahānubhāvenāpi na sakkāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2762_2: Tattha catunnamapi dīpānanti jambudīpaaparagoyānauttarakurupubbavidehasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ tadanugatānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2762_3: dvisahassaparittadīpānañca ekato katvā sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe issaraṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2762_4: Ekissā pūjanāyetanti dhātugabbhe cetiye katāya ekissā pūjāya etaṃ sakalajambudīpe sattaratanādikaṃ sakalaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2762_5: Kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasinti cetiye katapūjāya soḷasakkhattuṃ vibhattassa soḷasamakoṭṭhāsassa na agghatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2763_2: phalitantareti narānaṃ aggassa seṭṭhassa siddhatthassa bhagavato cetiye dhātugabbhamhi sudhākamme karīyamāne paricchedānaṃ ubhinnamantare vemajjhe,
atk-s0510a:2763_3: atha vā pupphadānaṭṭhānānaṃ antare phalantiyā mayā sudhāpiṇḍo dinno makkhitoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2766_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu nibbānādhigamāya puññaṃ upacinitvā tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:2766_2: kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā satthu nisīdanatthāya parisuddhaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2766_4: So tena puññakammena sugatisukhamanubhavitvā tattha tattha saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2766_5: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2767_1: So pattaarahattaphalo pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento tissassa lokanāthassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2770_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:2770_2: bhagavato kāle ekenākusalena kammena duggatakulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhammadesanaṃ ñatvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2770_4: So teneva pītisomanassena kālaṃ katvā sagge nibbatto cha kāmāvacarasampattimanubhavitvā tato cuto manussesu
atk-s0510a:2770_5: manussasampattīnaṃ aggabhūtaṃ cakkavattisampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ addhakule nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2770_6: vuddhippatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2771_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento tissassāhaṃ bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2774_0: Kammārohaṃ pure āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato sūcidāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2774_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro antarantarā kusalabījāni pūrento vipassissa bhagavato kāle antarantarā
atk-s0510a:2774_2: katena ekena kammacchiddena kammārakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2774_4: tena puññena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā aparabhāge manussesu uppanno cakkavattādayo sampattiyo ca anubhavanto
atk-s0510a:2774_6: So kamena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde nibbatto vuddhippatto mahaddhano saddhājāto tikkhapañño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2774_7: So ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā dhammānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā nisinnāsaneyeva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2775_1: So arahā samāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento kammārohaṃ pure āsintiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2775_2: Tattha kammāroti ayokammalohakammādinā kammena jīvati ruhati vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ āpajjatīti kammāro,
atk-s0510a:2775_3: pubbe puññakaraṇakāle kammāro āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2778_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto mahaddhano mahābhogo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2778_2: So satthari pasīditvā candanāgarukappūrakassaturādīni anekāni sugandhāni vaḍḍhetvā satthu gandhathūpaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0510a:2778_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:2778_6: kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2779_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2782_0: Migaluddo pure āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato tipupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2782_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro antarā kenaci akusalacchiddena vipassissa bhagavato kāle nesādakule nibbatto migaluddo hutvā araññe viharati.
atk-s0510a:2782_2: Tadā vipassissa bhagavato pāṭalibodhiṃ sampuṇṇapattapallavaṃ haritavaṇṇaṃ nīlobhāsaṃ manoramaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:2782_3: tīhi pupphehi pūjetvā purāṇapattaṃ chaḍḍetvā bhagavato sammukhā viya pāṭalimahābodhiṃ vandi.
atk-s0510a:2782_4: So tena puññena tato cuto devaloke uppanno tattha dibbasampattiṃ aparāparaṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto manussesu
atk-s0510a:2782_5: jāto tattha cakkavattisampattiādayo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2782_6: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasomanassahadayo gehaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2783_1: So evaṃ siddhippatto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento migaluddo pure āsintiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2783_3: atha vā magayamāno ihati pavattatīti migo,
atk-s0510a:2783_4: migānaṃ māraṇe luddo lobhī gedhoti migaluddo,
atk-s0510a:2783_5: pure mayhaṃ puññakaraṇasamaye kānanasaṅkhāte mahāaraññe migaluddo āsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2783_6: Pāṭaliṃ haritaṃ disvāti tattha pakārena talena rattavaṇṇena bhavatīti pāṭali,
atk-s0510a:2783_8: pattānaṃ haritatāya haritaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ pāṭalibodhiṃ disvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2786_0: Vivane kānane disvātiādikaṃ āyasmato madhupiṇḍikattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2786_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2786_2: bhagavato kāle nesādayoniyaṃ nibbatto mahāaraññe paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:2786_3: Tadā vivekābhiratiyā sampattaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā samādhito vuṭṭhitassa tassa sumadhuraṃ madhumadāsi.
atk-s0510a:2786_5: So teneva puññena sampattiṃ anubhavanto devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2786_6: vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2787_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vivane kānane disvātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2787_2: Tattha vivaneti visesena vanaṃ patthaṭaṃ vivanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2787_3: hatthiassarathasaddehi bherisaddehi ca vatthukāmakilesakāmehi ca vigataṃ byāpagatanti attho,
atk-s0510a:2787_5: Osadhiṃva virocantanti bhavavaḍḍhakijanānaṃ icchiticchitaṃ nipphādetīti osadhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2787_6: Ojānibbattikāraṇaṃ paṭicca yāya tārakāya uggatāya uddharanti gaṇhantīti sā osadhi.
atk-s0510a:2787_7: Osadhitārakā iva virocantīti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ “osadhiṃva virocanta”nti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2790_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2790_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vanantaraṃ sampattassa
atk-s0510a:2790_3: bhagavato paṇāmaṃ katvā paṇṇasantharaṃ santharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2790_4: Bhagavato nisinnaṭṭhānassa samantato bhittiparicchedaṃ katvā pupphapūjamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2790_5: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2790_6: vuddhippatto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2791_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ dassento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2797_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2797_2: bhagavato kāle saṅkhadhamakakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya attano sippe saṅkhadhamane cheko ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2797_3: niccakālaṃ bhagavato saṅkhaṃ dhametvā saṅkhasaddeneva pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2797_4: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha pākaṭo mahāghoso mahānādī madhurassaro ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2797_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ pākaṭakule nibbatto vuddhippatto madhurassaroti pākaṭo,
atk-s0510a:2797_6: satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi,
atk-s0510a:2798_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vipassissa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2798_3: Ahosiṃ saṅkhadhamakoti saṃ suṭṭhu khananto gacchatīti saṅkho,
atk-s0510a:2798_5: Taṃ saṅkhaṃ dhamati ghosaṃ karotīti saṅkhadhamako,
atk-s0510a:2803_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2803_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya vibhavasampanno saddhājāto vihārato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0510a:2803_3: piṇḍāya caramānaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso āhāramadāsi.
atk-s0510a:2803_4: Bhagavā taṃ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2803_5: So teneva kusalena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne devaloke nibbatto tattha cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2803_6: anubhavitvā manussesu ca manussasampattimanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2804_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ anussaritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2804_3: Pavarā abhinikkhantanti pakārena varitabbaṃ patthetabbanti pavaraṃ,
atk-s0510a:2804_4: rammabhūtato vivekabhūtato sakavihārato abhi visesena nikkhantanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2804_7: vānanāmaṃ taṇhaṃ padhānaṃ katvā sabbakilese pahāya nibbānaṃ pattanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2805_1: Kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ datvānāti karatalena gahetabbā dabbi kaṭacchu,
atk-s0510a:2805_3: abhi visesena khāditabbā bhakkhitabbāti vā bhikkhā,
atk-s0510a:2808_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2808_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhājāto saddhammassavane sādaro sālayo bhagavato dhammadesanānusārena
atk-s0510a:2808_4: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā ghosapamāṇattā bhagavato ñāṇe pasanno pañcaṅgaaṭṭhaṅganamakkāravasena paṇāmaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2808_5: So tato cuto devalokesu uppanno tattha cha kāmāvacare dibbasampattimanubhavanto tato cavitvā manussaloke
atk-s0510a:2808_6: jāto tatthaggabhūtā cakkavattisampadādayo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2808_7: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2809_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2809_4: nisabho ca so ājāniyo seṭṭho uttamo ceti nisabhājāniyo.
atk-s0510a:2812_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katakusalo tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:2812_2: bhagavato kāle mālākārakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya mālākārakammena anekāni pupphāni vikkiṇanto jīvati.
atk-s0510a:2812_3: Athekadivasaṃ pupphāni gahetvā caranto bhagavantaṃ ratanagghikamiva caramānaṃ disvā rattuppalakalāpena pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2812_4: So tato cuto teneva puññena sugatīsu puññamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0510a:2813_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento tivarāyaṃ nivāsīhantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2813_2: Tattha tivarāti tīhi vārehi kāritaṃ sañcaritaṃ paṭicchannaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0510a:2813_4: vasanasīlo nivāsanaṭṭhānagehe vā vasanto ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2813_5: Ahosiṃ māliko tadāti tadā nibbānatthāya puññasambhārakaraṇasamaye māliko mālākārova pupphāni kayavikkayaṃ katvā jīvanto ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2814_1: Pupphahatthamadāsahanti siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā uppalakalāpaṃ adāsiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2817_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasanno sumanapupphena pādamūle pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2817_2: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sakkasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2817_3: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2818_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhatthassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2818_2: Jātipupphamadāsahanti jātisumanapupphaṃ adāsiṃ ahanti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ sumanasaddassa lopaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2818_3: Tattha jātiyā nibbatto vikasamānoyeva sumanaṃ janānaṃ somanassaṃ karotīti sumanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2818_6: tāni sumanapupphāni siddhatthassa bhagavato ahaṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2821_0: Sudassano nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato muṭṭhipupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2821_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2821_2: bhagavato kāle mālākārakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sakasippe nipphattiṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:2821_3: disvā pasannamānaso jātisumanapupphāni ubhohi hatthehi bhagavato pādamūle okiritvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2821_4: So tena kusalasambhārena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubho sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2821_5: nibbatto vuddhippatto pubbavāsanāvasena satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2822_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ anussaritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sudassano nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2822_3: nāmena sudassano nāma mālākāro hutvā jātisumanapupphehi padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2825_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu pūritakusalasañcayo tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni paripūriyamāno
atk-s0510a:2825_2: pudumuttarassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya kusalākusalaṃ jānanto padumuttarassa
