atk-s0510a:2825_3: bhagavato ākāse gacchato nikkhantachabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsīsu pasanno ubhohi hatthehi udakaṃ gahetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2825_4: Tena pūjitaṃ udakaṃ rajatabubbulaṃ viya ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2825_5: So abhippasanno teneva somanassena tusitādīsu nibbatto dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā aparabhāge manussasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2825_6: ca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2826_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2826_5: atha vā taṃ asati bhuñjatīti ghatāsanaṃ, aggiyeva.
atk-s0510a:2826_6: Yathā ghate āsitte aggimhi aggisikhā atīva jalati,
atk-s0510a:2826_7: evaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ iva jalamānaṃ bhagavantanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2826_10: jalamānaṃ sūriyaṃ iva dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi byāmappabhāmaṇḍalehi vijjotamānaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sambuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2829_1: Esopi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni kusalakammāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2829_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā kāme ādīnavaṃ disvā gehaṃ pahāya
atk-s0510a:2829_3: tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vasanto tatthāgataṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasanno vanditvā tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0510a:2829_4: santharitvā tattha nisinnassa bhagavato naḷamālehi bījaniṃ katvā bījetvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2829_7: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto uppannuppannabhave pariḷāhasantāpavivajjito kāyacittacetasikasukhappatto
atk-s0510a:2829_8: anekasukhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya pubbavāsanābalena
atk-s0510a:2829_9: satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2830_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2831_1: Naḷamālaṃ gahetvānāti naḷati asāro nissāro hutvā veḷuvaṃsatopi tanuko sallahuko jātoti naḷo,
atk-s0510a:2835_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2835_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto tattha dosaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2835_3: pabbajitvā himavante vasanto tattha sampattaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasanno sīhāsanaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0510a:2835_4: tattha nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ mālākalāpaṃ gahetvā pūjetvā taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2835_5: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto nibbattanibbattabhave uccakuliko vibhavasampanno ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2835_6: So kālantarena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2836_1: So arahā samāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento kānanaṃ vanamoggayhātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2839_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2839_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto tatthādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya
atk-s0510a:2839_3: tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vasanto atīva appicchasantuṭṭho āluvādīhi yāpento vasati.
atk-s0510a:2839_4: Tadā padumuttaro bhagavā tassa anukampāya taṃ himavantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2839_5: Taṃ disvā pasanno vanditvā biḷāliyo gahetvā patte okiri.
atk-s0510a:2839_7: So tena kammena tato cuto devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:2839_8: vuddhimanvāya satthari pasanno sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2840_1: So aparabhāge attano kusalakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2843_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2843_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya satthari pasanno viññutaṃ patto aggikkhandhaṃ viya vijjotamānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2843_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāgapupphakesaraṃ gahetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2844_1: So tena puññena tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā uppannuppannabhave sabbattha
atk-s0510a:2844_2: pūjito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto pubbavāsanābalena satthari pasanno sāsane
atk-s0510a:2844_3: pabbajito nacirasseva arahā hutvā dibbacakkhunā attano pubbakammaṃ disvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2844_6: Sataraṃsiṃva bhāṇumanti satamattā satappamāṇā raṃsi pabhā yassa sūriyassa so sataraṃsi,
atk-s0510a:2844_11: bhāṇumasaṅkhātaṃ sūriyaṃ iva vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā sakesaraṃ nāgapupphaṃ gahetvā abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2849_0: Vipassī nāma bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato mahāparivārakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2849_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2849_2: bhagavato uppannasamaye yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbatto anekayakkhasatasahassaparivāro ekasmiṃ khuddakadīpe dibbasukhamanubhavanto viharati.
atk-s0510a:2849_5: Atha so yakkhasenādhipati taṃ bhagavantaṃ tattha gatabhāvaṃ disvā dibbavatthāni gahetvā gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā dibbavatthehi pūjesi,
atk-s0510a:2849_7: So tena puññakammena tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā tattha cha kāmāvacarasukhamanubhavitvā tato cuto
atk-s0510a:2849_8: manussesu aggacakkavattiādisukhamanubhavitvā aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:2849_9: patto satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2850_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vipassī nāma bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2850_2: Tattha visesaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ passatīti vipassī,
atk-s0510a:2850_3: vividhe satipaṭṭhānādayo sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhamme passatīti vā vipassī,
atk-s0510a:2850_4: vividhe anekappakāre bodhaneyyasatte visuṃ visuṃ passatīti vā vipassī,
atk-s0510a:2850_5: so vipassī bhagavā dīpacetiyaṃ dīpe pūjanīyaṭṭhānaṃ vihāramagamāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2853_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2853_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ taḷākasamīpe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2853_3: Tasmiṃ samaye bhagavā vihārato nikkhamitvā nahāyitukāmo tassa taḷākassa tīraṃ gantvā tattha nhatvā ekacīvaro
atk-s0510a:2853_4: jalamāno brahmā viya sūriyo viya suvaṇṇabimbaṃ viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:2853_5: Atha so devaputto somanassajāto pañjaliko thomanamakāsi,
atk-s0510a:2853_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2853_8: viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2854_1: So pacchā pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento atthadassī jinavarotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2854_2: Tattha paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ dakkhati passatīti atthadassī,
atk-s0510a:2854_3: atha vā sabbasattānaṃ caturāriyasaccasaṅkhātaṃ atthapayojanaṃ dassanasīloti atthadassī,
atk-s0510a:2854_6: atthadassī jino ca so varo cāti atthadassī jinavaro.
atk-s0510a:2854_8: lokīyati passīyati buddhādīhi pārappattoti vā loko,
atk-s0510a:2854_9: loko ca loko ca loko cāti loko.
atk-s0510a:2857_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro uppannuppannabhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttare
atk-s0510a:2857_2: bhagavati uppanne ayaṃ himavante devarājā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:2857_3: tasmiṃ aparena yakkhadevaraññā saddhiṃ saṅgāmatthāya upaṭṭhite dve anekayakkhasahassaparivārā phalakāvudhādihatthā saṅgāmatthāya samupabyūḷhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2857_4: Tadā padumuttaro bhagavā tesu sattesu kāruññaṃ uppādetvā ākāsena tattha gantvā saparivārānaṃ dvinnaṃ devarājūnaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0510a:2857_5: Tadā te sabbe phalakāvudhāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavantaṃ gāravabahumānena vanditvā saraṇamagamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2857_7: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2857_8: vuddhimanvāya satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2858_1: So aparabhāge pubbakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ubhinnaṃ devarājūnantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2858_2: Tattha sucilomakharalomaāḷavakakumbhīrakuverādayo viya nāmagottena apākaṭā dve yakkharājāno aññāpadesena dassento “ubhinnaṃ devarājūna”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2858_3: Saṅgāmo samupaṭṭhitoti saṃ suṭṭhu gāmo kalahatthāya upagamananti saṅgāmo,
atk-s0510a:2858_6: Ahosi samupabyūḷhoti saṃ suṭṭhu upasamīpe rāsibhūtoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2859_1: Saṃvejesi mahājananti tesaṃ rāsibhūtānaṃ yakkhānaṃ ākāse nisinno bhagavā catusaccadhammadesanāya saṃ suṭṭhu vejesi,
atk-s0510a:2862_0: Varuṇo nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato ekāsaniyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2862_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2862_2: bhagavato kāle varuṇo nāma devarājā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2862_3: So bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso gandhamālādīhi gītavāditehi ca upaṭṭhayamāno saparivāro pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2862_4: Tato aparabhāge bhagavati parinibbute tassa mahābodhirukkhaṃ buddhadassanaṃ viya sabbatūriyatāḷāvacarehi saparivāro upahāramakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2862_5: So tena puññena tato kālaṅkatvā nimmānaratidevaloke uppajji.
atk-s0510a:2862_6: Evaṃ devasampattimanubhavitvā manussesu ca manussabhūto cakkavattisampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2862_7: kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2863_1: So pacchā sakakammaṃ saritvā taṃ tathato ñatvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento varuṇo nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2863_2: Tattha yadā ahaṃ sambodhanatthāya buddhaṃ bodhiñca pūjesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2863_3: tadā varuṇo nāma devarājā ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2864_4: siñcitasiñcitodakaṃ pādena mūlena pivati rukkhakkhandhasākhāviṭapehi āporasaṃ patthariyatīti attho,
atk-s0510a:2865_1: Sakakammābhiraddhoti attano kusalakammena abhiraddho pasanno uttame bodhimhi pasannoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2868_0: Vipassī nāma bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato suvaṇṇapupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2868_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2868_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ ṭhāne bhūmaṭṭhakadevaputto hutvā nibbatto tassa bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2868_4: Tāni pupphāni ākāse suvaṇṇavitānaṃ hutvā chādesuṃ,
atk-s0510a:2868_5: suvaṇṇapabhā ca buddhassa sarīrapabhā ca ekato hutvā mahāobhāso ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2868_6: So atirekataraṃ pasanno sakabhavanaṃ gatopi saratiyeva.
atk-s0510a:2868_7: So tena puññakammena tusitabhavanādisugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2868_8: kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2869_1: So aparabhāge pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vipassī nāma bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2870_1: Pāmojjaṃ janayitvānāti balavapītiṃ uppādetvā “pāmojjaṃ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ attamanatā
atk-s0510a:2870_2: cittassā”tiādīsu viya attamanatā sakabhāvaṃ uppādetvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2873_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tato paraṃ uppannuppannabhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2873_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle rājāyatanarukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto antarantarā devatāhi saddhiṃ dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:2873_3: pasanno bhagavati parinibbute saparivāro gandhadīpadhūpapupphabheriādīni gāhāpetvā bhagavato āḷahanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2873_4: gantvā dīpādīni pūjetvā anekehi tūriyehi anekehi vāditehi taṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2873_5: Tato paṭṭhāya sakabhavanaṃ upaviṭṭhopi bhagavantameva saritvā sammukhā viya vandati.
atk-s0510a:2873_6: So teneva puññena tena cittappasādena rājāyatanato kālaṃ kato tusitādīsu nibbatto dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2873_7: tato manussesu manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto bhagavati
atk-s0510a:2873_8: uppannacittappasādo bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2874_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vasāmi rājāyatanetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2874_4: Parinibbute bhagavatīti parisamantato kiñci anavasesetvā khandhaparinibbānakāle parinibbānasamaye parinibbānappattassa
atk-s0510a:2875_3: buddhagāravena citakaṃ pūjanatthāya citakassa samīpaṃ ahaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2875_4: Tattha gantvā katakiccaṃ dassento tūriyaṃ tattha vādetvātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2878_0: Yadā vipassī lokaggotiādikaṃ āyasmato buddhasaññakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2878_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2878_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ bhūmaṭṭhakavimāne devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2878_7: “kiṃ nu kho pathavīkampāya nibbattī”ti cintetvā buddhassa āyusaṅkhāravossajjabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahāsokaṃ domanassaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0510a:2878_8: Tadā vessavaṇo mahārājā āgantvā “mā cintayitthā”ti assāsesi.
atk-s0510a:2878_9: So devaputto tato cuto tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:2878_10: patto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2879_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento yadā vipassī lokaggotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2879_2: Āyusaṅkhāramossajjīti ā samantato yunoti pāleti satteti āyu,
atk-s0510a:2879_4: taṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajji pariccaji jahāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2880_1: Otataṃ vitthataṃ mayhanti mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ otataṃ vitthataṃ cittaṃ vicittaṃ suci suparisuddhaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0510a:2880_2: anekehi sattahi ratanehi vicittaṃ sobhamānaṃ pakampittha pakārena kampitthāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2883_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tato oraṃ tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2883_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle himavante devaputto hutvā nibbatto araññaṃ gantvā maggamūḷhānaṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0510a:2883_3: gavesantānaṃ tassa sāvakānaṃ bhojetvā maggaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0510a:2883_4: So tena puññena devamanussasampattimanubhavitvā uppannuppannabhave sabbattha amūḷho saññavā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2883_5: Atha imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāse anallīno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2884_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarabuddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2884_2: Sāvakā vanacārinoti bhagavato vuttavacanaṃ sammā ādarena suṇantīti sāvakā,
atk-s0510a:2884_3: atha vā bhagavato desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā saddhammaṃ suṇantīti sāvakā.
atk-s0510a:2884_4: Vanacārino vane vicaraṇakā sāvakā vippanaṭṭhā maggamūḷhā mahāaraññe andhāva cakkhuvirahitāva anusuyyare vicarantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2887_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2887_2: bhagavato kāle yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbatto bhagavati dharamāne dassanassa aladdhattā pacchā parinibbute mahāsokappatto vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:2887_3: Tadā hissa bhagavato sāgato nāma aggasāvako anusāsanto bhagavato sārīrikadhātupūjā bhagavati dharamāne
atk-s0510a:2887_4: katapūjā viya cittappasādavasā mahapphalaṃ bhavatī”ti vatvā “thūpaṃ karohī”ti niyojito thūpaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0510a:2887_5: taṃ pūjetvā tato cuto devamanussesu sakkacakkavattisampattimanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2887_6: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2888_1: So aparabhāge attano puññakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento atthadassimhi sugatetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2888_3: Yakkhayoniṃ upapajjinti ettha pana attano sakāsaṃ sampattasampatte khādantā yanti gacchantīti yakkhā,
atk-s0510a:2889_1: Dulladdhaṃ vata me āsīti me mayā laddhayasaṃ dulladdhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2889_2: buddhabhūtassa satthuno sakkāraṃ akatattā virādhetvā laddhanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2892_0: Jāyaṃ tassa vipassissātiādikaṃ āyasmato jātipūjakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2892_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2892_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto nakkhattapāṭhakehi vipassibodhisattassa vuttalakkhaṇanimittaṃ
atk-s0510a:2892_3: sutvā “ayaṃ kira kumāro buddho hutvā sakalalokassa aggo seṭṭho sutvā sabbasatte saṃsārato uddharissatī”ti
atk-s0510a:2892_4: sutvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ kumārakāleyeva buddhassa viya mahāpūjamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2892_5: Pacchā kamena kumārakālaṃ rājakumārakālaṃ rajjakālanti kālattayamatikkamma buddhe jātepi mahāpūjaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:2892_6: tato cuto tusitādīsu nibbatto dibbasukhamanubhavitvā pacchā manussesu cakkavattādimanussasukhamanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2892_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto sattaṭṭhavassakāleyeva bhagavati pasanno pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:2893_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento jāyaṃ tassa vipassissātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2894_1: Nemittānaṃ suṇitvānāti ettha nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ sukhadukkhappattihetuṃ jānantīti nemittā,
atk-s0510a:2894_2: tesaṃ nemittānaṃ nakkhattapāṭhakānaṃ vacanaṃ suṇitvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2899_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tato paresu attabhāvasahassesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2899_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ gantvā itihāsādisakalabrāhmaṇadhammesu
atk-s0510a:2899_3: koṭippatto ekasmiṃ divase abbhokāse saparivāro ṭhito bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sereyyapupphaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0510a:2899_5: Tāni pupphāni ākāse vitānaṃ hutvā sattāhaṃ ṭhatvā pacchā antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2899_6: So taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā atīva pasannamānaso teneva pītisomanassena kālaṃ katvā tusitādīsu nibbatto tattha
atk-s0510a:2899_7: dibbasukhamanubhavitvā tato manussasukhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:2899_8: pāpuṇitvā pubbavāsanābalena satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2900_1: So aparabhāge purākatakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ajjhāyako mantadharotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2901_1: Sereyyakaṃ gahetvānāti sirise bhavaṃ jātipupphaṃ sereyyaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2901_4: Bhagavati pasanno jātisumanamakuḷacampakādīni pupphāni patiṭṭhapetvā pūjetuṃ kālaṃ natthitāya tattha
atk-s0510a:2901_5: sampattaṃ taṃ sereyyakaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2904_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassibuddhassa
atk-s0510a:2904_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā sakasippe nipphattiṃ patto tattha sāraṃ apassanto
atk-s0510a:2904_3: gehaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā attanā sahagatehi pañcasissasahassehi saddhiṃ pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0510a:2904_5: Tadā buddhuppādabhāvaṃ sutvā sissehi saha buddhassa santikaṃ gantukāmo kenaci byādhinā pīḷito paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0510a:2904_6: pavisitvā sissasantikā buddhassānubhāvaṃ lakkhaṇañca sutvā pasannamānaso himavantato campakāsokatilakakeṭakādyaneke
atk-s0510a:2904_7: pupphe āharāpetvā thūpaṃ katvā buddhaṃ viya pūjetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2904_8: Atha te sissā tassa āḷahanaṃ katvā buddhasantikaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:2904_9: Atha bhagavā buddhacakkhunā oloketvā anāgataṃsañāṇena pākaṭīkaraṇamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:2904_10: So aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto pubbavāsanābalena satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2905_1: Atha so attano pubbakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2905_3: Kukkuro nāma pabbatoti pabbatassa sikharaṃ kukkurākārena sunakhākārena saṇṭhitattā “kukkurapabbato”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:2905_4: tassa samīpe paṇṇasālaṃ katvā pañcatāpasasahassehi saha vasamānoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2908_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2908_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ vibhavasampanne kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto hatthiassadhanadhaññasattaratanādivibhavasampanno
atk-s0510a:2908_3: saddhāsampanno kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā sahassamattā suvaṇṇapātiyo kāretvā tasmiṃ khīrapāyasasahassassa
atk-s0510a:2908_4: pūretvā tā sabbā gāhāpetvā simbalivanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2908_5: Tasmiṃ samaye vipassī bhagavā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjetvā ākāse caṅkamaṃ māpetvā caṅkamati.
atk-s0510a:2908_6: So pana seṭṭhi taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā atīva pasanno pātiyo ṭhapetvā vanditvā ārocesi paṭiggahaṇāya.
atk-s0510a:2908_8: paṭiggahetvā ca pana tassa somanussuppādanatthaṃ sahassamattehi bhikkhusaṅghehi saddhiṃ paribhuñji,
atk-s0510a:2908_10: So tena puññena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2909_1: So aparabhāge attano kusalaṃ paccavekkhamāno taṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sambuddhotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2910_1: Caṅkamaṃ susamārūḷhoti cadinanto padavikkhepaṃ karonto kamati gacchatīti caṅkamaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2910_2: caṅkamassa padavikkhepassa ādhārabhūtapathavipadeso caṅkamaṃ nāmāti attho,
atk-s0510a:2910_4: Ambare anilāyaneti varīyati chādiyati anenāti varaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2910_8: ā samantato yanti gacchanti anena iddhimantoti āyanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2910_10: tasmiṃ ambare anilāyane caṅkamaṃ māpayinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2913_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave nibbānūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassībhagavato
atk-s0510a:2913_2: kāle seṭṭhikule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā mahaddhano mahābhogo dibbasukhamanubhavanto viya manussasukhamanubhavanto
atk-s0510a:2913_4: Tadā bhagavā suvaṇṇamahāmeru viya vīthiyā vicarati,
atk-s0510a:2913_5: taṃ vicaramānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso gantvā vanditvā sugandhodakena bhagavantaṃ osiñcamāno pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2913_6: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:2913_7: gharāvāsena anallīno satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:2914_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nisajja pāsādavaretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2914_2: Tattha pāsādoti pasādaṃ somanassaṃ janeti uppādetīti pāsādo,
atk-s0510a:2914_3: mālākammacittakammasuvaṇṇakammādyanekavicittaṃ disvā tattha paviṭṭhānaṃ janānaṃ pasādaṃ janayatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2914_4: Pāsādo ca so patthetabbaṭṭhena varo cāti pāsādavaro,
atk-s0510a:2914_5: tasmiṃ pāsādavare nisajja nisīditvā vipassiṃ jinavaraṃ addasanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2917_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2917_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sattavassikakāleyeva sakasippe nipphattiṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā
atk-s0510a:2917_3: vasanto vipassimhi bodhisatte uppanne sabbabuddhānaṃ lakkhaṇāni vedattaye dissamānāni tāni rājappamukhassa
atk-s0510a:2917_4: janakāyassa vipassībodhisattassa lakkhaṇañca buddhabhāvañca byākaritvā janānaṃ mānasaṃ nibbāpesi,
atk-s0510a:2917_6: So tena kusalakammena cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavattisampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2917_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2918_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento jāyamāne vipassimhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2918_2: Vipassimhi sammāsambuddhe jāyamāne uppajjamāne mātukucchito nikkhante ahaṃ pātubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ buddhabhāvassa hetuṃ byākariṃ kathesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2921_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:2921_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto mahaddhano mahābhogo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ gato brāhmaṇasippesu
atk-s0510a:2921_3: koṭippatto sakaparasamayakusalo mātāpitaro pūjetukāmo pañca uppalakalāpe attano samīpe ṭhapetvā nisinno
atk-s0510a:2921_4: bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā nīlapītādighanabuddharasmiyo ca disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:2921_5: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha tāni pupphāni santharitvā bhagavantaṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā sakaghare mātu atthāya
atk-s0510a:2921_6: paṭiyattāni sabbāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni gahetvā saparivāraṃ bhagavantaṃ sahatthena santappento bhojesi.
atk-s0510a:2921_10: So tena puññena devamanussesu dve sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2921_11: ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto bhogayasehi vaḍḍhito kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajito
atk-s0510a:2922_1: So aparabhāge pubbe katakusalaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇena saritvā somanassappatto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nagare dhaññavatiyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2922_2: Dhaññānaṃ puññavantānaṃ khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatimahāsālānaṃ anekesaṃ kulānaṃ ākarattā dhaññavatī,
atk-s0510a:2922_3: atha vā muttāmaṇiādisattaratanānaṃ sattavidhadhaññānaṃ upabhogaparibhogānaṃ ākarattā dhaññavatī,
atk-s0510a:2922_4: atha vā dhaññānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ ārāmavihārādīnaṃ ākarattā dhaññavatī,
atk-s0510a:2922_6: Nagaranti patthenti ettha upabhogaparibhogatthikā janāti nagaraṃ,
atk-s0510a:2922_10: rājādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānasamūhabhūtaṃ pākāraparikhādīhi parikkhittaṃ paricchinnaṭṭhānaṃ nagaraṃ nāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a:2922_11: Nagare yadā ahaṃ vipassissa bhagavato santike byākaraṇaṃ alabhiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2922_12: tadā tasmiṃ dhaññavatiyā nagare brāhmaṇo ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2925_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2925_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā vedattayādisakasippesu pārappatto anekesaṃ brāhmaṇasahassāniṃ
atk-s0510a:2925_3: pāmokkho ācariyo sakasippānaṃ pariyosānaṃ adisvā tattha ca sāraṃ apassanto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2925_4: pabbajitvā himavantassa avidūre assamaṃ kāretvā saha sissehi vāsaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0510a:2925_5: tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā bhikkhāya caramāno tassānukampāya taṃ padesaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2925_6: Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano atthāya puṭake nikkhipitvā rukkhagge laggitāni madhurāni padumaphalāni madhunā saha adāsi.
atk-s0510a:2925_7: Bhagavā tassa somanassuppādanatthaṃ passantasseva paribhuñjitvā ākāse ṭhito phaladānānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2926_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne
atk-s0510a:2926_2: ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto sattavassikoyeva arahattaṃ patvā pubbe katakusalakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2926_7: akāro virahappake”ti evaṃ vuttesu dasasu atthesu tabbhāve vattati.
atk-s0510a:2926_8: Sissānaṃ savanadhāraṇādivasena hitaṃ ajjheti cinteti sajjhāyaṃ karotīti ajjhāyako,
atk-s0510a:2926_10: Ācariyassa santike uggahitaṃ sabbaṃ mantaṃ manena dhāreti pavattetīti mantadharo.
atk-s0510a:2926_11: Tiṇṇaṃ vedāna pāragūti vedaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2926_14: tesaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ koṭiṃ gato pattoti pāragū.
atk-s0510a:2929_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uppannuppanne bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:2929_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2929_3: himavantassa avidūre pabbatantare paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā vasanto
atk-s0510a:2929_4: ekadivasaṃ parisuddhaṃ paṇḍaraṃ pulinatalaṃ disvā “īdisā parisuddhā buddhā,
atk-s0510a:2929_5: īdisaṃva parisuddhaṃ buddhañāṇa”nti buddhañca tassa ñāṇañca anussari thomesi ca.
atk-s0510a:2930_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2930_2: nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto pubbe katapuññaṃ anussaritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2930_4: Pulinaṃ sobhanaṃ disvāti paripuṇṇakataṃ viya pulākārena parisodhitākārena pavattaṃ ṭhitanti pulinaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2930_5: sobhanaṃ vālukaṃ disvā seṭṭhaṃ buddhaṃ anussarinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2933_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu katapuññasañcayo vipassissa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2933_2: nibbatto upabhogaparibhogehi anūno ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ sagaṇaṃ disvā pasannamānaso lājāpañcamehi
atk-s0510a:2933_4: So teneva cittappasādena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato devaloke nibbatto dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0510a:2933_5: manussesu manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto saddhājāto pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2934_1: So ekadivasaṃ pubbe katapuññaṃ saritvā somanassajāto “iminā kusalenāhaṃ nibbānaṃ patto”ti pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2937_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2937_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā sakasippe nipphattiṃ patvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto
atk-s0510a:2937_3: buddhuppattito puretaraṃ uppannattā ovādānusāsanaṃ alabhitvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2937_4: himavantassa avidūre gotamakaṃ nāma pabbataṃ nissāya assamaṃ kāretvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā
atk-s0510a:2937_6: Tadā padumuttaro bhagavā buddho hutvā satte saṃsārato uddharanto tassānukampāya himavantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2937_7: Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sakasisse samānetvā tehi padumapupphāni āharāpetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2937_8: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:2937_9: kulagehe nibbatto saddho pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2938_1: So attano puññakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2938_2: Gotamo nāma pabbatoti anekesaṃ yakkhadevatānaṃ āvāsabhāvena adhiṭṭhānavasena gotamassa bhavanattā gotamoti pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2938_5: Atha vā pathaviṃ khananto uddhaṃ ruhatīti rukkho,
atk-s0510a:2938_7: tehi nānārukkhehi sañchanno parikiṇṇo gotamo pabbatoti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2938_8: Mahābhūtagaṇālayoti bhavanti jāyanti uppajjanti vaḍḍhanti cāti bhūtā,
atk-s0510a:2938_9: mahantā ca te bhūtā cāti mahābhūtā,
atk-s0510a:2939_1: Vemajjhamhi ca tassāsīti tassa gotamassa pabbatassa vemajjhe abbhantare assamo abhinimmito nipphādito katoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2944_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato sobhitattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2944_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2944_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā ekadivasaṃ satthārā dhamme
atk-s0510a:2944_4: So teneva somanassena kālaṃ katvā devesu nibbatto tattha dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā manussesu ca manussasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:2944_5: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto sattavassikova pabbajitvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0510a:2945_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2948_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave katapuññūpacayo sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2948_2: nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto vitthatāya nāma gaṅgāya samīpe pilakkhuphalitaṃ
atk-s0510a:2948_3: pariyesanto tassā tīre nisinnaṃ jalamānaaggisikhaṃ iva sikhiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ketakīpupphaṃ
atk-s0510a:2948_5: yena ñāṇena tvaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvo sabbaññubuddho jāto,
atk-s0510a:2948_8: So tena puññena devamanussesu jāto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2948_9: nibbatto satthari pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2949_1: So attano katakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vitthatāya nadītīretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2949_2: Tattha vitthatāyāti vittharati pattharati vitthiṇṇā hotīti vitthatā,
atk-s0510a:2949_3: nadanti saddaṃ karonti itā gatā pavattāti nadī,
atk-s0510a:2949_4: nadiṃ tarantā etaṃ patvā tiṇṇā nāma hontīti tīraṃ,
atk-s0510a:2949_5: tassā vitthatāya nadiyā tīre tīrasamīpeti attho.
atk-s0510a:2949_6: Ketakiṃ pupphitaṃ disvāti kucchitākārena gaṇhantānaṃ hatthaṃ kaṇḍako chindati vijjhatīti ketaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2950_2: sikhīsadisā nīlapītādibhedā jalamānā chabbaṇṇaghanaraṃsiyo yassa so sikhī,
atk-s0510a:2950_4: tassa sikhino lokabandhuno ketakīpupphaṃ vaṇṭe chinditvā pūjesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2953_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2953_2: bhagavato kāle himavante candabhāgānadiyā samīpe kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbatto pupphabhakkho pupphanivasano
atk-s0510a:2953_3: candanaagaruādīsu gandhavibhūsito himavante bhummadevatā viya uyyānakīḷajalakīḷādianekasukhaṃ anubhavanto
atk-s0510a:2953_5: Tadā atthadassī bhagavā tassānukampāya himavantaṃ gantvā ākāsato oruyha saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:2953_6: So kinnaro taṃ bhagavantaṃ vijjotamānaṃ tattha nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sugandhacandanena pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2954_1: So tena puññena tena somanassena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo
atk-s0510a:2954_2: anubhavitvā manussesu cakkavattirajjapadesarajjasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:2954_3: viññutaṃ patto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2954_5: Tattha candaṃ manaṃ ruciṃ ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā viya jātoti cando.
atk-s0510a:2954_6: Candamaṇḍalena pasannanimmalodakena ubhosu passesu muttādalasadisasantharadhavalapulinatalena ca samannāgatattā candena bhāgā sadisāti candabhāgā,
atk-s0510a:2954_7: tassā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre samīpeti attho.
atk-s0510a:2958_0: Sunando nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato pupphacchadaniyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2958_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:2958_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patto mahābhogo mahāyaso dānābhirato ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2958_3: Ekadivasaṃ so “sakalajambudīpe ime yācakā nāma ‘ahaṃ dānaṃ na laddhosmī’ti vattuṃ mā labhantū”ti mahādānaṃ sajjesi.
atk-s0510a:2958_4: Tadā padumuttaro bhagavā saparivāro ākāsena gacchati.
atk-s0510a:2958_5: Brāhmaṇo taṃ disvā pasannacitto sakasisse pakkosāpetvā pupphāni āharāpetvā ākāse ukkhipitvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2958_6: Tāni sakalanagaraṃ chādetvā satta divasāni aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:2959_1: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2959_2: nibbatto saddhājāto pabbajitvā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2962_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto ekasmiṃ buddhasuññakāle
atk-s0510a:2962_2: majjhimadese brāhmaṇakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto
atk-s0510a:2962_3: kevalaṃ udaraṃ pūretvā kodhamadamānādayo akusaleyeva disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:2962_4: pabbajitvā anekatāpasasataparivāro vasabhapabbatasamīpe assamaṃ māpetvā tīṇi vassasahassāni himavanteyeva
atk-s0510a:2962_5: vasamāno “ahaṃ ettakānaṃ sissānaṃ ācariyoti sammato garuṭṭhāniyo garukātabbo vandanīyo,
atk-s0510a:2962_6: ācariyo me natthī”ti domanassappatto te sabbe sisse sannipātetvā buddhānaṃ abhāve nibbānādhigamābhāvaṃ
atk-s0510a:2962_7: pakāsetvā sayaṃ ekako raho vivekaṭṭhāneva nisinno buddhassa sammukhā nisinno viya buddhasaññaṃ manasi
atk-s0510a:2962_8: karitvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā sālāyaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2963_1: So tattha jhānasukhena ciraṃ vasitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto kāmesu anallīno sattavassiko
atk-s0510a:2963_2: pabbajitvā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā chaḷabhiñño hutvā pubbenivāsañāṇena attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā
atk-s0510a:2963_4: Vasabho nāma pabbatoti himavantapabbataṃ vinā sesapabbatānaṃ uccatarabhāvena seṭṭhatarabhāvena vasabhoti saṅkhaṃ gato pabbatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:2966_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa
atk-s0510a:2966_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto vuddhippatto sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto
atk-s0510a:2966_3: gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vanantare vasanto vessabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa sissehi
atk-s0510a:2966_6: So teneva kusalena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2966_7: nibbatto viññutaṃ pāpuṇitvā pubbavāsanābalena gharāvāse anallīno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2967_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbapuññakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento kaṇikāraṃva jotantantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2967_2: Tattha kaṇikāranti sakalapattapalāsāni paribhajja pātetvā pupphagahaṇasamaye kaṇṇikābaddho hutvā pupphamakuḷānaṃ
atk-s0510a:2967_6: Taṃ pupphitaṃ kaṇikārarukkhaṃ iva jotantaṃ buddhaṃ addasanti attho.
atk-s0510a:2970_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekesu attabhāvesu katapuññūpacayo padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0510a:2970_2: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patto tattha sāraṃ apassanto gehaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:2970_4: tadā sattānukampāya himavantamāgataṃ padumuttarabhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pañcaṅgasamannāgato vanditvā thutivacanehi thomesi.
atk-s0510a:2970_5: So tena puññena yāvatāyukaṃ katvā kālaṅkatvā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2970_6: So aparabhāge imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2971_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento visālamāḷe āsīnotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2971_2: Tattha visālamāḷeti visālaṃ patthaṭaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ mahantaṃ māḷaṃ visālamāḷaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2971_3: tasmiṃ visālamāḷe āsīno nisinno ahaṃ lokanāyakaṃ addasanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2974_0: Nārado iti me nāmantiādikaṃ āyasmato ekapasādaniyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2974_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu katakusalo atthadassissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0510a:2974_2: nibbatto kesavoti pākaṭo hutvā viññutaṃ patvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vasanto ekadivasaṃ satthu
atk-s0510a:2974_3: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso añjaliṃ paggayha ativiya pītisomanassajāto pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:2974_4: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā teneva somanassena kālaṃ katvā devesu nibbatto tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:2974_5: manussesu uppanno tattha sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto
atk-s0510a:2974_6: satthari pasīditvā pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:2975_1: So aparabhāge attano katakusalakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nārado iti me nāmantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2975_2: Tattha nāradoti jātivasena suddhasarīrattā natthi rajo dhūli malaṃ etassāti nārado, ja-
atk-s0510a:2975_5: Kesavoti kisavacchagotte jātattā kesavo nāradakesavo iti maṃ janā vidū jānantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:2978_0: Migarājā tadā āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato sālapupphadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2978_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave katakusalasañcayo kenaci kammacchiddena himavante sīhayoniyaṃ nibbatto anekasīhaparivāro vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:2978_2: Tadā sikhī bhagavā tassānukampāya himavantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:2978_3: Sīho taṃ upagataṃ disvā pasannamānaso sākhābhaṅgena sakaṇṇikasālapupphaṃ gahetvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2979_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:2979_2: nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthari pasanno pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2979_5: atha vā ghāsaṃ magganti gavesantīti migā,
atk-s0510a:2979_7: Sakalacatuppadānaṃ rājabhāve satipi gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ mige ādiṃ katvā migarājāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2979_8: Yadā bhagavantaṃ disvā sapupphaṃ sālasākhaṃ bhañjitvā pūjesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2980_0: 62. Sakosaṃ pupphamāharinti sakaṇṇikaṃ sālapupphaṃ āhariṃ pūjesinti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:2983_0: Parodhako tadā āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato piyālaphaladāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:2983_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sikhissa
atk-s0510a:2983_2: bhagavato kāle nesādakule nibbatto himavante ekasmiṃ pabbhāre mige vadhitvā jīvikaṃ kappetvā vasati.
atk-s0510a:2983_3: Tasmiṃ kāle tattha gataṃ sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sāyaṃ pātaṃ namassamāno kañci deyyadhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:2983_6: So nesādo buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭṭhasarīro pāpakamme virattacitto mūlaphalāhāro nacirasseva kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:2984_1: So tattha dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca anekavidhasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:2984_2: gahapatikule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tattha anabhirato gehaṃ pahāya satthu santike
atk-s0510a:2984_3: pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto attano kataphaladānakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:2984_5: Tattha yadā ahaṃ piyālaphalaṃ datvā cittaṃ pasādesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:2985_2: imaṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti pavāriṃ nimantesiṃ ārādhesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2990_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:2990_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto dharamānassa bhagavato adiṭṭhattā parinibbutakāle “aho mama
atk-s0510a:2990_3: parihānī”ti cintetvā “mama jātiṃ saphalaṃ karissāmī”ti katasanniṭṭhāno chattādhichattaṃ kāretvā tassa
atk-s0510a:2990_5: Aparabhāge pupphacchattaṃ kāretvā tameva dhātugabbhaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2990_6: So teneva puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde gahapatikule
atk-s0510a:2990_7: nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthari pasanno pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vāyamanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:2991_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento parinibbute bhagavatītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:2991_2: Tattha chattātichattanti chādiyati saṃvariyati ātapādinti chattaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2991_3: chattassa atichattaṃ chattassa upari katachattaṃ chattātichattaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2991_6: atha vā thūpati thirabhāvena vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjamāno patiṭṭhātīti thūpo,
atk-s0510a:2991_7: tasmiṃ thūpamhi mayā kāritaṃ chattaṃ uparūpari ṭhapanavasena abhi visesena āropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2992_1: Pupphacchadanaṃ katvānāti vikasitehi sugandhehi anekehi phupphehi chadanaṃ chattupari vitānaṃ katvā pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2995_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto dhammadassissa
atk-s0510a:2995_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto saddho pasanno parinibbute bhagavati tassa bhagavato dhātugabbhamāḷake
atk-s0510a:2995_4: Bahūni jātisumanapupphāni ganthitvā nisseṇiyā ārohitvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:2996_1: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā kālaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā sabbattha pūjito
atk-s0510a:2996_2: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe nibbatto daharakālato pabhuti pūjanīyo sāsane baddhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:2996_3: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:2996_5: Tattha nibbute lokanāthamhīti sakalalokassa nāthe padhānabhūte paṭisaraṇe ca satthari khandhaparinibbānena
atk-s0510a:2996_6: nibbute nibbutadīpasikhā viya adassanaṃ gateti attho.
atk-s0510a:2996_8: atha vā satipaṭṭhānādike sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhamme dassanasīlo passanasīloti dhammadassī,
atk-s0510a:2996_10: dhammadassī ca so narāsabho ceti dhammadassīnarāsabho,
atk-s0510a:2996_12: Āropesiṃ dhajaṃ thambhanti cetiyamāḷake thambhaṃ nikhanitvā tattha dhajaṃ āropesiṃ bandhitvā ṭhapesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:2997_1: Nisseṇiṃ māpayitvānāti nissāya taṃ iṇanti gacchanti ārohanti uparīti nisseṇi,
atk-s0510a:2997_2: taṃ nisseṇiṃ māpayitvā kāretvā bandhitvā thūpaseṭṭhaṃ samāruhinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:2997_3: Jātipupphaṃ gahetvānāti jāyamānameva janānaṃ sundaraṃ manaṃ karotīti jātisumanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2997_4: jātisumanameva pupphaṃ “jātisumanapuppha”nti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ sumanasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “jātipuppha”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:2997_5: taṃ jātisumanapupphaṃ gahetvā ganthitvā thūpamhi āropayiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3000_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto piyadassissa
atk-s0510a:3000_2: bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā nibbute satthari
atk-s0510a:3000_5: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto anekesu jātisatasahassesu pūjanīyo mahaddhano mahābhogo ubhayasukhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3000_6: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vibhavasampanno pabbajitvā vāyamanto nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3001_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbe katakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3001_3: Piyadassīnaruttameti piyaṃ somanassākāraṃ dassanaṃ yassa so piyadassī,
atk-s0510a:3001_6: piyadassī ca so naruttamo ceti piyadassīnaruttamo,
atk-s0510a:3001_7: tasmiṃ piyadassīnaruttame nibbute dhātugabbhamhi muttavediṃ ahaṃ akāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3002_1: Maṇīhi parivāretvāti maṇati jotati pabhāsatīti maṇi,
atk-s0510a:3002_2: atha vā janānaṃ manaṃ pūrento somanassaṃ karonto ito gato pavattoti maṇi,
atk-s0510a:3002_3: jātiraṅgamaṇiveḷuriyamaṇiādīhi anekehi maṇīhi katavedikāvalayaṃ parivāretvā uttamaṃ mahāpūjaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3005_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato saparivāriyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3005_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3005_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto mahaddhano mahābhogo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3005_3: Atha padumuttare bhagavati parinibbute mahājano tassa dhātuṃ nidahitvā mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ kāretvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3005_4: Tasmiṃ kāle ayaṃ upāsako tassupari candanasārena cetiyagharaṃ karitvā mahāpūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3005_5: So teneva puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kulagehe
atk-s0510a:3005_6: nibbatto vuddhimanvāya kusalaṃ katvā saddhāya sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.

atk-s0510a:3063_4: disvā pasannamānaso tiṇasūlapupphaṃ gahetvā pādamūle pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3064_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3064_2: vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sāsane pasanno pabbajitvā upanissayasampannattā nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:3064_3: arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassappatto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3064_4: Bhūtagaṇo nāma pabbatoti bhūtagaṇānaṃ devayakkhasamūhānaṃ āvāsabhūtattā bhavanasadisattā avirūḷhabhāvena pavattattā ca bhūtagaṇo nāma pabbato,
atk-s0510a:3064_5: tasmiṃ eko adutiyo jino jitamāro buddho vasate dibbabrahmaariyairiyāpathavihārehi viharatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3065_2: kappaṃ na vinipātikoti tena tiṇasūlapupphapūjākaraṇaphalena nirantaraṃ ekūnasatasahassakappānaṃ avinipātako
atk-s0510a:3068_0: Suvaccho nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato nāgapupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3068_1: Ayampi thero purimajinanisabhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3068_2: padumuttarabhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto vuddhippatto vedattayādīsu sakasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā
atk-s0510a:3068_3: tattha sāraṃ adisvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānasamāpattisukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0510a:3068_4: Tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā tassānukampāya tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3068_5: So tāpaso taṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā lakkhaṇasatthesu chekattā bhagavato lakkhaṇarūpasampattiyā pasanno vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3068_6: Ākāsato anotiṇṇattā pūjāsakkāre akateyeva ākāseneva pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3068_7: Atha so tāpaso sasisso nāgapupphaṃ ocinitvā tena pupphena bhagavato gatadisābhāgamaggaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3069_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavanto sabbattha pūjito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3069_2: sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddhāsampanno pabbajitvā vattapaṭipattiyā sāsanaṃ sobhayamāno
atk-s0510a:3069_3: nacirasseva arahā hutvā “kena nu kho kusalakammena mayā ayaṃ lokuttarasampatti laddhā”ti atītakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3069_4: saranto pubbakammaṃ paccakkhato ñatvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento suvaccho nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3069_6: sundaro ca so vaccho ceti suvaccho.
atk-s0510a:3069_7: Nāmena suvaccho nāma brāhmaṇo mantapāragū vedattayādisakalamantasatthe koṭippattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3072_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto phussassa
atk-s0510a:3072_2: bhagavato kāle nesādakule nibbatto mahāvanaṃ paviṭṭho tattha supupphitapunnāgapupphaṃ disvā hetusampannattā
atk-s0510a:3072_3: buddhārammaṇapītivasena bhagavantaṃ saritvā taṃ pupphaṃ saha kaṇṇikāhi ocinitvā vālukāhi cetiyaṃ katvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3073_1: So tena puññena dvenavutikappe nirantaraṃ devamanussasampattiyoyeva anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3073_2: vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya pubbavāsanābalena sāsane pasanno pabbajitvā vāyamanto nacirasseva
atk-s0510a:3073_3: arahā hutvā pubbe katakusalaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento kānanaṃ vanamogayhātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3076_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3076_2: bhagavato kāle himavantassa āsanne mahante jātassare kukuttho nāma pakkhī hutvā nibbatto kenaci akusalena
atk-s0510a:3076_3: pakkhī samānopi pubbe katasambhārena buddhisampanno puññāpuññesu cheko sīlavā pāṇagocarato paṭivirato ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3076_4: Tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā ākāsenāgantvā tassa samīpe caṅkamati.
atk-s0510a:3076_5: Atha so sakuṇo bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto kumudapupphaṃ ḍaṃsitvā bhagavato pādamūle pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3077_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu ubhayasampattisukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3077_2: kule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya mahaddhano mahābhogo ratanattaye pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:3077_3: pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ paccakkhato ñatvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3077_5: Padumuppalasañchannoti ettha satapattehi sampuṇṇo setapadumo ca tīṇi nīlarattasetuppalāni ca padumuppalāni
atk-s0510a:3077_6: tehi sañchanno gahanībhūto sampuṇṇo mahājātassaro ahūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3077_7: Puṇḍarīkasamotthaṭoti puṇḍarīkehi rattapadumehi otthaṭo sampuṇṇoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3082_0: Padumo nāma nāmenātiādikaṃ āyasmato supāricariyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3082_1: Ayampi purimamunipuṅgavesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3082_2: bhagavato kāle yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbatto himavati yakkhasamāgamaṃ gato bhagavato devayakkhagandhabbanāgānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3082_3: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso ubho hatthe ābhujitvā apphoṭesi namassi ca.
atk-s0510a:3082_4: So tena puññena tato cuto upari devaloke uppanno tattha dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavatiādisampattiyo
atk-s0510a:3082_5: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatto aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo ratanattaye
atk-s0510a:3082_6: pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhājāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3083_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumo nāma nāmenātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3083_2: Tattha padumoti yassa pādanikkhepasamaye pathaviṃ bhinditvā padumaṃ uggantvā pādatalaṃ sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0510a:3083_3: tena saññāṇena so bhagavā padumoti saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:3083_5: So bhagavā pavanā vasanavihārā abhinikkhamma vanamajjhaṃ pavisitvā dhammaṃ desetīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3084_0: Yakkhānaṃ samayoti devānaṃ samāgamo āsi ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3087_0: Siddhattho nāma bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato kaṇaverapupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3087_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle suddakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya rañño antepurapālako ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3087_2: Tasmiṃ samaye siddhattho bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājavīthiṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0510a:3087_3: Atha so antepurapālako caramānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso hutvā kaṇaverapupphena bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3087_4: So tena puññena sugatisampattiyoyeva anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kule nibbattitvā vuddhippatto
atk-s0510a:3087_5: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3088_1: So pattaaggaphalo pubbe katakusalaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento siddhattho nāma bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3091_0: Tissassa kho bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato khajjakadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3091_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:3091_2: bhagavato kāle suddakule nibbatto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ambajambuādimanekaṃ madhuraphalāphalaṃ
atk-s0510a:3091_5: So tena puññena sugatisampattiyoyeva anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:3091_6: patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sañjātasaddho pasādabahumāno pabbajitvā vattapaṭipattiyā sāsanaṃ sobhento
atk-s0510a:3092_1: So pubbakammaṃ saranto “pubbe mayā sukhette kusalaṃ kataṃ sundara”nti somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento tissassa kho bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3092_2: Tattha tissopi bhavasampattiyo dadamāno jātoti mātāpitūhi katanāmavasena tisso.
atk-s0510a:3092_3: Atha vā tīhi saraṇagamanehi assāsento ovadanto hetusampannapuggale saggamokkhadvaye patiṭṭhāpento buddho jātoti tisso.
atk-s0510a:3092_5: tassa tissassa bhagavato pubbe ahaṃ phalaṃ adāsinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3092_6: Nāḷikerañca pādāsinti nāḷikākārena pavattaṃ phalaṃ nāḷikeraṃ,
atk-s0510a:3092_8: Khajjakaṃ abhisammatanti khāditabbaṃ khajjakaṃ abhi visesena madhusakkarādīhi sammissaṃ katvā nipphāditaṃ
atk-s0510a:3092_9: sundaraṃ madhuranti sammataṃ ñātaṃ abhisammataṃ khajjakañca adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3095_0: Atthadassī tu bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato desapūjakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3095_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:3095_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddho pasanno buddhamāmako dhammamāmako saṅghamāmako ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3095_3: Tadā atthadassī bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cando viya sūriyo viya ca ākāsena gacchati.
atk-s0510a:3095_4: So upāsako bhagavato gatadisābhāgaṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjento añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3096_1: So tena puññena devaloke nibbatto saggasampattiṃ anubhavitvā manussesu ca manussasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3096_2: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhippatto upabhogaparibhogasampanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3096_3: sutvā pasannamānaso gharāvāse anallīno pabbajitvā vattasampanno nacirasseva arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3096_4: saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento atthadassī tu bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3096_7: añjasaṃ vaṭumāyana”nti pariyāyassa vuttattā anilassa vātassa añjasaṃ gamanamaggoti anilañjasaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3099_0: Vessabhū nāma sambuddhotiādikaṃ āyasmato kaṇikārachattiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3099_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa
atk-s0510a:3099_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto saddhāsampanno ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3099_3: Tasmiṃ samaye vessabhū bhagavā vivekakāmo mahāvanaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:3099_4: Atha sopi upāsako kenacideva karaṇīyena tattha gantvā bhagavantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ viya jalamānaṃ nisinnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3099_5: disvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphaṃ ocinitvā chattaṃ katvā bhagavato nisinnaṭṭhāne vitānaṃ katvā pūjesi,
atk-s0510a:3099_6: taṃ bhagavato ānubhāvena sattāhaṃ amilātaṃ hutvā tatheva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3099_8: so taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā somanassajāto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3100_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0510a:3100_2: vuddhimanvāya saddhāsampanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gharāvāse anallīno pabbajitvā vattapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0510a:3100_3: jinasāsanaṃ sobhento nacirasseva arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3100_5: Tattha vessabhūti vesse vessajane bhunāti abhibhavatīti vessabhū.
atk-s0510a:3100_6: Atha vā vesse pañcavidhamāre abhibhunāti ajjhottharatīti vessabhū.
atk-s0510a:3100_9: Divāvihārāya munīti dibbati pakāseti taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ karotīti divā.
atk-s0510a:3100_14: tassa divāvihārāya lokajeṭṭho narāsabho buddhamuni mahāvanaṃ ogāhitvā pavisitvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3103_0: Phusso nāmātha bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato sappidāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3103_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto phussassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3103_2: Tadā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto vīthiyaṃ caramāno tassa upāsakassa gehadvāraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3103_3: Atha so upāsako bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā pattapūraṃ sappitelaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0510a:3103_5: So teneva somanassena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto tena puññena devaloke uppanno tattha dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3103_6: manussesu ca nibbatto uppannuppannabhave sappitelamadhuphāṇitādimadhurāhārasamaṅgī sukhaṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3103_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhippatto saddho buddhisampanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3103_8: sutvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā vattasampanno nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3104_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā jātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento phusso nāmātha bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3104_2: Tattha phussoti phussanakkhattayogena jātattā mātāpitūhi katanāmadheyyena phusso.
atk-s0510a:3104_3: Atha vā nibbānaṃ phusi passi sacchi akāsīti phusso.
atk-s0510a:3104_4: Atha vā samatiṃsapāramitāsattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhamme sakale ca tepiṭake pariyattidhamme phusi passi aññāsīti phusso.
atk-s0510a:3104_7: tesaṃ āhutīnaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ arahatīti āhutīnaṃ paṭiggaho.
atk-s0510a:3104_8: Mahājanaṃ nibbāpento vīro phusso nāma bhagavā vīthiyaṃ atha tadā gacchateti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3107_1: Ayampi āyasmā purimamunindesu katādhikāro anekesu ca jātisatesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3107_2: phussasseva bhagavato kāle suddakule nibbatto vuddhippatto candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre kenacideva karaṇīyena
atk-s0510a:3107_3: anusotaṃ caramāno phussaṃ bhagavantaṃ nhāyitukāmaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ viya jalamānaṃ disvā somanassajāto tattha
atk-s0510a:3108_1: So tattha tena puññakoṭṭhāsena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3108_2: kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā vattapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0510a:3108_3: sāsanaṃ sobhento nacirasseva arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3111_0: Tivarāyaṃ pure rammetiādikaṃ āyasmato dussadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3111_1: Ayampāyasmā purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa
atk-s0510a:3111_2: bhagavato kāle rājakule nibbatto vuddhippattakāle yuvarājabhāvaṃ patvā pākaṭo ekaṃ janapadaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0510a:3111_5: Tasmiṃ samaye siddhattho bhagavā taṃ janapadaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3111_6: Atha so yuvarājā paṇṇākāraṃ labhitvā tattha sukhumavatthena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3111_7: Bhagavā taṃ vatthaṃ hatthena parāmasitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0510a:3111_9: Atha so yuvarājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā atīva pasanno añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3111_10: Bhagavato sampattasampattaṭṭhāne sabbe janā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittā añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3111_12: Yuvarājā teneva kusalakammena tato cuto devaloke uppanno tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā manussesu
atk-s0510a:3111_13: cakkavattiādisampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ
atk-s0510a:3111_14: patto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā ratanattaye pasanno bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3112_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento tivarāyaṃ pure rammetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3112_2: Tattha tivaranāmake nagare ramaṇīye ahaṃ rājaputto hutvā siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ vatthena pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3115_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhānaṃ santike katakusalasambhāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3115_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā puññāni karonto vasamāno
atk-s0510a:3115_3: saddho pasanno bahū upāsake sannipātetvā gaṇajeṭṭhako hutvā “māḷakaṃ karissāmā”ti te sabbe samādapetvā
atk-s0510a:3115_4: ekaṃ māḷakaṃ samaṃ kāretvā paṇḍarapulinaṃ okiritvā bhagavato niyyādesi.
atk-s0510a:3115_5: So tena puññena devaloke uppanno cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavattiādisampattiyo
atk-s0510a:3115_6: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto bhagavati pasanno dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3115_7: saddhājāto pabbajitvā sīlasampanno vattasampanno nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3116_1: So aparabhāge attano katakusalaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nagare bandhumatiyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3116_2: Tattha bandhanti ñātigottādivasena ekasambandhā honti sakalanagaravāsinoti bandhū,
atk-s0510a:3116_4: tassā bandhumatiyā nāma nagare mahāpūgagaṇo upāsakasamūho ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3116_5: Māḷaṃ kassāma saṅghassāti ettha māti gaṇhāti sampattasampattajanānaṃ cittanti māḷaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3116_6: atha vā sampattayatigaṇānaṃ cittassa vivekakaraṇe alanti māḷaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3119_0: Tisso nāmāsi bhagavātiādikaṃ āyasmato pañcaṅguliyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3119_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāre tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto tissassa
atk-s0510a:3119_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vibhavasampanno saddho pasanno
atk-s0510a:3119_3: vīthito vihāraṃ paṭipannaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā jātisumanādianekāni sugandhapupphāni candanādīni ca vilepanāni
atk-s0510a:3119_4: gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gato pupphehi bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā vilepanehi bhagavato sarīre pañcaṅgulikaṃ katvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3120_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3120_2: kule nibbattitvā vuddhimanvāya satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0510a:3120_3: nacirasseva arahā hutvā pubbakammaṃ saranto paccakkhato ñatvā “imaṃ nāma kusalakammaṃ katvā īdisaṃ lokuttarasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:3120_4: pattomhī”ti pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento tisso nāmāsi bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3125_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0510a:3125_2: bhagavato kāle himavantapabbatasamīpe jātassarassa āsanne rakkhaso hutvā nibbatto atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3125_3: tattha upagataṃ disvā pasannamānaso kumudapupphāni ocinitvā bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3126_1: So tena puññena tato cavitvā devalokaṃ upapanno cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavattiādisampattiyo
atk-s0510a:3126_2: anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto ratanattaye pasanno pabbajitvā vāyamanto
atk-s0510a:3126_3: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:3126_5: Tattha tatthajo rakkhaso āsinti tasmiṃ jātassarasamīpe jāto nibbatto rakkhaso pararudhiramaṃsakhādako
atk-s0510a:3126_6: niddayo ghorarūpo bhayānakasabhāvo mahābalo mahāthāmo kakkhaḷo yakkho āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3127_0: Kumudaṃ pupphate tatthāti tasmiṃ mahāsare sūriyaraṃsiyā abhāve sati sāyanhe makuḷitaṃ kuñcitākārena nippabhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3127_1: avaṇṇaṃ hotīti “kumuda”nti laddhanāmaṃ pupphaṃ pupphate vikasatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3127_2: Cakkamattāni jāyareti tāni pupphāni rathacakkapamāṇāni hutvā jāyantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3130_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro anekāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto koṇḍaññassa
atk-s0510a:3130_2: bhagavato kāle vaḍḍhakikule nibbatto saddho pasanno bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3130_3: vasanapāsādassārohanatthāya sārakaṭṭhamayaṃ nisseṇiṃ katvā ussāpetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3130_4: Bhagavā tassa pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthāya passantasseva uparipāsādaṃ āruhi.
atk-s0510a:3130_5: So atīva pasanno teneva pītisomanassena kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3130_6: manussesu jāyamāno nisseṇidānanissandena uccakule nibbatto manussasukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3130_7: ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhājāto pabbajito nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3131_1: So attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento koṇḍaññassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3131_2: Tattha koṇḍaññassāti kucchito hutvā ḍeti pavattatīti koṇḍo,
atk-s0510a:3131_6: Atha vā brāhmaṇagottesu koṇḍaññagotte uppannattā “koṇḍañño”ti gottavasena tassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3134_0: Migaluddo pure āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato rattipupphiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3134_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:3134_2: bhagavato kāle nesādakule uppanno migavadhāya araññe vicaramāno tassa kāruññena araññe caramānaṃ vipassiṃ
atk-s0510a:3134_3: bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pupphitaṃ rattikaṃ nāma pupphaṃ kuṭajapupphañca saha vaṇṭena ocinitvā
atk-s0510a:3135_1: So teneva puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe
atk-s0510a:3135_2: nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3135_3: nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā “nesādabhūtena mayā katakusalaṃ sundara”nti somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:3135_5: Tattha migānaṃ luddo sāhasiko mārakoti migaluddo,
atk-s0510a:3136_1: Rattikaṃ pupphitaṃ disvāti padumapupphādīni anekāni pupphāni sūriyaraṃsisamphassena divā pupphanti rattiyaṃ makuḷitāni honti.
atk-s0510a:3136_2: Jātisumanamallikādīni anekāni pupphāni pana rattiyaṃ pupphanti no divā.
atk-s0510a:3136_3: Tasmā rattiyaṃ pupphanato rattipupphanāmakāni anekāni sugandhapupphāni ca kuṭajapupphāni ca gahetvā pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3139_1: Ayampi thero purimamunivaresu katādhikāro anekesu bhavesu katapuññasañcayo vipassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0510a:3139_3: tañca nirantaraṃ katvā pavattetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ekaṃ kūpaṃ khanāpetvā udakasampattakāle iṭṭhakāhi
atk-s0510a:3139_4: cināpetvā thiraṃ katvā tattha uṭṭhitena udakena puṇṇaṃ taṃ udapānaṃ vipassissa bhagavato niyyādesi.
atk-s0510a:3139_6: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne pokkharaṇīudapānapānīyādisampanno sukhamanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3139_7: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya saddho pasanno pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3140_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vipassino bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3140_2: Tattha udapāno kato mayāti udakaṃ pivanti etthāti udapāno,
atk-s0510a:3140_4: So udapāno kūpo vipassissa bhagavato atthāya kato khanitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3143_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave nibbānādhigamatthāya katapuññūpacayo padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3143_2: bhagavato kāle gahapatikule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ratanattaye pasanno tasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3143_3: bhagavati parinibbute sattahi ratanehi khacitaṃ sīhāsanaṃ kārāpetvā bodhirukkhaṃ pūjesi,
atk-s0510a:3144_1: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā sabbattha pūjito imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3144_2: sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto vuddhippatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3144_3: ñātivaggaṃ pahāya pabbajito nacirasseva arahā hutvā pubbūpacitakusalasambhāraṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso
atk-s0510a:3144_5: Tattha sīhāsanamadāsahanti sīharūpahiraññasuvaṇṇaratanehi khacitaṃ āsanaṃ sīhāsanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3144_7: sīhaṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ āsananti sīhāsanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3147_1: Ayampāyasmā purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto anomadassissa
atk-s0510a:3147_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto anomadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3147_3: ākāse caṅkamantaṃ pāduddhāre pāduddhāracaṅkamanaṭṭhāne pupphānaṃ vikiraṇaṃ acchariyañca disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3148_1: So tena puññena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjito sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3148_2: kule nibbatto kamena yobbaññaṃ pāpuṇitvā saddhājāto pabbajitvā vattasampanno nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto
atk-s0510a:3148_4: So pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento anomadassī bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3148_5: Diṭṭhadhammasukhatthāyāti imasmiṃ attabhāve caṅkamanena sarīrasallahukādisukhaṃ paṭiccāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3149_0: Uddhate pāde pupphānīti caṅkamantena pāde uddhate padumuppalādīni pupphāni pathavito uggantvā caṅkame vikiriṃsūti attho.
atk-s0510a:3149_1: Sobhaṃ muddhani tiṭṭhareti buddhassa muddhani sīse sobhayamānā tāni tiṭṭhantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3152_1: Ayampāyasmā purimajinaseṭṭhesu katakusalasambhāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3152_2: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhippatto saddho pasanno bhagavato salalamahābodhimhi
atk-s0510a:3152_5: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha jalamāno pasannacakkhuko ubhayasukhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3152_6: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patto ratanattaye pasanno pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3152_7: nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto dīpapūjāya laddhavisesādhigamattā ekadīpiyattheroti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:3153_1: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa muninotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3156_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3156_2: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā tatthādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3156_3: pabbajitvā himavantaorabhāge ekissā nadiyā samīpe paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā vasanto vivekakāmatāya tassānukampāya
atk-s0510a:3156_4: ca tattha upagataṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso maṇipallaṅkaṃ bhagavato pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3156_6: So bhiyyosomattāya pasanno nibbānādhigamatthāya patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3156_8: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto sabbattha pūjito sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3156_9: vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:3157_1: So ekadivasaṃ attanā katakusalaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento orena himavantassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3157_2: Tattha orenāti himavantassa aparaṃ bhāgaṃ vihāya orena,
atk-s0510a:3157_5: Nadikā sampavattathāti apākaṭanāmadheyyā ekā nadī saṃsuṭṭhu pavattānī vahānī sandamānā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3157_6: Tassā cānupakhettamhīti tassā nadiyā anupakhettamhi tīrasamīpeti attho.
atk-s0510a:3157_7: Sayambhū vasate tadāti yadā ahaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ pūjesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3157_8: tadā anācariyako hutvā sayameva buddhabhūto bhagavā vasate viharatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3158_1: Maṇiṃ paggayha pallaṅkanti maṇinti cittaṃ ārādheti somanassaṃ karotīti maṇi,
atk-s0510a:3158_2: atha vā māti pamāṇaṃ karoti ābharaṇanti maṇi,
atk-s0510a:3158_3: atha vā marantāpi rājayuvarājādayo taṃ na pariccajanti tadatthāya saṅgāmaṃ karontīti maṇi,
atk-s0510a:3158_4: taṃ maṇiṃ maṇimayaṃ pallaṅkaṃ manoramaṃ sādhu cittaṃ suṭṭhu vicittaṃ paggayha gahetvā buddhaseṭṭhassa abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3161_1: Ayampāyasmā purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:3161_2: bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare vejjakule nibbatto bahussuto susikkhito vejjakamme cheko bahū rogino
atk-s0510a:3161_3: tikicchanto vipassissa bhagavato upaṭṭhākassa asokanāmattherassa rogaṃ tikicchi.
atk-s0510a:3161_4: So tena puññena devamanussesu aparāparaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavanto nibbattanibbattabhave arogo dīghāyuko suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīro ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3162_1: So imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto
atk-s0510a:3162_2: arogo sukhito vibhavasampanno ratanattaye pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0510a:3162_3: pahāya pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0510a:3165_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katakusalasambhāro anekesu bhavesu vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto
atk-s0510a:3165_2: vessabhussa bhagavato kāle tassārāmikassa putto hutvā nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā saddho pasanno vihāresu
atk-s0510a:3165_4: So teneva kusalakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3165_5: gahapatikule nibbatto vuddhippatto vibhavasampanno sukhappatto pākaṭo satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sāsane
atk-s0510a:3165_6: pasanno pabbajitvā vattasampanno sāsanaṃ sobhayamāno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0510a:3165_7: arahattaṃ patto chaḷabhiñño pubbe katakusalakammavasena saṅghupaṭṭhākattheroti pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3166_1: So ekadivasaṃ “pubbe mayā kiṃ nāma kammaṃ katvā ayaṃ lokuttarasampatti laddhā”ti attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā
atk-s0510a:3166_2: paccakkhato jānitvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto vessabhumhi bhagavatītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3166_3: Tattha ahosārāmiko ahanti ahaṃ vessabhussa bhagavato sāsane ārāmiko ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3166_4: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3171_0: Ito parampi ekūnavīsatimavagge āgatānaṃ imesaṃ kuṭajapupphiyattherādīnaṃ dasannaṃ therānaṃ apubbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0510a:3171_1: Tesañhi therānaṃ purimabuddhānaṃ santike katapuññasambhārānaṃ vasena pākaṭanāmāni ceva nivāsanagarādīni
atk-s0510a:3171_2: ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti taṃ sabbaṃ apadānaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3176_1: Dutiyattherāpadāne yaṃ dāyavāsiko isīti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vane vasanabhāvena dāyavāsiko isīti saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:3176_2: attano anukampāya taṃ vanaṃ upagatassa siddhatthassa satthuno vasanamaṇḍapacchādanatthāya yaṃ tiṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3176_4: Dabbachadanaṃ katvā anekehi khuddakadaṇḍakehi maṇḍapaṃ katvā taṃ tiṇena chādetvā siddhatthassa bhagavato ahaṃ adāsiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3177_1: Sattāhaṃ dhārayuṃ tatthāti taṃ maṇḍapaṃ tattha ṭhitā devamanussā sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0510a:3178_0: Tatiyattherassa apadāne khaṇḍaphulliyattheroti ettha khaṇḍanti kaṭṭhānaṃ jiṇṇattā chinnabhinnaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3178_4: Imassa pana therassa sambhārapūraṇakāle phussassa bhagavato cetiye chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne sudhāpiṇḍaṃ makkhetvā
atk-s0510a:3178_6: Tasmā so khaṇḍaphulliyo theroti pākaṭo ahosi. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3179_0: 17. Catutthattherassāpadāne rañño baddhacaro ahanti rañño paricārako kammakārako ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3182_1: Chaṭṭhe nagare dvāravatiyāti mahādvāravātapānakavāṭaphalakāhi vatipākāraṭṭālagopurakaddamodakaparikhāhi ca sampannaṃ nagaranti dvāravatīnagaraṃ,
atk-s0510a:3182_2: dvāraṃ vatiñca padhānaṃ katvā nagarassa upalakkhitattā “dvāravatī nagara”nti voharantīti nagare dvāravatiyāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3188_1: Ekavīsatime bāvīsatime tevīsatime ca vagge sabbesaṃ therānaṃ sayaṃkatena puññena laddhanāmāni,
atk-s0510a:3188_2: katapuññānañca nānattaṃ tesaṃ byākaraṇadāyakānaṃ buddhānaṃ nāmāni vasitanagarāni ca heṭṭhā vuttanayattā sabbānipi uttānāneva.
atk-s0510a:3192_1: Tatiyāpadāne aruṇavatiyā nagareti ā samantato ālokaṃ karonto uṇati uggacchatīti aruṇo,
atk-s0510a:3192_3: tasmiṃ nagare ālokaṃ karonto sūriyo uggacchatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3192_4: Sesanagaresupi sūriyuggamane vijjamānepi visesavacanaṃ sabbacatuppadānaṃ mahiyaṃ sayanepi sati mahiyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3192_5: sayatīti mahiṃsoti vacanaṃ viya rūḷhivasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3192_6: Atha vā pākārapāsādahammiyādīsu suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādisattaratanapabhāhi aruṇuggamanaṃ viya pabhāvatī aruṇavatī nāma,
atk-s0510a:3192_8: pūpiko pūpavikkayena jīvikaṃ kappento ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3193_1: Catutthāpadāne tivarāyaṃ pure rammeti tīhi pākārehi parivāritā parikkhittāti tivarā,
atk-s0510a:3193_3: tasmiṃ tivarāyaṃ pure nagare ramme naḷakāro ahaṃ ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3195_1: Chaṭṭhāpadāne vaṇṇakāro ahaṃ tadāti nīlapītarattādivaṇṇavasena vatthāni karoti rañjetīti vaṇṇakāro.
atk-s0510a:3195_2: Vattharajako hutvā cetiye vatthehi acchādanasamaye nānāvaṇṇehi dussāni rañjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3196_1: Sattamāpadāne piyālaṃ pupphitaṃ disvāti supupphitaṃ piyālarukkhaṃ disvā.
atk-s0510a:3196_2: Gatamagge khipiṃ ahanti ahaṃ migaluddo nesādo hutvā piyālapupphaṃ ocinitvā buddhassa gatamagge khipiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3197_1: Aṭṭhamāpadāne sake sippe apatthaddhoti attano takkabyākaraṇādisippasmiṃ apatthaddho patiṭṭhito cheko
atk-s0510a:3197_2: ahaṃ kānanaṃ agamaṃ gato sambuddhaṃ yantaṃ disvānāti vanantare gacchantaṃ vipassiṃ sambuddhaṃ passitvā.
atk-s0510a:3197_3: Ambayāgaṃ adāsahanti ahaṃ ambadānaṃ adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3198_1: Navamāpadāne jagatī kāritā mayhanti atthadassissa bhagavato sarīradhātunidhāpitacetiye jagati chinnabhinnaālindapupphādhānasaṅkhātā
atk-s0510a:3203_1: Pañcavīsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne bharitvā tuvaramādāyāti tuvaraaṭṭhiṃ muggakalayasadisaṃ tuvaraṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3203_2: bhajjitvā pupphetvā bhājanena ādāya saṅghassa vanamajjhogāhakassa adadiṃ adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3204_1: Dutiyāpadāne dhanuṃ advejjhaṃ katvānāti migādīnaṃ māraṇatthāya dhanuṃ sannayhitvā caramāno kesaraṃ ogataṃ
atk-s0510a:3204_2: disvāti supupphitaṃ khuddakasaraṃ disvā buddhassa abhiropesinti ahaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā vanaṃ sampattassa
atk-s0510a:3205_2: Tuṇḍena kesariṃ gayhāti padumapupphaṃ mukhatuṇḍena ḍaṃsitvā ākāsena gacchantassa tissassa bhagavato abhiropesiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3206_1: Catutthāpadāne viravapupphamādāyāti vividhaṃ ravati saddaṃ karotīti viravaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3206_2: saddakaraṇavelāyaṃ vikasanato “virava”nti laddhanāmaṃ pupphasamūhaṃ ādāya gahetvā siddhatthassa buddhassa abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3207_4: Siddhatthassa bhagavato gandhakuṭikālānusāridhūpena dhūpesiṃ vāsesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3209_2: satta pupphāni sīsenādāya vessabhussa bhagavato abhiropesiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3210_1: Navamāpadāne bimbijālakapupphānīti rattaṅkuravakapupphāni siddhatthassa bhagavato pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3211_1: Dasamāpadāne uddālakaṃ gahetvānāti jātassare vihaṅgasobbhe jātaṃ uddālakapupphaṃ ocinitvā kakusandhassa bhagavato pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3216_1: Dutiyāpadāne vijahitvā devavaṇṇanti devatā sarīraṃ vijahitvā chaḍḍetvā,
atk-s0510a:3216_3: Adhikāraṃ kattukāmoti adhikakiriyaṃ puññasambhāraṃ kattukāmo devaro nāma ahaṃ devarājā bhariyāya saha
atk-s0510a:3216_4: buddhaseṭṭhassa sāsane sādaratāya idha imasmiṃ manussaloke āgamiṃ āgatoti attho.
