atk-s0510a:3216_5: Tassa bhikkhā mayā dinnāti padumuttarassa bhagavato yo nāmena devalo nāma sāvako ahosi,
atk-s0510a:3216_6: tassa sāvakassa mayā vippasannena cetasā bhikkhā dinnā piṇḍapāto dinnoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3217_1: Tatiyāpadāne ānando nāma sambuddhoti ānandaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ jananato ānando nāma paccekabuddhoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3217_2: Amanussamhi kānaneti amanussapariggahe kānane mahāaraññe parinibbāyi anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā antaradhāyi,
atk-s0510a:3217_4: Sarīraṃ tattha jhāpesinti ahaṃ devalokā idhāgantvā tassa bhagavato sarīraṃ tattha araññe jhāpesiṃ dahanaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3219_1: Chaṭṭhāpadāne ahosiṃ candano nāmāti nāmena paṇṇattivasena candano nāma.
atk-s0510a:3219_2: Sambuddhassatrajoti paccekasambuddhabhūtato pubbe tassa atrajo putto ahaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3219_3: Ekopāhano mayā dinnoti ekaṃ upāhanayugaṃ mayā dinnaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3219_4: Bodhiṃ sampajja me tuvanti tena upāhanayugena me mayhaṃ sāvakabodhiṃ tuvaṃ sampajja nipphādehīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3220_1: Sattamāpadāne mañjarikaṃ karitvānāti mañjeṭṭhipupphaṃ haritacaṅkoṭakaṃ gahetvā rathiyaṃ vīthiyā paṭipajjiṃ
atk-s0510a:3220_2: ahaṃ tathā paṭipannova bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ bhikkhusaṅghena parivutaṃ samaṇānaggaṃ samaṇānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3220_4: Buddhassa abhiropayinti disvā ca pana taṃ pupphaṃ ubhohi hatthehi paggayha ukkhipitvā buddhassa phussassa bhagavato abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3221_1: Aṭṭhamāpadāne aloṇapaṇṇabhakkhomhīti khīrapaṇṇādīni uñchācariyāya āharitvā loṇavirahitāni paṇṇāni pacitvā bhakkhāmi,
atk-s0510a:3221_3: Niyamesu ca saṃvutoti niyamasaññitesu pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīsu niccapañcasīlesu saṃvuto pihitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3221_5: Siddhattho upagacchi manti mama samīpaṃ siddhattho bhagavā upagañchi sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3221_6: Tāhaṃ buddhassa pādāsinti ahaṃ taṃ aloṇapaṇṇaṃ tassa buddhassa adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3223_1: Dasamāpadāne sikhinaṃ sikhinaṃ yathāti sarīrato nikkhantachabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi obhāsayantaṃ jalantaṃ sikhīnaṃ
atk-s0510a:3223_3: Aggajaṃ pupphamādāyāti aggajanāmakaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā buddhassa sikhissa bhagavato abhiropayiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3227_1: Sattavīsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne jalajagge duve gayhāti jale udake jāte agge uppalādayo dve pupphe gahetvā
atk-s0510a:3227_2: buddhassa samīpaṃ gantvā ekaṃ pupphaṃ pādesu nikkhipiṃ pūjesiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3229_2: Aḍḍhacandaṃ mayā dinnanti tasmiṃ bodhimūle aḍḍhacandākārena mayā anekapupphāni pūjitānīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3229_5: pādasaṅkhātena mūlena udakaṃ pivati khandhaviṭapādīsu patthariyatīti pādapo,
atk-s0510a:3229_6: dharaṇīruho ca so pādapo ceti dharaṇīruhapādapo,
atk-s0510a:3229_7: tasmiṃ dharaṇīruhapādape pupphaṃ mayā pūjitanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3231_2: Romaso nāma pabbatoti rukkhalatāgumbābhāvā kevalaṃ dabbatiṇādisañchannattā romaso nāma pabbato ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3231_4: Samaṇo bhāvitindriyoti samitapāpo vūpasantakileso samaṇo vaḍḍhitaindriyo,
atk-s0510a:3231_7: Tassa samaṇassa ahaṃ biḷāliāluve gahetvā adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3237_0: 5. Dutiyāpadāne manomayena kāyenāti yathā cittavasena pavattakāyenāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3238_1: Tatiyāpadāne mahāsamuddaṃ nissāyāti mahāsāgarāsanne ṭhitassa pabbatassa antare pabbataleṇeti attho.
atk-s0510a:3238_2: Siddhattho bhagavā vivekakāmatāya vasati paṭivasatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3238_3: Paccuggantvānakāsahanti ahaṃ tassa bhagavato paṭiuggantvā samīpaṃ gantvā vandanādipuññaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3238_4: Caṅkoṭakamadāsahanti siddhatthassa bhagavato ahaṃ pupphabharitaṃ caṅkoṭakaṃ kadambaṃ adāsiṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3240_1: Pañcamāpadāne udumbare vasantassāti udumbararukkhamūle rukkhacchāyāya vasantassa tissassa bhagavato.
atk-s0510a:3240_2: Niyate paṇṇasanthareti niyāmite paṭibaddhe paṇṇasanthare sākhābhaṅgāsane nisinnassa.
atk-s0510a:3240_3: Vutthokāso mayā dinnoti vivittokāse maṇḍapadvārādīhi pihitokāso mayā dinno sampāditoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3241_1: Chaṭṭhāpadāne potthadānaṃ mayā dinnanti potthavaṭṭiṃ potthachalliṃ tāḷetvā kataṃ sāṭakaṃ visamaṃ gophāsukena
atk-s0510a:3241_2: ghaṃsitvā nimmitaṃ suttaṃ gahetvā kantitvā tena suttena nisīdanatthāya vā bhūmattharaṇatthāya vā sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3241_3: vāyāpetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ mayā ratanattayassa dinnanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3242_1: Sattamāpadāne candabhāgānadītīreti candabhāgāya nāma nadiyā tīrato,
atk-s0510a:3242_3: Anusotanti sotassa anu heṭṭhāgaṅgaṃ vajāmi gacchāmi ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3242_5: citamāropayiṃ ahanti ahaṃ māluvapupphāni satta pattāni gahetvā citake vālukarāsimhi vālukāhi thūpaṃ katvā pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3243_1: Aṭṭhamāpadāne mahāsindhu sudassanāti sundaradassanasundarodakadhavalapulinopasobhitattā suṭṭhu manoharā mahāsindhu nāma vārinadī ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3243_2: Tattha tissaṃ sindhuvārinadiyaṃ sappabhāsaṃ pabhāya sahitaṃ sudassanaṃ sundararūpaṃ paramopasame yuttaṃ
atk-s0510a:3243_3: uttame upasame yuttaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ vītarāgaṃ ahaṃ addasanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3243_4: Disvāhaṃ vimhitāsayoti “evarūpaṃ bhayānakaṃ himavantaṃ kathaṃ sampatto”ti vimhitaajjhāsayo acchariyabbhutacittoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3243_5: Āluvaṃ tassa pādāsinti tassa arahato ahaṃ pasannamānaso āluvakandaṃ pādāsiṃ ādarena adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3248_1: Ekūnatiṃsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne paṇṇabhojanabhojanoti khīrapaṇṇādibhojanassa bhuñjanatthāya paṇṇasālāya nisinno amhi bhavāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3248_2: Upaviṭṭhañca maṃ santanti paṇṇasālāyaṃ upaviṭṭhaṃ santaṃ vijjamānaṃ maṃ.
atk-s0510a:3248_3: Upāgacchi mahāisīti mahante sīlādikhandhe esanato mahāisi.
atk-s0510a:3248_6: Nisinnassa paṇṇasanthareti upagantvā paṇṇasanthare nisinnassa khādanatthāya seditaṃ paṇṇaṃ mayā dinnanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3249_1: Dutiyāpadāne sinerusamasantoso dharaṇīsamasādiso siddhattho bhagavāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3249_2: Vuṭṭhahitvā samādhimhāti nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā visuṃ hutvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3249_3: Bhikkhāya mamupaṭṭhitoti bhikkhācāravelāya “ajja mama yo koci kiñci dānaṃ dadāti,
atk-s0510a:3249_4: tassa mahapphala”nti cintetvā nisinnassa mama santikaṃ samīpaṃ upaṭṭhito samīpamāgatoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3249_6: phārusakaphalāni cāti evaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ phalaṃ sabbalokānukampino tassa siddhatthassa mahesissa mayā vippasannena cetasā dinnanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3250_1: Tatiyāpadāne sīhaṃ yathā vanacaranti vane caramānaṃ sīharājaṃ iva caramānaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantanti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3250_9: ājānīyaṃ abhītaṃ niccalaṃ usabharājaṃ ivāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3250_10: Kakudhaṃ vilasantaṃvāti pupphapallavehi sobhamānaṃ kakudharukkhaṃ iva narāsabhaṃ narānaṃ āsabhaṃ uttamaṃ
atk-s0510a:3250_11: āgacchantaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā saddhāya sampayuttattā vippasannena cetasā paccuggamanaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3255_1: Tiṃsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne āhutiṃ yiṭṭhukāmohanti pūjāsakkāraṃ kāretukāmo ahaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3255_2: Nānāpupphaṃ samānayinti nānā anekavidhaṃ campakasalalādipupphaṃ saṃ suṭṭhu ānayiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3255_4: Sikhino lokabandhunoti sakalalokattayabandhussa ñātakassa sikhissa bhagavato parinibbutassa citakaṃ āḷāhanacitakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3255_5: dārurāsiṃ jalantaṃ ādittaṃ disvā tañca mayā rāsīkataṃ pupphaṃ okiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3256_1: Dutiyāpadāne ajinuttaravāsanoti ajinamigacammaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā nivāsino acchādanoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3256_2: Abhiññā pañca nibbattāti iddhividhādayo pañca abhiññāyo pañca ñāṇāni nibbattā uppāditā nipphāditā.
atk-s0510a:3256_5: Vipassiṃ lokapajjotanti sakalalokattaye padīpasadisaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ mama santikaṃ abhigataṃ visesena sampattaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0510a:3256_6: Disvā pāricchattakapupphānīti devalokato pāricchattakapupphāni āharitvā vipassissa satthuno matthake chattākārena ahaṃ dhāresinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3257_1: Tatiyāpadāne putto mama pabbajitoti mayhaṃ putto saddhāya pabbajito.
atk-s0510a:3257_4: So ca buddhattaṃ sampattoti so mayhaṃ putto catūsu buddhesu sāvakabuddhabhāvaṃ saṃ suṭṭhu patto,
atk-s0510a:3257_6: Nibbuto lokapūjitoti sakalalokehi katasakkāro khandhaparinibbānena parinibbutoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3257_7: Vicinanto sakaṃ puttanti ahaṃ tassa gatadesaṃ pucchitvā sakaṃ puttaṃ vicinanto pacchato agamaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3257_9: Nibbutassa mahantassāti mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi yuttattā mahantassa tassa mama puttassa arahato ādahanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:3257_11: Paggayha añjaliṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ ādahanaṭṭhāne añjaliṃ dasaṅgulisamodhānaṃ paggahetvā sirasi katvā ahaṃ
atk-s0510a:3257_12: citakaṃ dahanadārurāsiṃ vanditvā paṇāmaṃ katvā setacchattañca paggayhāti na kevalameva vanditvā dhavalacchattañca
atk-s0510a:3257_13: paggayha ukkhipitvā ahaṃ āropesiṃ patiṭṭhapesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3258_1: Catutthāpadāne anuggatamhi ādicceti sūriye anuggate anuṭṭhite paccūsakāleti attho.
atk-s0510a:3258_2: Pasādo vipulo ahūti rogapīḷitassa mayhaṃ cittappasādo vipulo atireko buddhānussaraṇena ahu ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3258_3: Mahesino buddhaseṭṭhassa lokamhi pātubhāvo pākaṭabhāvo ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3258_4: Ghosamassosahaṃ tatthāti tasmiṃ pātubhāve sati “ahaṃ gilāno buddho uppanno”ti ghosaṃ assosiṃ.
atk-s0510a:3258_5: Na ca passāmi taṃ jinanti taṃ jitapañcamāraṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0510a:3258_6: bāḷhagilānattā gantvā passituṃ na sakkomīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3259_1: Pañcamāpadāne ārāmadvārā nikkhammāti ārāmadvārato saṅghassa nikkhamanadvāramaggehi attho.
atk-s0510a:3259_2: Gosīsaṃ santhataṃ mayāti tasmiṃ nikkhamanadvāramagge “bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pādā mā kaddamaṃ
atk-s0510a:3259_3: akkamantū”ti akkamanatthāya gosīsaṭṭhiṃ mayā santharitanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3259_4: Anubhomi sakaṃ kammanti attano gosīsaattharaṇakammassa balena ājānīyā vātajavā sindhavā sīghavāhanādīni vipākaphalāni anubhomīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3259_5: Aho kāraṃ paramakāranti sukhette saṅghe mayā suṭṭhu kataṃ kāraṃ appakampi kiccaṃ mahapphaladānato paramakāraṃ uttamakiccaṃ aho vimhayanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3259_6: Yathā tiṇadosādivirahitesu khettesu vappitaṃ sālibījaṃ mahapphalaṃ deti,
atk-s0510a:3259_7: evameva rāgadosādidosarahite parisuddhakāyavacīsamācāre saṅghakhette gosīsaattharaṇakammaṃ mayā kataṃ,
atk-s0510a:3259_9: Na aññaṃ kalamagghatīti aññaṃ bāhirasāsane kataṃ kammaṃ saṅghe katassa kārassa pūjāsakkārassa kalaṃ soḷasiṃ kalaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ na agghatīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3264_1: Ekatiṃsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne isisaṅghe ahaṃ pubbeti ahaṃ pubbe bodhisambhārapūraṇakāle isisaṅghe
atk-s0510a:3264_2: paccekabuddhaisisamūhe tesaṃ samīpe himavantapabbate mātaṅgahatthikule vāraṇo caṇḍahatthī ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3264_4: atha vā vācāya ravati koñcanādaṃ nadatīti vāraṇo.
atk-s0510a:3264_7: dhutarāgesu tādisūti lokadhammehi niccalesu paccekabuddhesu padmakesaraṃ padumareṇuṃ okiriṃ avasiñcinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3266_1: Catutthāpadāne mahābodhimaho ahūti vipassissa bhagavato catumaggañāṇādhārabhāvato “bodhī”ti laddhanāmassa rukkhassa pūjā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3266_2: Rukkhaṭṭhasseva sambuddhoti assa bodhipūjāsamaye sannipatitassa mahājanassa sambuddho lokajeṭṭho narāsabho
atk-s0510a:3266_3: rukkhaṭṭho iva rukkhe ṭhito viya paññāyatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3266_4: Bhagavā tamhi samayeti tasmiṃ bodhipūjākaraṇakāle bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhato bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto.
atk-s0510a:3266_5: Vācāsabhimudīrayanti mudusiliṭṭhamadhurauttamaghosaṃ udīrayaṃ kathayanto nicchārento catusaccaṃ pakāsesi,
atk-s0510a:3266_7: Saṃkhittena ca desentoti veneyyapuggalajjhāsayānurūpena desento saṃkhittena ca vitthārena ca desayīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3266_11: sabbakilesā chadanā”ti evaṃ vuttā chadanā vivaṭā ugghāṭitā viddhaṃsitā anenāti vivaṭṭacchado,
atk-s0510a:3266_13: Taṃ mahājanaṃ desanāvasena nibbāpesi pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3266_14: Tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvānāti tassa bhagavato desentassa dhammaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0510a:3267_1: Pañcamāpadāne phalahattho apekkhavāti vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā madhurāni phalāni gahetvā apekkhavā aturito saṇikaṃ assamaṃ gañchinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3269_1: Aṭṭhamāpadāne niṭṭhite navakamme cāti sīmāya navakamme niṭṭhaṃ gate sati.
atk-s0510a:3275_1: Catutthāpadāne jalajaggehi okirinti jalajehi uttamehi uppalapadumādīhi pupphehi okiriṃ pūjesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3277_2: sikhino lokabandhunoti sakalalokattayassa bandhuno ñātakassa sikhissa bhagavato uttamaṃ cetiyaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3277_3: Irīṇe janasañcaravirahite vane manussānaṃ kolāhalavirahite mahāaraññe ahosīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3277_4: Andhāhiṇḍāmahaṃ tadāti tasmiṃ kāle vane maggamūḷhabhāvena andho,
atk-s0510a:3277_7: Pavanā nikkhamantenāti mahāvanato nikkhamantena mayā sīhāsanaṃ uttamāsanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3277_8: sīhassa vā bhagavato āsanaṃ diṭṭhanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3277_9: Ekaṃsaṃ añjaliṃ katvāti ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3277_10: Santhaviṃ lokanāyakanti sakalalokattayanayaṃ taṃ nibbānaṃ pāpentaṃ thomitaṃ thutiṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3284_0: 55. Sattamāpadāne samayaṃ agamāsahanti samūhaṃ samāgamaṭṭhānaṃ ahaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3285_2: abbudasatasahassānaṃ sataṃ nirabbuda”nti vuttattā āyunā abbudanirabbudāni gatamahāāyuvantā manujādhipā
atk-s0510a:3285_3: cakkavattino khattiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha hutvā kappānaṃ pañcavīsasahassamhi āsiṃsu ahesunti attho.
atk-s0510a:3293_0: Navamāpadāne pana vipassino pāvacanetiādikaṃ āyasmato soṇassa koṭivīsattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3293_1: Ayampi thero purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:3293_2: bhagavato kāle mahāvibhave seṭṭhikule nibbatto vuddhippatto seṭṭhi hutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:3293_3: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso bhagavato caṅkamanaṭṭhāne sudhāya parikammaṃ kāretvā ekañca
atk-s0510a:3293_4: leṇaṃ kāretvā nānāvirāgavatthehi leṇabhūmiyā santharitvā upari vitānañca katvā cātuddisassa saṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3293_5: niyyādetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3293_7: So tena kusalakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā imasmiṃ kappe parinibbute
atk-s0510a:3293_8: kassapadasabale anuppanne amhākaṃ bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṅgātīre
atk-s0510a:3293_9: paṇṇasālaṃ karitvā vasantaṃ ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0510a:3293_11: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ tattha puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3293_12: kāle campānagare aggaseṭṭhissa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:3293_13: Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhissa mahābhogakkhandho abhivaḍḍhi.
atk-s0510a:3293_14: Tassa mātukucchito nikkhamanadivase sakalanagare mahālābhasakkārasammāno ahosi,
atk-s0510a:3293_15: tassa pubbe paccekabuddhassa satasahassagghanikarattakambalapariccāgena suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhumālataro ca attabhāvo ahosi,
atk-s0510a:3293_19: tesaṃ satavāraṃ vihatakappāsaṃ viya mudusamphasso ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3293_21: Vayappattassa tassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kārāpetvā nāṭakitthiyo upaṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3293_22: So tattha mahatiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto devakumāro viya paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:3294_0: Atha amhākaṃ bhagavati sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante bimbisāraraññā
atk-s0510a:3294_1: pakkosāpito tehi asītiyā gāmikasahassehi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ āgato satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0510a:3294_2: paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike
atk-s0510a:3294_5: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
atk-s0510a:3294_6: kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto
atk-s0510a:3294_7: pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ
atk-s0510a:3294_8: nibbattetuṃ asakkonto “evaṃ ahaṃ vāyamantopi maggaphalāni nibbattetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0510a:3294_12: Atha satthā tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā tattha gantvā vīṇopamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
atk-s0510a:3294_13: Soṇopi kho satthu santikā ovādaṃ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3295_1: So arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento vipassino pāvacanetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3295_7: Leṇanti linante nilīyante etthāti leṇaṃ vihāraṃ.
atk-s0510a:3295_8: Bandhumārājadhāniyāti bandhanti kulaparamparāya vasena aññamaññaṃ sambajjhantīti bandhū, ñātakā.
atk-s0510a:3295_12: bandhumā ca sā rājadhānī ceti bandhumārājadhānī,
atk-s0510a:3298_1: Dasamāpadāne anotattasarāsanneti pabbatakūṭehi paṭicchannattā candimasūriyānaṃ santāpehi otattaṃ uṇhaṃ udakaṃ ettha natthīti anotatto.
atk-s0510a:3298_2: Saranti gacchanti pabhavanti sandanti etasmā mahānadiyoti saro.
atk-s0510a:3298_3: Sīhamukhādīhi nikkhantā mahānadiyo tikkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā nikkhantanikkhantadisābhāgena saranti gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3298_4: Anotatto ca so saro cāti anotattasaro.
atk-s0510a:3298_11: Nānāratanapajjoteti padumarāgaveḷuriyādinānāanekehi ratanehi pajjote pakārena jotamāne.
atk-s0510a:3299_2: pareto parivuto lokanāyako lokattayasāmisammāsambuddho tattha silāsane nisinno attano pubbāni kammāni byākarī visesena pākaṭamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3299_3: Sesamettha heṭṭhā buddhāpadāne vuttattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:3299_4: Buddhāpadāne antogadhampi idhāpadāne kusalākusalaṃ kammasaṃsūcakattā vaggasaṅgahavasena dhammasaṅgāhakattherā saṅgāyiṃsūti.
atk-s0510a:3304_0: Cattālīsamavagge apadāne nagare haṃsavatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato pilindavacchattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3304_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3304_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare dovārikakule nibbatto mahaddhano mahābhogo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3304_3: So koṭisannicitadhanarāsiṃ oloketvā raho nisinno “imaṃ sabbadhanaṃ mayā sammā gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0510a:3304_4: cintetvā “buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā
atk-s0510a:3304_5: chattasatasahassaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaparibhogaparikkhārānipi satasahassavasena kāretvā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3304_7: Evaṃ sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā pariyosānadivase nibbānādhigamaṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā jīvitapariyosāne
atk-s0510a:3304_8: devaloke nibbatto cha kāmāvacare dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvā manussesu ca cakkavattiādisampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3304_9: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto gottavasena pilindavacchoti pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3305_1: So ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahā hutvā
atk-s0510a:3305_2: attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto udānavasena taṃ pakāsento nagare haṃsavatiyātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3305_4: Āsiṃ dovāriko ahanti ahaṃ haṃsavatīnagare rañño gehadvāre dvārapālako āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3305_5: Akkhobhaṃ amitaṃ bhoganti rañño vallabhattā aññehi khobhetuṃ cāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ amitaṃ aparimāṇabhogaṃ
atk-s0510a:3305_6: dhanaṃ mama ghare sannicitaṃ rāsīkataṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3306_1: Bahū medhigatā bhogāti anekā bhogā me mayā adhigatā pattā paṭiladdhāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3310_1: Ayaṃ kira thero atīte ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake anomadassissa bhagavato uppattito
atk-s0510a:3310_2: puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto “samparāyikatthaṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_3: gavesissāmī”ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde viharanto pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattīnaṃ lābhī hutvā
atk-s0510a:3310_4: viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito satthu vātābādhe
atk-s0510a:3310_5: uppanne araññato bhesajjāni ānetvā taṃ vūpasametvā taṃ puññaṃ ārogyatthāya pariṇāmetvā tato cuto brahmaloke
atk-s0510a:3310_6: nibbatto ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare ekasmiṃ kule
atk-s0510a:3310_7: nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_8: disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0510a:3310_9: saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva bandhumatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto sabbasippesu
atk-s0510a:3310_10: nipphattiṃ patto tattha sāraṃ apassanto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññālābhī hutvā pabbatapāde vasanto
atk-s0510a:3310_11: buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ tiṇapupphakaroge uppanne taṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_12: vūpasametvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā tato ekanavutikappe devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:3310_13: saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekaṃ jiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_14: vinassamānaṃ mahāvihāraṃ disvā tattha uposathāgārādikaṃ sabbaṃ āvasathaṃ kārāpetvā tattha bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3310_15: sabbaṃ bhesajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ
atk-s0510a:3310_16: bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:3311_0: So mātukucchito nikkhamitvā dhātīhi arogabhāvāya yamunāyaṃ nhāpiyamāno tāsaṃ hatthato muccitvā macchena gilito ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3311_1: Kevaṭṭā taṃ macchaṃ jālāya gahetvā bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3311_2: Sā taṃ gahetvā phālayamānā pubbe katapuññaphalena arogaṃ dārakaṃ disvā “putto me laddho”ti gahetvā posesi.
atk-s0510a:3311_3: So janakehi mātāpitūhi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā āgantvā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ putto,
atk-s0510a:3311_4: detha no putta”nti anuyoge kate raññā “ubhayesampi sādhāraṇo hotū”ti dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ dāyādabhāvena vinicchayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3311_5: katvā ṭhapitattā bākuloti laddhanāmo vayappatto mahāsampattiṃ anubhavanto dvīsu seṭṭhikulesu ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3311_7: Te attano vāre sampatte nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ bandhitvā tatrūpari ratanamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā pañcaṅgikatūriye nipphādetvā
atk-s0510a:3311_8: kumāraṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā ubhayanagaramajjhaṭṭhānaṃ gaṅgāya āgacchanti,
atk-s0510a:3311_9: aparaseṭṭhimanussāpi evameva sajjetvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ tattha āropetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0510a:3311_10: So evaṃ vaḍḍhamāno āsītiko hutvā ubhayaseṭṭhiputtoti pākaṭo.
atk-s0510a:3311_11: Satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sattāhaṃ vāyamanto aṭṭhame divase saha paṭisambhidāya arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3312_1: So arahā hutvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento himavantassāvidūretiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3312_4: So arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto saṭṭhivassasatāyuko hutvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0510a:3315_0: Sattamāpadāne bhariyā me kālaṅkatātiādikaṃ āyasmato girimānandattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3315_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0510a:3315_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanto attano bhariyāya ca putte
atk-s0510a:3315_3: ca kālaṅkate sokasallasamappito araññaṃ pavisitvā pavattaphalabhojano rukkhamūle vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3315_4: Tadā sumedho bhagavā tassānukampāya tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetvā sokasallaṃ abbūḷhesi.
atk-s0510a:3315_5: So dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso sugandhapupphehi bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā abhitthavi.
atk-s0510a:3316_0: So tena puññena devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayattha sukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe bimbisārarañño purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3316_2: So viññutaṃ patvā satthu rājagahāgamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3316_3: karonto katipayaṃ divasaṃ gāmakāvāse vasitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3316_4: Bimbisāramahārājā tassa āgamanaṃ sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idheva, bhante, vasatha,
atk-s0510a:3316_5: ahaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahāmī”ti sampavāretvā gatopi bahukiccattā taṃ na sari.
atk-s0510a:3316_8: Rājā avassanakāraṇaṃ upadhāretvā ñatvā therassa kuṭikaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3316_9: Thero kuṭikāyaṃ vasanto senāsanasappāyalābhena cittasamādhānaṃ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3317_1: So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento bhariyā me kālaṅkatātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3317_2: Taṃ bhagavato nivedanañca bhagavatā katānusāsanañca maggaṃ phalādhigamāpadānañca pāṭhānusārena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3323_1: Ekacattālīsame vagge paṭhamāpadāne pabbhārakūṭaṃ nissāyātiādikaṃ tissametteyyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3323_2: Tattha tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā padumuttarassa bhagavato ajinacammaṃ nisīdanatthāya dinnameva nānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3325_1: Dutiyāpadāne pabbhārakūṭaṃ nissāyātiādikaṃ āyasmato puṇṇakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3325_2: Tattha himavante yakkhasenāpati hutvā parinibbutassa paccekabuddhassa āḷahanakaraṇameva nānattaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3326_2: Tattha himavantasamīpe asokapabbate so tāpaso hutvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasanto sumedhasambuddhaṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā sappipūraṇaṃ viseso.
atk-s0510a:3327_1: Catutthāpadāne gaṅgā bhāgīrathī nāmātiādikaṃ āyasmato dhotakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3327_2: Tatrāpi brāhmaṇo hutvā bhāgīrathīgaṅgāya taramāne bhikkhū disvā pasannamānaso setuṃ kārāpetvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0510a:3328_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3328_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante padumuttaraṃ
atk-s0510a:3328_4: bhagavantaṃ disvā tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā tattha nisinnassa bhagavato sālapupphapūjaṃ akāsīti ayaṃ viseso,
atk-s0510a:3329_1: Chaṭṭhāpadāne migaluddo pure āsintiādikaṃ āyasmato nandakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3329_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle karavikasakuṇo hutvā madhurakūjitaṃ karonto satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3329_3: Aparabhāge mayūro hutvā aññatarassa paccekabuddhassa vasanaguhādvāre pasannamānaso divasassa tikkhattuṃ madhurena vassitaṃ vassi.
atk-s0510a:3329_4: Evaṃ tattha tattha bhave puññāni katvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto nandakoti
atk-s0510a:3329_5: laddhanāmo satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3329_6: So aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento migaluddo pure āsintiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3329_7: Tattha paccekabuddhassa maṇḍapaṃ katvā padumapupphehi chadanameva viseso.
atk-s0510a:3330_1: Sattamāpadāne pabbhārakūṭaṃ nissāyātiādikaṃ āyasmato hemakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3330_2: Tatthāpi isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vasanto piyadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ upagataṃ disvā ratanamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ attharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3330_3: Tattha nisinnassa kumbhamattaṃ jambuphalaṃ āharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3330_4: Bhagavā tassa cittappasādatthāya taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0510a:3331_1: Aṭṭhamāpadāne rājāsi vijayo nāmātiādikaṃ āyasmato todeyyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3331_2: Tattha rājāsi vijayo nāmāti daharakālato paṭṭhāya sabbasaṅgāmesu jinato,
atk-s0510a:3331_3: catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ rañjanato allīyanato vijayo nāma rājā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3331_6: te ketū niccaṃ ussāpitā sobhayamānā assā atthīti ketumatī.
atk-s0510a:3331_8: Ketumatī ca sā purañca seṭṭhaṭṭhena uttamañceti ketumatīpuruttamaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3331_10: Sūro vikkamasampannoti abhīto vīriyasampanno vijayo nāma rājā ajjhāvasīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3331_11: Itthaṃ bhūtaṃ purañca sabbavatthuvāhanañca chaḍḍetvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vasanto
atk-s0510a:3331_12: sumedhabhagavantaṃ disvā somanassaṃ uppādetvā candanena pūjākaraṇameva viseso.
atk-s0510a:3332_1: Navamāpadāne nagare haṃsavatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato jatukaṇṇittherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3332_2: Tattha seṭṭhiputto hutvā suvaṇṇapāsāde vasanabhāvo ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgī hutvā vasanabhāvo ca
atk-s0510a:3332_3: sabbadesavāsīnaṃ sabbasippaviññūnañca āgantvā sevanabhāvo ca viseso.
atk-s0510a:3333_2: Tattha himavantasamīpe padumapabbataṃ nissāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vasantena padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3337_0: Bācattālīsamavagge paṭhamāpadānañca dutiyāpadānañca tatiyāpadānañca nayānusārena suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:3338_1: Catutthāpadāne nagare bandhumatiyātiādikaṃ āyasmato madhumaṃsadāyakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3338_2: Tattha sūkarikoti sūkaramaṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappento.
atk-s0510a:3338_3: Ukkoṭakaṃ randhayitvāti pihakapapphāsamaṃsaṃ pacitvā madhumaṃsamhi okiriṃ pakkhipiṃ.
atk-s0510a:3338_4: Tena maṃsena pattaṃ pūretvā bhikkhusaṅghassa datvā tena puññakammena imasmiṃ buddhuppāde arahattaṃ pāpuṇinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3339_0: Nāgapallavattherassa pañcamāpadānampi ekadīpiyattherassa chaṭṭhāpadānampi ucchaṅgapupphiyattherassa sattamāpadānampi
atk-s0510a:3339_1: yāgudāyakattherassa aṭṭhamāpadānampi patthodanadāyakattherassa navamāpadānampi mañcadāyakattherassa dasamāpadānampi
atk-s0510a:3344_0: Catucattālīsame vaggepi sabbāni apadānāni pākaṭāneva. Kevalaṃ puññanānattaṃ phalanānattañca viseso.
atk-s0510a:3345_1: Pañcacattālīsamavagge paṭhamāpadāne kakusandho mahāvīrotiādikaṃ āyasmato vibhīṭakamiñjiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3346_1: Tattha bījamiñjamadāsahanti vibhīṭakaphalāni phāletvā bījāni miñjāni gahetvā madhusakkarāhi yojetvā kakusandhassa bhagavato adāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3347_1: Chacattālīsame vagge paṭhamāpadāne jagatiṃ kārayiṃ ahanti uttamabodhirukkhassa samantato āḷindaṃ ahaṃ kārayinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3350_1: Tatiyāpadāne kosiyo nāma bhagavāti kosiyagotte jātattā kosiyo nāma paccekabuddhoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3350_2: Cittakūṭeti cittakūṭakelāsakūṭasānukūṭādīsu anotattadahaṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitapabbatakūṭesu nānāratanaosadhādīhi
atk-s0510a:3350_3: vicitte cittakūṭapabbate so paccekabuddho vasīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3353_1: Sattamāpadāne sobhito nāma sambuddhoti ārohapariṇāhadvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇabyāmappabhādīhi sobhamānasarīrattā sobhito nāma sammāsambuddhoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3354_1: Aṭṭhamāpadāne takkarāyaṃ vasī tadāti taṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthuṃ karontā janā paṭivasanti etthāti takkarā,
atk-s0510a:3355_1: Navamāpadāne pānadhiṃ sukataṃ gayhāti upāhanayugaṃ sundarākārena nipphāditaṃ gahetvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3360_1: Dutiyāpadāne adhiccuppattikā buddhāti adhiccena akāraṇena uppattikā sayambhūtā,
atk-s0510a:3360_2: aññehi devabrahmamārādīhi upadesadāyakehi rahitā sayambhūñāṇena uppannā jātā pātubhūtāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3361_1: Odumbarikapupphaṃ vāti udumbararukkhe pupphaṃ dullabhaṃ dullabhuppattikaṃ iva.
atk-s0510a:3361_2: Candamhi sasakaṃ yathāti candamaṇḍale sasalekhāya rūpaṃ dullabhaṃ yathā.
atk-s0510a:3361_3: Vāyasānaṃ yathā khīranti kākānaṃ niccaṃ rattindivaṃ khuddāpīḷitabhāvena khīraṃ dullabhaṃ yathā,
atk-s0510a:3361_4: evaṃ dullabhaṃ lokanāyakaṃ caturāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ vā aṭṭhāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ vā soḷasāsaṅkhyeyyaṃ vā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0510a:3361_5: pāramiyo pūretvā buddhabhāvato dullabho lokanāyakoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3362_1: Tatiyāpadāne madhuṃ bhisehi savatīti pokkharamadhupadumakesarehi savati paggharati.
atk-s0510a:3362_2: Khīraṃ sappiṃ muḷālibhīti khīrañca sappirasañca padumamuḷālehi savati paggharati.
atk-s0510a:3362_3: Tasmā tadubhayaṃ mama santakaṃ buddho paṭiggaṇhatūti attho.
atk-s0510a:3364_1: Sattamāpadāne cattālīsadijāpi cāti dvikkhattuṃ jātāti dijā.
atk-s0510a:3364_2: Kumāravaye uṭṭhitadantānaṃ patitattā puna uṭṭhitadantā dijā,
atk-s0510a:3366_1: Navamāpadāne tadāhaṃ māṇavo āsinti yadā sumedhapaṇḍito dīpaṅkarabhagavato santikā byākaraṇaṃ labhi,
atk-s0510a:3366_2: tadā ahaṃ megho nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo hutvā sumedhatāpasena saha isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā sikkhāpadesu sikkhito
atk-s0510a:3366_3: kenaci pāpasahāyena saṃsaṭṭho saṃsaggadosena pāpavitakkādivasaṃ gato mātughātakammavasena narake aggijālādidukkhamanubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3366_4: tato cuto samudde timiṅgalamahāmaccho hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:3366_6: Disvā maṃ vāṇijā bhītā “aho gotamo bhagavā”ti saddamakaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3366_7: Atha mahāmaccho pubbavāsanāvasena buddhagāravaṃ uppādetvā tato cuto sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0510a:3366_8: nibbatto saddho pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0510a:3366_9: divasassa tikkhattuṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā saramāno vandati.
atk-s0510a:3367_1: Atha so thero “suciraṃ satapuññalakkhaṇa”ntiādīhi gāthāhi thomesi. Bhante,
atk-s0510a:3367_3: Patipubbena visuddhapaccayanti pubbe dīpaṅkarapādamūle paripuṇṇapāramīpaccayasambhāro suṭṭhu ciraṃ kālaṃ mayā na diṭṭho asīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3367_4: Ahamajjasupekkhananti ajja imasmiṃ divase ahaṃ supekkhanaṃ sundaradassanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3367_5: sundaradiṭṭhaṃ vā nirupamaṃ viggahaṃ upamārahitasarīraṃ gotamaṃ vata ekantena passāmi dakkhāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3368_1: Suciraṃ vihatatamo mayāti visesena hatatamo viddhaṃsitamoho tvaṃ mayāpi suṭṭhu ciraṃ thomitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3368_2: Sucirakkhena nadī visositāti esā taṇhānadī sundararakkhena gopanena visesena sositā,
atk-s0510a:3368_4: Suciraṃ amalaṃ visodhitanti suṭṭhu ciraṃ dīghena addhunā amalaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena sodhitaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3368_7: Cirakālasamaṅgitoti mahāmune mahāsamaṇa ñāṇamayaṃ nayanaṃ dibbacakkhuṃ cirakālaṃ samadhigato sampatto tvanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3368_8: Avinaṭṭho punarantaranti ahaṃ puna antaraṃ antarābhave majjhe parinaṭṭho parihīno ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3368_9: Punarajjasamāgato tayāti ajja imasmiṃ kāle tayā saddhiṃ punapi samāgato ekībhūto saha vasāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3368_10: Na hi nassanti katāni gotamāti gotama sabbaññubuddha,
atk-s0510a:3368_11: tayā saddhiṃ katāni samāgamādīni na hi nassanti yāva khandhaparinibbānā na vinā bhavissantīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3374_0: Paññāsamavagge ca ekapaññāsamavagge ca dvepaññāsamavagge ca tepaññāsamavagge ca sabbāni apadānāni uttānānevāti.
atk-s0510a:3377_0: Catupaññāsamavagge paṭhamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato mahākaccāyanattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3377_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3377_2: bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vuddhippatto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0510a:3377_3: satthārā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0510a:3377_4: disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento paṇidhānaṃ katvā dānādīni puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:3377_5: sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena gacchanto ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3378_0: So tena puññena aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:3378_1: parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakammaṭṭhāne satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā “imassa
atk-s0510a:3378_2: nissandena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīraṃ me suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3378_3: Tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3378_6: attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti kañcanamāṇavotveva nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3378_7: So vuddhimanvāya tayo vede uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0510a:3378_10: tumhe tattha gantvā satthāraṃ idhānethā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0510a:3378_11: So attaṭṭhamo satthu santikaṃ upagato tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0510a:3378_12: desanāpariyosāne sattahi janehi saddhiṃ saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3379_1: So evaṃ pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3379_7: rājā pajjoto tumhākaṃ pāde vandituṃ dhammañca sotuṃ icchatī”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0510a:3379_11: Thero satthu āṇāya attaṭṭhamo tattha gantvā rājānaṃ pasādetvā avantīsu sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā puna satthu santikameva āgato.
atk-s0510a:3379_12: Attano pubbapatthanāvasena kaccāyanappakaraṇaṃ mahāniruttippakaraṇaṃ nettippakaraṇanti pakaraṇattayaṃ saṅghamajjhe byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3379_15: mama sāvakānaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito aggaphalasukhena vihāsīti.
atk-s0510a:3382_0: Dutiyāpadāne ito satasahassamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato vakkalittherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3382_1: Ayampi thero purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3382_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto satthu santikaṃ gacchantehi upāsakehi
atk-s0510a:3382_3: saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3382_4: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3383_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3383_3: Niddhantasuvaṇṇapiṇḍasadisatāya apagato byapagato kali doso assāti va-
atk-s0510a:3383_5: So vuddhippatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato,
atk-s0510a:3383_6: satthāraṃ disvā rūpakāyasampattidassanena atitto satthārā saddhiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0510a:3383_7: “Agāramajjhe vasanto niccakālaṃ satthu dassanaṃ na labhissāmī”ti satthu santike pabbajitvā ṭhapetvā bhojanakālaṃ
atk-s0510a:3383_8: sarīrakiccakālañca sesakāle yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ passituṃ,
atk-s0510a:3383_9: tattha ṭhito aññaṃ kiccaṃ pahāya bhagavantaṃ olokentoyeva viharati.
atk-s0510a:3383_10: Satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento bahukālaṃ tasmiṃ rūpadassaneneva vicarante kiñci avatvā punekadivasaṃ – “kiṃ te, vakkali,
atk-s0510a:3383_11: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali,
atk-s0510a:3383_18: Satthari evaṃ vadantepi thero satthu dassanaṃ pahāya aññattha gantuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0510a:3383_22: So satthārā paṇāmito satthu sammukhe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto –
atk-s0510a:3383_24: yohaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmī”ti gijjhakūṭe pabbate papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi?
atk-s0510a:3383_26: “ayaṃ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ nāseyyā”ti attānaṃ dassetvā obhāsaṃ vissajjento –
atk-s0510a:3386_3: ‘ehī’ti avhāyanampi laddha”nti balavapītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā “kuto gacchāmī”ti attano gamanabhāvaṃ ajānitvāva
atk-s0510a:3386_4: satthu sammukhe ākāse pakkhanditvā paṭhamena pādena pabbate ṭhitoyeva satthārā vuttagāthāyo āvajjento
atk-s0510a:3386_5: ākāseyeva pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ dhammapadavaṇṇanāyañca āgataṃ.
atk-s0510a:3387_1: vakkalī”tiādinā satthārā ovadito gijjhakūṭe viharanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0510a:3387_2: tassa saddhāya balavabhāvato eva vipassanā vīthiṃ na otarati?
atk-s0510a:3387_3: Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3387_4: So puna vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ nāsakkhiyeva.
atk-s0510a:3387_6: taṃ vātābādhena pīḷiyamānaṃ ñatvā bhagavā tattha gantvā pucchanto –
atk-s0510a:3399_2: Evaṃ thero vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3400_1: So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ito satasahassamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3400_2: Tattha itoti kakusandhādīnaṃ uppannabhaddakappato heṭṭhā kappasatasahassamatthaketi attho.
atk-s0510a:3403_6: Karuṇāmatiākaroti sādhūnaṃ cittakampanasaṅkhātāya karuṇāya ca atthānatthaminanaparicchinnamatiyā ca ākaro ādhārabhūto.
atk-s0510a:3404_0: 32. Brahmāsurasuraccitoti brahmehi ca asurehi ca devehi ca accito pūjitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3405_1: Madhurena rutena cāti karavīkarutamadhurena saddena sakalaṃ janaṃ rañjayantīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3405_2: Santhavī sāvakaṃ sakanti attano sāvakaṃ madhuradhammadesanāya santhavī,
atk-s0510a:3406_1: Saddhādhimuttoti saddahanasaddhāya sāsane adhimutto patiṭṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3406_2: Mama dassanalālasoti mayhaṃ dassane byāvaṭo tapparo.
atk-s0510a:3407_0: 35. Taṃ ṭhānamabhirocayinti taṃ saddhādhimuttaṭṭhānantaraṃ abhirocayiṃ, icchiṃ patthesinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3409_3: Pisācībhayatajjitāti tadā evaṃbhūtaṃ kumāraṃ maṃ aññā pisācī ekā rakkhasī bhayena tajjesi bhiṃsāpesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3409_4: Tadā mahesissa sammāsambuddhassa pādamūle maṃ sāyesuṃ nipajjāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3409_5: Dīnamānasā bhītacittā mama mātāpitaro imaṃ dārakaṃ te dadāma,
atk-s0510a:3409_6: imassa saraṇaṃ patiṭṭhā hotu nātha nāyakāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3410_1: Tadā paṭiggahi so manti so bhagavā tadā tasmiṃ mama mātuyā dinnakāle jālinā jālayuttena saṅkhālakena
atk-s0510a:3410_2: cakkalakkhaṇādīhi lakkhitena mudukomalapāṇinā mudukena visuddhena hatthatalena maṃ aggahesīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3411_3: Sabbasubhākiṇṇaṃ sabbena subhena vaṇṇena saṇṭhānena ākiṇṇaṃ gahanībhūtaṃ rūpaṃ bhagavato hatthapādasīsādirūpaṃ disvāti attho,
atk-s0510a:3412_1: Tadā maṃ caraṇantagoti tasmiṃ mayhaṃ arahattaṃ pattakāle sīlādipannarasannaṃ caraṇadhammānaṃ antago,
atk-s0510a:3412_4: Tassa maraṇassa antaṃ nibbānaṃ pattoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3412_9: vakkalī”ti maṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0510a:3415_0: Padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato kappinattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3415_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3415_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu santike dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0510a:3415_3: satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0510a:3416_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto bārāṇasito avidūre ekasmiṃ pesakāragāme jeṭṭhapesakāragehe
atk-s0510a:3416_1: nibbatto tadā sahassamattā paccekabuddhā himavante aṭṭha māse vasitvā vassike cattāro māse janapade vasanti.
atk-s0510a:3416_2: Te ekavāraṃ bārāṇasiyā avidūre otaritvā “senāsanaṃ karaṇatthāya hatthakammaṃ yācathā”ti rañño santikaṃ aṭṭha paccekabuddhe pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3416_4: So “paccekabuddhā kira āgatā”ti sutvā nikkhamitvā āgatakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā “ajja, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3416_6: tatiyadivase karissāmā”ti vatvā paccekabuddhe animantetvāva pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:3417_0: Tasmiṃ samaye jeṭṭhapesakārassa bhariyā kenacideva karaṇīyena bārāṇasiṃ gacchantī te paccekabuddhe disvā vanditvā, “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3417_3: Taṃ sutvā saddhāsampannā buddhisampannā itthī “sve, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3418_4: yāgubhattādīni sampādethā”ti gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā āsanāni paññāpetvā punadivase paccekabuddhe
atk-s0510a:3418_5: nisīdāpetvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne tasmiṃ gāme sabbā itthiyo
atk-s0510a:3418_6: ādāya tāhi saddhiṃ paccekabuddhe vanditvā temāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhitvā puna gāme ugghosesi –
atk-s0510a:3418_8: ekekakulato ekekapuriso vāsipharasuādīni gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre āharitvā ayyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karotū”ti.
atk-s0510a:3418_9: Gāmavāsino tassāyeva vacanaṃ sutvā ekeko ekekaṃ katvā saddhiṃ rattidivāṭṭhānehi paṇṇasālasahassaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0510a:3418_10: attano attano paṇṇasālāyaṃ upagataṃ paccekabuddhaṃ “ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi,
atk-s0510a:3418_12: Sā vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle “attano attano paṇṇasālāya vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ cīvarasāṭake sajjethā”ti
atk-s0510a:3418_13: samādapetvā ekekassa sahassa sahassamūlaṃ cīvaraṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3418_15: Gāmavāsinopi idaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā tato cuto tāvatiṃsadevaloke nibbattitvā gaṇadevatā nāma ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3419_0: Te tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kuṭumbikagehesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3419_4: tā sabbāpi vayappattā parakulaṃ gacchantiyo tesaṃ tesaṃyeva gehāni agamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3419_5: Athekadivasaṃ vihāre dhammassavane saṅghuṭṭhe “satthā dhammaṃ desessatī”ti sutvā te sabbepi kuṭumbikā
atk-s0510a:3419_8: Yesaṃ kulūpakā vā ñātisāmaṇerādayo vā atthi,
atk-s0510a:3419_10: Te pana tathārūpānaṃ natthitāya katthaci pavisituṃ avisahantā vihāramajjheyeva aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3419_21: Te taṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā sahassakūṭāgāraparivāraṃ satthu vasanatthāya mahāpariveṇaṃ nāma kārāpesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3419_22: Navakammassa mahantatāya dhane appahonte pubbe dinnadhanato puna upaḍḍhūpaḍḍhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3419_23: Niṭṭhite pariveṇe vihāramahaṃ karontā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarāni sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3420_0: Jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa pana bhariyā attano paññāya ṭhitā ahaṃ tehi samakaṃ akatvā atirekataraṃ katvā “satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3420_1: pūjessāmī”ti anojapupphavaṇṇena sahassamūlena sāṭakena saddhiṃ anojapupphacaṅkoṭakaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3420_2: anojapupphehi pūjetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ satthu pādamūle ṭhapetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0510a:3420_4: anojātveva ca nāmaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3420_6: Te sabbepi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3420_7: Te imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokā cavitvā jeṭṭhako kukkuṭavatīnagare rājakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto mahākappinarājā nāma ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3420_9: Jeṭṭhakassa bhariyā maddaraṭṭhe sākalanagare rājakule nibbatti anojapupphavaṇṇamevassā sarīraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0510a:3420_11: sā vayappattā mahākappinarañño gehaṃ gantvā anojādevīti pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3421_0: Sesitthiyopi amaccakulesu nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva amaccaputtānaṃ gehāni agamaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3421_1: Te sabbepi rañño sampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3421_2: Yadā hi rājā alaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā vicarati,
atk-s0510a:3421_4: Tasmiṃ assena vā rathena vā vicarante tepi tatheva vicaranti.
atk-s0510a:3421_5: Evaṃ te ekato hutvā katānaṃ puññānaṃ balena ekatova sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3421_10: Tesu rājā supattaṃ assaṃ sayaṃ ārohati,
atk-s0510a:3421_11: itare cattāro asse assārohānaṃ sāsanāharaṇatthāya adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3421_13: dve vā tīṇi vā yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā mayhaṃ sukhasāsanaṃ ārocethā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0510a:3421_14: Te catūhi dvārehi nikkhamitvā dve tīṇi yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā kiñci sāsanaṃ alabhitvāva paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3422_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā supattaṃ āruhitvā amaccasahassaparivuto uyyānaṃ gacchanto kilantarūpe pañcasatamatte
atk-s0510a:3422_2: addho imesaṃ santikā ekaṃ bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ sossāmī”ti te pakkosāpetvā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi. “Atthi, deva,
atk-s0510a:3422_5: “Atthi pana vo dese kiñci sāsanaṃ uppanna”nti. “Deva,
atk-s0510a:3422_8: Rājā tāvadeva balavapītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro kiñci sallakkhetuṃ asakkonto muhuttaṃ vītināmetvā pana, “tātā,
atk-s0510a:3422_11: Rājā dutiyampi tatiyampi tatheva vītināmetvā catutthavāre “kiṃ vadetha,
atk-s0510a:3422_13: sukhasāsanasavanāya satasahassaṃ vo dammī”ti vatvā “aparampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0510a:3422_16: Rājā tampi sutvā purimanayeneva tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthavāre “dhammo uppanno”ti vutte –
atk-s0510a:3422_17: “idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā “aparampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0510a:3422_20: Rājā tampi sutvā tatheva tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthavāre “saṅgho uppanno”ti vutte –
atk-s0510a:3422_21: “idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā amaccasahassaṃ oloketvā, “tātā,
atk-s0510a:3422_24: ‘buddho uppanno dhammo uppanno saṅgho uppanno’ti sutvā na puna nivattissāmi,
atk-s0510a:3422_25: bhagavantaṃ uddissa gantvā tassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti. “Mayampi, deva,
atk-s0510a:3422_27: Rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni likhāpetvā vāṇijakānaṃ datvā “imaṃ anojāya nāma deviyā detha,
atk-s0510a:3422_29: evañca pana naṃ vadeyyātha ‘raññā kira te issariyaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3422_32: ‘satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajissāmī’ti vatvā gatoti āroceyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:3422_33: Amaccāpi attano attano bhariyānaṃ tatheva sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3422_34: Rājā vāṇijake uyyojetvā assaṃ abhiruyha amaccasahassaparivuto taṃkhaṇaññeva nikkhami.
atk-s0510a:3423_0: Satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahākappinarājānaṃ saparivāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ mahākappino
atk-s0510a:3423_1: vāṇijakānaṃ santikā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ tīhi satasahassehi pūjetvā rajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3423_2: pahāya amaccasahassaparivuto maṃ uddissa pabbajitukāmo sve nikkhamissati,
atk-s0510a:3423_3: so saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0510a:3423_4: paccuggamanaṃ karissāmī”ti punadivase cakkavattī viya khuddakagāmabhojakaṃ rājānaṃ paccuggacchanto sayameva
atk-s0510a:3423_5: pattacīvaramādāya vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ paccuggantvā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre nigrodharukkhamūle chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo
atk-s0510a:3423_7: Rājāpi āgacchanto ekaṃ nadiṃ patvā “kā nāmāya”nti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:3423_12: “Atthi panettha nāvā vā uḷumpo vā”ti? “Natthi, devā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3423_15: Ahaṃ nibbematiko hutvā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto,
atk-s0510a:3423_16: tesaṃ me ānubhāvena ‘idaṃ udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā hotū’ti ratanattayassa guṇaṃ āvajjetvā ‘itipi so bhagavā
atk-s0510a:3423_17: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”’ti buddhaguṇaṃ anussaranto saparivāro assasahassena udakapiṭṭhe pakkhandi.
atk-s0510a:3424_0: So taṃ uttaritvā purato gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:3424_5: Taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”ti dhammānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi.
atk-s0510a:3424_6: Tampi atikkamitvā gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:3424_11: Taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”ti saṅghānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi.
atk-s0510a:3424_12: Tampi nadiṃ atikkamitvā gacchanto satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo nigrodharukkhassa sākhāviṭapapalāsāni obhāsayamānā disvā cintesi –
atk-s0510a:3424_16: addhā ahaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa āgacchanto sammāsambuddhena diṭṭho bhavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3424_17: So tāvadeva assapiṭṭhito otaritvā onatasarīro rasmiyānusārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā manosilārase nimujjanto viya buddharasmīnaṃ anto pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:3424_18: So satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena.
atk-s0510a:3425_1: Satthā “āgamissati nu kho imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ iddhimayapattacīvara”nti upadhārento “ime kulaputtā paccekabuddhasahassānaṃ cīvarasahassaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0510a:3425_3: anacchariyaṃ imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarāgamana”nti ñatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha,
atk-s0510a:3425_5: caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:3425_6: Te tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya hutvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā paccorohitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3426_0: Te pana vāṇijakā rājagehaṃ gantvā deviyā raññā pahitasāsanaṃ ārocetvā deviyā “āgacchantū”ti vutte pavisitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3426_4: tīṇi kira no satasahassāni dethā”ti. “Bahuṃ, bhaṇe, bhaṇatha,
atk-s0510a:3426_6: kismiṃ vo rājā pasanno ettakaṃ dhanaṃ dāpetī”ti? “Devi,
atk-s0510a:3426_13: Sāpi taṃ sutvā pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā tikkhattuṃ kiñci asallakkhetvā catutthavāre “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0510a:3426_16: ananucchavikaṃ raññā kataṃ evarūpaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tumhākaṃ satasahassadadamānena,
atk-s0510a:3426_17: ahaṃ vo mama duggatapaṇṇākāre tīṇi satasahassāni dammi.
atk-s0510a:3426_19: Te idañca idañcāti itarānipi dve sāsanāni ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3426_20: Devī purimanayeneva tayo tayo vāre asallakkhetvā catutthacatutthavāre tīṇi tīṇi satasahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3427_11: “Kiṃ pana tehi amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ pahitaṃ, devī”ti?
atk-s0510a:3427_12: “Tehi kira attano sampatti tumhākaṃ vissaṭṭhā ‘tumhe kira sampattiṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjathā”’ti.
atk-s0510a:3427_15: “Amhākaṃ so tāva rājā magge ṭhito tīhi satasahassehi tīṇi ratanāni pūjetvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya sampattiṃ pahāya ‘pabbajissāmī’ti nikkhanto,
atk-s0510a:3427_16: mayāpi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tāni navahi satasahassehi pūjitāni,
atk-s0510a:3427_17: na kho panesā sampatti nāma raññoyeva dukkhā,
atk-s0510a:3427_19: Ko raññā chaḍḍitakheḷapiṇḍaṃ jaṇṇukehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā mukhena gaṇhissati,
atk-s0510a:3427_24: Tena hi “ethā”ti rathasahassaṃ yojāpetvā rathaṃ āruyha tāhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā antarāmagge paṭhamaṃ nadiṃ disvā yathā raññā paṭhamaṃ pucchitā,
atk-s0510a:3427_25: tatheva pucchitvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “raññā gatamaggaṃ olokethā”ti vatvā “sindhavānaṃ padavalañjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_26: na passāmā”ti vutte rājā “tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhantosmī”ti saccakiriyaṃ karitvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3427_29: tesaṃ me ānubhāvena “idaṃ udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā hotū”ti tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇe anussarantī rathasahassaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0510a:3427_32: Eteneva upāyena itarā dvepi nadiyo uttariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3428_0: Satthā tāsaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā tā attano santike nisinne sāmike bhikkhū na passanti,
atk-s0510a:3428_2: Devīpi āgacchantī satthu sarīrato nikkhantā rasmiyo disvā tatheva cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0510a:3428_4: mahākappino rājā tumhe uddissa nikkhamitvā gato,
atk-s0510a:3428_9: Tā sabbāpi haṭṭhatuṭṭhā “idheva kira nisinnā sāmike no passissāmā”ti nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3428_11: Anojādevī desanāpariyosāne tāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3428_12: Mahākappino thero tāsaṃ desiyamānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3428_13: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā tāsaṃ te bhikkhū dassesi.
atk-s0510a:3428_14: Tāsañhi āgatakkhaṇeyeva attano sāmike kāsāvadhare muṇḍasīse disvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na bhaveyya,
atk-s0510a:3428_16: Tasmā acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya tāsaṃ te bhikkhū arahattappatte dassesi.
atk-s0510a:3428_18: tumhākaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakappatta”nti vatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3429_0: Evaṃ vutte satthā uppalavaṇṇāya theriyā āgamanaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0510a:3429_1: Sā satthu cintitakkhaṇeyeva ākāsenāgantvā tā sabbā itthiyo gahetvā ākāsena bhikkhunupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0510a:3429_3: Satthā bhikkhusahassaṃ ādāya ākāsena jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3429_4: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā mahākappino rattiṭṭhānādīsu “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3429_14: taṃ ārabbha udānabhāvaṃ vā aññaṃ ārabbha udānabhāvaṃ vā jānātī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3429_17: mama putto kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha udānaṃ udāneti,
atk-s0510a:3429_18: puttassa pana me dhammaṃ carato dhammapīti nāma uppajjati,
atk-s0510a:3429_19: so amatamahānibbānaṃ ārabbha evaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0510a:3432_12: ajja paṭṭhāya upagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desehī”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0510a:3432_13: bhante”ti thero bhagavato vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā ekovādeneva samaṇasahassaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3432_14: Tena naṃ satthā paṭipāṭiyā attano sāvake ṭhānantare ṭhapento “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3432_16: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhuovādakānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākappino”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3433_1: Evaṃ thero pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3433_2: Udito ajaṭākāseti sakalākāse udito uṭṭhito pākaṭabhūto.
atk-s0510a:3433_3: Saradambare saradakāle ākāse ravīva sūriyo ivāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3434_1: Akkhadasso tadā āsinti tasmiṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sāradassī hitadassī ācariyo pākaṭo ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3435_1: Sāvakassa katāvinoti tassa bhagavato me manaṃ mama cittaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3435_2: tappayantassa tosayantassa sāvakassa ovādakassa guṇaṃ pakāsayato aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentassa katāvino sātaccakiccayuttassa vacanaṃ sutvāti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3438_1: Katāvinoti katādhikārassa etadagge ṭhitassa bhikkhuno ṭhānaṃ so eso muditāya pahaṭṭhacittatāya patthetīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3439_1: Sataso anusāsiyāti dhammena samena vacanena kāraṇavasena anusāsitvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3439_3: Jāto keniyajātiyanti tantavāyajātiyā pesakārakule jātoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3442_0: Catutthāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato dabbamallaputtattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3442_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3442_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare seṭṭhiputto hutvā jāto vibhavasampanno ahosi,
atk-s0510a:3442_3: satthari pasanno satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0510a:3442_4: ṭhapentaṃ disvā pasannamānaso buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattāhaccayena
atk-s0510a:3442_5: bhagavato pādamūle nipatitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthesi.
atk-s0510a:3442_7: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto tusitādīsu devesu dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:3442_8: bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ kule nibbatto asappurisasaṃsaggena tassa sāvakaṃ bhikkhuṃ arahāti jānantopi abbhūtena
atk-s0510a:3442_11: So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā kassapadasabalassa
atk-s0510a:3442_12: kāle kulagehe nibbatto osānakāle sāsane pabbajito parinibbute bhagavati sakalaloke kolāhale jāte satta
atk-s0510a:3442_13: bhikkhavo pabbajito paccantajanapade vanamajjhe ekaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhitvā “jīvitāsā orohantu nirālayā
atk-s0510a:3442_15: Tesaṃ ovādadāyako jeṭṭhakatthero satthāhabbhantare arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3442_17: itare pañca parisuddhasīlā tato cutā devaloke nibbattā.
atk-s0510a:3442_18: Tattha ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde pukkusāti, sabhiyo, bāhiyo,
atk-s0510a:3442_19: kumārakassapoti ime cattāro tattha tattha nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3442_22: atheko tassā sarīraṃ jhāpanatthāya citakasmiṃ āropetvā kumāraṃ dabbantare patitaṃ gahetvā jaggāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3442_23: Dabbe patitattā dabbo mallaputtoti pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3442_25: so kammaṭṭhānamanuyutto nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3443_0: Atha naṃ satthā majjhattabhāvena ānubhāvasampannabhāvena ca bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ paññāpane bhattuddesane ca niyojesi.
atk-s0510a:3443_3: Aparabhāge thero ekassa varasalākadāyakassa salākabhattaṃ mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0510a:3443_4: Te haṭṭhatuṭṭhā “sve mayhaṃ muggaghatamadhumissakabhattaṃ bhuñjissāmā”ti ussāhajātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3443_5: So pana upāsako tesaṃ vārappattabhāvaṃ sutvā dāsiṃ āṇāpesi – “ye, je,
atk-s0510a:3443_8: Sāpi tatheva te bhikkhū āgate koṭṭhakapamukhe nisīdāpetvā bhojesi.
atk-s0510a:3443_9: Te bhikkhū anattamanā kopena taṭataṭāyantā there āghātaṃ bandhitvā “madhurabhattadāyakaṃ amhākaṃ amadhurabhattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3443_10: dāpetuṃ esova niyojesī”ti dukkhī dummanā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3443_11: Atha te mettiyā nāma bhikkhunī “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3443_13: kiṃ amhe dabbena mallaputtena viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasī”ti āhaṃsu. “Kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3443_16: Sā tattha tattha therassa abhūtāropanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3443_27: “mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsetvā te bhikkhū anuyuñjathā”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:3443_28: Upālittherappamukhā bhikkhū taṃ bhikkhuniṃ uppabbājetvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anuyuñjitvā tehi “amhehi
atk-s0510a:3443_29: niyojitā sā bhikkhunī”ti vutte bhagavato ekamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3444_0: Tena ca samayena dabbatthero bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ paññāpento veḷuvanavihārassa sāmantā aṭṭhārasamahāvihāre
atk-s0510a:3444_1: sabhāge bhikkhū pesento rattibhāge andhakāre aṅguliyā padīpaṃ jāletvā tenevālokena aniddhimante bhikkhū pesesi.
atk-s0510a:3444_2: Evaṃ therassa senāsanapaññāpanabhattuddesanakicce pākaṭe jāte satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe dabbattheraṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapento “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3444_4: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ yadidaṃ dabbo mallaputto”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3445_1: Thero attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3445_3: Ito ekanavute kappe vipassī nāma nāyako loke uppajjīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3446_2: Upavadiṃ sāvakaṃ tassāti tassa bhagavato khīṇāsavaṃ sāvakaṃ upavadiṃ,
atk-s0510a:3447_1: Dundubhiyoti dunduṃ iti saddāyanato dundubhisaṅkhātā bheriyo.
atk-s0510a:3447_3: Samantato asaniyoti sabbadisābhāgato asane vināsane niyuttoti asaniyo,
atk-s0510a:3448_1: Ukkā patiṃsu nabhasāti ākāsato aggikkhandhā ca patiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0510a:3448_2: Dhūmaketu ca dissatīti dhūmarājisahito aggikkhandho ca dissati paññāyatīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3451_0: Pañcamāpadāne ito satasahassamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3451_1: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike
atk-s0510a:3451_2: dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ cittakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0510a:3451_3: patthento paṇidhānaṃ katvā tadanurūpāni puññāni karonto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:3451_4: ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto tassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3451_5: samaṇadhammaṃ katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto dibbasukhaṃ mānusasukhañca anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3451_7: Sā kira kumārikākāleyeva pabbajitukāmā mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā patikulaṃ gantvā gabbhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3451_8: gaṇhitvā taṃ ajānitvā “sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpessāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0510a:3453_0: Daṇḍaṃ nūna gahetvāna, kāke soṇe nivāraye”ti. –
atk-s0510a:3454_0: Ādinā sarīrassa dosaṃ dassentī taṃ ārādhesi.
atk-s0510a:3455_0: Sā sāmikena anuññātā gabbhinibhāvaṃ ajānantī devadattapakkhiyāsu bhikkhunīsu pabbaji.
atk-s0510a:3455_1: Tassā gabbhinibhāvaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3455_4: bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitā”ti bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā dasabalaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0510a:3455_6: Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sarājikāya parisāya taṃ vinicchinanto “pure laddho gabbho,
atk-s0510a:3455_8: Taṃ sutvā satthā “sādhu suvinicchitaṃ upālinā adhikaraṇa”nti therassa sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3456_1: Taṃ rājā pasenadi kosalo “dārakapariharaṇaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ palibodho”ti dhātīnaṃ dāpetvā posāpesi,
atk-s0510a:3456_3: Aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0510a:3456_5: idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā”ti vutte “katarakassapassā”ti “kumārakassapassā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0510a:3456_6: gahitanāmattā raññā posāvanīyaputtattā ca vuddhakālepi kumārakassapotveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0510a:3457_0: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0510a:3457_2: Atha tena saddhiṃ pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāse nibbattamahābrahmā “vipassanāya
atk-s0510a:3457_3: mukhaṃ dassetvā maggaphaluppattiyā upāyaṃ karissāmī”ti pañcadasapañhe abhisaṅkharitvā andhavane vasantassa
atk-s0510a:3457_5: Tato so te pañhe bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0510a:3457_7: Thero bhagavatā kathitaniyāmeneva te uggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3458_1: So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ito satasahassamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3459_0: 169. Āpannasattā me mātāti mayhaṃ mātā garugabbhā gabbhinī pasutāsannagabbhāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3460_1: Vammikasadisaṃ kāyanti sarīraṃ nāma vammikasadisaṃ yathā vammiko ito cito ca chiddāvachiddo gharagoḷikaupacikādīnaṃ āsayo,
atk-s0510a:3460_2: evameva ayaṃ kāyo navachiddo dhuvassavoti buddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ pakāsitaṃ taṃ sutvā me cittaṃ āsave aggahetvā asesetvā kilesato vimucci,
atk-s0510a:3460_4: Aparabhāge tattha tattha bhikkhūnaṃ vicittadhammakathikabhāvaṃ sutvā satthā “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3460_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ kumārakassapo”ti etadagge ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0510a:3463_0: Chaṭṭhāpadāne ito satasahassamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato bāhiyassa dārucīriyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3463_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3463_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā vedaṅgesu anavayo ekadivasaṃ satthu
atk-s0510a:3463_3: santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto pasannamānaso satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_4: disvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ pattukāmo sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sattāhassa accayena
atk-s0510a:3463_6: ito sattame divase yaṃ bhikkhuṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi,
atk-s0510a:3463_7: so viya ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane khippābhiññānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3463_8: Bhagavā anāgataṃsañāṇena oloketvā samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā khippābhiññānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3463_9: So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto tattha cha kāmāvacarasampattiyo anubhavitvā
atk-s0510a:3463_10: puna manussesu cakkavattiādisampattiyo anekakappakoṭisatesu anubhavitvā kassapassa bhagavato kāle ekasmiṃ
atk-s0510a:3463_12: bhagavati parinibbute pabbajito yadā sāsane osakkamāne satta bhikkhū catunnaṃ parisānaṃ ajjhācāraṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3463_13: saṃvegappattā araññaṃ pavisitvā “yāva sāsanassa antaradhānaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0510a:3463_14: tāva attano patiṭṭhaṃ karissāmā”ti suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ vanditvā tattha araññe ekaṃ pabbataṃ disvā “jīvitasālayā nivattantu,
atk-s0510a:3463_15: nirālayā imaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhantū”ti nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā sabbe taṃ pabbataṃ abhiruyha nisseṇiṃ pātetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3463_17: So anotattadahe nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā te bhikkhū āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0510a:3463_20: amhehi evaṃ katikā katā ‘yo paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0510a:3463_23: “Tena hi sace mayampi tumhe viya visesaṃ nibbattessāma,
atk-s0510a:3464_0: Dutiyadivase dutiyatthero anāgāmī hutvā tatheva piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā itare nimantesi.
atk-s0510a:3464_4: ‘mahātherena ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitvā anutherena ābhataṃ bhuñjissāmā”’ti?
atk-s0510a:3464_6: “Evaṃ sante tumhe viya mayampi visesaṃ nibbattetvā attano attano purisakārena bhuñjituṃ sakkontā bhuñjissāmā”ti na icchiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3464_9: itare pañca visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sussitvā sattame divase kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3464_10: Tattha dibbasukhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tato cavitvā manussesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3464_16: Tesu ayaṃ bāhiyo dārucīriyo suppārakapaṭṭane vāṇijakule nibbatto vāṇijakamme nipphattiṃ gato mahaddhano mahābhogo,
atk-s0510a:3464_17: so suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gacchantehi vāṇijehi saddhiṃ nāvamāruyha videsaṃ gacchanto katipāhaṃ gantvā bhinnāya
atk-s0510a:3464_18: nāvāya sesesu macchakacchapabhakkhesu jātesu ekoyeva avasiṭṭho ekaṃ phalakaṃ gahetvā vāyamanto sattame
atk-s0510a:3464_21: so aññaṃ kiñci apassanto sukkhakaṭṭhadaṇḍake vākehi paliveṭhetvā nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca devakulato kapālaṃ gahetvā suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3464_22: Manussā taṃ disvā yāgubhattādīni datvā “ayaṃ eko arahā”ti sambhāvesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3464_25: lābhasakkāro me parihāyissatī”ti tāni paṭikkhipitvā dārucīrāneva parihari.
atk-s0510a:3465_1: arahā”ti bahūhi sambhāviyamānassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “ye keci loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā,
atk-s0510a:3465_2: ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”ti so tena niyāmena kuhanakammena jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0510a:3466_0: Kassapadasabalassa sāsane sattasu janesu pabbataṃ āruyha samaṇadhammaṃ karontesu eko anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāsabrahmaloke
atk-s0510a:3466_1: nibbattitvā attano brahmasampattiṃ olokento āgataṭṭhānaṃ āvajjento pabbatamāruyha samaṇadhammaṃ karaṇaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3466_2: disvā sesānaṃ nibbattanaṭṭhānaṃ āvajjento ekassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ itaresañca pañcannaṃ kāmāvacaradevaloke
atk-s0510a:3466_3: nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā te kālānukālaṃ āvajjesi “imasmiṃ pana kāle kahaṃ nu kho te”ti āvajjento dārucīriyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3466_4: suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ nissāya kuhanakammena jīvitaṃ kappentaṃ disvā “naṭṭho vatāyaṃ bālo,
atk-s0510a:3466_5: pubbe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto atiukkaṭṭhabhāvena arahatāpi ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ aparibhuñjitvā idāni udarahetu
atk-s0510a:3466_6: anārahāva samāno arahattaṃ paṭijānitvā lokaṃ vañcento vicarati,
atk-s0510a:3466_8: gacchāmi naṃ saṃvejetvā buddhuppādaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti khaṇeneva brahmalokato otaritvā suppārakapaṭṭane
atk-s0510a:3466_10: So attano vasanaṭṭhāne obhāsaṃ disvā bahi nikkhamitvā mahābrahmānaṃ disvā añjaliṃ paggayha “ke tumhe”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:3466_11: “Ahaṃ tumhākaṃ porāṇakasahāyo anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā brahmaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:3466_14: Svāhaṃ dāni taṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kuhanakammena jīvikaṃ kappentaṃ disvā damituṃ āgato”ti vatvā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āha –
atk-s0510a:3466_18: yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti.
atk-s0510a:3466_19: Athassa satthu uppannabhāvaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ vasanabhāvañca ācikkhitvā “satthu santikaṃ gacchā”ti taṃ uyyojetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3467_0: Bāhiyo pana ākāse ṭhatvā kathentaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ oloketvā cintesi –
atk-s0510a:3467_5: atthi nu kho loke añño arahā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3467_7: “atha ke carahi sadevake loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3467_10: tattha so bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. So hi, bāhiya,
atk-s0510a:3467_11: bhagavā arahā ceva arahattāya ca dhammaṃ desesī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3467_12: Bāhiyo rattibhāge devatāya kathaṃ sutvā saṃviggamānaso taṃkhaṇaṃyeva suppārakā nikkhamitvā ekarattivāsena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0510a:3467_13: gacchanto ca pana devatānubhāvena buddhānubhāvena ca vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā sāvatthiṃ anuppatto,
atk-s0510a:3467_14: tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0510a:3467_15: So jetavanaṃ pavisitvā abbhokāse caṅkamante sambahule bhikkhū pucchi –
atk-s0510a:3467_17: Bhikkhū “sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti vatvā “tvaṃ pana kuto āgatosī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3467_22: nisīda tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā thokaṃ vissamāhi,
atk-s0510a:3467_24: satthu vā attano vā jīvitantarāyaṃ na jānāmi,
atk-s0510a:3467_25: katthaci aṭṭhatvā anisīditvā ekaratteneva vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgato,
atk-s0510a:3467_27: So evaṃ vatvā taramānarūpo sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ anopamāya buddhasiriyā carantaṃ disvā “cirassaṃ
atk-s0510a:3467_28: vata me gotamo sammāsambuddho diṭṭho”ti diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya onatasarīro gantvā antaravīthiyaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0510a:3467_33: Atha naṃ satthā “akālo kho tāva, bāhiya,
atk-s0510a:3468_2: tumhākaṃ vā mayhaṃ vā jīvitantarāyaṃ na jānāmi,
atk-s0510a:3468_8: “imassa diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ ajjhotthaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0510a:3468_9: balavapītivego dhammaṃ sutvāpi na sakkhissati paṭivijjhituṃ,
atk-s0510a:3468_11: ekaratteneva vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgatassapi cassa daratho balavā sopi tāva paṭippassambhatū”ti.
atk-s0510a:3468_12: Tasmā dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā tatiyaṃ yācito antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitova “tasmātiha te, bāhiya,
atk-s0510a:3468_14: diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā nayena anekapariyāyena dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0510a:3468_15: So satthu dhammaṃ suṇantoyeva sabbāsave khepetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3469_1: So arahattaṃ pattakkhaṇeyeva pubbakammaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ito satasahassamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3471_3: Setatiṇhasamaṃ dijanti sunisitatikhiṇaayalohaghaṃsanena ghaṃsitvā samaṃ kataṃ viya samadantanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3472_1: Pītisamphullitānananti pītiyā suṭṭhu phullitaṃ vikasitaṃ ānanaṃ mukhaṃ ādāsatalasadisamukhavantanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3473_1: Khippābhiññassa bhikkhunoti khippaṃ desanāya samugghāṭitakkhaṇeyeva abhivisesena ñātuṃ samatthassa bhikkhunoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3474_0: 186. Saggaṃ agaṃ sabhavanaṃ yathāti attano gehaṃ viya saggaṃ lokaṃ agamāsinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3475_0: 196. Na tvaṃ upāyamaggaññūti tvaṃ nibbānādhigamūpāyabhūtamaggaññū na ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3476_1: Satthuno sadā jinanti sadā sabbakālaṃ jinaṃ jinanto parājitakopo satthuno sammāsambuddhassa vimalānanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3476_3: Dije apucchiṃ kuhiṃ lokanandanoti kuhiṃ ṭhāne lokapasādakaro satthāti dije brāhmaṇe ahaṃ bhikkhū apucchinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3477_1: Sasova khippaṃ munidassanussukoti munidassane tathāgatadassane ussuko ussāhajāto saso iva khippaṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3478_2: Piṇḍatthaṃ apihāgidhanti piṇḍapātaṃ paṭicca apihaṃ apagatapihaṃ agidhaṃ nittaṇhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3479_1: Alolakkhanti ito cito ca anolokayamānaṃ uttame sāvatthinagare piṇḍāya vicarantaṃ adakkhinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3479_2: Sirīnilayasaṅkāsanti siriyā lakkhaṇānubyañjanasobhāya nilayaṃ saṅkāsaṃ jalamānatoraṇasadisaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3480_1: Kupathe vippanaṭṭhassāti kucchitapathe sopaddavamagge mūḷhassa micchāpaṭipannassa me saraṇaṃ hohi patiṭṭhā hohi.
atk-s0510a:3481_1: Na tattha sukkā jotantīti sukkapabhāsampannā jotamānaosadhitārakādayo na jotanti nappabhāsanti.
atk-s0510a:3481_3: So evaṃ pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsetvā tāvadeva ca bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0510a:3481_4: “Paripuṇṇaṃ te pattacīvara”nti ca puṭṭho “na paripuṇṇa”nti āha.
atk-s0510a:3481_5: Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesāhī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3481_6: So kira vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karonto “bhikkhunā nāma attanā paccaye labhitvā aññaṃ anoloketvā
atk-s0510a:3481_7: sayameva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā ekabhikkhussāpi pattena vā cīvarena vā saṅgahaṃ nākāsi,
atk-s0510a:3481_8: “na tenassa iddhimayaṃ pattacīvaraṃ uppajjissatī”ti ñatvā bhagavā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ nādāsi.
atk-s0510a:3481_9: Tampi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesamānameva saṅkāraṭṭhānato coḷakkhaṇḍāni saṃkaḍḍhentaṃ pubbaveriko amanusso
atk-s0510a:3481_10: ekissā taruṇavacchāya gāviyā sarīre adhimuccitvā vāmaūrumhi paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3481_11: Satthā piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nikkhamanto bāhiyassa sarīraṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne patitaṃ disvā “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0510a:3481_13: etaṃ bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyanti ekasmiṃ gehadvāre ṭhatvā mañcakaṃ āharāpetvā imaṃ sarīraṃ nagaradvārato nīharitvā
atk-s0510a:3481_14: jhāpetvā dhātuyo gahetvā thūpaṃ karothā”ti bhikkhū āṇāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3482_0: Te bhikkhū dhātuṃ mahāpathe thūpaṃ kāretvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano katakammaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3482_9: bāhiyo dārucīriyo arahatto”ti upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍheti.
atk-s0510a:3482_12: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khippābhiññānaṃ yadidaṃ bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3483_13: mama dhammaṃ ‘appaṃ’ vā ‘bahuṃ vā’ti mā cintayittha.
atk-s0510a:3483_14: Anekānipi hi anatthapadasaṃhitāni gāthāsahassāni na seyyo,
atk-s0510a:3483_15: atthanissitaṃ pana ekampi gāthāpadaṃ seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0510a:3485_0: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. –
atk-s0510a:3489_0: Sattamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato mahākoṭṭhikattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3489_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3489_3: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto mātāpitūnaṃ accayena kuṭumbaṃ
atk-s0510a:3489_4: saṇṭhapetvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato dhammadesanākāle haṃsavatīnagaravāsino
atk-s0510a:3489_5: gandhamālādihatthe yena buddho yena dhammo yena saṅgho,
atk-s0510a:3489_6: tanninne tappoṇe tappabbhāre gacchante disvā tehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0510a:3489_7: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “ayaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggo,
atk-s0510a:3489_8: yaṃnūnāhampi ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ viya paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti cintetvā satthu
atk-s0510a:3489_10: sve mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantesi.
atk-s0510a:3489_12: So bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakanivesanaṃ gantvā sabbarattiṃ buddhassa ca bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0510a:3489_13: ca nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ gandhamālādīhi alaṅkaritvā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā tassā rattiyā accayena
atk-s0510a:3489_14: sakanivesane bhikkhusatasahassaparivāraṃ satthāraṃ vividhayāgukhajjakaparivāraṃ sasūpabyañjanaṃ gandhasālibhojanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3489_17: na pana yuttaṃ mayā ekadivasameva dānaṃ datvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetuṃ,
atk-s0510a:3489_19: So teneva niyāmena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā uttamaṃ
atk-s0510a:3489_20: ticīvarappahonakaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ buddhassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā bhikkhusatasahassassa ca ticīvaraṃ datvā
atk-s0510a:3489_22: yo so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattame divasamatthake paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0510a:3489_23: ahampi so bhikkhu viya anāgate uppajjanakassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggo
atk-s0510a:3489_24: bhaveyya”nti satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3489_25: Satthā tassa samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “anāgate ito kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati,
atk-s0510a:3489_26: tassa sāsane tava patthanā samijjhissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3489_27: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devasampattiṃ anubhavitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu paribbhami.
atk-s0510a:3490_0: Evaṃ so devamanussesu saṃsaranto tattha tattha bhave puññañāṇasambhāre sambharanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3490_2: Kasmā mātuyā vā ayyakapayyakādīnaṃ vā nāmaṃ aggahetvā evaṃ nāmaṃ kariṃsūti ce?
atk-s0510a:3490_3: Attano paññavantatāya vedaṅgesu satakkaparatakkesu sanighaṇḍukeṭubhesu sākkharappabhedesu sakalabyākaraṇesu
atk-s0510a:3490_4: ca chekabhāvena ca diṭṭhadiṭṭhe jane mukhasattīhi koṭṭhento pakkoṭṭhento vitudanto vicaratīti anvatthanāmaṃ
atk-s0510a:3490_6: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3490_7: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0510a:3490_8: arahattaṃ patvā paṭisambhidāsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā abhīto mahāthere upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi dasabalaṃ
atk-s0510a:3490_10: Evamayaṃ thero tattha katādhikāratāya tattha ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggo jāto.
atk-s0510a:3490_11: Atha naṃ satthā mahāvedallasuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi,
atk-s0510a:3490_14: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākoṭṭhiko”ti.
atk-s0510a:3491_1: So aparena samayena vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3492_0: Itthaṃ sudamāyasmā mahākoṭṭhikoti ettha sudanti nidassane nipāto.
atk-s0510a:3495_0: Aṭṭhamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato uruvelakassapattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3495_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3495_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mahāparivārānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3495_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3495_4: Bhagavā cassa anantarāyataṃ disvā “anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane mahāparivārānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3495_5: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvenavutikappamatthake
atk-s0510a:3495_8: Te tayo buddhappamukhabhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā paramāya pūjāya pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0510a:3495_9: saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule tayo bhātaro hutvā nibbattā
atk-s0510a:3495_10: gottavasena tayopi kassapāti evaṃ nāmakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3495_11: Te tayo vayappattā tayo vede uggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3495_15: te attano ganthesu sāraṃ olokentā diṭṭhadhammikameva atthaṃ disvā pabbajjaṃ rocesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3495_16: Tesu jeṭṭhabhātā attano parivārena saddhiṃ uruvelaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā uruvelakassapo nāma jāto,
atk-s0510a:3495_17: majjhimo gaṅgānadīvaṅke pabbajito nadīkassapo nāma jāto,
atk-s0510a:3495_18: kaniṭṭho gayāsīse pabbajito gayākassapo nāma jāto.
atk-s0510a:3495_19: Evaṃ tesu isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tattha tattha vasantesu bahūnaṃ divasānaṃ accayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto
atk-s0510a:3495_20: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo anukkamena dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā pañcavaggiyatthere
atk-s0510a:3495_21: arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā yasakulaputtappamukhe pañcapaññāsajane sahāyake vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante “caratha,
atk-s0510a:3495_23: cārika”nti vissajjetvā tiṃsabhaddavaggiye vinetvā uruvelakassapassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vasanatthāya
atk-s0510a:3495_24: agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā tattha gatanāgadamanādīhi aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassehi pāṭihāriyehi uruvelakassapaṃ saparivāraṃ
atk-s0510a:3495_26: Tassa pabbajjāvidhānañca iddhipāṭihāriyakaraṇañca sabbaṃ nadīkassapassa apadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0510a:3495_27: Tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā itarepi dve bhātaro saparisā āgantvā satthu santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3495_29: Satthā taṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisinno ādittapariyāyadesanāya te sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3496_1: So evaṃ arahattaṃ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
