atk-s0510a:3497_1: So ca sabbaṃ tamaṃ hantvāti so phusso bhagavā rāgadosamohādikilesandhakāraṃ viddhaṃsetvā.
atk-s0510a:3497_2: Vijaṭetvā mahājaṭanti taṇhāmānādīhi diyaḍḍhasahassehi kilesagaṇehi mahābyākulaṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā padāletvā phāletvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3497_3: Sadevakaṃ devalokasahitaṃ sakalaṃ lokasannivāsaṃtappayanto santappayanto pīṇento amataṃ vuṭṭhiṃ mahānibbānavuṭṭhidhāraṃ vassate paggharāpetīti yojanā.
atk-s0510a:3498_1: Tadā hi bārāṇasiyanti “bārasa manussā”tiādīsu viya bārasa dvādasarāsī hutvā purā,
atk-s0510a:3498_2: himavantato isayo ca paccekamunisaṅkhātā isayo ca gandhamādanato ākāsenāgantvā ettha gacchanti otaranti pavisantīti bārāṇasī,
atk-s0510a:3498_3: atha vā sammāsambuddhasaṅkhātānaṃ anekasatasahassānaṃ dhammacakkapavattanatthāya otaraṭṭhānaṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0510a:3499_1: Nikkhittasatthaṃ paccantanti chaḍḍitasatthaṃ pātitaāvudhaṃ paccantajanapadaṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā punarupaccatanti
atk-s0510a:3499_2: punarapi taṃ nagaraṃ upecca upagamma sampattāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3502_1: Navamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato rādhattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3502_2: Taṃ sabbaṃ pāṭhānusārena nayānucintanena viññūhi suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0510a:3508_0: Pañcapaññāsamavagge paṭhamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3508_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3508_2: bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinno
atk-s0510a:3508_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mañjussarānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0510a:3508_5: anāgate ayaṃ bhikkhu viya ekassa buddhassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti paṇidhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3508_6: Bhagavā tassa anantarāyaṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3509_0: So yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā phussabhagavato kāle
atk-s0510a:3509_1: citrakokilo hutvā nibbatto rājuyyānato madhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ tuṇḍenādāya gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3509_3: Satthā tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:3509_5: Satthā tassa somanassuppādanatthaṃ tassa passantasseva taṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0510a:3509_6: Atha so kokilo pasannamānaso teneva pītisukhena sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0510a:3509_8: Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle vaḍḍhakikule nibbattetvā jeṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī hutvā pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3509_9: Parinibbute bhagavati tassa sarīradhātuyo nidahituṃ sattayojanappamāṇe thūpe āraddhe so āha –
atk-s0510a:3509_12: Iti appamāṇassa buddhassa orappamāṇaṃ cetiyaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0510a:3509_13: tena kammena nibbattaṭṭhāne aññehi hīnappamāṇo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3509_14: So amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā atirassatāya ca suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya sundarasarīratāya ca lakuṇḍakabhaddiyoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0510a:3509_15: So aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvā madhurena sarena paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0510a:3510_0: Athekasmiṃ ussavadivase ekena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ rathena gacchantī ekā gaṇikā theraṃ disvā dantavidaṃsakaṃ hasi.
atk-s0510a:3510_1: Thero tassā dantaṭṭhike nimittaṃ gahetvā jhānaṃ uppādetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmī ahosi,
atk-s0510a:3510_2: so abhiṇhaṃ kāyagatāya satiyā viharanto ekadivasaṃ āyasmatā dhammasenāpatinā ovadiyamāno anusāsiyamāno arahatte patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0510a:3510_3: Ekacce bhikkhū ca sāmaṇerā ca tassa arahattappattabhāvaṃ ajānanto kaṇṇesu gahetvā kaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0510a:3510_4: sīse bāhāya hatthapādādīsu vā gahetvā cāletvā kīḷantā viheṭhesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3510_8: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ “arahā”ti jānitvā na viheṭhesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3511_1: So arahā hutvā sañjātasomanasso attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3511_2: Mañjunābhinikūjahanti madhurena pemaniyena sarena abhinikūjiṃ saddaṃ nicchāresiṃ ahanti attho.
atk-s0510a:3514_1: Dutiyāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato kaṅkhārevatattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3514_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:3517_0: Tatiyāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato sīvalittherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3517_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3517_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto heṭṭhā vuttanayena vihāraṃ gantvā parisāya pariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0510a:3517_3: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0510a:3517_4: dasabalaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhasaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0510a:3517_5: iminā adhikārakammena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi,
atk-s0510a:3517_6: anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ahampi tumhehi so etadagge ṭhapitabhikkhu viya lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3517_7: Satthā tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā “ayaṃ te patthanā anāgate gotamassa buddhassa santike samijjhissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3517_8: So kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvā vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0510a:3517_9: kāle bandhumatīnagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ gāmake nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3517_10: tasmiṃ samaye bandhumatīnagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ sākacchitvā dasabalassa dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3518_0: Ekadivasaṃ sabbe ekato hutvā dānaṃ dentā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ dānagge natthī”ti olokentā madhuñca guḷadadhiñca nāddasaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3518_1: Te “yato kutoci āharissāmā”ti janapadato nagarapavisanamaggesu purise ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3518_2: Tadā esa kulaputto attano gāmato guḷadadhivārakaṃ gahetvā “kiñcideva āharissāmī”ti nagaraṃ gacchanto
atk-s0510a:3518_3: “mukhaṃ dhovitvā dhotahatthapādo pavisissāmī”ti phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento naṅgalasīsappamāṇaṃ nimmakkhikadaṇḍakamadhuṃ
atk-s0510a:3518_4: disvā “puññena me idaṃ uppanna”nti gahetvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0510a:3518_9: “Tena hi imaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā etaṃ madhuñca guḷadadhiñca dehī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3519_16: nagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhitvā vipassisammāsambuddhassa dānaṃ dentā idaṃ dvayaṃ dānagge apassantā maṃ pariyesāpenti.
atk-s0510a:3519_23: “Atthi pana koci nāgarānaṃ dāne ekadivasaṃ sahassaṃ dātā”ti? “Natthi, sammā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3519_28: ‘eko puriso imāni dve mūlena na deti,
atk-s0510a:3519_30: tumhe imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇā nibbitakkā hothā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3519_31: “Tvaṃ imasmiṃ dāne jeṭṭhakabhāgassa kāyasakkhī hohī”ti vatvā gato.
atk-s0510a:3519_32: So pana kulaputto gāmato paribbayatthaṃ gahitakahāpaṇena pañcakaṭukaṃ gahetvā cuṇṇaṃ katvā dadhito kañciyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3519_33: vāhetvā tattha madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷetvā pañcakaṭukacuṇṇena yojetvā paduminipatte pakkhipitvā taṃ saṃvidahitvā
atk-s0510a:3519_35: Mahājanehi āhariyamānassa sakkārassa antare attano pattavāraṃ olokento okāsaṃ ñatvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0510a:3519_38: Satthā tassānukampaṃ paṭicca catumahārājehi dattiyena selamayapattena taṃ paṭiggahetvā yathā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0510a:3520_0: So kulaputto niṭṭhitabhattakiccaṃ bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno āha –
atk-s0510a:3520_4: ahampi imassa nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave lābhaggayasaggappatto bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:3520_5: Satthā “evaṃ hotu kulaputtā”ti vatvā tassa ca nagaravāsīnañca bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3520_6: So kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde suppavāsāya rājadhītuyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0510a:3520_7: Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato paṭṭhāya sāyaṃ pātañca pañcapaṇṇākārasatāni suppavāsāya upanīyanti.
atk-s0510a:3520_8: Athassa sā puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ hatthena bījapacchiṃ phusāpentī aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3520_11: Koṭṭhapūraṇakālepissā koṭṭhadvāraṃ hatthena phusantiyā rājadhītāya puññena gaṇhantānaṃ gahitagahitaṃ puna pūrati.
atk-s0510a:3520_12: Paripuṇṇabhattakumbhitopi “rājadhītāya puñña”nti vatvā yassa kassaci dentā naṃ yāva na ukkaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0510a:3521_0: Gabbhe pana paripakke sattāhaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhosi.
atk-s0510a:3521_2: “pure maraṇā jīvamānā dānaṃ dassāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, sāmi,
atk-s0510a:3521_3: imaṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocetvā satthāraṃ nimantehi,
atk-s0510a:3521_5: taṃ sādhukaṃ upalakkhetvā āgantvā mayhaṃ kathehī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3521_6: So gantvā tassā sāsanaṃ satthu ārocesi –
atk-s0510a:3521_12: So taṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano gāmābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0510a:3521_13: Tassa pure āgamanāyeva suppavāsāya kucchito dhammakaraṇato udakaṃ viya gabbho nikkhami,
atk-s0510a:3521_14: parivāretvā nisinnajano assumukho rodituṃ āraddho haṭṭhatuṭṭhova tassā sāmikassa tuṭṭhisāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0510a:3521_17: So āgantvā satthu kathaṃ rājadhītāya kathesi.
atk-s0510a:3521_18: Rājadhītā tayā nimantitaṃ jīvabhattameva maṅgalabhattaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0510a:3521_22: So dārako ñātīnaṃ santattacittaṃ nibbāpento sītalabhāvaṃ kurumāno jātoti,
atk-s0510a:3521_24: So satta vassāni gabbhe vasitattā jātakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakammakkhamo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3521_25: Dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero sattame divase tena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpamakāsi.
atk-s0510a:3525_1: “kiṃ pana tayā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavitvā pabbajituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0510a:3525_4: Suppavāsā taṃ therena saddhiṃ kathentaṃ disvā –
atk-s0510a:3525_5: “kiṃ nu kho me putto dhammasenāpatinā kathetī”ti theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0510a:3525_12: Thero taṃ vihāraṃ netvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājento, “sīvali,
atk-s0510a:3525_18: So pana paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā oropitakkhaṇeyeva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0510a:3525_21: Sabbesaṃyeva kesānaṃ oropanañca arahattaphalasacchikiriyā ca apure apacchā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3526_1: “aho evaṃ puññavāpi thero sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni mātugabbhe vasitvā satta divasāni mūḷhagabbhe vasī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3526_8: iminā kulaputtena imāya jātiyā katakamma”nti vatvā atītaṃ āharitvā atīte,
atk-s0510a:3526_10: buddhuppādato puretarameva esa kulaputto bārāṇasiyaṃ rājakule nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:3526_11: pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhāya vibhavasampanno pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3526_12: Tadā eko paccantarājā “rajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti āgantvā nagaraṃ uparundhitvā khandhāvāraṃ kāretvā vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3526_13: Atha rājā mātuyā saddhiṃ samānacchando hutvā sattāhaṃ khandhāvāranagare catūsu disāsu dvāraṃ pidhāpesi,
atk-s0510a:3526_18: So tena kammavipākena narakādīsu dukkhamanubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājakule nibbattopi mātuyā saddhiṃ imaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhamanubhavi.
atk-s0510a:3526_19: Tassa pana pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccayā yadicchakaṃ uppajjanti.
atk-s0510a:3527_5: So pañcasate bhikkhū gahetvā himavantābhimukhaṃ gacchanto aṭavimaggaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0510a:3527_6: Tassa paṭhamaṃ diṭṭhanigrodhe adhivatthā devatā satta divasāni dānaṃ adāsi. Iti so –
atk-s0510a:3532_0: Sabbaṭṭhānesu satta satta divasāneva dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3532_1: Gandhamādanapabbate pana nāgadattadevarājā sattasu divasesu ekadivasaṃ khīrapiṇḍapātaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0510a:3532_4: imassa devarañño neva dhenuyo duyhamānā paññāyanti,
atk-s0510a:3532_7: kassapadasabalassa kāle khīrasalākabhattadānassetaṃ phala”nti devarājā āha.
atk-s0510a:3533_0: Aparabhāge satthā khadiravaniyarevatattherassa paccuggamanaṃ akāsi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0510a:3533_5: Bhagavā revatassa āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve vāre paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre yācito arahattappattabhāvaṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0510a:3533_11: Dasabalassa cārikatthāya gamanakāle ohiyyamānakabhikkhū nāma appakā honti,
atk-s0510a:3533_13: madhuradhammakathaṃ vā suṇissāmā”ti yebhuyyena gantukāmā bahutarāva honti.
atk-s0510a:3534_0: Athekasmiṃ padese ānandatthero dvedhāpathaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0510a:3534_5: Parihāramaggo pana saṭṭhiyojaniko khemo subhikkho”ti. “Ānanda, sīvali,
atk-s0510a:3534_9: Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sīvalittherassa puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0510a:3535_0: Maggaṃ abhiruhanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya devasaṅgho yojane yojane ṭhāne nagaraṃ māpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa vasanatthāya vihāre paṭiyādesi.
atk-s0510a:3535_1: Devaputtā raññā pesitakammakārā viya hutvā yāgukhajjakādīni gahetvā – “kahaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3535_3: Thero sakkārasammānaṃ gāhāpetvā satthu santikaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0510a:3535_5: Imināva niyāmena satthā sakkāraṃ anubhavanto devasikaṃ yojanaparamaṃ gantvā tiṃsayojanikaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma
atk-s0510a:3535_7: thero satthu āgamanaṃ ñatvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa pahonakavihāre dasabalassa
atk-s0510a:3535_8: gandhakuṭiṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni ca iddhiyā māpetvā tathāgatassa paccuggamanaṃ gato.
atk-s0510a:3535_10: Atha tathāgate gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhū vassaggena pattasenāsanāni pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3535_13: Iminā niyāmeneva tathāgatassa sakkārasammānaṃ anubhavantasseva addhamāso atikkanto.
atk-s0510a:3536_0: Athekacce ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhū ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā kathaṃ uppādayiṃsu –
atk-s0510a:3536_1: “dasabalo ‘mayhaṃ aggasāvakassa kaniṭṭhabhātā’ti vatvā evarūpaṃ navakammikaṃ bhikkhuṃ passituṃ āgato,
atk-s0510a:3536_2: imassa vihārassa santike jetavanavihāro vā veḷuvanavihārādayo vā kiṃ karissanti?
atk-s0510a:3536_6: “mayi idha ciraṃ vasante idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0510a:3536_10: Theropi ekakova caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya pāsāṇaphalake nisinno satthāraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā vandi.
atk-s0510a:3537_2: caṇḍānaṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ saddaṃ sutvā kiṃ karosī”ti?
atk-s0510a:3537_5: Satthā imasmiṃ ṭhāne revatattherassa pañcahi gāthāsatehi araññānisaṃsaṃ nāma kathetvā punadivase avidūraṭṭhāne

atk-s0510a:3705_14: Ettha ca “buddhassa puttomhī”tiādiṃ vadanto thero aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3706_0: Evaṃ pana attānaṃ jānāpetvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhena raññā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasabhojanassa
atk-s0510a:3706_1: pattaṃ pūretvā patte dinne gamanākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0510a:3706_9: Yāva ca mama putto imaṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0510a:3706_11: Thero bhattakiccaṃ katvā rañño ca parisāya ca dhammaṃ desetvā satthu āgamanato puretarameva rājanivesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3706_12: ratanattayaguṇesu abhippasannaṃ karonto sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva satthu āharitabbabhattapuṇṇaṃ pattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3706_13: ākāse vissajjetvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ upanetvā satthu hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3706_15: Evaṃ saṭṭhiyojanaṃ maggaṃ divase divase yojanaṃ gacchantassa bhagavato rājagehato bhattaṃ āharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3706_16: Bhagavā kamena kapilavatthunagaraṃ patvā punadivase rājavīthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0510a:3708_0: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
atk-s0510a:3709_0: “Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;
atk-s0510a:3710_0: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti. –
atk-s0510a:3711_2: Tato rājā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sakamandire bhojetvā sampavāretvā bhojanāvasāne dhammapālajātakaṃ
atk-s0510a:3711_4: Aparabhāge setacchattassa heṭṭhā nipannova arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0510a:3712_0: Tato bhagavā rāhulamātuyā bimbādeviyā pāsādaṃ gantvā tassā dhammaṃ desetvā sokaṃ vinodetvā candakinnarījātakadesanāya
atk-s0510a:3712_9: Taṃ bhagavā nigrodhārāmaṃ netvā “lokutaradāyajjaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0510a:3712_12: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kulappasādakānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷudāyī”ti theraṃ etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0510a:3713_1: Thero pattaetadaggaṭṭhāno attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādigāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3714_5: ekadivasampi bhattadānādinā katūpakārassa rajjampi dātuṃ samatthattā kataññū.
atk-s0510a:3714_6: Katavedīti kataṃ vindati anubhavati sampaṭicchatīti katavedī.
atk-s0510a:3714_7: Titthe yojeti pāṇineti sabbasatte nibbānapavesanupāye kusalapathe magge dhammadesanāya yojeti sampayojeti patiṭṭhāpetīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3717_0: Sattamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato abhayattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3717_1: Ayampi purimajinavaresu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vipaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3717_3: So vuddhimanvāya vedaṅgapārago sakaparasamayakusalo ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi thomesi.
atk-s0510a:3717_4: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyevaṃ saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:3717_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe bimbisārarañño putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3717_7: So vayappatto nigaṇṭhehi saddhiṃ vissāsiko hutvā caranto ekadivasaṃ nigaṇṭhena nāṭaputtena satthu vādāropanatthāya
atk-s0510a:3717_8: pesito nipuṇapañhaṃ pucchitvā nipuṇabyākaraṇaṃ sutvā pasanno satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānānurūpaṃ
atk-s0510a:3718_1: So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3721_0: Aṭṭhamāpadāne imamhi bhaddake kappetiādikaṃ āyasmato lomasakaṅgiyattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3721_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto kassapassa
atk-s0510a:3721_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbatto saddho pasanno ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3721_3: Aparo candano nāma tassa sahāyo cāsi.
atk-s0510a:3721_4: Te dvepi satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānasā pabbajitvā yāvajīvaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā suparisuddhasīlā
atk-s0510a:3721_5: tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasukhaṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3721_6: Tesu ayaṃ imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākiyakule nibbattitvā aparo candano devaputto hutvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:3721_7: Atha so sakyakulappasādakena kāḷudāyinā ārādhitena bhagavatā sakyarājūnaṃ mānamaddanāya kataṃ vessantaradhammadesanāyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3721_8: pokkharavassaiddhipāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā majjhimanikāye vuttaṃ bhaddekarattasuttantadesanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3721_9: sutvā araññavāsaṃ vasanto bhaddekarattasuttantadesanānusāsanaṃ saritvā tadanusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3722_1: Arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā sañjātasomanasso pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento imamhi bhaddake kappetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3722_7: Tesu yasmiṃ kappe eko buddho uppajjati,
atk-s0510a:3722_9: Yasmiṃ dve vā tayo vā buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0510a:3725_0: “Eko dve tayo cattāro, pañca buddhā yathākkamaṃ;
atk-s0510a:3727_1: Tesu ayaṃ kappo “kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapo gotamo metteyyo”ti pañcabuddhapaṭimaṇḍitattā bhaddakappo nāma jāto.
atk-s0510a:3728_0: Tasmā imasmiṃ bhaddakappamhi kassapo nāyako uppajjīti sambandho. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3731_0: Navamāpadāne imamhi bhaddake kappetiādikaṃ āyasmato vanavacchattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3731_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto kassapassa
atk-s0510a:3731_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhājāto pabbajitvā parisuddhaṃ
atk-s0510a:3731_3: brahmacariyaṃ caritvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0510a:3731_4: tato cuto araññāyatane bhikkhūnaṃ samīpe kapotayoniyaṃ nibbatto.
atk-s0510a:3731_5: Tesu mettacitto dhammaṃ sutvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:3731_6: Tassa mātukucchigatakāleyeva mātu dohaḷo udapādi vane vasituṃ vane vijāyituṃ.
atk-s0510a:3731_7: Tato icchānurūpavasena vane vasantiyā gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3731_10: rājā taṃ kumāraṃ āharāpetvā saheva posesi.
atk-s0510a:3731_11: Atha bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā chabbasāni dukkarakārikaṃ katvā buddhe jāte
atk-s0510a:3731_12: so mahākassapassa santikaṃ gantvā tassovāde pasanno tassa santikā buddhuppādabhāvaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:3731_13: gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño arahā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3732_1: So arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento imamhi bhaddake kappetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3732_2: Tattha brahmabandhu mahāyasoti ettha brāhmaṇānaṃ bandhu ñātakoti brāhmaṇabandhūti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ “brahmabandhū”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3735_0: Dasamāpadāne imamhi bhaddake kappetiādikaṃ āyasmato sugandhattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3735_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0510a:3735_2: bārāṇasiyaṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sabbadā namassamāno
atk-s0510a:3735_3: mahādānaṃ dadamāno māsassa sattakkhattuṃ bhagavato gandhakuṭiyā catujjātigandhena vilimpesi.
atk-s0510a:3735_4: “Mama nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīrato sugandhagandho nibbattatū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3735_6: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā puññāni karonto tato cuto devaloke nibbatto kāmāvacaralokaṃ sarīragandhena sugandhaṃ kurumāno sugandhadevaputtoti pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3735_7: So devalokasampattiyo anubhavitvā tato cuto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mahābhogakule nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3735_8: tassa mātukucchigatasseva mātuyā sarīragandhena sakalagehaṃ sakalanagarañca sugandhena ekagandhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0510a:3735_9: jātakkhaṇe sakalaṃ sāvatthinagaraṃ sugandhakaraṇḍako viya ahosi,
atk-s0510a:3735_12: Tadā satthā sāvatthiyaṃ patvā jetavanamahāvihāraṃ paṭiggahesi,
atk-s0510a:3735_13: taṃ disvā pasannamānaso bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3735_14: Tassa uppannadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva parinibbānā etthantare nipannaṭṭhānādīsu sugandhameva vāyi.
atk-s0510a:3736_1: Sopi thero arahattaṃ patvā attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento imamhi bhaddake kappetiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3736_2: Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyameva,
atk-s0510a:3741_0: Chappaññāsame vagge paṭhamāpadāne mahāsamuddaṃ oggayhātiādikaṃ āyasmato yasattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3741_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0510a:3741_2: bhagavato kāle mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ attano bhavanaṃ netvā mahādānaṃ
atk-s0510a:3741_5: ekekañca bhikkhuṃ mahaggheneva paccekadussayugena sabbena ca samaṇaparikkhārena.
atk-s0510a:3741_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle seṭṭhiputto hutvā mahābodhimaṇḍalaṃ sattahi ratanehi pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3741_7: Kassapassa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3741_8: Evaṃ so sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā
atk-s0510a:3741_9: sujātāya bhagavato khīrapāyāsaṃ dinnāya seṭṭhidhītāya kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3741_15: So vassike pāsāde vassike cattāro māse nippurisehi tūriyehi paricārayamāno vasati,
atk-s0510a:3741_17: Hemantike pāsāde cattāro māse suphusitavātapānakavāṭe tattheva paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:3741_18: Gimhike pāsāde bahukavāṭavātapānajālāhi sampanne tattheva vasati.
atk-s0510a:3741_20: Simbalitulādipuṇṇasabhāve attharitvā tattha upadhānāni kiccāni karoti.
atk-s0510a:3741_21: Evaṃ devaloke devakumāro viya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitassa samaṅgībhūtassa paricārayamānassa paṭikacceva niddā okkami,
atk-s0510a:3741_24: Atha kho yaso kulaputto paṭikacceva pabujjhitvā addasa sakaṃ parijanaṃ supantaṃ aññissā kacche vīṇaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3741_32: Atha kho yaso kulaputto udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0510a:3742_0: Atha kho yaso kulaputto suvaṇṇapādukāyo ārohitvā yena nivesanadvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a:3742_2: “mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3742_3: Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena nagaradvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a:3742_5: “mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3742_6: Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena isipatanaṃ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0510a:3743_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati,
atk-s0510a:3743_1: addasā kho bhagavā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3743_2: disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:3743_3: Atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavato avidūre udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0510a:3743_6: Atha kho bhagavā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3743_13: idaṃ anupassaṭṭha”nti haṭṭho udaggo suvaṇṇapādukāhi orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0510a:3743_15: ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho yasassa kulaputtassa bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0510a:3743_17: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0510a:3743_18: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ kallacittaṃ muducittaṃ vinīvaraṇacittaṃ udaggacittaṃ pasannacittaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3743_20: taṃ pakāsesi dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ maggaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3743_21: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya,
atk-s0510a:3743_22: evameva yasassa kulaputtassa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi –
atk-s0510a:3744_0: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa mātā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ apassantī yena seṭṭhi gahapati tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3744_2: “putto te gahapati yaso na dissatī”ti. Atha kho,
atk-s0510a:3744_4: catuddisā assadūte uyyojetvā sāmaṃyeva yena isipatanaṃ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0510a:3744_9: Addasā kho bhagavā seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3744_12: yathā seṭṭhi gahapati idha nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ na passeyyā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3744_13: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharesi.
atk-s0510a:3744_14: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3744_18: appeva nāma idha nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passeyyāsīti.
atk-s0510a:3744_19: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati “idheva kirāhaṃ nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passissāmī”ti haṭṭho udaggo bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0510a:3744_20: ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho seṭṭhissa gahapatissa bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi…pe…
atk-s0510a:3744_26: paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya,
atk-s0510a:3744_27: andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti,
atk-s0510a:3744_28: evamevaṃ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito. Esāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3744_30: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata”nti.
atk-s0510a:3744_31: Sova loke paṭhamaṃ upāsako ahosi tevāciko.
atk-s0510a:3745_0: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamāne yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āyavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-s0510a:3745_2: “yasassa kho kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamāne yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3745_3: abhabbo kho yaso kulaputto hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṃ,
atk-s0510a:3745_6: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhesi.
atk-s0510a:3745_7: Addasā kho seṭṭhi gahapati yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ nisinnaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3745_12: Atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavantaṃ ullokesi.
atk-s0510a:3745_13: Atha kho bhagavā seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3745_15: yassa sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho vidito seyyathāpi tayā,
atk-s0510a:3745_16: tassa yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3745_18: hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṃ seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto”ti?
atk-s0510a:3745_21: kulaputtassa sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho vidito seyyathāpi tayā,
atk-s0510a:3745_22: tassa yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3745_24: yaso kulaputto hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṃ seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto”ti. “Lābhā, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3745_28: yathā yasassa kulaputtassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3745_34: bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3745_35: Atha kho yaso kulaputto acirapakkante seṭṭhimhi gahapatimhi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3746_1: Arahā pana hutvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento mahāsamuddaṃ oggayhātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3746_2: Tattha samuddanti aṅgulimuddāya saṃ suṭṭhu dassetabbato samuddo,
atk-s0510a:3746_3: atha vā saṃ suṭṭhu udiyati khobhiyati pasodhiyati ghosanaṃ karonto āluḷiyatīti samuddo,
atk-s0510a:3746_4: mahanto ca so samuddo cāti mahāsamuddo,
atk-s0510a:3746_6: Oggayhāti ajjhogāhetvā abbhantaraṃ pavisitvā tassa mahāsamuddassa anto pavisitvā,
atk-s0510a:3746_8: Bhavanaṃ me sumāpitanti ettha bhavanti nibbattanti nivasanti catūhi iriyāpathehi vāsaṃ kappenti etthāti bhavanaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3746_9: mayhaṃ taṃ bhavanaṃ taṃ vimānaṃ taṃ pāsādaṃ pañcapākārakūṭāgārehi saṃ suṭṭhu māpitaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0510a:3746_11: Sunimmitā pokkharaṇīti sumahantā hutvā bhūtā itā gatā pavattā khaṇitā katāti pokkharaṇī,
atk-s0510a:3746_13: Cakkavākūpakūjitāti cakkavākakukkuṭahaṃsādīhi kūjitā ghositā nāditā sā pokkharaṇīti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3746_14: Ito paraṃ nadīvanadvipadacatuppadapādapapakkhīnaṃ vaṇṇañca sumedhassa bhagavato dassanañca nimantetvā
atk-s0510a:3747_1: kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātassa lokassa āhutiṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ paṭiggaṇhātīti lokāhutipaṭiggahaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3750_0: Dutiyāpadāne padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato nadīkassapattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3750_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3750_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3750_3: attanā ropitassa ambarukkhassa paṭhamuppannaṃ manosilāvaṇṇaṃ ekaṃ ambaphalaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3750_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0510a:3750_5: bhātā hutvā nibbatto vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ anicchanto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3750_6: tīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre assamaṃ māpetvā viharati.
atk-s0510a:3750_7: Nadītīre vasanato kassapagottatāya ca nadīkassapoti samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3750_8: Tassa bhagavā saparisassa ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3750_9: So bhagavato gayāsīse ādittapariyāya desanāya arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3751_1: satthā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ pabbājetvā uruvelāyaṃ tayo bhātikajaṭile dametuṃ yena uruvelā tadavasari.
atk-s0510a:3751_2: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelāyaṃ tayo jaṭilā paṭivasanti uruvelakassapo nadīkassapo gayākassapoti,
atk-s0510a:3751_3: tesu uruvelakassapo jaṭilo pañcannaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho,
atk-s0510a:3751_4: nadīkassapo jaṭilo tiṇṇaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho,
atk-s0510a:3751_5: gayākassapo jaṭilo dvinnaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako hoti vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho.
atk-s0510a:3751_6: Atha kho bhagavā yena uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3751_7: upasaṅkamitvā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca – “sace te, kassapa, agaru,
atk-s0510a:3751_13: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca…pe…
atk-s0510a:3751_21: Atha kho bhagavā agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññapetvā nisīdi pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
atk-s0510a:3752_0: Addasā kho so nāgo bhagavantaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3752_3: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imassa nāgassa anupahacca chaviñca cammañca maṃsañca nhāruñca aṭṭhiñca aṭṭhimiñjañca tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyeyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:3752_4: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā padhūpāyi.
atk-s0510a:3752_5: Atha kho so nāgo makkhaṃ asahamāno pajjali.
atk-s0510a:3752_7: Ubhinnaṃ sajotibhūtānaṃ agyāgāraṃ ādittaṃ viya hoti sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3752_8: Atha kho te jaṭilā agyāgāraṃ parivāretvā evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0510a:3752_11: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena tassa nāgassa anupahacca chaviñca cammañca maṃsañca nhāruñca
atk-s0510a:3752_12: aṭṭhiñca aṭṭhimiñjañca tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyitvā patte pakkhipitvā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa dassesi – “ayaṃ te, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3752_16: yatra hi nāma caṇḍassa nāgarājassa iddhimato āsivisassa ghoravisassa tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyissati,
atk-s0510a:3752_17: na tveva kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3754_0: Sace te kassapa agaru, viharemu ajjaṇho aggisālamhī”ti.
atk-s0510a:3755_0: “Na kho me mahāsamaṇa garu, phāsukāmova taṃ nivāremi;
atk-s0510a:3758_0: “Appeva maṃ na viheṭheyya, iṅgha tvaṃ kassapa anujānāhi agyāgāranti;
atk-s0510a:3759_0: Dinnanti naṃ viditvā, abhīto pāvisi bhayamatīto.
atk-s0510a:3766_0: Udicchare jaṭilā, abhirūpo vata bho mahāsamaṇo;
atk-s0510a:3768_0: “Atha tassā rattiyā accayena, hatā nāgassa acciyo honti;
atk-s0510a:3769_0: Iddhimato pana ṭhitā, anekavaṇṇā acciyo honti.
atk-s0510a:3773_0: Ayaṃ te kassapa nāgo, pariyādinno assa tejasā tejo”ti.
atk-s0510a:3774_0: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavato iminā iddhipāṭihāriyena abhippasanno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “idheva,
atk-s0510a:3776_0: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa assamassa avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3776_1: Atha kho cattāro mahārājāno abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
atk-s0510a:3776_2: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā catuddisā aṭṭhaṃsu seyyathāpi mahantā aggikkhandhā.
atk-s0510a:3776_3: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3776_9: abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena tvaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
atk-s0510a:3776_10: upasaṅkamitvā taṃ abhivādetvā catuddisā aṭṭhaṃsu seyyathāpi mahantā aggikkhandhā”ti. Ete kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3776_14: yatra hi nāma cattāropi mahārājāno upasaṅkamissanti dhammassavanāya,
atk-s0510a:3776_15: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3776_16: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3778_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3778_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
atk-s0510a:3778_2: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3778_8: abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena tvaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3778_9: upasaṅkamitvā taṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti. Eso kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3778_13: yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo upasaṅkamissati dhammassavanāya,
atk-s0510a:3778_14: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3778_15: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3780_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3780_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
atk-s0510a:3780_2: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3780_8: abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena tvaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3780_9: upasaṅkamitvā taṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti. Eso kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3780_13: yatra hi nāma brahmāpi sahampati upasaṅkamissati dhammassavanāya,
atk-s0510a:3780_14: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3780_15: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3782_0: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-s0510a:3782_1: kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamitukāmā honti.
atk-s0510a:3782_4: kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamissanti,
atk-s0510a:3782_9: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya uttarakuruṃ gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0510a:3782_10: āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3782_11: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3782_20: khādanīyassa ca bhojanīyassa ca te paṭivīso ṭhapito”ti. Nanu te, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3782_22: “etarahi kho me mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamissanti,
atk-s0510a:3782_28: tava cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya uttarakuruṃ gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṃ akāsinti.
atk-s0510a:3782_31: yatra hi nāma cetasāpi cittaṃ pajānissati,
atk-s0510a:3782_32: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3782_33: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3784_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
atk-s0510a:3784_3: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_8: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_13: Atha kho kakudhe adhivatthā devatā bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya sākhaṃ onāmesi – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_18: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_21: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3784_27: nāyaṃ pubbe idha pokkharaṇī sāyaṃ idha pokkharaṇī,
atk-s0510a:3784_31: sāyaṃ sākhā onatā”ti? Idha me, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3784_35: “kattha nu kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhoveyya”nti? Atha kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3784_36: sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇitvā maṃ etadavoca – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_42: “kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ parimaddeyya”nti? Atha kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3784_43: sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_49: “kimhi nu kho ahaṃ ālambitvā uttareyya”nti? Atha kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3784_50: kakudhe adhivatthā devatā mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya sākhaṃ onāmesi – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_56: “kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ vissajjeyya”nti? Atha kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3784_57: sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi – “idha,
atk-s0510a:3784_63: yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo veyyāvaccaṃ karissati,
atk-s0510a:3784_64: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3784_65: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3785_0: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3785_5: āyāmaha”nti uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā jambudīpo paññāyati,
atk-s0510a:3785_6: tato phalaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:3785_7: Addasā kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ agyāgāre nisinnaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3785_13: so tvaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno”ti? “Idhāhaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3785_14: taṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā jambudīpo paññāyati,
atk-s0510a:3785_15: tato phalaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno. Idaṃ kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3785_23: yatra hi nāma maṃ paṭhamataraṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā jambudīpo paññāyati,
atk-s0510a:3785_24: tato phalaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdissati,
atk-s0510a:3785_25: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3785_26: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0510a:3786_0: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3786_5: āyāmaha”nti uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā jambudīpo paññāyati,
atk-s0510a:3786_9: tāvatiṃsaṃ gantvā pāricchattakapupphaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:3786_10: Addasā kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ agyāgāre nisinnaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3786_16: so tvaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno”ti? “Idhāhaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3786_17: taṃ uyyojetvā tāvatiṃsaṃ gantvā pāricchattakapupphaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno. Idaṃ kho, kassapa,
atk-s0510a:3786_25: yatra hi nāma maṃ paṭhamataraṃ uyyojetvā tāvatiṃsaṃ gantvā pāricchattakapupphaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdissati,
atk-s0510a:3786_26: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3787_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritukāmā na sakkonti kaṭṭhāni phāletuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3787_2: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo yathā mayaṃ na sakkoma kaṭṭhāni phāletu”nti.
atk-s0510a:3787_3: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3787_12: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3788_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritukāmā na sakkonti aggiṃ ujjaletuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3788_2: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo yathā mayaṃ na sakkoma aggiṃ ujjaletu”nti.
atk-s0510a:3788_3: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3788_11: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3789_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritvā na sakkonti aggiṃ vijjhāpetuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3789_2: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo yathā mayaṃ na sakkoma aggiṃ vijjhāpetu”nti.
atk-s0510a:3789_3: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3789_11: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3790_0: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā sītāsu hemantikāsu rattīsu antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamaye najjā nerañjarāya
atk-s0510a:3790_2: Atha kho bhagavā pañcamattāni mandāmukhisatāni abhinimmini yattha te jaṭilā uttaritvā visibbesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3790_4: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo yathayimā mandāmukhiyo nimmitā”ti.
atk-s0510a:3790_7: yatra hi nāma tāva bahū mandāmukhiyopi abhinimminissati,
atk-s0510a:3790_8: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3791_0: Tena kho pana samayena mahā akālamegho pāvassi,
atk-s0510a:3791_2: yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati so padeso udakena na otthaṭo hoti.
atk-s0510a:3791_4: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkameyya”nti.
atk-s0510a:3791_5: Atha kho bhagavā samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkami.
atk-s0510a:3791_6: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo “māheva kho mahāsamaṇo udakena vūḷho ahosī”ti nāvāya sambahulehi jaṭilehi saddhiṃ yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati,
atk-s0510a:3791_8: Addasā kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkamantaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3791_13: kassapā”ti bhagavā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā nāvāya paccuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3791_16: yatra hi nāma udakampi na pavāhissati,
atk-s0510a:3791_17: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha”nti.
atk-s0510a:3792_1: “cirampi kho imassa moghapurisassa evaṃ bhavissati ‘mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo,
atk-s0510a:3792_2: na tveva ca kho arahā yathā aha’nti,
atk-s0510a:3792_4: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3792_8: yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assasi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti.
atk-s0510a:3792_9: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0510a:3792_14: pañcannaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho,
atk-s0510a:3792_18: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo yena te jaṭilā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3792_27: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
atk-s0510a:3792_28: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ –
atk-s0510a:3793_0: Addasā kho nadīkassapo jaṭilo kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake vuyhamāne,
atk-s0510a:3793_5: sāmañca tīhi jaṭilasatehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā uruvelakassapo tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3793_9: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
atk-s0510a:3793_10: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ –
atk-s0510a:3794_0: Addasā kho gayākassapo jaṭilo kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake vuyhamāne,
atk-s0510a:3794_5: sāmañca dvīhi jaṭilasatehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā uruvelakassapo tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0510a:3794_9: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
atk-s0510a:3794_10: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ –
atk-s0510a:3796_0: “Atha kho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena gayāsīsaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0510a:3796_2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati gayāsīse saddhiṃ bhikkhusahassena.
atk-s0510a:3796_11: yamidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3796_14: jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi?
atk-s0510a:3796_27: yamidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3796_30: jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi āditta”’nti vadāmi.
atk-s0510a:3797_6: yamidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
atk-s0510a:3797_19: yamidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
atk-s0510a:3798_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3799_1: Evaṃ ādittapariyāyadesanaṃ sutvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ sampatto nadīkassapo thero somanassajāto
atk-s0510a:3802_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃsakappe
atk-s0510a:3802_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbatto viññutaṃ patto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3802_3: pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṃ māpetvā vanamūlaphalāhāro vasati.
atk-s0510a:3802_4: Tena ca samayena bhagavā eko adutiyo tassa assamasamīpenāgacchi,
atk-s0510a:3802_5: so bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito velaṃ olokento manoharāni kolaphalāni satthu upanesi.
atk-s0510a:3802_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0510a:3802_7: nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā dvīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ gayāya viharati.
atk-s0510a:3802_8: Gayāya vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca gayākassapoti samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3802_9: So bhagavato saddhiṃ parisāya ehibhikkhūpasampadaṃ datvā nadīkassapassa vuttanayena ādittapariyāya desanāya ovadiyamāno arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3803_1: So arahattaṃ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento ajinacammavatthohantiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3803_5: Kolaṃ ahāsi assamanti kolaphalaṃ assame pūretvā assame nisinnoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3803_6: Agopayinti pāṭhe kolaphalaṃ pariyesitvā assamaṃ gopesiṃ rakkhinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3806_0: Catutthāpadāne nibbute kakusandhamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato kimilattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3806_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto kakusandhassa
atk-s0510a:3806_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto parinibbute satthari tassa dhātuyo uddissa salalamālāhi
atk-s0510a:3806_4: So tena puññakammena tāvatiṃsesu uppajjitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare
atk-s0510a:3806_5: sakyarājakule nibbattitvā kimiloti tassa nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3806_7: Tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā saṃvegajananatthaṃ anupiyāyaṃ viharanto satthā paṭhamayobbane ṭhitaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0510a:3806_8: itthirūpaṃ abhinimminitvā purato dassetvā puna anukkamena yathā jarārogavipattīhi abhibhūtā dissati,
atk-s0510a:3806_10: Taṃ disvā kimilakumāro ativiya saṃvegajāto attano saṃvegaṃ pakāsento bhagavato pākaṭaṃ katvā laddhānusāsano arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3807_1: So arahattaṃ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute kakusandhamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3807_2: Brāhmaṇamhi vusīmatīti pañcahi vasitāhi vasippattamhi bhagavati.
atk-s0510a:3807_3: Brāhmaṇassa sabbaguṇagaṇehi maṇḍitattā abhivūḷhītattā brāhmaṇamhi kakusandhe bhagavati parinibbuteti attho.
atk-s0510a:3810_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito catunavutikappe
atk-s0510a:3810_2: ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ bhikkhāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kadaliphalāni adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3810_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ licchavirājakumāro hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3810_5: So daharo hutvā hatthisippādisikkhanakālepi hetusampannatāya nissaraṇajjhāsayova hutvā vicaranto satthu
atk-s0510a:3810_6: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ katvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3810_7: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā aparabhāge aciraparinibbute satthari dhammaṃ saṅgāyituṃ saṅketaṃ katvā mahātheresu
atk-s0510a:3810_8: tattha tattha viharantesu ekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sekhaṃyeva samānaṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ
atk-s0510a:3810_9: dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā tassa uparimaggādhigamāya ussāhaṃ janento –
atk-s0510a:3812_0: Jhāya gotama mā ca pamādo, kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī”ti. – gāthaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0510a:3813_5: tesu rukkhamūlaggahaṇena ṭhānassa chāyāya sampannatāya vātātapaparissayābhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0510a:3813_9: Nibbānaṃ hadayasmiṃ opiyāti “evaṃ mayā paṭipajjitvā nibbānaṃ adhigantabba”nti nibbutiṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā citte katvā.
atk-s0510a:3813_13: Mā ca pamādoti adhikusalesu dhammesu mā pamādaṃ āpajji.
atk-s0510a:3813_15: taṃ paṭikkhepavasena dassento “kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0510a:3813_19: Kiṃ te karissatīti kīdisaṃ atthaṃ tuyhaṃ sādhessati,
atk-s0510a:3813_20: tasmā janapaññattiṃ pahāya sadatthapasuto hohīti ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0510a:3814_0: Taṃ sutvā aññehi vuttena vissagandhavāyanavacanena saṃvegajāto bahudeva rattiṃ caṅkamena vītināmento
atk-s0510a:3814_1: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisinnamattova “kiñci sayāmī”ti sīsaṃ bimbohanamasampattaṃ
atk-s0510a:3814_2: pādaṃ bhūmito uggataṃ sarīrassa ākāsagatakkhaṇeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3815_1: Vajjiputtatthero aparabhāge somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sahassaraṃsī bhagavātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3815_2: Tattha sahassaraṃsīti ettha “anekasatasahassaraṃsī”ti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ “sahassaraṃsī”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3818_0: Chaṭṭhāpadāne sumedho nāma sambuddhotiādikaṃ āyasmato uttarasāmaṇerassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3818_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0510a:3818_2: bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena vicarati.
atk-s0510a:3818_3: Tena ca samayena satthā tasseva anuggaṇhanatthaṃ vanantare aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjento.
atk-s0510a:3818_4: So antalikkhena gacchanto bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ākāsato oruyha suvisuddhehi vipulehi kaṇikārapupphehi bhagavantaṃ pūjesi,
atk-s0510a:3818_5: pupphāni buddhānubhāvena satthu upari chattākārena aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0510a:3818_6: so tena bhiyyosomattāya pasannacitto hutvā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0510a:3818_7: anubhavanto yāvatāyukaṃ tattha ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0510a:3818_10: So viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gantvā jātiyā rūpena vijjāya vayena sīlācārena ca lokassa sambhāvanīyo jāto.
atk-s0510a:3819_0: Tassa taṃ sampattiṃ disvā vassakāro magadhamahāmatto attano dhītaraṃ dātukāmo hutvā attano adhippāyaṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0510a:3819_1: So nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya taṃ paṭikkhipitvā kālena kālaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ payirupāsanto tassa santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3819_2: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vattasampanno hutvā theraṃ upaṭṭhahati.
atk-s0510a:3820_0: Tena ca samayena therassa aññataro ābādho uppanno,
atk-s0510a:3820_1: tassa bhesajjatthāya uttaro sāmaṇero pātova pattacīvaramādāya vihārato nikkhanto antarāmagge taḷākassa
atk-s0510a:3820_2: samīpe pattaṃ ṭhapetvā udakasamīpaṃ gantvā mukhaṃ dhovati.
atk-s0510a:3820_3: Atha aññataro umaṅgacoro katakammo ārakkhapurisehi anubaddho aggamaggena nagarato nikkhamitvā palāyanto
atk-s0510a:3820_4: attanā gahitaṃ ratanabhaṇḍitaṃ sāmaṇerassa patte pakkhipitvā palāyi.
atk-s0510a:3820_6: Coraṃ anubandhantā rājapurisā sāmaṇerassa patte bhaṇḍikaṃ disvā “ayaṃ coro,
atk-s0510a:3820_7: iminā coriyaṃ kata”nti sāmaṇeraṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vassakārassa brāhmaṇassa dassesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3820_8: Vassakāro ca tadā rañño vinicchaye niyutto hutvā chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsati,
atk-s0510a:3820_10: suddhapāsaṇḍiyesu pabbajī”ti kammaṃ asodhetvā ghātukāmattāva jīvantameva taṃ sūle uttāsesi.
atk-s0510a:3821_0: Athassa bhagavā ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā vipphurantahatthanakhamaṇimayūkhasambhinnasitābhatāya
atk-s0510a:3821_4: tattha tayā paccavekkhaṇabalena adhivāsanā kātabbā”ti vatvā ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0510a:3821_5: Uttaro amatābhisekasadisena satthu hatthasamphassena sañjātappasādasomanassatāya uḷārapītipāmojjaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0510a:3821_6: yathāparicitaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ samārūḷho ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā satthu ca desanāvilāsena tāvadeva
atk-s0510a:3821_7: maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbe kilese khepetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3821_8: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā sūlato uṭṭhahitvā parānuddayāya ākāse ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0510a:3821_12: tādisadukkhaṃ anubhavanto kathaṃ tvaṃ vipassanaṃ anuyuñjituṃ asakkhī”ti puṭṭho,
atk-s0510a:3821_16: evāhaṃ tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantopi asakkhiṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ adhigantu”nti āha.
atk-s0510a:3821_17: “Pubbajātiyā daharakāle makkhikaṃ gahetvā nimbasūlakaṃ gahetvā sūlāropanakīḷaṃ paṭicca evaṃ anekajātisatesu
atk-s0510a:3821_18: sūlāropanadukkhamanubhavitvā imāya pariyosānajātiyā evarūpaṃ dukkhamanubhūta”nti āha.
atk-s0510a:3822_1: Atha aparabhāge pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento sumedho nāma sambuddhotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3823_1: Vijjādharo tadā āsinti bāhirakamantādivijjāsiddhiyā ākāsagāmisamattho hutvā caraṇavasena taṃ vijjaṃ rakkhitvā
atk-s0510a:3823_2: avināsetvā pariharaṇavasena vijjādharayoni āsiṃ ahosinti attho.
atk-s0510a:3823_3: Antalikkhacaro ahanti antaṃ pariyosānaṃ koṭiṃ likhate saṃkarissatīti antalikkhaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3823_4: Atha vā antaṃ pariyosānaṃ likhyate olokiyate etenāti antalikkhaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3823_10: koṭṭanaghaṃsanamaddanapaharaṇavasena suṭṭhu kataṃ sūlāvudhaṃ gayha gahetvā ambarato gacchāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3823_11: Sesaṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattāva nayānuyogena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3826_0: Sattamāpadāne nibbute lokanāthamhītiādikaṃ āyasmato aparassa uttarattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3826_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto ito catunnavutikappe
atk-s0510a:3826_2: siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto viññutaṃ patvā sāsane laddhappasādo hutvā
atk-s0510a:3826_4: So satthari parinibbute attano ñātake sannipātetvā bahupūjāsakkāraṃ saṃharitvā dhātupūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3826_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākete brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā uttaroti
atk-s0510a:3826_6: laddhanāmo vayappatto kenacideva karaṇīyena sāvatthiṃ gato kaṇḍambamūle kataṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā
atk-s0510a:3826_7: pasīditvā puna kāḷakārāmasuttadesanāya abhivaḍḍhamānasaddho pabbajitvā satthārā saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ gantvā
atk-s0510a:3826_8: upasampadaṃ labhitvā tatheva caranto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3826_9: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā satthari sāvatthiyaṃ viharante buddhupaṭṭhānatthaṃ rājagahato sāvatthiṃ upagato bhikkhūhi – “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0510a:3826_10: pabbajjākiccaṃ tayā matthakaṃ pāpita”nti puṭṭho aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3827_1: Arahattaṃ pana patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento nibbute lokanāthamhītiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3830_0: Aṭṭhamāpadāne ogayhāhaṃ pokkharaṇintiādikaṃ āyasmato bhaddajittherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3830_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3830_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu pāraṃ gantvā kāme pahāya
atk-s0510a:3830_3: tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṃ kāretvā vasanto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ
atk-s0510a:3830_5: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ disvā ākāsato otari.
atk-s0510a:3830_6: Otiṇṇassa pana bhagavato madhuñca bhisamuḷālañca sappikhīrañca upanāmesi,
atk-s0510a:3830_7: tassa taṃ bhagavā anukammaṃ upādāya paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3830_8: So tena puññakammena tusitesu nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto
atk-s0510a:3830_9: vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahaddhano seṭṭhi hutvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassaṃ bhojetvā ticīvarena
atk-s0510a:3831_0: Evaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:3831_1: Tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā manussalokesu uppanno buddhasuññe loke pañca paccekabuddhasatāni
atk-s0510a:3831_2: catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahitvā tato cuto rājakule nibbattitvā rajjaṃ anusāsanto attano puttaṃ paccekabodhiṃ
atk-s0510a:3831_3: adhigantvā ṭhitaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā tassa parinibbutassa dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ katvā pūjesi.
atk-s0510a:3831_4: Evaṃ tattha tattha tāni tāni puññāni katvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhaddiyanagare asītikoṭivibhavassa bhaddiyaseṭṭhissa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0510a:3831_6: Tassa kira issariyabhogaparivārasampatti carimabhave bodhisattassa viya ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3832_0: Tadā satthā sāvatthiyaṃ vasitvā bhaddajikumāraṃ saṅgaṇhanatthāya mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ bhaddiyanagaraṃ
atk-s0510a:3832_1: gantvā jātiyāvane vasi tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0510a:3832_2: Sopi uparipāsāde nisinno sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokento bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sotuṃ gacchantaṃ mahājanaṃ disvā,
atk-s0510a:3832_3: “katthāyaṃ mahājano gacchatī”ti pucchitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā sayampi mahatā parivārena satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0510a:3832_4: gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitova sabbakilese khepetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3832_5: Arahatte pana tena adhigate satthā bhaddiyaseṭṭhiṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0510a:3832_6: “tava putto alaṅkatapaṭiyatto dhammaṃ suṇanto arahatte patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0510a:3832_10: Seṭṭhi “na mayhaṃ puttassa daharasseva sato parinibbānena kiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0510a:3832_12: Taṃ satthā pabbājetvā upasampādetvā tattha sattāhaṃ vasitvā koṭigāmaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0510a:3832_14: Koṭigāmavāsino ca buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-s0510a:3832_15: Bhaddajitthero satthārā anumodanāya āraddhamattāya bahigāmaṃ gantvā “gaṅgātīre maggasamīpe satthu āgatakāle
atk-s0510a:3832_16: vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti kālaparicchedaṃ katvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0510a:3832_17: Mahātheresu āgacchantesupi avuṭṭhahitvā satthu āgatakāleyeva vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3832_20: mahātheresu āgacchantesu mānathaddho hutvā na vuṭṭhāsī”ti ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3833_0: Koṭigāmavāsino satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bahū nāvāsaṅghāṭe bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3833_1: Satthā “bhaddajissānubhāvaṃ pakāsemī”ti nāvāya ṭhatvā “kahaṃ bhaddajī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0510a:3833_3: bhante”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā añjaliṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0510a:3833_13: Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero satthāraṃ vanditvā iddhibalena gantvā pāsādathūpikaṃ pādaṅgulantarena sannirujjhitvā
atk-s0510a:3833_16: Athassa purimabhave ñātakā pāsādagatena lobhena macchakacchapamaṇḍūkā hutvā nibbattā tasmiṃ pāsāde uṭṭhahante parivattitvā patiṃsu.
atk-s0510a:3833_17: Satthā te sampatante disvā “ñātakā te, bhaddaji,
atk-s0510a:3833_22: bhaddajittherena ayaṃ pāsādo ajjhāvuṭṭho”ti puṭṭho mahāpanādajātakaṃ kathetvā bahujanaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0510a:3834_1: Thero pana arahattaṃ patto pubbasambhāraṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsetuṃ ogayhāhaṃ pokkharaṇintiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3834_2: Tattha ogayhāhaṃ pokkharaṇinti puthunānāanekamahoghehi khaṇitattā “pokkharaṇī”ti laddhanāmaṃ jalāsayaṃ
atk-s0510a:3834_3: ogayha ogahetvā pavisitvā ajjhogāhetvā ghāsahetukhādanatthāya tattha pokkharaṇiyaṃ pavisitvā bhisaṃ padumapuṇḍarīkamūlaṃ
atk-s0510a:3834_5: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānapadatthattā ca nayānusārena suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0510a:3837_0: Navamāpadāne esanāya carantassātiādikaṃ āyasmato sivakattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3837_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0510a:3837_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0510a:3837_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakulagehe nibbattitvā sivakotissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3837_5: So vayappatto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3837_6: vicaranto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto
atk-s0510a:3838_1: Arahattaṃ patvā somanassajāto attano pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento esanāya carantassātiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3841_0: Dasamāpadāne padumuttaro nāma jinotiādikaṃ āyasmato upavānattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3841_1: Ayaṃ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto kenaci
atk-s0510a:3841_2: kammacchiddena padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle dalliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0510a:3841_3: tassa dhātuṃ gahetvā manussadevanāgagaruḷayakkhakumbhaṇḍagandhabbehi sattaratanamaye sattayojanike thūpe
atk-s0510a:3841_4: kate tattha sudhotaṃ attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ veḷagge ābandhitvā dhajaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0510a:3841_5: Taṃ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṃ ṭhapito adissamānakāyo ākāse
atk-s0510a:3841_8: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0510a:3841_9: upavānoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0510a:3841_12: Tena ca samayena bhagavato vātābādho uppajji.
atk-s0510a:3841_13: Therassa gihisahāyo devahito nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasati.
atk-s0510a:3841_15: Athāyasmā upavāno nivāsetvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā tassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0510a:3841_16: Brāhmaṇo “kenaci maññe payojanena thero āgato bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “vadeyyātha, bhante,
atk-s0510a:3843_0: Sace uṇhodakaṃ atthi, munino dehi brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0510a:3847_1: yo imasmiṃ loke pūjaneyyānaṃ pūjetabbehi sakkādīhi devehi mahābrahmādīhi ca brahmehi pūjito,
atk-s0510a:3847_5: sobhanagamanādinā sugato sabbaññū muni mayhaṃ satthā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā,
atk-s0510a:3847_6: so dāni vātehi vātahetu vātakkhobhanimittaṃ ābādhiko jāto. Sace, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0510a:3847_8: tassa vātābādhavūpasamanatthaṃ taṃ hātave upanetuṃ icchāmīti.
atk-s0510a:3848_0: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo uṇhodakaṃ tadanurūpaṃ vātaharañca bhesajjaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi.
atk-s0510a:3849_1: Athāyasmā upavāno aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttaro nāma jinotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3850_2: Citakaṃ katvāti yojanubbedhaṃ candanarāsicitakaṃ katvā bhagavato sarīraṃ tattha abhiropayiṃsūti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3851_0: 124. Sarīrakiccaṃ katvānāti ādahanāti agginā dahanakiccaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3852_1: Jaṅghā maṇimayā āsīti manussehi katathūpe jaṅghā pupphavāhatthaṃ caritaṭṭhānaṃ maṇimayā indanīlamaṇinā katāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3852_2: Mayampīti sabbe devā thūpaṃ karissāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3853_1: Dhātu āveṇikā natthīti devamanussehi visuṃ visuṃ cetiyaṃ kātuṃ āveṇikā visuṃ dhātu natthi,
atk-s0510a:3853_3: Adhiṭṭhānabalena sakalasarīradhātu ekaghanasilāmayapaṭimā viya ekameva ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3853_4: Imamhi buddhathūpamhīti sakalajambudīpavāsīhi katamhi imamhi suvaṇṇathūpamhi mayaṃ sabbe samāgantvā kañcukathūpaṃ karissāmāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3854_2: Tato adhikavaṇṇatā mahāmaṇi indanīlamaṇayo ca mahānīlamaṇayo ca jotirasamaṇijātiraṅgamaṇayo ca ekato
atk-s0510a:3854_3: sannipātetvā rāsī katvā suvaṇṇathūpe kañcukathūpaṃ katvā achādayunti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3855_0: 144. Paccekaṃ buddhaseṭṭhassāti buddhuttamassa pati ekaṃ visuṃ uparichadanena thūpaṃ akaṃsūti attho.
atk-s0510a:3856_1: Kumbhaṇḍā guyhakā tathāti kumbhamattāni aṇḍāni yesaṃ devānaṃ te kumbhaṇḍā,
atk-s0510a:3856_2: paṭicchādetvā niguhitvā paṭicchādanato garuḷā guyhakā nāma jātā,
atk-s0510a:3856_3: te kumbhaṇḍā guyhakāpi thūpaṃ akaṃsūti attho.
atk-s0510a:3857_1: Atibhonti na tassābhāti tassa cetiyassa pabhaṃ candasūriyatārakānaṃ pabhā na atibhonti,
atk-s0510a:3858_1: Ahampi kāraṃ kassāmīti tādino lokanāthassa thūpasmiṃ ahampi kāraṃ puññakiriyaṃ kusalakammaṃ dhajapaṭākapūjaṃ karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0510a:3861_0: Ekādasamāpadāne padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādikaṃ āyasmato raṭṭhapālattherassa apadānaṃ.
atk-s0510a:3861_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0510a:3861_2: bhagavato kāle tassa uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0510a:3861_3: pitu accayena gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena dassitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ kulavaṃsānugataṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3861_4: disvā “imaṃ ettakaṃ dhanarāsiṃ mayhaṃ ayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0510a:3861_5: mayā pana gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ deti.
atk-s0510a:3861_6: So abhiññālābhiṃ ekaṃ tāpasaṃ upaṭṭhahanto tena devalokādhipacce uyyojito yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devo hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0510a:3861_7: So tattha devaloke devarajjaṃ karonto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto manussaloke bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ
atk-s0510a:3861_9: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro nāma bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasattaṃ nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātakhemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesi.
atk-s0510a:3861_10: Atha so kulaputto anukkamena viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato satthāraṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0510a:3862_0: Tena ca samayena satthā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi,
atk-s0510a:3862_1: taṃ disvā pasannamānaso tadatthāya cittaṃ ṭhapetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato mahatā sakkārena
atk-s0510a:3862_3: Satthā tassa anantarāyena ijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0510a:3862_4: So satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0510a:3862_5: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvānavutikappe phussassa
atk-s0510a:3862_6: bhagavato kāle satthu vemātikabhātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahantesu tesaṃ puññakiriyāya
atk-s0510a:3862_8: Evaṃ tattha tattha bhave taṃ taṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0510a:3862_10: tassa bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthe kule nibbattattā raṭṭhapāloti vaṃsānugatameva nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3862_11: So mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena yobbanaṃ patto mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena saṃyojetvā mahante
atk-s0510a:3862_12: ca yase patiṭṭhāpito dibbasampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0510a:3862_13: Atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṃ caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṃ anupāpuṇi.
atk-s0510a:3862_14: Taṃ sutvā raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0510a:3862_15: sattavāre bhattacchede katvā kicchena kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0510a:3862_16: yācitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa santike pabbajitvā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0510a:3863_1: Athāyasmā aparabhāge attano pubbakammaṃ saritvā somanassajāto pubbacaritāpadānaṃ pakāsento padumuttarassa bhagavatotiādimāha.
atk-s0510a:3863_2: Sunāgo so mayā dinnoti tadā mahādhanaseṭṭhi hutvā sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dānamukhe vissajjanasamaye sattappatiṭṭho
atk-s0510a:3863_3: sundaro nāgo hatthirājā mayā dinno ahosi.
atk-s0510a:3863_12: Itthambhūto hatthināgo padumuttarassa bhagavato mayā dinnoti attho.
atk-s0510a:3864_1: Mayā bhattaṃ kāretvānāti mayā kārāpitavihāre vasantānaṃ koṭisaṅkhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā mahesino niyyādesinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a:3865_1: Jalajuttamanāmakoti jalato jāto jalajo, kiṃ taṃ? Padumaṃ,
atk-s0510a:3865_2: padumena samānanāmattā uttamattā ca padumuttaro nāma bhagavāti attho.
atk-s0510a:3871_0: Sīhaḷadīpake appicchatādiguṇavantānaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ ānandattherādīnaṃ sabbasattānaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhādayo
atk-s0510a:3871_1: chedananiggahavivecanādyatthaṃ sattahi māsehi ativiya ārādhanena laddhakosallena bodhisambhāraṃ gavesantena
atk-s0510a:3871_2: satidhitigativīriyaparakkamantena mahāsamantaguṇasobhanena tipiṭakadharena paṇḍitena ābhataṃ imaṃ apadāna-
atk-s0510a:3872_0: Anena lobhādimalā pajānaṃ, cakkhādirogā vividhā ca dukkhā;
atk-s0510a:3873_0: Kalahādibhayā dukkhitā jātā, corādayonatthakarā ca loke.
atk-s0510a:3874_0: Nassantu me pañca verā ca pāpā, nassantu gimhe yathā vuṭṭhivātā;
atk-s0510a:3879_0: Sabbe dhammānuyāyantu, tayo lokā utupi cāti.
